Title: No refund or reply to email
Review: Ordered a BTO MacBook Air, a card reader and an adapter for almost ‚Ç¨2k and have gotten no product or refund. The day after ordering I got an email stating that the order was cancelled and that I would get a refund. It's been over two weeks now and I still haven't gotten my money back or a response to my email.EDIT: The fact that the order is cancelled is not the problem. The problem is that I still haven't received a refund or a reply to my email about when I should expect said refund.
Response: Hello, the order had to be cancelled because it was placed as a privat order but had a forwarding company as the invoice address. Firstly, we had to cancel due to compliance concerns. Secondly, our carriers quite often don't finish deliveries to such addresses because the privat recipient of goods is not present at the address. We ask for your understanding. Regards, Marc

Title: Everything good
Review: I ordered it as a gift ( Harman Kardon speaker) and unbelievable how the box arrived, they send it in the original box without any cover or protection‚Ä¶.the box come broken and dirty‚Ä¶i made pictures too‚Ä¶very disappointed‚Ä¶I will never buy nothing from them.( update: They solve my problem, so I can say everything is ok, anyway they must and try to pack better‚Ä¶I know it‚Äôs fault most probably of the delivery company‚Ä¶DPD üëéüèº
Response: Hello, we'd like to apologize for the damage of the packaging during transit. Some of our items may get shipped in original packaging in order to reduce packaging material. The process isn't completely optimized yet, so any feedback helps us in making adjustments. I've sent you an email with further details about the subsequent handling of your order. Regards, Marc from Cyberport

Review: Well, I ordered Thursday and get my package Friday, I didn't see that coming, everything came in good shape, I highly recommend.

Title: Possibly worst internet sale expereince
Review: They Own computeruniverse where I Ordered a PC, after tens of phone calls and emails and after 2 months where they were not responding, managed to get a response (from the mother company CYBERPORT to which the payment was made) that the products was not available and to change my order so I requested  a refund which I received so late (after 2 months).  They requested bank transfer instead of card payment which helped them not being traced and be able to report the transaction to bank.  Very very bad experience!! If i did not insist they would have scammed me.

Review: simplicity of ordering and the wide range of discounts

Title: Easy Peesy
Review: easy order procedure no needless steps to complete the order

Title: This is the first time I've seen‚Ä¶
Review: This is the first time I've seen something like this. To refuse a VAT refund based on nationality. Discrimination in the center of Berlin, simply because you are from Ukraine. We have never heard a legal justification. Just seeing our passport, they directly told us ‚Äúwe are forced to refuse your purchase and refund VAT in the future.‚Äù Since we do not know the language, our friend helped us and he is a German citizen who said that for the first time in his life he encountered such a reason for refusal. simply because we are of a certain nationality.
Response: Hello Mr. Mevlid, the background is that there's an EU embargo regulation that is relevant for some specific persons in Ukraine, but also connected persons. As a retailer, we're obligated to follow this regulation. Due to technical reasons, we can thus not issue a Global Blue form for handling a VAT refund. There is no general obligation for retailers to offer the VAT refund process. I've sent you an email with further details, and an offer in order to be accommodating. The store employees assured us that there was no discriminatory basis for the interaction. We regret the legal justification not coming across in the store correctly, and would like to apologize for that. Regards, Marc

Title: it was all nice and smood
Review: it was all nice and smood, no issues. Keep going like that.

Title: Very fast and convenient
Review: We bought an Ipad for my grandpa here so we can keep in touch with him during the war. We went to cyberport in Bikini Berlin, Ipad was in stock and the exact configuration we wanted. The purchase was made very quickly it took only 5 minutes.

Title: First-rate, dependable, refreshingly professional service!
Review: I don't usually write positive reviews here as I rarely have any positive experiences to report. Because customer service in 2022 is generally poor to non-existent, we jaded consumers have come to expect nothing more.Cyberport however deserve the highest accolade I can give them. I ordered an iMac for my business on Sunday and it arrived (with VAT receipt) on Tuesday afternoon. I even got a phone call on the Monday to inform me it had been packed and was awaiting pickup. Just amazing!20 years ago, this level of customer service was normal, nowadays it is very rare indeed. Thank you Cyberport for a smooth and pleasant transaction, I will shop again with confidence!

Title: I placed an order for a Starlink unit‚Ä¶
Review: I placed an order for a Starlink unit that was listed as "in stock" 13 days ago but have not received it yet. In addition, I have been billed a second time for shipping. The initial payment was ‚Ç¨324.99, which included VAT and shipping costs, and now I‚Äôve been charged an additional ‚Ç¨21.84 for shipping, for reasons unknown to me. I have attempted to contact customer service via email to inquire about a VAT refund but have not received a response. I'm hoping we can address and resolve these issues here.
Response: Hi Artur, we regret the long wait and the double reservation. We are currently still waiting for the starlink to arrive, which is expected to be imminent. As soon as the goods have been received, they will be sent to you on a daily basis.The double reservation of the shipping costs was due to the fact that your order had to be adjusted because the order is VAT-free. As soon as the goods have been dispatched and invoiced, we will of course only collect the correct net price and not the gross EUR 324.99 previously authorized by you.Unfortunately we could not find your e-mail in the system, for further questions please contact us directly at Kundenzufriedenheit@cyberport.de Best regards Jens from the Cyberport team

Title: Broken Pro Display XDR
Review: Bought a B-Stock Pro Display XDR and picked it up in Bochum. Discovered a few months later there is a scratch inside the glass panel. You can only see it when shining with a flashlight on it. Contacted Cyberport, they never e-mailed back. Had to sell the Pro Display XDR with a loss and buy a new one from a Dutch APR. Cyberport doesn‚Äôt know anything about service or checking B-Stock products. Never again.Edit: just received an email where ‚Äòcustomer Happiness‚Äô is blaming me for not noticing the damage earlier and they will not do anything against it. If you want to lose your money quickly and have a poor customer service, order with Cyberport!
Response: Hello Mr. de Wit, we could not find any emails in our archive with your name, the order number, or the email address that had been used for the order. Please send us details on how and when exactly you had tried to contact us to kundenzufriedenheit@cyberport.de. Regards, Marc

Title: Great online and physical shop!
Review: NaN

Title: Tampering with new Apple products packaging
Review: I had an unfortunate pleasure of ordering brand new AirPods Pro 2 from this store because they had a good deal. However, when the package arrived, I realized that one seal on the box was already torn which meant that someone already tried to open the packaging of the AirPods which, as mentioned before, they advertised as brand new.Looking for an explanation regarding this issue, I contacted them directly, but I got no response. Perfect customer support.I'm certain that before the product was wrapped and shipped, someone approved that state of it and didn't care if it had marks or not. As everyone already knows, every Apple product when ordered new has all the seals untouched.Therefore, I find this very unprofessional in every sense and won't surely order there again!
Response: Hello, we've received your email from the 23.11. and have checked the serial number tracking of the item. Currently, we're still examining the cause of one of the two seals being broken. We'd like to apologize for the long processing time of your email due to the high volume of incoming emails because of Black Friday. We've sent you an email asking for more information regarding the case as well as the further handling. Regards, Marc

Title: DONT WASTE YOUR TIME AND MONEY!
Review: DONT WASTE YOUR TIME AND MONEY!The worst customer service ever, they will book your money, over sale the stock, give you delivery dates on a Public holiday! Brag about 3 to 10 day delivery time and never stick to it! buy from here only if you have all the time and money in the world and ready to get rude people answering you!
Response: Hello, the availability of the item unfortunately changed as a result of the strain on the logistics during the time around Black Friday. We'd like to apologize for the delay. Best regards, Marc

Title: Good organised shop
Review: Good organised shop, everything is where you expect to find it. Super response during order placement, and permanent information during processing through delivery. Only one minor thing, partial delivery is not always required, only adds to the costs.I'm totally satisfied with the shop and it's performance and can Highly recommend it to other users.

Title: Poor support/customer service.
Review: Poor support/customer service.‚Ç¨1,700 device ordered, used device delivered.The Lenovo seal was broken, the warranty has been running for 3 months, instructions were missing, the device was already unpacked (no protective film), and fingerprints are everywhere.Got offered a ‚Ç¨35 refund on request (2% of the price)On counter-offer, refund withdrawn by merchant and referred to return.
Response: Hello Lars_und_so, we'd like to apologize if you've been sent a device in a flawed condition, or even been mistakenly sent a device that should've been B-Stock. In such cases we will offer the exchange of the device, provided that we have it available once more. There's also the return of the device for full refund, of course. If the condition of the device and further circumstances allow for it then we will try to offer a price reduction as another option. You've sent us an email detailing the problem and asked for a price reduction. After a colleague offered 35 euros you explictily requested the return, and only after sending you the documents for the return you've sent us another email making a counter-offer of a price reduction of 320 euros, refering to usual B-stock prices. This is not close to usual price reductions we have for B-stock. Regards, Marc

Title: Wanted to buy apple products‚Ä¶never managed
Review: Ordered one and the same item twice in less than half a year. Got it cancelled both times. Even I was checking after the order if the buying button is still working. After that- Wanted to order a MacBook. Wrote an email asking a question , never got a reply. I mean how bad this thing pretending to be a shop could be?)
Response: Hello Mr. Kulikov, we're sorry that this happened to you. We will check what has occured in detail. The device that you had ordered seemed to have been misinventory of a delisted item. If there there's still a matter of concern that I can help you with then please send an email to kundenzufriedenheit@cyberport.de. Regards, Marc

Title: No actions from customer service. Misleading contradiction infos. 9 months delay with the order.
Review: After ordering the speaker in April, I‚Äôve been experiencing constant delays with delivery date. The customer service was telling that it would arrive in two weeks. It was happening for a few months until they scheduled delievery date for Dec. After 9 months, I still havent had it arrived although the seller still have it on they www as available to purchase. Double standards for german and non-german customers?
Response: Hello S.J.K., the speaker had been ordered from our distributors. We're experiencing delays in getting that shipment. That precise model and colour combination had been taken off the webshop. We are sorry that we have not received the shipment yet and therefore have not been able to send the items. Regards, Marc

At the end I reurned the item and order it from different store.Don‚Äôt recommend.

During a call with our customer service, you were supposed to get in touch with our private customer sales team in order to offer you a suitable alternative. If there's still something that I can check for you then please write to us to kundenzufriedenheit@cyberport.de. Regards, Marc from Cyberport

Title: Never delivered in 15 days, useless customer service. Refund not issued after 1 month.
Review: Very bad experience with their online shop. Will not purchase online again.The process is easy as any other and they sent the bill in one day, everything fine here.They never provided a tracking number and, if you don't register as user at the time of purchase, you won't be able to check for the shipment status.You can ask customer service using email or WhatsApp: both are useless. Twelve days after purchase, on Friday, their answer was that it was within expected time. Meaning that Monday would be the 14th say, which is way too long.On day 15, we requested a cancellation and refund, not knowing where the item was. Their answer was that they need to have the item back to proceed with the refund. How would I return it if it never arrived?One week after, the carrier company call to schedule a delivery. We asked them to send it back to the seller. One week after, so one month after the purchase, we have not hear anything from cyberport. They have not process the refund and after calling them, they say they won't do until they receive the item.They never fulfill their side of the contract and they do not refund a thousand euro purchase.

I ordered an iMac for my business on Sunday and it arrived (with VAT receipt) on Tuesday afternoon. I even got a phone call on the Monday to inform me it had been packed and was awaiting pickup. Just amazing!20 years ago, this level of customer service was normal, nowadays it is very rare indeed. Thank you Cyberport for a smooth and pleasant transaction, I will shop again with confidence!

Title: Never got my package, customer service ignored me, lied to me, then ignored me again
Review: I wanted to buy my grandma a laptop for her birthday and found one on cyberport that fit my budget. I ordered it, my payment went through, and within a day I received an email that my package was handed over to the carrier (DPD) along with a tracking number. I thought everything was fine, but I was very-very wrong.I ordered on the 24th of May. After the 27th, there were no more updates about my package. I wasn't too worried at first, but after waiting more than a week (around two weeks if we count weekends and holidays) I tried to contact cyberport to ask about my package. All I got was an automatic reply linking me to their general information page on problems that might arise from the pandemic. There I found that deliveries might take up to 14 days instead of what's said elsewhere on the website. It was also made clear in the email that they wouldn't answer questions about delivery dates, so this link was all I was going to get.Fine. 14 days it is. It was cutting it close since we are talking about a birthday present here, but I was willing to give them the benefit of the doubt. Except my package still wouldn't get updated, so after sitting out the 14 work days, I contacted DPD directly, hoping they would actually give me the time of day. Guess what! They never even received my package! Told me to contact the sender and ask them.Another email to cyberport, attaching my previous one for reference. A few hours after receiving the same autamic answer, an actual human contacted me! They told me that since the package hasn't moved since the 27th of May (we were nearing the middle of June at this point) they presumed that the package is lost and would send a replacement as soon as possible. They would contact me if they needed additional info from me, but otherwise I didn't need to do anything but wait for a new email with a new tracking number.Okay, fine. Things happen, packages get lost sometimes, I get that. We could have solved this a lot sooner if they had been willing to talk to me the first time I contacted them, but at least we were getting somewhere now, right?No. We absolutely weren't.One day passes in radio silence. Two days. It was a little strange since I received the first tracking number so quickly, but I just assumed that sending out a replacement must involve more bureaucracy. One more day, I told myself, then I would remind them of my existence again.Lo and behold, I get an email on the morning of the third day stating that... They issued me a refund? What?No explanation given. I went back to the single email I received from an actual human working at the company, but nothing in there either that would imply that this might happen.I looked at their site, and yes, my suspicions were correct: the sale that put the laptop within my price range ended sometime during this mess. My guess is that they weren't willing to honor the price that I originally bought the laptop for, but we will never know because after three days (again, not counting the weekend) I still haven't received an answer as to what happened with that promise of a replacement package they made me.At least I did get my money back, so they didn't scam me out of my money, only out of my time that I could have spent finding a different present for my grandma. Whatever I find now, I'll only be able to give it to her after her birthday. Thanks for nothing, cyberport. And anyone reading this, I hope you will find whatever you want to buy at a different store. Spare yourself the trouble and do not do business with them.
Response: Hello, I completely understand your frustration and would like to apologize to you. We have packed the item here and passed it on to DPD. However, the package seems to have been lost. We have given the case here to DPD for clarification and have a regulation made after checking. Unfortunately, we no longer have the item in stock and can not obtain it from the manufacturer and supplier. For this reason, we have immediately made a refund so that it is possible to order an alternative here. If you still have questions here, then please do not hesitate and contact me at kundenzufriedenheit@cyberport.de with exact data. Many greetings, Manuel from the Cyberport team

Title: seller refused to refund by PayPal, as good was paid.
Review: Three months later refund from seller still not paid!
Response: Hallo, hier hat der Kunde die Bestellung stornieren lassen und wir haben die Zahlung umgehend erstattet. Viele Gr√º√üe, Manuel vom Cyberport-Team

Title: Extremely unprofessional and a bunch of liars
Review: Extremely unprofessional. Ordered a new Macbook Pro that was listed as on stock. I even called their support prior ordering to make sure that it is on stock for immediate shipping and was guaranteed that it is on stock for immediate shipping. After paying 6.800 Euro and buying this maxed out Macbook Pro on their web store, I received no confirmation for days. After almost a week I checked with them, why the item was not sent to me. I was told that the item is not on stock and that it will be available in two to three months. Prior contacting them I didn‚Äôt receive any notification about this. If I would not contact them, they would leave me waiting for months. This is the third time that this happened to me with Cyberport and the last time. I received no refund although my order was canceled. I had to open a case on Paypal. I won‚Äôt order from them anymore. It‚Äôs a nightmare!Reply to Cyberport‚Äôs reply:Like I‚Äôve wrote, you are a bunch of liars! Your reply is a complete lie! How is this possible that you don‚Äôt reserve a product for a customer, when the customer paid almost 7000 Euro to you? Your excuse is a complete nonsense and a proof that you are not a honest and professional company. Too bad I can‚Äôt post emails and proof here, so that people could see, how awful you lie as company. Btw I payed the VAT also upfront! I can see that I‚Äôm not the only one that had problems with your company. There are plenty of unhappy customers commenting here. This means you need to take action and prevent such things from happening and don‚Äôt write untruthful excuses here. It‚Äôs extremely sad to see that you treat your customers this way!
Response: Hallo, leider ist dieser Fall hier falsch dargestellt. Die Ware wurde hier ins Ausland bestellt und dadurch muss eine entsprechende Steuerpr√ºfung durchgef√ºhrt werden. Dies geschah einen Werktag nach Bestellung. Nach einer daraus resultierenden Freigabe wurde festgestellt, das sich der Liefertermin, welchen wir vom Hersteller genannt bekommen haben, verschoben hat. Das hat der Kunde genau an diesem Tag auch erfahren. Auf Kundenwunsch wurde die Bestellung dann storniert. Aufgrund des er√∂ffneten PayPal-Konfliktes kann hier von unserer Seite aber keine Erstattung durchgef√ºhrt werden. Der Konflikt wurde hier im √ºbrigen unmittelbar nach Stornierung er√∂ffnet. Schade, das hier schlicht die Unwahrheit verbreitet wurde. Viele Gr√º√üe, Manuel vom Cyberport-TeamHello, unfortunately this case is misrepresented here. The goods here were ordered abroad and as a result a corresponding tax audit must be carried out. This happened one business day after the order. After a resulting release, it was determined that the delivery date, which we have been given by the manufacturer, has been postponed. The customer also found this out on this very day. At the customer's request, the order was then canceled. Due to the opened PayPal conflict, however, no refund can be made from our side. The conflict was opened here immediately after cancellation. Too bad that here simply the untruth was spread. Many greetings, Manuel from the Cyberport team

Title: Fraud and Scams
Review: I have been in Germany for 1 month, I was looking for to buy RAM memory for very good price, went on site ordered it payed for it in advanced. As my stay in Germany has been coming to it's end I didn't received my order in 2 weeks. I have sent email with questions about my order, one week later I got reply that it will be available again in 2 and a half weeks time, and I will no longer be in Germany by that time. I have requested refund for my money, didn't got the answer for 3 more days. After 3 days they told my that my order is no longer available and that I can get my refund after 3 working days, or sooner if i have payed with PayPal ... I have payed with my Visa, 3 days have passed and i still didn't get my money back, my mails are not answered. On all that they took 6 more euros from my bank account, and didn't explain a thing for what that was for! And my only chance now is to sue cyberport for fraud and that will happen for sure. NEVER ORDERING ANYTHING FROM THESE SCAMMERS
Response: Hallo, sofern sich die Verf√ºgbarkeit eines Artikels kurzfristig √§ndert informieren wir unsere Kunden unverz√ºglich und transparent √ºber diesen Umstand. Bedauerlicherweise produzieren wir die Artikel, welche wir anbieten, nicht. An der schlechten Verf√ºgbarkeit k√∂nnen wir daher bedauerlicherweise nicht viel √§ndern. Stattdessen bieten wir unseren Kunden an, dass Sie den Kaufbetrag unverz√ºglich erstattet bekommen, oder aber dass unsere Kunden sich eine passende Alternative aussuchen. Dabei achten wir stets darauf, dass der Kauf einer Alternative nicht zum Nachteil des Kunden wird. So treten wir kulant und l√∂sungsorientiert gegen√ºber unseren Kunden auf. Wir haben hier auf alle Anfragen zeitnah reagiert und auch die Stornierung umgehend am n√§chsten Werktag erledigt. Danach ist auch der Betrag umgehend erstattet wurden. Viele Gr√º√üe, Manuel vom Cyberport-Team

Title: Orders cancelled for no reason - Geoblocking, EU Law violation
Review: My orders are getting cancelled, and nobody from support can tell me the reason. Officially. They are not responding to my e-mails, don't follow up on phone calls, complete stop of communication.Unofficially, it's due to Mailboxde.com warehouse address being blacklisted in their system, as it's a post forwarding company that ships internationally. However, I'm from the EU and since Cyberport doesn't ship to my current country by default, this in plain English violates the Geoblocking regulation (EU) 2018/302. Feel free to read upon the subject on the eur-lex.europa.eu website (Document 32018R0302).Additionally, I want to stress out that I am a German resident and paying with a German bank card, using Mailboxde.com post forwarding services only when I'm abroad in another EU country for extended periods of time, which is often due to my work. This "behind the scenes" geoblocking is a discrimination of the highest order and should be investigated by EU authorities. I will certainly contribute to that, if I can with my appalling experience with Cyberport.deEDIT: So you have the answer from Cyberport below. They assume you're a criminal. Even if you legitimately pay them and all your data are valid. This cannot even theoretically be a fraud, but they willingly violate an EU regulation regardless.
Response: Hello, with the order we had to assume fraud and cancelled the order accordingly for protection. We have to protect ourselves and our customers accordingly here. Many greetings, Manuel from the Cyberport teamHallo, bei der Bestellung mussten wir von Betrug ausgehen und haben die Bestellung entsprechend zum Schutz storniert. Wir m√ºssen hier uns und unsere Kunden entsprechend sch√ºtzen. Viele Gr√º√üe, Manuel vom Cyberport-Team

Title: Do not pay by credit card!
Review: Bought a monitor for 264,99‚Ç¨ incuding shipping, payment via mastercard. Everything seemed ok at first, the proper amount was deducted form my credit card. However, an amount of 8,99‚Ç¨ was additionally deducted from my credit card.Called the customer service, had to wait 45 minutes (!) until the service agent was ready to tell me that he cannot help me.Problem is that I do not have any order over the amount of 8,99‚Ç¨. Right. I do not have such an order because I did not order anything for 8,99‚Ç¨. So I had to block my credit card. Let's see what happens next.
Response: Hi, I'll be happy to take a look at what happened on your end. Please write us with the order number and a description and we will get back to you. Many greetings, Manuel from the Cyberport team

Title: never again
Review: I wanted to buy 2x Amazon echo 4 speakers for black Friday. Because delivery costs to Slovenia are almost 30‚Ç¨ i also ordered some other products on their website. After a while they send me email that blue speakers are unavailable and if i would like to have something else. I sent them email if they could please send me speakers in antracit color which they have on stock, but they never answered. They sent me other products without speakers but for same delivery costs. They canceled speakers. I have also some other problems on their page - if you pay with Paypal there is no value on it and they authorize bigger value than the order when you confirm. We tried to reach them by email and telephone but they never answered.
Response: Hallo,die Vorw√ºrfe, das wir mehr buchen als bei Bestellung angezeigt weisen wir mit aller Deutlichkeit zur√ºck, da dies bei PayPalzahlung unm√∂glich ist. Title: Worst customer service and website ever
Review: Avoid with all costs! Worst customer service and online shopping platform experience ever.They are selling on their website products they don't actually have in stock, or they have no idea if the products are available or not?! Any attempt to contact customer service is futile if you don't speak German(email and phone call). Although they pretend to be an European retailer, I was told on the phone "Deutsche Firma, Deutsche Sprache" a few times, such a 21st century mentality.After a few days without any success finding out what actually happened with my order, I had to ask a German friend to call and the answer was: there is an error with my order and they actually don't know what the problem is, or if they actually have the product, or when is the issue gonna sort out. After a few days of stress, lost time, and blocked money, I finally managed to cancel the order. They said I'm gonna get my money back in 3 days. I am waiting..But rest assured, if there are gonna be any delays getting my money back, next time you'll gonna be contacted by a lawyer. This is unacceptable!

Title: Worst customer service and Potentially scam
Review: After 10 days since placing my order, I received nothing, not even an email. I contacted them TWICE aand after 3 days they replied telling me there had been an error and the order was not processed. 5 Days later, Still nothing. They reply to my email once every 2 days. Worst customer assistance I've seen in a while. Definitely avoid it. They're slowand won't even reply to you until you stress them out with multiple emails. 3 Weeks later I asked for a refund, let's see how long it will takeEDIT: They said, and I quote ‚Äú Just once again I have informed our accounting department about the procedure and asked for the urgency of your request.‚ÄùThis is what I received on the 18th. No further response from them. I feel like I‚Äôm being scammed. I‚Äôve been buying from the internet for more than 10 years, and I can say this is the worst experience I‚Äôve ever had. Good job Cyberport, you‚Äôre legit scamming me.EDIT 2: They ignored every single one of my emails after the first one about the refund. They never directly refunded it, I had to wait 30 days and make it through the bank. Worst experience I‚Äôve ever had so far

Title: Item in the shopping trolley for 1390
Review: Item in the shopping trolley for 1390, went to pay, but now 1490. What? Tried again, advertised for 1390, renewed page, shopping trolley, went to pay, now 1490 without warning. This seems very odd and must surely not be OK.Then suddenly the item is no longer available on the page. What is happening? Called several times, they could not take my call.

Title: Schreckliche Kundenerfahrung
Review: Schreckliche Kundenerfahrung. Ich habe einen Fernseher im Rahmen eines zeitlich Aktion bestellt. Ich habe die Zahlung best√§tigt und 3 Tage sp√§ter immer noch keinen Liefertermin, obwohl der Fernseher auf der Website eindeutig verf√ºgbar ist. Ich musste den Kundenservice anrufen, um zu erfahren, dass das TV-Modell nicht mehr verf√ºgbar ist, was eindeutig eine L√ºge ist. Sie stornieren meine Bestellung. 0 Kommerzielle Geste oder Alternative. Nicht einmal eine Entschuldigung.Terrible customer experience. I ordered a TV as part of a timed promotion. I confirmed payment and 3 days later still no delivery date, even though the TV is clearly available on the website. I had to call customer service to get told that the TV model is no longer available, which is clearly a lie. They cancel my order. 0 commercial gesture or alternative. Not even an apology. Also no effort to speak English or at least to speak German a little bit slower to make it easier to understand.Edit: 1 Week after taking the time to send an email with my details to the address given here, no answer ü§°

Bitte schreibe mir dazu dein Anliegen zusammen mit deiner Auftragsnummer an Kundenzufriedenheit@cyberport.de und ich melde mich anschlie√üend sehr gerne mit einem Feedback bei dir.Viele Gr√º√üeDaniel vom Cyberport-Team

Title: had a bad experience with a caller, but they backed me up: Good customer service after all
Review: I bought an Acer Nitro 5 with 8gb ram and gtx 1650 graphic card. I ran couple of tests after receiving the laptop and decided to give it back. It had low brightness, hard to type keyboards, low resolution, low refreshrate and some more. I put everything in the box and handed it over to the post. After couple of days I got an email stating that they received the box but not the laptop. So I called them to ask about it. At this point I got refunded for the Guarantee but not for laptop. The customer person said that they received the box and the charger, but not the laptop and if i send them the laptop he would give me a refund.I told him that I put everything including the laptop into the box before handing it over to the post, but he couldn‚Äôt accept it and kept on accusing me of trying to steal the laptop. I tried to ask if it could‚Äôve got stolen during the delivery, but he couldn‚Äôt accept that and kept on accusing me of trying to steal it and that he would inform police if I persist that I didn‚Äôt steal it. It was very frustrating. I sent them the laptop and there is no reason for me to steal the laptop as the quality wasn‚Äôt what I was expecting. I already ordered another laptop (Lenovo Legion 5 with 16 gb ram and rtx 3060 from amazon), which fulfills my needs, so I don‚Äôt need the one I ordered from here. I contacted the post that the laptop went missing during the delivery or somewhere between and waiting for their response. Customer service person could‚Äôve helped me to find a ways to figure this out instead of accusing me of stealing it as I didn‚Äôt steal it.‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚ÄîUpdate: I got a refund from Cyberport. I do not know if they found the laptop, but I already contacted the Post about this situation and hopefully it will get resolved if they didn‚Äôt find it.

Title: I purchased ASUS Laptop and Samsung A71‚Ä¶
Review: I purchased ASUS Laptop and Samsung A71 from Cyberport. I wanted to confirm that I could get the computer in the original state so that I could initiate the install. The customer service was fabulous and the order process was great. The computer came as scheduled and exactly as described. Also, the phone was using the battery to fast but this was determined to be the natural process of Samsung smart battery optimizing. Again customer service provided all answers and support easily by email. The products were priced very competitive and after now 3 months use I am very happy.

Title: Very good service

Title: Super
Review: Super! Fast order. Fast delivery.

Title: My worse online shopping experience ever
Review: Update about my previous negative review:I‚Äôm shopping online for at least 5 years and Cyberport has been my WORSE experience sofar. On 10.5.2021, I placed an order for a NVMe disk with this status: ‚Äúavailable within 3 to 10 days‚Äù. The product was available on other platforms and was even a bit cheaper. However, since I had ordered the other computer components from Cyberport, I decided to order all of the parts from there and this was my biggest mistake!Delivery date: after 2 UNANSWERED emails, multiple submitted contact forms, and 1 phone call without any assistance from a very unprofessional support, guess what I received? ESTIMATED delivery date: 02.07.2021!!!What I experienced while struggling for help:1- Contact form is decorative. You will never receive any response from it. Posted there 3 times and got no response. Never.2- ‚Äúkundenzufriedenheit[at]cyberport.de‚Äù email which you see they post below people‚Äôs negative comments is again, decorative and after a while you will receive an AUTOMATED and GENERATED RESPONSE only!! I know it is hard to believe but this is the truth.3- Phone support is very basic with answers like: ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt know, let‚Äôs hope, not sure, let‚Äôs see‚Äù and generic corporate responses exactly like their customer satisfaction email.Delivered products: computer case was severely damaged and full of scratches. It is even deformed and the door cannot be fixed in its place. It seems like DPD has thrown it multiple times during the delivery. A couple of smaller boxes were also deformed but since there‚Äôs no other delivery option on their website to choose from, you HAVE TO use the awful DPD service which is as bad as their shop.Since I still don‚Äôt have the disks, I cannot assemble my new computer and components are of no use for me. This is while their guarantee and testing date is passing and I am still waiting for the disks to arrive!This shop doesn‚Äôt care at all and is not reliable. You must be very careful and avoid ordering anything from there because once you place the order, it is in God‚Äôs hands to be delivered. I will file a legal complaint for their extremely rude and careless customer care. Worse online shopping experience ever!

Title: Express delivery is not express at all
Review: Product was marked as immediately available. I booked and paid express delivery, expecting that I should have it in my hands max. 24 hours later (I live in a big city, not too far from their storage facility), but I learned that they handed it to the logistics provider as standard delivery. Also, AFTER ordering I received an email how difficult everything is because of Covid and that there are major delays in everything. They also said they have no insight where the delivery after I ordered, all outsourced, and pushed all questions to the logistics firm. The logistics provider received the 'express' information from Cyberport nearly 24 hours after ordering. 36 ours after ordering, the logistics firm told me they don't know when the product will arrive, I should keep checking their website. Close to the weekend, I now expect delivery 4-5 days after ordering. When I asked whether the process can be stopped and that I instead go to a store for pickup they said this is not possible.

Review: Today my Dell All in One pc arrived.The Display was already damaged. So i Tool the phone and called the service. Although I have the right to send it back without any comments within a 14 day period, the customer support told me that they don't take it back unless I send them pictures of the damaged display. I was not very satisfied with this, but I decided to take the pictures and send them. After a few minutes I received an automaticall Email. It said it will take approximately 1 week to check the pictures and when the check is done they will send me the retour paper.I have never heard of something similar. Cyber port I think I will not order again.SincerelyA.K.

Title: Broken TV received
Review: Update 8 days later: The broken TV has been picked up, and still no news regarding a replacement. This leaves me back to where I've been for the last 21 days. I have no TV, Cyberport has my money, and I'm using way too much energy on customer support trying to end the nightmare that is dealing with Cyberport.------------------------------------------------------This is the second time I've been displeased with an order from Cyberport.11 days ago, I ordered a decently sized TV. Despite living close to Cyberport, we decided to pay 80 EUR shipping (Which I found rather a high fee), as we don't have a car, and the apartment doesn't have a fitting lift.We called delivery agent on Monday to arrange the handover. We agreed on a delivery between 9 and 14 on Tuesday. This would be perfect, and we made sure that both me and my girlfriend were home at this point in time.My girlfriend rescheduled an important doctors-meeting to 14:45, to ensure that nothing would go wrong, and we were two people home at the time.However, at 14:20 - 20 minutes after the latest agreed upon time - there was still no delivery, and she had to leave.14:40 the TV was finally delivered, by an older looking gentleman, that wasn't capable of carrying the goods himself.So I went out to help him carry it (Parked decently far from the door).As soon as it was delivered to the doorstep - Still two floors from where it was ordered to - he left; leaving me to struggle with it alone.HOWEVER, the thing that outraged me the most, was how badly mangled the package was. Despite "Vorsichtig Behandlen" being plastered on the package, it is dirty, badly dinged, and even missing one of the plastics holding the tv in place, and ensuring safe transport.After 40 minutes of struggling, with the help from some kind neighbours, I finally got up to the apartment.A few hours later,  my girlfriend finally got home, and we were excited to unpack the television.This excitement quickly turned to horror, as we removed the outer shell.We immediately noticed that the main ding in front was gone all the way through, even through the innermost piece of cardboard, and to the screen.However, as the monitor didn't seem to be scathed of this, we carefully assembled the rest.Not until we turned it on, we saw that the entire picture was broken, and the inside of the screen was cracked.I took a bunch of photos of this and sent it to customer service. They aim to reply within a week; which needless to say is unacceptable, after already having waited 12 days. So I tried calling them, but the customer Service couldn't speak english. Got by with broken german, that my only course of action, was to wait and see if they will reply my email.As it currently stands, we have a big, heavy, and expensive, piece of garbage taking up space in our apartment. Furthermore, Even after having sent 5 email, and a long phone-conversation, I'm non-the-wiser on how this can be resolved.
Response: Hello, a defective Tv is of course especially unpleasant when you are waiting for it, so I completely understand your displeasure. I see that today you have already communicated all by phone to my colleague and we will register the damage with the shipping company. Thanks there for your photos. We will get back to you here. Many greetings, Manuel from Cyberport-Team

Title: Shop anywhere else.

Title: Great experience when refunding a product
Review: I had my doubts when ordering an expensive laptop, but i had a great experience when dealing with the Cyberport customer service.  I ordered my laptop and within a week the product arrived just in time. However the laptop screen was malfunctioning so i have requested for a refund. They even answered my messages in the weekend what the process is for refunding back the item.I shipped the item back the next day (Saturday). The item was delivered on Wednesday and Thursday i got my money back. It was super easy and friendly.I will definitely go back to order some stuffs."I am not a fake customer and i am not payed to do this review".Cyberport Team deserve some thumbs up.

Title: Undelivered Package
Review: The DPD package tracking showed that my order was delivered at my door, during the delivery time I was at home and following it online. The delivery courier hadn't been by my apartment and the parcel was nowhere to be found. I made several phone calls with DPD and Cyberport to inform them what happened but the lines were always busy, so I opted to write an email to both but disappointed that neither of them responded. Hopefully you will improve your lousy customer service because this is an awful experience, I paid for something I haven't received.

Title: Nightmare with Apple Abo
Review: My nightmare started with ordering the new iPhone 12 Pro Max with an Apple Abo for 24 months. The delivery was late but this everyone can understand because of the current global situation. The phone has arrived,used. I contacted the support of c-2circle aka cyberport to sort out the issue. They sent me the return label and i shipped the phone on 26th of december 2020. I thought everything was fine until they took the money from my account. I wrote an email and called and they told me : We didn‚Äôt receive the parcel. I was cold as ice because the phone worth is more than 1200,00 ‚Ç¨. Then i called DHL and they told me the tracking number where i saw the post bot didn‚Äôt found the parcel inside the Pack Station. Then i was calling again and they told me its maybe not scanned but it will be delievered. I was all the time in touch with c2-circle and their support. Filled out the forms,promised that everything will be fine,but i am still paying for this device what i don‚Äôt have,what i returned to them! Until today i got an final answer :Dear Mr. Meier, Our partner has just informed us that a package that has been placed in the packing station cannot technically be removed without leaving traces. A break in the subject would bring traces that were not there. The station only registered the opening and closing of the compartment by you and the opening by the DHL messenger.  It must therefore be assumed that the customer did not put the package in the compartment.  No reimbursement can therefore be made. With best regards c2 [circle] service teamOn monday will report all this to the police because i don‚Äôt want to pay for something what i dont have. I thought this is a reliable company but i am shocked how they cut me off.

Review: Good organised shop, everything is where you expect to find it. Super response during order placement, and permanent information during processing through delivery. Only one minor thing, partial delivery is not always required, only adds to the costs.I'm totally satisfied with the shop and it's performance and can Highly recommend it to other users.

Title: So far so good
Review: The order has arrived to the Netherlands in 5 days.

Title: Unpleasant experience
Review: Unpleasant experience. The customer service is super slow and not helpful. I returned a malfunctioning laptop and Cyberport issued the credit note, saying that the money will be in my bank account. But this didn't happen so I contacted them after 1 week and got the answer that everything is ok and that it just takes some time. But it also wasn't there after 2 weeks, so I called again, got the same answer and minutes after the phone call an email saying that I didn't provide my bank account which is causing the delay. I sent them my details and waited. After 3 weeks i wrote them again and received the answer that I'm causing the delay because even after two reminders I didn't provide Cyperport with my bank account details. I wrote back and complained about the treatment and never received an answer. But finally, after almost 4 weeks I have my money back.

Title: Good communication and delivery as‚Ä¶
Review: Good communication and delivery as promissed. Very pleased with the product!!

Title: Does customer service exist?
Review: I originally thought great, a European site that ships to Ireland with reasonably priced items. Maybe I'll treat myself to a new laptop for work. Got an update the day  after ordering day to say the item has been dispatched, this is fantastic..... or so I thought. A week later and the only update on DHL shipping is:"17:02 Local time | The instruction data for this shipment have been provided by the sender to DHL electronically".The item has not been dispatched as of yet, DHL only notified. I expected better with a shipping fee of ‚Ç¨26.99.Since then I've tried every form on the website for customer service and then some. I eventually had to go through Twitter where I actually managed to get a response..... which was really vague and evasive and provided no actual help.Same occurred for Facebook.Eventually I stumbled across the TrustPilot reviews where I saw an email address to contact that everyone gets in a generic response.No luck getting any response from this email. Checked spam folder just in case, no response.Yeah the prices are great but everything after the purchase has been a dreadful experience. I was trying to avoid Amazon, last time I do that. I am a real customer and the order number is 2004404410 if you care to check.This is the single worst shopping exerience of my lifetime with only topped by their customer service.Any responses I've gotten seem generic, evasive and automated.No item to show for my purchase, down over ‚Ç¨1200 and Cyberport evading answers and resolutions.Cyberport CUSTOMER SERVICE NON EXISTENT.If there is any advice I can give to anyone shopping from them if you are really desperate is USE PAYPAL!!!!!!!!At least with their dispute process you will eventually get money back.**** I've had to tweak and condense this due to all the updates ****________________________________________________TIMELINE:Jan 26th - Item purchasedJan 27th - Item marked as dispatched (pretty cool) with tracking number.Jan 29th - Tracking has not updated. Shows the following:Wed, 01/27/2021, 4:02 pmThe broadcast was announced electronically. As soon as the shipment has been processed by us, you will receive further information.I contact Cyberport to ask about tracking. No response.I contact support via contact form - no response.Jan 30: I realize there is a contact form for English contacts, I use this but still no response.I try reaching out via twitter.Feb 1st: I try the English contact form again - no response.I get a response on twitter but they just share the tracking I have with me again evading my questions regarding it.Feb 2nd: I contact DHL about regarding unchanged tracking, very fast response informing me Cyberport has has not given them the package yet.I email Cyberport on the email shared in Trustpilot - no response.I try FB messenger.Feb 3rd: I try the English contact form - no responseFeb 4th - I sent a message to the email (again) provided by Cyberport in response to my review - no reply again.I finally get a response on FB messenger to answers absolutely nothing, completely evasive.Feb 5th: No answers to date. Now at 9 days since marked as dispatched but not really dispatched. No movement on tracking and another talk with DHL today has confirmed that Cyberport has not given them the item yet.I was about to file a PayPal dispute when you are prompted to contact their PayPal email first to resolve.Feb 6th: No answer from PayPal email. Dispute opened. Maybe someone will finally talk to me. I specifically stated to send item and not a refund.Feb 8th: All evidence submitted to PayPal. It's like something out of CSI.Response from Cyberport on Twitter telling me it should be there and I should check with DHL. Clearly not checking the tracking link they provided which states DHL do not have it or the correspondence with DHL I've shared which states they do not have it. WORST customer support ever.Feb 9th: Customer service must only have one person and he must have come back from holidays today because I got an email, a fb message and a twitter message. Sadly no resolution. They are pointing fingers at DHL and I really don't have the time to wait for a big long investigation.Gave multiple prompts this day for an update before moving to PayPal resolution but 0 responses. Escalated to Paypal.Contacted European Commission for consumers.Feb 10th: No responses to previous FB / Twitter / Emails. Still no movement on DHL.Feb 11th: Emails with receipts for each item and stating it will be refunded back to PayPal. No communication just refund, based on previous reviews I expect this to be a painful process.Reviewed by PayPal and full amount in refund process.Got one final message on Twitter from Cyberport apologizing for everything on behalf of DHL. Couldn't even take responsibility for their own service.
Response: Hallo, es tut mir leid, dass Sie eine solche schlechte Erfahrung machen mussten. Ihr Feedback gebe ich selbstverst√§ndlich an die richtigen Stellen weiter, damit wir uns hier verbessern k√∂nnen. Falls wir noch etwas f√ºr Sie tun k√∂nnen, dann schreiben Sie uns gern per E-Mail an kundenzufriedenheit@cyberport.de und geben uns die Kunden oder Bearbeitungsnummer inklusive den Text Ihrer Bewertung. Viele Gr√º√üe, Manuel vom Cyberport-Team

Title: 1 hour after I paid by bank transfer‚Ä¶
Review: 2 days after I placed an order, and 1 hour after I paid by bank transfer for item 'in stock', they cancelled my order.It is now 3 working days since my order was cancelled and I have not received my money back. I contacted them on facebook messenger, the person replied to me but stopped replying once I asked when I will get my refund. I feel like I have been scammed from being ignored by customer service. And they should not sell something in stock if there is no stock.---------------------------------Update 4/2 after cyberport reply to reviewNO Refund yetNO Reply to emailThis Manuel bot same person who is ignoring me on facebook despite reading messages. Do not believe their pathetic reply to reviews here, you email them, message, phone, still no reply. Customer service does not exist.Update 5/2NO RefundNO Reply to emailUpdate 7/2NO RefundNO Reply to emailCyberport still has ‚Ç¨600 from me on order They cancelled without explanation. It is 10 days (6 working days) since they have my money.Update 8/2NO RefundNO Reply to emailUpdate 9/2NO RefundNO Reply to emailUpdate 10/2NO RefundNO Reply to emailNearly 2 weeks since payment.Update 11/2NO RefundNO Reply to emailMore 'promises' on facebook from Manuel with no result.Contacted Bank and European Commission.Update 12/2Got my refund 15 days after payment+order cancelledStill no reply to email from cyberportMaybe someone else I contacted yesterday stepped in who knows.

Title: My order from Cyberport hasn‚Äôt been‚Ä¶
Review: My order from Cyberport hasn‚Äôt been delivered to me - DHL courier made a mistake by writing in the system that he has delivered it to my neighbor (which in fact, didn‚Äôt happen, as I haven‚Äôt received any written confirmation of that and contacted my neighbor already) and DHL didn‚Äôt want to take any responsibility for that. DHL instructed me to contact the seller so he can investigate my case. I tried contacting Cyberport‚Äôs support team numerous times - two of my phone calls were unsuccessful due to the fact that the person over the phone couldn‚Äôt speak English, and last time I was lucky to finally speak to a person who understood my problem - and told me to write an e-mail describing my problem so they can take action ASAP. I already did it (wrote an e-mail + send contact form twice) - but no one ever contacted me back although it‚Äôs been more than a week ago already. The result is that I‚Äôve lost 158‚Ç¨ for my purchase and haven‚Äôt received ANY support from Cyberport.

Title: Where do I start??
Review: Where do I start? Their website does not function properly if you use a gift card. Try and order something for ‚Ç¨66 and use a ‚Ç¨50 gift card and the website says you haven‚Äôt spent enough to use a ‚Ç¨50 gift card!  In short, you have to have at least a balance of ‚Ç¨50 in your cart AFTER any gift card has been applied in order to make a purchase!When you successfully place an order, they can never tell you when it will be delivered so weeks go by with automated emails that your delivery date is undetermined! - MULTIPLE emails to Customer Service (does the team even exist?!) go unanswered!! - Email and ask them to cancel the order and they do so straight away!HOWEVER, they do not refund your ‚Ç¨50 gift card amount, so they have in fact STOLEN your money!Absoloute CRIMINALS and they ahould have their license to sell revoked!!!!Do NOT use this company!

And I was very happy, besides the fact that the delivery was 1 day late, they still delivered within 4 (working) days, from Germany to Italy. Manuel replied to all my questions on Facebook when I needed something (though it was always very rushed, as I can imagine they must have a lot of demands right now).The product was well packed and also performing very well. Happy buyers.

I hope they fix this problem as quickly as possible since they did not do anything in the last 15 days.

Title: Very satisfied about the order with Cyberport
Review: Very satisfied about the order with Cyberport, I had many mails to let me know the status of some products not yet in the store, and at last I received all very quickly! Very good prices, (I bought a motherboard, Ram and SSD) and found kindness, when the seller has always answered quickly to my mails. I will buy other things when needed, from Cyberport.

Title: The price is right and delivery is on‚Ä¶
Review: The price is right and delivery is on point, 2 days from Germany to the Netherlands!Two times buying from this company and very happy with the watches. They are not for sale in the Netherlands.

Title: Transferred money but order cancelled
Review: I placed an order with Cyberport Germany for an rtx 3090 on the 3/12/20. I decided to do a part payment of 1000‚Ç¨ and finance the last part. My finance request was approved on the same day (3/12/20) but I did not hear from cyberport until 10/12/20. On 10/12/20 I recieved an email from Cyberport saying that the order could proceed once I had paid the deposit - 10/12/20. I may add that I had to contact them twice to get an update on my order. I did a bank transfer on the same day (10/12/20) for the required deposit amount, to the details provided by Cyberport, then waited for an update on my order.Today (12/10/20) they sent me an email saying that my order has been cancelled. This is despite the fact that I'd paid and the item is in stock (later confirmed by my wife on the phone)I tried to call them and the phone was put down on me twice. Unfortunately my German is not with situations like this great so I needed to speak English (although I did communicate only in German to ask) , I would assume this is the reason why. I was able to get some form of response over the phone after my German wife spoke to them. If I am contacted with an explanation and this situation is resolved (the man on the phone said I will have an update on Monday) then I will adjust my review accordingly.

Now its October and I expect that stores, in this case Cyberport is not selling returned laptops as NEW. Trying to arrange the return with customer service is connected to at least 10 min waiting time, after which I was forwarded to business customer department, which I even selected at the beginning of the call and being told there is another 10 min waiting time, which usually a very optimistic estimation.

Title: Untrustworthy; nicht vertrauensw√ºrdig
Review: I bought something expensive and important for my work on 10 May 2020.  According to the Cyperport website, the article was in stock and would be delivered to me within the week.  That was the very reason why I chose to order from Cyberport instead of from their competitors.  Ich habe etwas Teueres und meiner Arbeit Wichtiges am 10.5.2020 bestellt.  Als ich es bestellte, berichtete die Cyberport-Webseite, der Artikel sei vorhanden und w√ºrde innerhalb einer Woche ankommen.  Gerade deswegen habe ich von Cyberport bestellt, anstatt von seinen Konkurrenten.Am 14.5 wurde der Liefertermin auf 29.5 verschoben, zwei Wochen versp√§tet.  On May 14th, I received an email that the delivery date was pushed back two weeks, from May 17th to May 29th.Am 18.5 hie√ü es "Liefertermin derzeit unbestimmt".  On May 18th Cyberport wrote that the delivery date could not be determined.Am 26.5 wurde der Liefertermin auf 12.6 verschoben, nun vier Wochen versp√§tet.  On May 26th the delivery date was pushed back *another* two weeks, to June 12th, four weeks later than promised.Am 30.5 wurde er wieder "derzeit unbestimmt".  On May 30th Cyberport wrote that the delivery date could (once again) not be determined.Am 7.6 hie√ü es wieder 12.6, immer noch vier Wochen sp√§t.  On June 7th Cyberport changed its mind and again gave June 12th as the delivery date, still four weeks later than promised.Am 11.6 wurde er auf 19.6 verschoben, f√ºnf Wochen versp√§tet.  Four days later they pushed it back another week to June 19th, five weeks later than promised ‚Äî and counting.Am 16.6 wurde er auf 26.6 verschoben, sechs Wochen versp√§tet.  Five days later Cyberport pushed the delivery date back yet another week to June 26th, six weeks later than promised.Am 20.6 wurde der Liefertermin wieder "derzeit unbestimmt".  On June 20th Cyberport wrote that the delivery date could (once again) not be determined.Am 28.6 wurde ich erneut informiert, der Liefertermin sei "derzeit unbestimmt".  On June 28th Cyberport wrote again that the delivery date could not be determined, just in case I hadn't gotten the message a week earlier.Today the delivery is over 7 weeks later than initially  promised.  In that time I've been notified of five different delivery dates (May 15th, 29th, June 12th, 19th and 26th), none of which actually happened.  I understand that Cyberport would like to keep me informed, all to the good, but I would much prefer if I could believe anything that they write.  Cyberport is untrustworthy.Der Liefertermin bleibt bis heute unerf√ºllt, sieben Wochen nach dem abgesprochen Termin.  In der Zeit wurde ich f√ºnf verschiedene Termine verkauft (15.5, 29.5, 12.6, 19.6 und 26.6), die alle nicht stattgefunden haben.  Ich verstehe schon, dass Cyberport mich auf dem Laufenden halten m√∂chte, sch√∂n und gut, aber ich h√§tte es wirklich lieber, wenn ich der Firma etwas glauben k√∂nnte.  Man kann meiner Erfahrung nach Cyberport nicht vertrauen.
Response: Hallo Herr Grace, ich verstehe den Unmut durchaus und entschuldige mich daf√ºr bei Ihnen. Wir versuchen die uns genannten Termine immer so transparent, wie m√∂glich weiter zu geben, auch wenn das bedeutet, das es zu mehr Verschiebungen kommen, weil der Hersteller nicht liefern kann.  Dennoch viele Gr√º√üe, Manuel vom Cyberport-Team

Title: Worst experience ever
Review: Worst experience ever. In 2016 I bought a laptop that was labeled as new with a full HD display. The screen was never HD, the laptop had severe problems and 6 months after I bought it I had to send it in to get repaired 3 times because whenever I plugged in the charger, the screen wouldn't work (it would flicker and I couldn't see what was on the screen). About the same time the laptop started to get really slow. Tried to contact Cyberport but they never answered my emails. There where also partitions visible that shouldn't have been (Recovery and System partitions), a sign that this was a used laptop previously used in a business of some sort. Thanks to them, I had to work with a broken laptop for 4 years.Cyberport is an extremely shady business, that tricks it's customers and avoids legal obligations as a vendor. I would not recommend shopping here.

Title: Good

Title: good service, thanks
Review: delivery cost higher than market opponents, price considerately lower !

Title: Unavailable products sold and no communication
Review: Also the same issue as below: Displaying unavailable products as available and no communication at all, no answers to emails.As a business customer, I also advice you to stay away from Cyberport, if you work with deadlines. In my whole online experience I have never faced such a bad customer experience.In March 2020 a computer displayed has been ordered with a initial delivery of 2 weeks, a bit more due to corona. Since that time every 2 weeks I got an automated email to say that my delivery had delay and it has been extended by 1 week. Therefore, today 28 May 2020 and still did not got the display. It was planned for tomorrow but I received this morning the automated email, to inform that it has been postponed again to next week. I sent many emails none of them got an answer, they sold me an unavailable product and the product is of course paid from the first day.So this is and advice to you, think twice before buying from cyberport if you want to receive your product within the same year and to have 0 human interactions.Best
Response: Hi, I'm sorry you had such a bad experience. Of course I will pass on your feedback to the right people so that we can improve here. If there is anything else we can do for you, please send us an email to kundenzufriedenheit@cyberport.de and give us your customer or processing number including the text of your review. Best regards, Manuel from the Cyberport team

Title: Displaying unavailable products as available and lie on the phone.
Review: As a business customer, I advice you to stay away from Cyberport, if you work with deadlines.After asking explicitly the delivery possibility of the product on the same day and got confirmation about it, I ordered the product.Today the 3rd day - I experienced that they do not even have the product in their warehouse.Promises which were not kept :Friday :  If you can order until 13:00, we can send it out.Monday :  We have to check if we received your money transfer, which was done via SOFORT .Tuesday : We cannot send your product because we do not have it right now, we may send it during his week. When I ask for an E-Mail, agent told me that she cannot send an Email. It is a joke over there ! If they said that from the beginning, I would not order it - that simple!  I understand the Corona situation - even without Corona I am fine some delays.But giving false promises has nothing to do with business.If I cannot get the laptop on time, my new worker will be paid but wont be able to work.
Response: Hello, Jeam,your order has been properly processed and shipped to you. Since you have not ordered by express, it is normal that the goods are dispatched within a few days. If there was a false statement on the phone, I apologize to you for this. Best regards, Manuel from the Cyberport team

Title: Product is good, service is extremely bad
Review: Product is good, service is extremely bad. Prepare for a good read.I ordered a monitor with Cyberport on the 6th of april 2020. A week later the monitor was still stuck at a DHL centre so I called DHL and they told me Cyberport had to give more information about the order or else they couldn' t proceed. I called Cyberport with this message (was on hold for about 30 minutes, was like this everytime i called them) and they told me (in a very grumpy way) that i should just be patient. About 3 weeks later i still hadn' t received a thing and the package didn' t move since day 2 after i ordered. I called cyberport  again and they told me that the shipment would come back to cyberport and i would get my money back. Because i would receive a refund i ordered a new monitor over the phone (which btw went well and i received that one within a week). Back to the problem: When the first order returned i got an email with the message that a replacement monitor was going to be shipped to my adress. An hour after this email i called cyberport that they told me i would get my money back and not a replacement monitor so i asked them to cancel this order. At that point the order was put through and they couldn' t do anything anymore. They told me I should refuse the order when it came to my adress. Unfortunately they told DHL that they could deliver the package to a neighbour so that's what they did (that's what DHL told me when i called them). At this point it's already the 12th of May. I called Cyberport AGAIN and they would send me a return label in the email. 2 days later i didn' t receive anything so i send them an angry email. I had to pay for the return label myself and they would refund this. Last tuesday (19 may 2020) the monitor was delivered back at their warehouse and so far i haven' t heard a thing. MORE then 1 and a half month later and this issue is still not resolved. It's almost amazing how many things went wrong with this order. It's one of the worst costumer services i had ever had. It's like there is no internal communication in the entire company. Fix this Cyberport!
Response: Hello, Mr. Nellissen, I apologize to you for the circumstances. We've had some communication problems here, I'm afraid. The amount here will be returned to you, of course. You will also receive a confirmation by e-mail. Nevertheless, best regards, Manuel from the Cyberport team

Title: OK-Level Website User Experience, Good Customer Service, Fast Shipping
Review: I found a negative user experience in the website: I couldn't track the status of my order. It happened because I paid with PayPal without registering. I reported the details to Customer Happines team.However, the customer support respondend my email inquiry fast and it was helpful. The shipment was faster than I expected.This was my first purchase. Overall, it is was good. I would consider Cyberport for buying new stuff.

Title: Gut and schnell service!
Review: NaN

Title: Unique assortment
Review: Unique assortment, fast delivery, good support, and nice feedback response. Premium work!!!

Title: Arrived super fast in the Netherlands
Review: Arrived super fast in the Netherlands, very well packed and very good product.

Title: Very unpleasant experience
Review: Very unpleasant experience with this shop, I would not recommend it.I bought Macbook pro 13' five days ago. The box was open, the charger was used already (with stains on it), the cable as well, since they both were without original packing.The screen was also without prevention film and had the stains from cleaning.

Title: Good price, hard to get complete shipment
Review: Missed item from shipment, got no respons on email. Maybe this gets their attention.A pity that regular, private email begets no reply in a week, but a public negative review on trustpilot prompts a response within 8 hours. I was told the missing item will be shipped to me. Changed my review to three stars.Update: received the item a week later.
Response: Hello, we are currently investigating the case and will clarify this for you. Afterwards we will get back to you. We apologize for the circumstances. Best regards, Manuel from the Cyberport team

Title: Awesome experience with Cyberport
Review: Awesome experience with Cyberport. To be precise I ordered the product on Cyberport at 9.10 am on 28th April 2020 and the product delivered to my home at 11.00 am 29th April 2020. It was lighting speed delivery speed.

Title: great 2in1 vacuum for dog owners! recommend!
Review: great vacuum! everything as labeled, functions well and has several tools to use for cleaning, especially for the smaller vacuum.Really love the self storage options on the vacuum which the regular bosch vacuum doesnt have.

Title: good delivery
Review: NaN

Title: Worst service
Review: Worst service, i had to call multiple times to ask for a change in my order and still didn't get it. Most of their workers are rude as well. Would give 0 stars if it was possible.
Response: Hello, please note that when ordering with the payment method PayPal no more changes may be made to the order. For this reason we have cancelled the order for you. Many greetings, Manuel from the Cyberport team

Title: Not to recommend at All!
Review: I‚Äôve got drifted and somehow blinded by the price difference that I got from them - I ordered a MacBook Pro 2018 refurbished 2,3 ghz/265gb which was in a price of 1,499‚Ç¨ -100‚Ç¨ compared to the market!Was staying at home and at once got an email from the delivery company (DPD) the my package was delivered but I was at home at the moment!!Went down to see if it was left in the building door or so but nothing! Called dpd and they said the driver had left it in front of t he building door! Called cyber tech and they said we are not responsible if it was lost or even stolen! It was delivered!!! Over three days and constant calls and with no help whatsoever, then magically the MacBook was left in front of my door steps! Opened it and the pc was totally scratched and in a poor condition ( refurbished means almost new but the original packaging was opened by another client! ) - so whatever!!! I contacted the company and said I‚Äôll give it back- it‚Äôs not worth my money! It took them 3,5 weeks to send me back my money to the credit card!I would NOT recommend to order from them!I ordered another pc and paid 100‚Ç¨ in another trusted website and everything worked just perfectly with no stress at all! They offer low prices and combined with that a low costumer service!By the way, much luck when trying calling them - in a state it took me between 25-45 mins to talk with an employee!!! Compared with Gravis that answers in 3-8 minutes!!!!
Response: Dear Fadi H.,I‚Äôm sorry, that your order turned out differently than it was expected. I appreciate that you are disappointed, but I would really like to see if there is anything, that I can do for you. Can you please send me an E-Mail with your Order number and your request to Kundenzufriedenheit@cyberport.de so I can see what I can do?Many greetings,Daniel from the Cyberport-Team

Title: DHL left my new monitor in the lift and drove away!
Review: The monitor has just arrived, and now it's in my own quarantine for the next 24 hours. I will open and try it tomorrow. Meanwhile, I have the following observations to share:1. I live in a large block of 200 flats. DHL put the new monitor in the lift and just left it there!Some 40 minutes later, a neighbour called to say we had a "TV in the lift"!I understand the safety measures around the COVID-19 outbreak, but leaving the item unattended and just driving away is NOT acceptable.2. It took exactly 2 weeks, from placing the order to the delivery.I understand that the logistics are currently complex, so I don't really mind.

Title: Worst maintainance service
Review: Best laptop vendor. Worst maintenance service. Literally forgot to fix my laptop for an entire 3 weeks even though I was constantly sending emails. After talking on the phone they changed the battery litterally in one day. After a whole month of waiting.

Title: first and last time
Review: I've made order with huge discount. Contact and delivery address in Netherland. They charge me for delivery to the Netherland, but they sent parcel to my bank address in Poland. They promise me that package will be retrieve and sent once again to right address. After one month they give me back my money, but they charge me 64 cents for they "service"

I see through your customer tactics, Cyberport.edit: I have yet to receive a response after sending a mail to the address given in the reply.edit 2: I did receive a response. Title: I don't understand these positive reviews
Review: After ordering a monitor that was immediately available, I received an email 3 days later that the monitor would be dispatched in 5 days.A total of 8 days later, the monitor is no longer available in stock, but only after 2-4 days.I ordered this monitor because I wanted it to be as quick as possible and it was "immediately available".Then I called customer service and after waiting about 20 minutes someone answered my call and ... nothing (no comment is required).This is my 3rd order and my 3rd negative rating.I don't understand these positive reviews. Or is it a coincidence that I had problems with all 3 orders.I am sure I will not get my monitor for the next week either because "cyberport" is a really bad shop that always has stupid excuses."Small print." And please save your time with an apology and do not post an answer to this review as I will not change my review because you are just bad.

Title: TV order placed over Black Friday
Review: TV order placed over the black Friday weekend.My TV arrived but it was somewhat more stressful than it really needed to be: - Notification that the order was out for delivery with a code that didn't work. - No response from Cyberport over the following week and a half. - Calling helpdesk took time and was advised a mail was sent that morning. Confimed the address used as correct: no mail arrived. - Call in the evening before it was due to arrive the following morning: no time to arrange removal of old TV with the carrier.Now, the TV works fine and I got it so all's well in the end, but for you Cyberport there's some constructive feedback: - It's clear looking over the reviews and dates here, you guys need more staff over the holiday period. Almost all your poor reviews are a similar story, mine included. - Don't send out delivery notifications until the order is actually being sent. - Be honest with what's in stock. I get it, you guys probably want the sale. I would have probably still bought the TV from Cyberport even if it was a two week wait\delivery, it was actually a good deal!As there was little to no communication and the carrier didn't have any info on the order number provided, I honestly can't say where things went wrong, really. But looking over the other reviews, I suspect the three points above are probably going to help.All the best.

Title: Bad service
Review: Bad service! Ordered my laptop 10 days ago, paid for it, it was sent with DPD. Because I was not home, DPD rerouted the shipment to a DPD shop. But it has to go to the central warehouse first, after 2-3 days to the store. I went 3 times to the store until now, the shipment is not there yet!! I‚Äôve been trying to call Cyberport customer ‚Äúservice‚Äù, every time I‚Äôm waiting 20‚Äô on the line and then I hang up. Worst service ever! It would be my 3rd laptop from them, but I really consider not to pick it up and just demand my money back.

Title: They cancelled my products and don't refund
Review: I bought a few products during the black friday sale and they cancelled it. They say the product is not available anymore but they keep it at the site saying it's in stock and ready for immediate delivery. They are not giving my money back and don't ship the other products. They don't answer my emails and don't fix this. Don't buy at this store.

Title: One week and still waiting...
Review: One week and still waiting for delivery. For an article that was on stock for immediate delivery. My first and also my last order. Unfriendly customer service.

Title: I bought mobile phones ...When I had‚Ä¶

Title: After  5 week waiting.Very thank .you‚Ä¶
Review: After  5 week waiting.Very thank .you get back our laptop .but with same old battery. IT IS NOT FAIRreally you have very bad after sale service

Title: Cyberport sells devices with FAKE SERIAL NUMBERS
Review: Last christmas i bought two watches at cyberport. One of the watches broke this summer so i brought it to their store to hand it in for maintenance. Now they sent me the device back saying that the serial number on the device doesn't match the serial number on the receipt so they will not repair the device. After hearing this, i checked the second watch i bought there and at this one too, the serial number doesn't match the one on the receipt.As i have definitely bought exactly these devices at Cyberport, they obviously sold me devices where the serial number is not the official one, that should be on the device. I highly wouldn't recommend to buy anything valuable at Cyberport since they probably just won't do anything once your device gets damaged.
Response: Hello Matthias, I am sorry that the warranty claim was not handled to your and our satisfaction. I would like to work through the case and see what I can do for you.  Please send me an e-mail with your customer number and order number to: "kundenzufriedenheit@cyberport.de" and I will give you a feedback.Many greetings Alexander from the Cyberport Team
