I really don‚Äôt understand.How sad I‚Äôm.... I‚Äôm so so disappointed

Title: This company is fraudulent! Don't order!
Review: This company is fraudulent. Tries everything to avoid warranty.

Title: Cyberport refuses to deal with defective products.
Review: Cyberport refuses to deal with products that are defective if it was sold outside of Germany but within the EU. They are legally bound to either provide free shipment or reimbursement, yet they refuse to do so. When you point this out they break communication and since then are unreachable.

Title: Worse and arrogant customer service‚Ä¶
Review: Hardware broken after a few month...Worse and arrogant customer service giving absolutely no help. Never ever buying at cyberport again ...

Title: üëç üòä
Review: Always kind service and helpful sales staff in the stores, also in the call center. Fair prices guaranteed.Strongly recommended!Best regards from Norway

Title: Availability lies to trick you into buying
Review: When you chose items to be picked up in one of their stores it shows all as "available ".  Once you paid, this changes to "not available delivery in 3 to 10 days ".  Then on the online information to your order it changes to "available in central warehouse delivery within 24 hours". After one day it changes again to "not available delivery in 3 to 4 days".Questions to the customer service about this lousy performance are not answered....

Title: Worst Customer Service Ever
Review: Orderd my laptop on 12.03 with promised delivery 14-15.03. On 15.03 it was an unattended delivery and they send it to the DHL store next door. Unfortunately it wasn't there on 16.03 and 17.03 either. On 16.03 I claimed an investigation by DHL without any result. In parallel, I contacted Cyberport via their official ebay account. after 1.5days their first response was to check the tracking info on the DHL site - seems their only interest was to hit the ebay reponse SLA but not to take my issue serious. On 18.3 they then committed do to a DHL request. As i didn't head back, i called on 21 at 2pm and I started #8 in their hotline waiting queue. After 20min of waiting i was at #5.-> clearly shows that they more likely have no own Customer Service, outsourced everything, and the agents serve different websites. I don't expect them to raise the bar in terms of customer service but taking issues seriously would be a start. Excited to see if they will send a replacement or not (which one big E-Com Retailer would have sent on the very first day of my complaint already).

Title: NOPE
Review: This is by far the worst seller i spent even a nickle on. I had bought an LG G6 at the end of the 2017, everything seemed good until it started ghost screening like any other decent LG device, making their users proud. It was not unbearable but still got to my nerves and i wanted it fixed. This was the worst decision i have ever made.On 06.11 i have given my phone for the warranty, they said it would take around 3 weeks for me to get it back, which at that time seemed reasonable. So i decided to go for it and borrowed an old fashioned Samsung device from a close friend, which has like 3 - 4 GB of internal storage and is really slow and so on. Nothing you could not bear in a short section of time. Everything seemed normal as i got an email from the customer service on 15.11, stating that they were already working on the device and expected a return in one week. ONE WEEK. This was even quicker than what they assumed. Perfect customer satisfaction, i thought.On 22.11 and 29.11 i got two automatic e mails, saying they don't have my phone back. By this time i bought my tickets for a short vacation around two weeks, starting from 12.12, thinking i would easily get my device back by then, since it was already two weeks after they promised a return in one week; and we had two more weeks to go. Yet, nothing happened. On 06.12, I contacted them through a customer service whatsapp number, stating all the problems i have written above. What did I get in return? A timeline? An assumption? An apology? Nope. THEY DID NOT EVEN BOTHER TEXTING OR CALLING ME BACK. And finally, today i got to the Mitte-Store by myself and asked questions on the whereabouts of my phone. The lady at the store (she was quite nice and polite to be honest, if she were not, i was ready to roast her as well) said THEY DON'T KNOW anything about the progress and the possible returning of my phone and it would take a little more while. They knew nothing that i did not already know. Good thing that i rushed to the store between my two classes, expecting any kind of valuable information.By the way, ghost screening is like the easiest problem one may have on a device. Just do nothing on the homescreen for ten minutes, then open any app, see that some of the pixels from the home screen are still visible; replace the goddamn screen and send it back. It would take me around an hour and i am practically a monkey when it comes to the technolgy.After all, on 10.12, after five weeks, i got no phone, i got no idea when i can get my phone and i am about to go into a two-week vacation without my daily device and all my personal data. Thank you Cyberport.DO NOT BUY anything from this store. DO NOT EVEN walk by it. DO NOT MENTION its name in a conversation. You'd regret it. I did my part.

Title: Good site
Review: Easy website, fast and affordable delivery. Thank you

Title: 12 days to deliver a washing machine‚Ä¶
Review: 12 days to deliver a washing machine ...then its the wrong one then several days to schedule a pick up....no sense of customer service...This not a service oriented company and one which I would recommend to avoid

Title: Excellent service, with excellent products
Review: Very fast order processing, excellent customer support in English, also, quick delivery after payment process. Recommended!

Title: Reliable
Review: Everything executed according to promise. A bit of delay in shipping the goods as a consequence of additional check on my reliability as a customer, but I understand: mutual trust is fair in transactions with this level of value.

Title: Great shop, costumer service
Review: Great shop, costumer serviceI know the Cyberport since they have a shop in Westbahnhof, Vienna. I bought my laptop and any kind of other devices, phone, covers, coolers, tablet... The main reason that I really belive this shop is their after service ! My laptop almost burned out, many chips were burned. And they fixed it with guarantee which Saturn and Mediamarkt would NEVER EVER DO SO ! My phone cover led light got broken and they just simply gave me new one. All colleagues are really friendly and have the right information for shoping (basicly it is hard to find in other electronic shops as well....) I would buy any kind of electronic just from Cyberport...

Title: Dutch customer at Cyberport.de
Review: I have decided to order across border for electronics.For dutch customers it is as easy as can be (although some may struggle with the german.Cyberport is professional, quick and above all, cheaper than what I am used to in NL.They will see me again.

Title: "Super seller
Review: "Super seller, super service. Very good shop."

Title: I ordered a Dell Inspiron Firelord, MacBook Air, Ipad pro 9.7 and an apple pencil.
Review: I ordered a Dell Inspiron Firelord, a MacBook Air, iPad pro 9.7 and an apple pencil from Cyberport. And I have to admit I got a pretty good deal. Although my Dell Inspiron was lost on the way due to DPD. But then I called Cyberport regarding the problem and they sent me a new one. Super! Recommended!! Ich habe schon einen Dell Inspiron Firelord, Macbook Air, Ipad Pro 9.7 und ein Apple Pencil bestellt und habe ich bis jetzt kein Problem. Es war in Super Zustand und schnell geliefert. Eigentlich hat Apple pencil 1 woche Zeit genommen, weil es Black Friday war. Ansonst alles Superrrr!!

Title: I would like to warn all potentional ‚Ä¶
Review: I would like to warn all potentional customers to avoid this shop. I`ve made 3 orders on cyberport.de and have very bad experience. 1st order was delayed, but then I`ve received all goods and it was ok. 2nd order, from 5 pieces, 2 pieces was Dead on Arrival, had to ship them back, and it took a month for them to replace those 2 pieces, also there was difference in the prize, so they should refund me that difference, never happened, waiting already more than 2 months. Last order, and Im done with this shop was made a week ago, I`ve ordered 12 pieces, I`ve got invoice for 12 pieces, I`ve paid for 12 pieces, they`ve got money for 12 pieces but suddenly, almost a week after order, they`ve sent me email that they have only 5 pieces for me, even I`ve got confirmation that they`re reserved 12 pieces for me. Its ridiculous, even they`re helpdesk told me that they dont have anything on the stock but website says they still does. Now Im in situation that they`ve reduced my order to only 5 pieces, holding my money, I`ve sent them email and also talk to the guy on helpdesk, but he couldnt do anything, not even finding some alternative, very useless helpdesk btw, no response on email. I hope they`ll do refund quickly, otherwise I have to go ECC - European Customer Center and claim a case there.  Also, Im going to post this warning on all customer community pages, because this is not customer service for 21 century. If they would be serious B2B partner, or IT eshop, they could come with some alternative, apologize for mistake in they`re system, whatever. No, nothing happened. Very dissapointing.
Response: Hello Mr. Rak, I can understand your anger, but when ordering in quantities, it is necessary to contact our sales department in advance to check if these quantities are available.  If you have individual enquiries for larger quantities, my colleagues can also tell you how much is in stock. Since I was not present at the discussions with my colleagues, I can only apologise for that. The amounts will of course be reduced as soon as possible. If you have any further questions, please write to me at kundenzufriedenheit@cyberport.de Best regards, Manuel from the Cyberport team.Hallo Herr Rak, ich kann Ihren √Ñrger verstehen, aber bei Bestellungen in den Mengen ist es notwendig vorher bei unseren Vertrieb anzufragen ob diese Mengen denn vorhanden sind.  Bei individuellen Anfragen zu gr√∂√üeren St√ºckzahlen, k√∂nnen Ihnen meine Kollegen auch gern Auskunft geben, wieviel auf Lager ist. Da ich bei den Gespr√§chen mit den Kollegen nicht dabei war, kann ich mich nur daf√ºr entschuldigen. Die Betr√§ge gehen nat√ºrlich schnellstm√∂glich zur√ºck. Wenn Sie noch Fragen haben, schreiben Sie mir bitte an kundenzufriedenheit@cyberport.de Viele Gr√º√üe, Manuel vom Cyberport-Team

Title: CYBERPOT is a criminal organistion - don‚Äôt buy
Review: Neverless I never recieved any delivery from DHL (delivery-‚Äúservice‚Äù working for Cyberport), Cyberport refuses the refund (more than ‚Ç¨ 7000). Even after intervention from the EU-ombudsman, Cyberport still refuse every contact. Even after prove (and criminal complaint agains Cyberport) of non delivery (falsified signature discovered after 9 months), nothing changed. And of course fior ‚Ç¨ 7000 you can‚Äôt start a legal procedure in Germany. Cyberport knows it very well. Cyberport is just a criminal organisation. Stay far away from these criminals and never buy anything!NEVER NEVER TRUST CYBERPORT

Title: Great company
Review: The product was delivered according to the description and emails were always answered in about a day.I never had a problem with Cyberport.

Title: Had Very bad experience with them
Review: Had Very bad experience with them. I bought a laptop and went to pick it up from their store. 1st they couldn't print the invoice because a problem in their system and they said that they will send it by email. I didn't receive anything! 2nd, the next day i received another email that i have another order for the same laptop and the money is booked on my account twice. The chatting customer support wasn't helpful by any mean. Currently they canceled the new order and i'm waiting for the money to be back.They mentioned that in general they reserve the money on the card then take the money upon delivery and delete the reserved money however with me so far it seems that it was taken twice.
Response: Dear Emad Abdelshahid, I‚Äôm very sorry for the inconveniences you have had with your order. I can only see one order in your account. You also already picked up that  order. Additionally I have sent you a copy  of the invoice to the mail address of your customer account. The amount already has been cancelled through our accountings. Therefore your customer account is balanced now. Best regardsFranzi from Cyberport-Team

Title: Stalled delivery, no responses to emails
Review: Having a lot of trouble with Cyberport, unfortunately. Purchased a high-end laptop almost a month ago. They said it would be shipped in 3 to 10 days. I'm still waiting. I've gotten several automated emails about the expected delivery date, but the date just keeps getting pushed back. I've been sending emails to ask about the status of the order, but I'm not even getting a response from them. I write in English since I don't speak German but I don't think that's the problem. I've urged them to answer as I need the invoice urgently (I really do, it's grant money that needs to be accounted for in the following days), but my last several emails inquiring about the status of the order have been ignored. No response at all. Bottom line: good prices, but if you see "available in 3 to 10 days", I'd advise you to steer clear, unless you've got time and nerves to spare. Very frustrating customer experience.Edit: Daniel, sorry, but that's the same copy-pasted response you (cyberport) have given me several times already. It's always 3-10 days.  It's been almost a month since I paid for the laptop. If you had told me that the laptop would not be coming, that would have been fine, but this is just wasting my time.Edit #2: Got in touch with them via phone. Finally got specific info about shipping and it appears it's finally going to be shipped. The person on the phone was helpful and quite pleasant to talk to so I'm correcting my rating.
Response: Hello Antonio Nakiƒá Alfireviƒá, we expect the article you ordered within the next 3-10 business days to be delivered to us. As soon as it reaches our stock, it will be dispatched immediately. We apologise for any inconvenience this may cause. We try our best to get the delivery as soon as possbile to you.Kind regards,Daniel from Cyberport

Title: No Customer Happiness
Review: The shop service is good, the customer service, however, isn't. It took them one month to tell me they cannot help me. Very disappointed in the customer service.
Response: Hello Anothercustomer48, we apologise for any inconvenience this may cause. But you had a special service request and the handling with this was not so easy. And during that time our technical specialist was temporarily not in available which causes mainly the delay. Viele Gr√º√üe,Daniel vom Cyberport-Team

Title: Fast,reliable and cheap!
Review: Fast,reliable and cheap!I ordered a Synology device which was much cheaper than any other site I came across. It's a shame there isn't an English translation, but google translate helps a lot. I can recommend this site to anyone and I will definitely revisit!

Title: good overall
Review: good staff, good products, ice store, love the 30 day return policyI bought an HP computer, so far, so good

Title: Perfektes Online-Business bis zur Lieferung.
Review: You can trust in Cyberport

Title: Top Service
Review: I ordered a server PC from Cyberport.de from the Netherlands. I had no problems ordering this (apart from a little language difficulty). The delivery was very fast via DHL, if I hadn‚Äôt miss the delivery guy I would have received the package 2 days after ordering. Good communication with tracking number of the package. Definitely going to order again here if needed.

Title: Computer was never delivered.
Review: I ordered an iMac to be shipped to an address in Prague, Czech Republic on December, 10th 2016. As of December 29th the order has not been delivered. Despite a lot of effort that I have put into it - dozens of calls to the customer support at Cyberport and delivery companies (PPL and DPD). Very disappointed, very time consuming and draining experience dealing with the customer support that lead absolutely nowhere.P.S. Follow-up to the reaction of Cyberport Service Team below: Yes, I can read what the DPD tracking page says. Unfortunately, the address is correct. I have never had issues with deliveries of packages or regular mail to it. Every "Maps" application I know finds it in 1 second. I don't know how to give you a different one. Both Cyberport and DPD should have my phone number - I have given it to both about 14 times.
Response: Hallo Tomas Chudy, ich bedaure sehr, dass es bei der Zustellung Ihrer Sendung Probleme gibt und ich entschuldige mich f√ºr die entstandenen Umst√§nde bei Ihnen.. Laut DPD gibt es Unstimmigkeiten mit der Lieferadresse. Bitte teilen Sie uns die korrekte Lieferadresse per Mail an kundenservice@cyberport.de mit, damit wir erneut eine Zustellung veranlassen k√∂nnen.Viele Gr√º√üe,Daniel vom Cyberport-Team

Title: I'm going to try to describe what h ‚Ä¶
Review: I'm going to try to describe what happened to me at CyberPort Shop at Checkpoint Charlie in the last 5 weeks. Maybe somebody can help me out. So, in the end of November I had an issue with my iPhone camera. it was kind of loud when focusing and I researched it online and found out about a back camera recall. the next day i went to a cyberport shop, talked to a guy there and gave my phone to him with a promise to get it back in two weeks. he wrote down what he saw wrong on the phone, small scratches and a place where a sticker used to be. I reset the phone and went home.Ten days later i get a e-mail from cyber port telling me to go there and pay 300 euros for a repair. I kind of freaked out and went to the shop to try to understand how did my working phone needed a 300 euro repair. Another guy talked to me and explained that my touch screen was faulty and they didn‚Äôt manage to change the camera because it had an issue with the screen. also, the first guy wrote that there was an issue with the front camera, not the back one. I couldn‚Äôt understand how did my phone went from a camera being loud to a useless touch screen. I talked to this second guy more, he seemed to understand what was my problem. I gave a working phone to Cyberport, they were trying to get me to pay 300 euros for a phone that was broken. He typed some stuff on his computer, took my phone and told me that I would get an e-mail with everything I needed later.Today, after 5 weeks, I went back to Cyberport after not hearing from them and talked to a third guy that started the conversation with the front camera and its lack of issue, told me to pay to get the touch screen fixed and I thought it was a flashback. My iPhone was still at the shop, nothing was fixed, my back camera was still there without the recall and I didn‚Äôt know what to do anymore. There was also a slight bent on the back that I really don‚Äôt remember seeing it before. It wasn‚Äôt noted when I got the iPhone there first and, now, it seems like a big deal to everybody there.While still at the shop, I decided to talk to the manager who confirmed that my touch screen was broken and that it should have been broken before and that I need to pay for repair. Now, the argument is that the bent on the back broke something and that I probably did it before giving it to Cyberport and that I need to pay for repair.To shorten it up: I gave a working phone to a shop, they didn‚Äôt reply to me for 5 weeks. I went back there today and it seems that I need to pay to repair a phone that was working until I gave it to them.Does this make sense? What can i do about it? Should i get a lawyer? Is there anything that you can do?
Response: Hello Felipe Tofani, I apologize for all the circumstances and the delays. Your case is under investigation now by our sales manager. They will decide, how we can get this to fast and satisfying solution for you. I will inform you via mail as soon as possible. Kind regards, Daniel from the Cyberport-Team

Title: Good offer and good service
Review: I have ordered one hp laptop (with offer of 150 euro saving )which was extremenly very good offer. I have picked up next day the laptop, ithat is a really super service. I also ordered a beats solo 2 wireless headphones with offer. That is also very good offer, that was delivered without any charge.I really suggest to cyberport to buy electronic stuff and with great deals. a trustworthy online shopThank you cyberport

Title: Misleading delivery time
Review: I ordered Acer Spin 5 Notebook on 23.10.2016 because they say on their website that it will be available in 3-4 days. And my Liefertermin is supposed to be 02.11.2016. What a big lie. Now they send me an email telling me that my Liefertermin is postponed to 18.11.2016. If you don't have the laptop in your storage yet then maybe just dont receive new orders?! It seems like you constantly have problems with your logistic. Maybe it's time you seriously do something about that?!The only good thing here is at least they keep me update on my Bestellungstatus. Now I just hope that after 18 Nov, I wont receive another email telling me they have to postpone again.
Response: Hello Pattamon, I apologize for the circumstances because of the delay. Our distributor expects the article on 17.11.2016 to be delivered to us. As soon as it reaches our stock, it will be dispatched immediately. The expected delivery dates are, however, not guaranteed and may therefore vary in some cases. If you like to change anything about your order, feel free to contact us via phone +49 (0)351 3395-60 or email at info@cyberport.de.Kind regards,Daniel from Cyberport-Team

Title: Highly recommend
Review: I ordered a laptop from Cyberport online, and had it shipped to their store in the city for me to pick up at my convenience. The process was seamless, the price more competitive than elsewhere in Germany. Based on my positive experience, I can only highly recommend Cyberport.

Title: Never again!
Review: I have ordered one arcade fightstick street fighter 5 efition TE2+ on their webstore on 12  January. They delivered me on 23 another product mad catz fightstick te2.  I have a bill with the right reference and a product with another one. I contact them and they keep saying that's the right product. On the webstore they changed photos and reference 8 days after my order(week end 20 february).  They dont want to take back the product . They refuse to accept them mistake and they don't answer me back anymore. They are totally unprofessional!  I order several time on internet and never had this kind of experience. Think twice before to order with them!
Response: Hello Jean-Francois,we apologize for circumstances you have. There was a mistake in the data sheet and we corrected this. Of course, you can send the product back and we will refund your payment. We don't denied the return. Kind regards,Daniel from Cyberport

Title: Just an Awsome store!
Review: My experience was perfect, bought a  Asus Ux501 from them, they shipped it to Portugal, and it arrived fast with no problems at all. Exellent packing, and service.I recommend 100% for buyer in EU at least.

Title: Incredible slow and unreliable
Review: Indicated delivery time was delayed tree times and finally I had to cancel a part of the delivery scope. Cyberport.de is a one time supplier for me.

At the moment of purchase, it stated at the website it was available, but 2 days after buying it, I received an email from cyberport saying it is not available, and that I should wait 10days. Their price was very competible, and I could get my hands on the original product.Payment went without trouble, delivery was super fast and the product was jsut like described and works perfectly with my Ethernet Disk.  Couldn't be happier!

Title: 5% extra profit is better than happy customers
Review: I purchased a notebook unavailable in Italy.Unforeseen delays in product supplies to their store made me propose a change. Playing with contradictory information (website vs email) and an alleged order approval (WHEN???), Cyberport eventually shipped an older (but nearly identical) model at a greater price.I'm not dissatisfied with the product (in full working order - but could have been better packaged) nor with the price in absolute terms. I'm upset with the so-called customer service, as they seemed to forget the word "customer" in it."Misunderstanding"-prone... or really not ready for international customers?

Gut.

Title: My returned item was sent back to me
Review: So... What happened to me. I ordered a laptop from cyberport. After receiving it I noticed that the laptop wasn't quite what I expected. I decided to return it to them, since they have 14 days return. Same day I packed laptop carefully back into original packaging and paid 30‚Ç¨ to have it shipped back. After a week or so I got a robotized answer that item was shipped. I wrote them an email but got no response for 4 days. I tried saying it on facebook, thinking they will care. They didn't. They were telling me that "since i used company name, they don't accept returns if package was opened". Which is you have to admit, silly. How am I supposed to see the product if I don't open the package?! They still don't want to return me the money. So I don't have the laptop, don't have the money (1000‚Ç¨!!!). Cyberport customer service is worst I've ever experiencded.

Title: It was ok
Review: No option to choose shipping or delivery date, very long waiting time for e-mail responses. Poor quality of customer service. New and originally sealed products. Prices as high as in the Apple Store. I bought Christmas gifts from 3 stores and the customer service at the other two was much better.

Title: Very bad customer service/delivery.
Review: Very bad customer service/delivery.I bought a high end oven and booked transportation to my appartment (Lieferung zum W√ºnschort), I paid the extra fee for this. The delivery company called the day of delivery when they were on the way and the employee told me to wait for them on the street. I told them that the delivery should take place in the appartment and not on the street since I had booked for that. The unpolite guy started to shout saying that he knows what he has to do. I asked him to verify that, since it is written in my invoice delivery in the desired place and warned him that I wouldn't accept a delivery on the street.He called 10 minutes later and commanded me to come done to meet him on the street. I told him that the delivery should take place in the appartment, otherwise I cannot accept it. The guy started to shout again and at some point hung up.After two minutes someone called using the intercom and asked who's there. Two guys started to shout "open the door" in avery aggresive way. I asked again who's there and what for, the guys kept shouting. I got scared and didn't open.I called afterwards the mediamarkt customer service and the telephone operator opened an incidence with the delivery company and assured me that a new appointment would be made to deliver the oven in the apartment.After one week no one called. I sent 4 emails to mediamarkt that remained unanswered. I called again, the telophonist told me that the oven was on the way to my place and that would be delivered in 2h. No one called, no delivery.I submitted a Widerruf and mediamarkt answered that I would become a refund when the transportation company returns the oven. I complained since it is not my business. No answer.I warned mediamarkt that I would write a comment in trustpilot if they don't react. Here it is, mediamarkt.never again. Two weeks since I ordered an oven which was not delivered as agreed and still no refund.

Title: I thought this was a trusted and‚Ä¶
Review: I thought this was a trusted and reputable company but it turns out they have scammed me. I bought an iPad case along with an iPad. Title: Media Markt in DE is making fun of customer
Review: Media Markt in Germany is making fun of customers... I bought a watch on their website with delivery until 05/10/23 but of course I did not receive the watch. They then apologized in an email and asked for patience. On October 6, I received an e-mail that the parcel was available and would be available for collection in a few days, and on October 7, I was informed that it would take some time and I had to be patient again... Now I saw on the Vodafone Germany website that they have the watch is on offer and delivery will be possible from October 13. However, no one from Xiaomi DE, PL, EN is able to say when the watch will be available for sale...Media markt now deals with the money of people who paid for the product with the promise of receiving it within a certain time and do not feel obliged to apologize. They will probably lie in e-mails that we will receive the product in a few days, but nothing will come of it... This is probably not just a problem with this watch, but with other things too.Good advice from Media Markt, if you don't have delivery of a given product yet, mark it on the website, rather than selling something you don't have and lying to customers about delivery dates...W.T.H Media Markt

Title: iPhone 15
Review: We have ordered iPhone 15 (as preorder). Until 22nd of September they mentioned delivery will be until 22nd of September. Then on 21st of September they have said emails that it may take weeks to deliver (until now it is written "delivery until 22nd September" and today is 3rd October). We have written to support, they have copy-paste text in the email and turned it off. Very disrespectful. Then I have rated iPhone on their market (the time I wanted to rate, it was 2.5/5), they rejected that it is focused on delivery. They have deleted all the bad rates and wrote some good reviews by themselves (most comments written on same day, so it is their team). Although they are big, but I assume with this attitude they will become Nokia.

Title: The worst experience ever
Review: One of the worst experiences I have ever had with ordering online was with Medi Markt. We ordered a big fridge. Of course, you have to pay immediately. But I, as a customer, should always be on time, precise and responsible. They told us the fridge would arrive on Saturday between 8 till 11. We booked the day to be home. We emptied the refrigerator and put our stuff in the temporary boxes. On Saturday, they sent us messages several times between 8 till 11 to tell us when exactly it would arrive, which was postponing hours to hours. Then at 11:30, they told us the LKV with the fridge was not working, and they could not find any truck to substitute it. So we lost the day until 12, and they told us they could not send it anymore until Wednesday. The date has been set, and they told us it will arrive between 8 till 11. On Wednesday, we took a day off and were waiting for the fridge to come. We emptied out the old fridge again and put the stuff in the temporary boxes. They were sending us messages again to postpone the delivery hour one by one. At 11:30, they said it would arrive between 12:15 till 13:30. As you might guess, at 13:30, they said the fridge got lost!!! And they never send us any messages until 5. At five, we gave up waiting for the delivery. Media Markt is so irresponsible, unorganized, and rude! They have the most noncustomer-friendly customer service. I will never buy or order anything from them anymore. Not only did we not receive our fridge, we also lost two days of our lives.
Response: Hello Razul,thank you very much for your feedback. We would be happy to take another closer look. We look forward to receiving your message.Thank you - Your MediaMarkt Team

Title: The "effort" of the employees to provide assistance to consumers who do not speak German
Review: Hello, I purchased an apple watch on Monday 20/03/2023 and yesterday I decided to go and make a refund for that product, better said I wanted to exchange it for another Apple watch product and pay the difference, but the  employees from Mediamarkt(Paderborn Pohlweg) told me  that it can't be done arrogantly because the warranty started on Monday and she can't sell it back in the store to the future customers. I asked why there is this 14-day policy refund and she didn't give me a concrete answer, she told me that it was Apple's fault, not theirs.She also mentioned that if it was for example another brand to exchange like(Samsung,XIAOMI,etc)I could be entitled to change the product.This is nonsens for me. Furthermore I contacted Apple and they told me that I have the right to change it regardless of the situation because I have the right to do so within 14 days, can you give a proper answer? I read many articles that media market is having this problem with theirs costumers and this depends on the people that are working there, if they are willing to help you they will change it, if they don‚Äôt they will not assist you, this is happening because I‚Äôm not a German citizen?Apple said the warranty has nothing to do with what the employees said if am in the 14 days.I hope I will get an answer before expires the 14 days .The last this that I want to mention is that the Mediamarkt employees are not interested in helping people who want to buy products or want to find out information, specifications.  This always happens when they find out that you don't speak German and pass you from one colleague to another.  I find this very disappointing and unbearable.  Employees should try to provide assistance regardless of the language the consumer speaks, considering that nowadays there are all kinds of translation methods (applications, etc.).

Title: MediaMarkt sold me a used item SOLD as a NEW one
Review: I went into the Store in Fuengirola, Spain and was recommended a SmartGyro Rockway Pro Electric Scooter from the display (they have around 15 on display) that had a price tag on it of E 725 the sales person assured me it was the best and so l agreed to buy it. When he put it through the computer said it was E 829 but he convinced me it was a genuine mistake and the best machine and I bought it for my Birthday. Now it is in my garage and l turned on the display the 13th Jan after my birthday and find it is a SECOND HAND scooter with 110 km use and when l checked the tyres they are worn badly on the RHS, l have not even been on the road and only tested the setup adjustments of this item with less than 4 METRES set-up test when i spotted the 110 km previous use so no stars if it was possibleUPDATESeems a new employee didn't know the price was dropped to E725 due to returned item useage, the store apologised and credited the paid amount in full SO revised rating to 3 as it still shouldnt happen

Title: Bad customer service experience
Review: I've purchased a tv 11 months ago. We were having issues with the tv for a while now - reached out to the service centre twice who tried to do a repair however both tries have ended up unsuccessfully. The repair team has supplied us with a report/email explaining the situation and directing us to go to Media Markt who will make a replacement of the product or a refund.I immediately reached out to Media Markt both via phone and through filling out the relevant contact form on their website. They advised I should wait until I hear back from them with further steps. It's been 2 weeks now since we made a contact and still haven't heard back from them. Not to mention that we made another 2 phone calls to follow up on this. They advised we will hear back from them in the next couple of days.I am really annoyed with the whole situation and having constant issues with the tv. This timeframe for a refund/replacement of a product is simply unacceptable. Very disappointed with an inefficient and useless customer service. Will think twice next time before making another purchase at Media Markt!

Response: Guten Tag, vielen Dank, dass Sie Ihre positive Erfahrung mit uns teilen. Wir w√ºnschen Ihnen weiterhin viel Freude mit dem neuen Produkt.Viele Gr√º√üe - Ihr MediaMarkt Team

Title: Fast and nice experience
Review: Really competent and nice employers
Response: Hallo,wir freuen uns, dass alles zu Ihrer Zufriedenheit ist, und bedanken uns f√ºr die super Bewertung. Weiterhin w√ºnschen wir Ihnen noch viel Freude mit dem neuen Produkt.Viele Gr√º√üe - Ihr MediaMarkt Team

Title: Keep it up!!!
Review: NaN
Response: Hallo,wir freuen uns, dass alles zu Ihrer Zufriedenheit ist, und bedanken uns f√ºr die super Bewertung. Weiterhin w√ºnschen wir Ihnen noch viel Freude mit dem neuen Produkt.Viele Gr√º√üe - Ihr MediaMarkt Team

Title: Stay away from this store unless you‚Ä¶
Review: Stay away from this store unless you want to be scammed. Worst customer service.I placed the order 27 of October, and I was sick then, so I asked for an extension for the pickup period through customer service and the Hamburg Altona branch. They said it was possible and would do it, but they didn't.After that, I received an email that my order had been automatically canceled.I tried calling customer service a lot, and they kept saying that the product was not available in stock anymore, I told them that was not true, and the product was available in the Rostock-Sievershagen branch, and they said to me that was true.However, unfortunately, they are telling me that I have to pay the new price of 4469 Euros instead of 3375 Euros which I spent on the MWST promotion, which is unacceptable and highly frustrating.Don't recommend it at all. Never Again!

Title: No delivery after 3 weeks
Review: After one month, the good have not yet been delivered. Horrible service. No sollution presented. I will never buy at media markt again.

Title: I ordered a product online
Review: I ordered a product online, prepaid for it, but for some reason: never got the product. I asked for explanation, but in vane.I had to ask twice in 2 weeks for paying me back the more than 600,- EUR. Kundenservice bei MM bedeutet leider gar nichts. They just told us to buy the very same product for a second time (nonsense). So we did, but none of the 2 products has ever arrived!Shame on MM.After such a bad experience MediaMarkt made me to decide not to buy ANYTHING from them again and this means my whole family will avoid shopping at them ever. Sorry to write that I really can‚Äôt recommend MM to anyone.

Title: They are not professional at store of‚Ä¶
Review: They are not professional at store of Marmara forum Istanbul, after spending 1 hour waiting for them to issue the tax free form they issued an invoice which they told me that its tax free but it was refused at the tax refund office at airport, they don't understand English or any other language than Turkish, please avoid.

Title: Do Not pay for delivery!!!
Review: The worst! This is the second time I‚Äôve purchased a washing machine here and never again. The first washing machine broken after a two years (I accept this is a brand issue) but the delivery was ridiculous. Two times they didn‚Äôt turn up and stated the drivers didn‚Äôt get time even though they delivered for another three hours? I was also informed they would have no time the next day (Friday) leaving me with no washing machine for the weekend. They then failed to arrive or call to cancel for the Monday. That‚Äôs three days unpaid from work, including the day it was delivered. Then, The exact same thing happen for the second washing machine, no apology, no discount, nothing. Disrespectful, time wasting delivery.

Title: Delivery takes way too long..
Review: Delivery: really slow. It might take several weeks. Do not use it if you need anything immediately. Customer service: Super bad. I wrote couple of email. They did not even bother to reply it back. Which make it clear that why people use USA based online shop instead of a German-based-one.

Title: Theft Insurance and rude customer‚Ä¶
Review: Theft Insurance and rude customer services is rampant.  I mostly buy house utensils, but, I will have to check another place. I can't trust these guys anymore.

Title: Artikeln mit Rabatt nicht geliefert
Review: I ordered vacuum cleaner online from Media Markt shop as they were offering a discount for the item at the time, and paid with credit card, received the order confirmation email including which Media Markt location is going to fulfil the order. All good up to this point. Next day comes a 1-sentence email  (not from customer service address or Onlineshop address, I assume directly from the market supposed to fulfil the order) saying my order is cancelled as they don‚Äôt have this on stock. No polite words or apologies, nor any compensation offer. I check online again, the item is available still to order, and for same price. Interestingly, there is a 2nd entry for the same item but at higher price. So, I re-order the item, pay again, get a new order confirmation, this time from another market to fulfil the order. Next day, someone else sends me a 2-liner email, saying order is cancelled, they don‚Äôt have the item in the market. Online, again available. At this point I am convinced they don‚Äôt want to deliver at the prices they advertise, and low price displayed is a scam to get customers interested, but you only get the item if you pay the higher price. Total shame for such a large brand.

Title: Everything went smoothly.
Review: We ordered a fridge. It was delivered within a week and put properly where we wanted it. Satisfied!

Title: Good service
Review: Good service. I'm so happy with my new laptop. Thanks for the recommendation.

Title: Terrible after sales service
Review: I have just written a long review about my experience with Media Mart and I wish I had read the other reviews before buying my dishwasher . I have never experienced a service like it and my dishwasher is now nearly out of its guarantee .My client number is 900010398. I bought the dishwasher on the 11 of September 2021 and I have used it about 5 or 6 times . Goodness .What a shambles .I'm still waiting for an engineer to come after making 5 trips to the Media Mart near Benidorm . My last dishwasher lasted for 17years with no problems .

Title: Order cancelled without an explanation
Review: I ordered a mobile phone, got confirmation about the order, and money was taken from my account. Two days later I receive an email that my order was cancelled. No explanation. I see now on the website that the item is out of stock. They have returned the money, but they have wasted my time! Total incompetence if they cannot keep their offer up-to-date on their website!

Title: Cheeky system and-inefficient customer service and support system
Review: I ordered Samsung Tab S8+ in the promotion period where they are offering Samsung  buds pro and book cover in the bundle deal.  I added both the items in my cart (phone browser) along with the tablet and as I was checking out it said tablet is not available anymore. I am an IT person and I can see that they have some kind of check on their sell counter i.e.,  when an item has sold too many copies in promotion they simply make it unavailable till the offer expires.  Anyway, miraculously few hours later, I could check out and the tablet got ordered but not the promotional items (didn't change anything in my cart). I chatted with customers service immediately and was told that in their system the bundle has been ordered and that I would be getting all the items. I only received the tablet and when I wrote to them about it they said they've ordered both items for me now and I will get them soon. It has been 2 weeks and after exchanging many emails they still haven't dispatched anything. The customer service doesn't even reply to my exact queries and answers in one liners, which are not helpful. I think their systems are either too old or too much bureaucracy is in-loved in order to fix simple problems. I see that their customers service don't have much power to do anything and they've to communicate stuff to other departments and get a response. That's fine but how much time they require to get a response back? Days, weeks? This way it take decades to resolve even small issues. On the contrary, I've been buying stuff from Amazon and other online shops and they fix your issues within minutes and answer you comprehensively. Nevertheless, the promotion period ends soon and I bet then they would be telling me that I cannot get the items anymore (even though they have ordered them for me apparently).

Title: I ordered a Pixel 6 and paid with‚Ä¶
Review: I ordered a Pixel 6 and paid with Paypal. After 10 min i got order cancelled. I contacted the support via Facebook and they told me that they can tell me why my order was cancelled only tomorrow. I writed them back next day and the reason it was a "shortage". Clearly they didn't have the phone on stock, it was fake advertise.

Title: I ordered an advanced delivery n‚Ä¶
Review: I ordered an advanced delivery n instalation for a dishwasher from mediamarkt sweden.This service s offered by Bring a local sweden delivery company . When the draftman install , it seems my cran  have a hole for connecting to other pile at the back so water may come out during running. The draftman didn't have tool to cover it. So he advised me to buy a screw to cover the hole. N ask mediamarkt to order bring to come back for installation.I follow his advice , but mediamarkt n bring now made up a story that they cant install because there used to be another dishwasher. This is a lousy excue n lie. Even if there used to be another dishwasher , my delivery package include removing the dishwasher. It took mediamarkt n bring more than one month to response , n now they kick the ball back to me to ask another plumber for installation . My case number is Misslyckad installation vill boka igen 62573782 [√Ñrende: 220527-038265] . And it s still unsolvable now.When mediamarkt asked me to review this service on their website. They rejected to publish this review haha

Title: Order cancelled and price increased by 140 ‚Ç¨
Review: Ordered a Galaxy S20 FE last week.Happy to finally find a good deal.I checked every day when they finally ship my new phone...Today they cancelled my order and increased the price by 140‚Ç¨.Seriously Mediamarkt?Thanks for wasting my time!---The worst part:Their argument was that they're out of stock, so they cancelled my order. The next day the phone was available again just 140 bucks more expensive.The message:When you get a good deal at mediamarkt they will cancel your order.

Title: thats all
Review: Hi, order canceled after 15min I made payment with Paypal. Tried third time, again order cancel for security reasons...Contacted costumer service with e mail. two day after they answered in short order was canceled for security reasons.

Title: Want to be let down? Come on down to MediaMarkt!
Review: If you're looking for a company that takes your money instantly, but takes almost 3 weeks to deliver a single order item - then MediaMarkt is the place for you! Forget about Amazon prime, who needs next day? It's overrated. You can get absolutely highly inflated prices with almost little care given to your order by placing an order with MediaMarkt! And that's not all! If you're looking for bad customer service, where you'll shunned, ignored and of course - experience the old "Pass The Buck" simulator! Then look no further! MediaMarkt has got you covered! What isn't there to love about bad quality of service? Little to no due diligence in order prep, and of course falsely procured delivery estimates? If you're not into that, there is something seriously right with you! So what are you waiting for? Place your order, watch your money flutter away in the wind and find yourself getting agitated daily with MediaMarkt. Order now!(This is a sarcastic review, in case it wasn't clear).

Title: Pre ordered a Game in September
Review: Pre ordered a Game in September , it was supposed to Release in November , its the 27th of february now!! Like i even called them on Release day and they told me to wait another 3 weeks, ye nothing Changed..Update in Like mid of April:Luckily i still had the PayPal buyers Protection so i got a full refund!Thanks PayPal, cant recommend buying here

Title: So my order was never delivered to me‚Ä¶
Review: So my order was never delivered to me and on the tracking it says on the way back to sender, seems that somehow DHL lost it ,MediaMarkt keep telling me that I should wait till item reach their warehouse..How even item reach their warehouse when it's kind lost with carrier(DHL).Support is useless trying to call,email,twitter,live chat they didn't even understand how to read tracking,they saying same story like robots everyday.SO IF YOU WANT TO LEFT WITH NO ITEM NO MONEY AND NO SUPPORT AND ANXIETY JUST ORDER FROM THEM! Credit Card Chargeback is coming.. Order 143620748

Title: TERRIBLE Delivery Service
Review: I ordered a tablet and a case for school. A few days after the expected delivery date, I contacted customer support. I gave them my order number and they said it was delayed but did not know how long the delay will be for or where the package even was. A week after the expected delivery date, same thing. Two weeks after the expcted delivery date, I canceled the order since they were still not able to provide how long the delay will be or even track where my package was. However, they only canceled the tablet and not the case so I will have to return the case on a later date... I CANNOT recommend ordering from media markt. Stick to amazon.

Title: This company is a scam
Review: This company is a scam. I purchased a gift for my nephews.  The shipping address was in NY.  This outfit took my money...had the item returned to them with no explanation.  The recipient did not receive it.  I did not get a refund.  I am out $75.  MedialMarket does not respond to inquiries.  I am filing a fraud complaint against them.

Title: Disappointing customer/repair service
Review: My phone (still in warranty) didn't charge anymore. I delivered the phone for repair at a store and they informed me upon delivering the faulty product that it will take a maximum of 3 weeks.Imagine my surprise when after 2 months I still don't have my phone back. And they don't even provide a status update. I had to write them multiple times asking for an update. And the reply is usually a vague response, like 'please, be patient, we are working on it'.I have other products bought from them and honestly I am scared if these products stop working

Title: Sent wrong order and don't accept return
Review: I bought a roomba i7 online, they sent a roomba 600 and now they don't want to recognize their mistake, I ended up paying 200 euros for their mistake. Awful service!!!

Title: Bad service
Review: I bought a refrigerator trough online a fewdays ago .They brought the wrong refrigerator to my house.That¬¥s why I cloudn¬¥t receive it.Now they sent me an e-mail:We will refund your money.When is unclear.Because of them I missed new year offers and I don¬¥t have a fridge to keep my food.They tortured me completely.

Title: Turkey Ankamall Taking Hostage Customer
Review: I had a complaint about one of your store Ankamall (T049)- Media Markt. I went Ankamall Media Markt to buy phone cradle (28.12.2021, /day/month/year) at 8.15 pm. When I am entering the store the alarm was on I did not care that. Then I checked store and bought nothing so I went to the exit again alarm was on. Store security came near to me and wanted to search my gym bag. In Turkey security cannot search people or their bags it is against law and if they have to search it must be in front of the police. I said I know my rights you are not allowed to do that and store manager came near to me with another security (first security was female and second security who came with manager was male). They insisted to frisk and search my bag. I refused because the alarm was on when I go into the store and it was on again when I am leaving, it was clear alarm was broken. I said you can search my bag but you have to call the police. They take hostage me in the store and I had to call the police. Store manager checked the security camera with security but still they did not let me go. Then police came to the store and asked to me what is the situation. I explained the situation and alarm was on because of my wallet, then police officer empty my wallet in front of everybody so nothing was in my wallet. I did not make a complain about store manager and 2 security because my friend was waiting for me and time was late for me. I am very embarrassed because they blame me to be a thief even though they check the security cameras. I hope you will do something because your Ankamall - Turkey store employess are commiting an offense to me and this is my first step to make a complain. Also I will make a complain about this situation in Turkey and I wanted to inform you maybe you care about your brand value. Ankamall - Turkey store alarm is broken and they blamed me to be a thief also they took hostage me in the store.

Title: Friendly employees and fast service!
Review: NaN

Title: NEVER RECIEVED MY ORDER OR ANY INFORMATION
Review: I have ordered online (Online verf√ºgbar) . Media Markt informed us that delivery time is in 3 days. We were waiting for 6 working days till now. We have called customer service and received an answer that order is still in a warehouse. That was the reason why we cancelled it. We never had so horrible experience, lies as now. The company is in responsible without any willingness to solve the problem. If you are not lucky, you are not getting you gift at all. Please do not tell anything about delivery companies because your customer service made me call there (DHL) just to experience they have no Idea and I am beign horrible treated. The order from 20.12.2021 till 28.12.2021 stayed in a warehouse. I would like to raise it to manager, because this experience is enormously unpleasant. MediaMarkt offering products, makes you pay but you dont recieve anything but a bat time and Marketing Lyes.

Title: Over a month and still no TV
Review: I ordered a new TV on december 22nd with a Black friday discount. Got the TV after a week and a half with PostNord. I mounted it on my wall, turned it on, and the screen had a vertical line. Bad screen out of the box. Called support, they told me to call Samsung and activate the warranty, on a BRAND NEW TV. Called Samsung, they laughed and said it was Mediamarkt that should give me a new TV, not repair it. Called support again, they said they will send me a sendings note (fraktsedel) so that PostNord can come and take the TV and bring it to MediMarkt Norrk√∂ping.. Nothing came. After 2/3 days I called again. They had wrong email which is impossible as we use the same one as the one we made the order woth. Nevertheless, another 2/3 days passed, no email. So we went directly to the store. The guy there gave us the sending note and said that they would check the TV as soon as they get it, like the same day. But get this, they have a driver who could have taken the TV the next day, but no, we got to go with PostNord for another week of waiting. PostNord came after 5 days and MediaMarkt in Norrk√∂ping got the TV after another 4/5 days. So, more than week already. Nobody checked the TV in the store for days until we decided to visit the store again. They somehow "missed" to check the TV and after we insisted and waited like 30/40 minutes they confirmed it. They tried to sell us a more expensive TV with a little discount as a compensation because the TV we bought was no longer avaliable, which was not acceptible for us. We wanted the same or a better TV for the same amount of money without losing the Black Friday discount. They wanted the opposite of that. After failing to sell us a more expensive TV, they found the exact same model in Stockholm and Malm√∂. They would call them directly and arrange a transport for one TV to their store, if the box is was not opened. It was a late friday so the guy said that he would call us on monday. The weekend and 2 work days after that, nobody contacted us. So, another visit to the store and another person who worked there. She would make a few calls and then call us. Later that day, she called and said that she arranged the transport, so the TV should arrive the day after that so that a guy who works there as a driver would bring it to us. She would also call us when they get the TV. Here we are, 3 work days later and no call from her and no TV. There is no way to contact a regional manager, store manager or someone higher up. I am tired of calling a useless support and driving to the store.I would definitely never buy something again from MediaMarkt. Their support is basically non-existent and in zero coordination with the store. What an experience. It has been over a month since we made the order. Now we have no TV for Christmas. Nice!

Title: If you expect worse than no service
Review: If you expect worse than no service, this company will exceed expectations, we bought a TV in their Telde store here in Gran Canaria, for installation in our holiday apartment, the installation tech or tv did not show up at the agreed time, have contacted their customer service numerous times, no one can help u‚Äôs with a new time, they never get back to us, we have asked to be refunded, that has not happened either.It is like their customer service are just people that answer the phone, then just does nothing.

Title: Stop selling defective products
Review: I bought a new Whirlpool dishwasher a few weeks before Black Friday, because it was urgent for me to cover the needs of my baby. It was installed by authorised technicians of Media Markt and they just made sure it wasn't leaking. I did the first wash in the evening and used a few items to feed the one year old. After that I emptied the rest of the dishwasher with a bit wet hands and noticed soap residue on all the dishes.I contacted the Media Markt the next day, and several days after that (and after having to call daily their customer service line) and they sent a Whirlpool technician last week, who stayed for five minutes, took photos of the dishes that had soap, saw that I had used 4 different detergents (3 tablets and 1 liquid) and left. After almost a month since the purchase, Whirlpool has still not authorised the replacement of the device and they have been very rude on the phone. Moreover, they tried to send someone to fix the dishwasher and I didn't let them, because when a machine isn't working since day 1, it is defective and needs replacement.Their customer service is a nightmare; each rep that picks up the phone has no idea of what the case is about; they don't update their records, so you have to explain over and over the issue to them. I called the Media Markt owner, Retail World, and they connected me to a customer service manager, mrs Sousani, that promised to have the device replaced; that was a month ago, nothing happened. They also gave me the number of mrs Sourbati, but her line is constantly busy - I tried calling on a Sunday to realise that it's actually busy on purpose, even on Sundays... My baby consumed soap and nobody seems to care. Shame on them.I already informed the authorities and am planning to get legal advice.(Review about Media Markt Greece)

Title: Customer support is unkind to the‚Ä¶
Review: Customer support is unkind to the maximum as well as suppliers. Never again in the media market üëéü§¨

Title: Worst experience
Review: Worst experience. If any one of you want to return anything after some time or even within 14 days, they Won't take it according to their mood.Saturn and other stores are far away better than them. I bought a ipad. Saturn or apple schildergasse willingly told that they can return the opened product. No issue in that. Mediamarkt is creating their own policy. I have contacted with Apple. They have also no issue to have their products back even if It's opened. Choosing mediamarkt is absolutely worng choice and rude behaviour was from them.Saturn is far far way better than them.

Title: Never believe they can deliver things.
Review: Never believe they can deliver things.I ordered a phone on black week and they gave a delivery date and today cancelled the order . Neither i have a deal nor a phone .

Title: Sexism under German Surveillance
Review: A man followed me around the store, and even though the employee who was helping me also saw him and heard how I asked him to step back after he needed my name and address for an order, the man refused to and the employee, who should have protected me and reiterated my request for privacy, simply said "Oh well, then you can't order anything". This is how #Metoo in Germany is handled - or rather ignored. Men can follow you around, listen in on your private data and laugh when you are not comfortable to dish out your name and address in front of them.Really disappointing & shocking experience. The white German man who got to harass me was able to make his order and laugh at me in Schadenfreude. Even the female employees there did not help me!

Title: Terrible experience with customer‚Ä¶
Review: Terrible experience with customer support.  Weeks of trying to get a faulty OLEDS tv replaced. Continual refusal to replace a three week old faulty television. Had to resolve the problem at personal cost. They would not listen to professional advice on the problem. They stopped answering emails too. Abysmal customer service. Please do not buy from this store..

Title: I would give 0 stars - "Available products" are actually not available
Review: I would give 0 stars. Customer service unfriendly. Customer support chat unavailable (waited 1,5 hours in my queue only to find out that there are currently no agents available). I placed an order on an available product and then got contacted that the product is not available anymore. Instead they offered me a used product with a 3% discount. I especially created a gift card for my order and I am now hooked into this bad retailer because they did not pay me out the gift cards. Instead they gave back another gift card.

Title: No customer service
Review: No customer service. Order a tumble dryer three weeks ago and I have been given three different delivery dates so far. No explanation as to why it didn‚Äôt arrive each time. Avoid online orders

Title: Don't buy on Media Markt.DE
Review: Don't buy on Media Markt.DE. I ordered a couple of CDs and LPs in August because the estimate delivery was one to two weeks. Here I am still waiting for my items to be delivered after two months of waiting! I have contacted the costumer service many times and nobody could provide a solution to my situation, they just ask me to be more patient and wait. I just got sick of waiting and asked for a refund. What really makes me mad about the whole situation is that although no one can tell me when the items will be available, the information displayed on the website tells that the items could be delivered in seven days!

Title: I ordered a Samsung GStill haven't received my order that is A MONTH LATE!alaxy S21 from the‚Ä¶
Review: I ordered a Samsung Galaxy S21 from the online store. It said that it was in stock and that it would arrive in 3 days. I placed the order and paid upfront in full. I received a confirmation email saying that it would arrive on the 16th of September. It is now the 11th of October, almost a month later and it still hasn't arrived. I've called 4 times and no body was able to do anything helpful at all. Every time they tell me to wait a few days or cancel the order which would take A WEEK to be refunded. Nobody knows what they are talking about, no one takes you seriously, the website and fulfilment system clearly doesn't work and the service is terrible. No one has any kind of solution or compensation for me. Would never buy from here again. I would sooner buy something from Wish and that's saying something. At least something would get shipped

Title: It is so unbelievable bad, you don't believe it!
Review: It is so unbelievable, It seems that I need to go to court because of a washing machine. NEVER BUY FROM ANY MEDIAMARKT ENTITIY! I am saying that as a lawyer and a German. They do systematically try to discourage you from your rights after German and European law. Actually, very sure they are completely in compliant in many ways and they should be banned from the authorities. DONT BUY HERE; better order on amazon.

Title: They cancelled my order without any explanation
Review: Media Markt cancelled my order with no explanation. I just got an email from PayPal that I was issued a refund. I checked the product page again afterwards and it says that the product is in stock (green circle).

Title: Trash
Review: Trash, trash nothing but trash! Paid for installation service only for the representative to show up at my house with zero competence and a bad attitude. Told his ass to take the TV right out of my house! Getting a refund and and taking my money where I‚Äôll be appreciated!

Title: Ordered a washing machine
Review: Ordered a washing machine, should be delivered two days later. No delivery -and impossible to find a telephone number to the shop on costa del Sol where I bought it. Had to call a central in Alicante, they promised delivery next day. No delivery! After long time I found an email address and made a complaint.Promise: delivery next day between 09.00 - 12.00. Did arrive, but too late!Never more bad German MediaMarkt!

Title: Didn't help me at all
Review: Didn't help me at all after my packets got send back. Now I have to pay 200 euro's more for the same item I bought yesterday.

Title: Never seen bad Customer service like‚Ä¶
Review: Never seen bad Customer service like the lady whos i met today, train your employees to have nice face when they meet their customers.Helsingborg V√§la

Title: I bought my laptop last friday there‚Ä¶
Review: I bought my laptop last friday there and the Staff, Herr Horbert war sehr nett mit uns und he has helped us choose the right laptop. I want to rate him 10/10, ausgezeichnet!üëçüèª

Title: WORST SHOPPING AND CUSTOMER SERVICE EXPERIENCE IN MY 46 YEARS
Review: 1. I ordered a watch that was in stock almost 6 weeksago and  2 weeks later I was told to expect it on May 27th, 2021. As of Friday, I am now being told June 28th, 2021. 2. I have called Media Markt many times, but they hang up as soon as they know only I speak English. I've called at least 100 times.3. I have asked for an English speaker at least 200 times over email and Facebook to no avail.4. I have emailed or contacted Facebook over 82 times in total to no avail.5.  The Facebook team (after a solution with another watch) says they can't help me anymore.6.  Media Markt no longer replies to my emails because they don't seem to know how to resolve this matter. Calling to discuss would be the easiest option but no one will call me.7.  I've spent over 100 hours of my life arguing with Media Markt to no avail.8.  This experience has caused me emotional distress and has kept me from going to work for 4 weeks now due to my Aspergers Syndrom being affected by this major complication.9.   I have been offered several watches in place of the initially ordered watch but Media Markt has not honored the offer. Instead, they come back with an excuse every time.10. As of this past Thursday, May 19th, 2021, I agreed to another watch. The next day, A completely different watch was sent out to me without anyone reaching out to confirm the watch as promised.  I did not agree to the watch that Media Markt sent out.11. Media Markt canceled the order with (DHL code ADVIS-STBSD-DD), which means the sender (Media Markt) canceled the order. Instead of admitting this, Media Markt sent an email stating that I gave them the wrong address when in fact the first part of this order arrived to the very same address 5 weeks ago.12.  Media Markt had the correct address this whole time. The item never even made it to my address. It was directly canceled by Media Markt.13.  Media Markt has now sent an email stating my mailing address is incorrect and that the order will be sent back and canceled. The watch is financed, which means I will not be offered the financing offer again via Consor's Finanz if/when the order is canceled.I have consistently emailed Media Markt multiple times on a daily basis for the last 6 weeks asking for an English speaker to no avail. Media Markt cannot produce a watch that has already been paid for. Now they are saying they are going to cancel the order 'seemingly' because they do not want to figure out how to get me a watch that I asked for.

Title: Hi i have bought a samsung tablet in‚Ä¶
Review: Hi i have bought a samsung tablet in kiel media markt and a screen protector and when we got home we tried putting the screen protector on it was fine but next day it came off the screen As i was today which is 3 days after i bought it went to media markt they had no 1 speaking in english and when finally someone arrived never listened just told me it was my mistake to put it on my self and called the police to kick me out off the store and i had my family and kids watching me Anyways i tried not making a probl3m and just asked a response to an error that could be solved in no cost or in no harm but I guess this is what you call a customer service....

Title: Worst service ever
Review: Boycott !!!! I have bought an oven end of February 2021 from media market website, the purchase was confirmed and the item was supposed to arrive latest 16 of March 2021. I called them for the first time beginning of April, they told me that the item is not available for delivery, knowing that they did not even send me an email to inform me about that. Until today and after several calls, the oven did not arrive yet and each time I call the customer service they ask me to wait a little bit longer. Instead of enjoying cooking in this lockdown days with my oven, I am spending my time calling them every day to not be stolen and at least to have my money back.This is my second very bad experience with Mediamarket, the first one was in Vienna shop in August 2020 where I bought a video game as a gift for my nephew abroad of Austria and when he received it some weeks later, it was empty without a CD. Of course, in the shop they did not wanna change it or refund it becuse it was 40 days after the purchase ( it was not possible to bring back the video game again within 40 months because simply the gift was sent outside of Europe).

Title: Made an order
Review: Made an order. Said i can Pick it up in 3 days. I called, and now i can be Lucky if it comes in 7 days. I do not know why they use online shop to misinform customers. But they are terrible

Title: Bad Delivery Estimation
Review: I ordered a Surface Go 2 with the estimated delivery 1-2 business days after ordered. However, after the payment was made, on the day my Surface Go 2 supposes to arrive, DHL tells me that my order will only be delivered in next 3 days! So much disappointment for the delivery service! Also, I called the customer services center of Mediamarkt and it‚Äôs hopeless! If I would know that they would give more than 5 days for the delivery, I would not order with Mediamarkt at all! Feel like being cheated as they only change the delivery date after the payment was made!

Title: One of the worsts e-commerces on the market
Review: I tried to order on mediamarkt.de, and it always ends with freezing my money for over 2 weeks and canceling my orders.

Title: Ordered something
Review: Ordered something, should have come in 1-3 days.It has been 4 days now and they just texted me with "Your order in on the way it will arrive in 3 days(After weekend)"It was important that it came BEFORE the weekend. Its to late now. Really really bad services. It was stuck in MEDIA MARKT STORE for over 3 days(Being "ready" to get picked up by a DHL guy)Never again. F##k MEDIA MARKT

Title: They are truly inconsiderate
Review: They are truly inconsiderate! I bought an ipad and an apple pencil online with the promise that they will be in my hands three days later! then I proceeded to buy the case and cover for them from amazon with slow post! at 5:20 in the afternoon before the day I was supposed to receive the products someone sent me an email stating that they have not even been sent yet! and that they can not tell me when they will be able to send them! well now I have a bunch of accessories for stuff that I don't have!The worst part? they said to email them if I have further questions and I did! TWICE! No one replied! I even did an online chat a couple hours ago with the personnel on the website and they just told me to wait for an answer!I don't have time to wait! I need the products for a class I have on Monday! I just want my money back so that I can order them from amazon and do my tasks with them!The least they could do was to inform me the day that they were supposed to send the products and they failed! not when I was supposed to have already received it!From a very well known company, one expects more than a very vague and late email!

Title: DO NOT BUY FROM THIS SHOP.
Review: DO NOT BUY FROM THIS SHOP.Definitely the worst online experience ever. First i bought from Italy and nowhere is written that they don‚Äôt ship to Italy.Second I selected Italy as shipping country in checkout field and no error message or pupup appear to stop the checkout. So it seemed the order has been placed correctly.After some days I receive an email that says the parcel has been sent back to sender.O_OI called to ask some clarification and they confirmed that they don‚Äôt ship outside Germany.Ok, so I asked: please change delivery address to my house in berlin. MediaMarkt: changing address is not possible !!!Me: ok, how can I buy again that product?MediaMarkt: you must wait refund and place a new order !!!Me: ok, but how can I reserve the product I already bought?MediaMarkt: you cannot reserve your product !!!Me: ok I go to website and place a new order with German shipping address.The big surprise: the price of the item has gone up by +300‚Ç¨ compared to when I bought it 3 days before.Scammers

Review: NaN
