Title: Goodbye
Review: Hi, order canceled after 5min I made payment with paypal. Tried second time, again order cancel for security reasons...Contacted costumer service with e mail. One day after they answered in short order was canceled for security reasons. No help from them.

Title: They display products as stock‚Ä¶
Review: They display products as stock available without having stock. Then after you pay, they will contact you to offer you the returned items (2nd hand, without possibility to request cashback promotions) with a 50‚Ç¨ discount. Finger weg.

Title: ***NO STARS***
Review: JFTR ***I GIVE NO STARS*** Out of date CRIMINALSI ordered a Toshiba TV online, it took weeks to arrive, then when I contacted them they say it is past the 14 days guarantee so I can not return it, even though it arrived faulty, it was late arriving and now I can not return it!!!!   I emailed 16 different times, every single response is different.  First they are sending the return label, then they have already sent the return label, now they will NOT send a label because 14 days blah blah.  I would avoid this company like you would avoid CANCER or COVID.  Of course I complained on social media, they also gave two different answers, one that they sent the returns label, then the next message was that it past 14 days.  MediaMarkt are the reason people become physically violent, because now I have to deal with a broken TV that does not accept the new 4K Chromecast, the sound keeps failing and the quality of the picture is also the same as MediaMarkt' service. AVOID AVOID AVOID!!  Use Coolblue.de instead, I will never use MediaMarkt ever again.

Title: MM is okay
Review: My personal experiences over the last 10 years with different stores and the online shop is good, not perfect. Fast delivery, good pricing / offers.But I dont like the hotline. I dont want to call them 10 times in case of issues or want to have an discussion if I need help. F u c k off, I'm the customer. Would I do this evaluation not rational you would receive 1 point out of 5.Stuff and service in stores are kind and works pretty well at all!

Title: I bought an Item from MediaMarkt ebay
Review: I bought an Item from MediaMarkt ebay! the Item is defect, no one is helping and are saying that I should contcat ebay. They wasted alot of my time!ebay Bestellnummer: 13-05323-41212

Title: If I could give a negative Bewerbung I‚Ä¶
Review: If I could give a negative Bewerbung I would. I ordered a Coffee Machine value 670‚Ç¨ online on the 21.2 with a delivery date 25-26.2. On the 24.2 I received an email fro Mediamarkt that my order is packed and waiting to be picked up from DHL. Today is the 3.3 and the Status from DHL sendungsverfolgung is the same. Of course I rang the Kundenservice from Mediamarkt on the 26.2 the day it was supposed to come, I already said I want to cancel the order if they can‚Äôt tell me when it will be delivered, only to be told I can‚Äôt cancel in that ‚Äöstatus‚Äò. Wow!! 5 Days later, still the same status, 3 emails, 4 calls to Kunden Services, I have managed to cancel my order, BUT, in the Storno Best√§tigung says when the goods are returned from DHL I will get my refund, how can they be returned if they weren‚Äôt collected??? I also think this is a ‚ÄöBetrug‚Äò! An ‚Äö√úberverkauf‚Äò can happen.... but to sell goods online that are not in stock and holding on the money as long as possible.... that‚Äôs corrupt. It‚Äôs not a small amount of money, I have lodged a complaint with PayPal but I‚Äôm guessing it‚Äôll be a while until I receive my refund. Take care everybody!!! BETRUG ALARM!!!!BTW. I rang DHL, they said that the Absender soll sich melden, I sent an email on Mediamarkt.... I heard nothing!

Title: Great support
Review: Great support staff and I honestly do not get the hate here in the comments.

Title: Worse than Amazon - delivery issues and inability to process a refund
Review: I ordered a monitor for my work office.I selected delivery (no time was mentioned).I then received the delivery info from TRUKRS, they explained they can only deliver between 5-10pm.I explained I could not take deliver at the office at this time, I was willing to be flexible and stay at the office until 8pm (I can't stay any later due to curfew) but they had no willingness to help and said they can't guarantee that.I then cancelled the order with them and I was told it would be refunded....30 days later, hours of time spent calling, messaging, emailing and still not refund or even a response....TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE.If i wanted to deal with some terribly designed bots and be treated like an insignificant customer I'd have bought from Amazon and will do in the future.Just go to Amazon, they're cheaper and their customer service is equally as bad.

Title: Ordered a Dji osmo
Review: Ordered a Dji osmo, micro sd and charging kit..paid and after 10 minutes they cancelled my orders without telling me whats the reason...now my money is with them and havent received refund yet! Unbelivable.

Title: Very friendly staff and fastest‚Ä¶
Review: Very friendly staff and fastest delivery :3I would definitely shop again with them!Beste service :)

Title: I would like to leave a minus 5 for‚Ä¶
Review: I would like to leave a minus 5 for customer service. I will never consider buying anything from any of their stores again, I go to Amazon or eBay next time.

Title: Worst experience with MM Online store
Review: Used the Mediamarkt online store in Austria, to order a dishwasher, including installation and removalof the old dishwasher. First nobody contacted me for the delivery date, I found only out that they are waiting me because I also wrote to the customer service that they might need a longer tube because there is a stove between the wall outlet and the place the dishwasher stands. This indicated that they should have sent a service team which is able to remove the stove if necessary. Unfortunately nobody read that and the haulers came five days after I placed the order, told that they can't fix it and that the Mediamarkt Service team should have read it, because its obvious that assembly team should have brought it.  That was Friday. No news on Monday noon, so I called, got promised things will move on. Tuesday, 24 hours later, no news, no contact, called again, promised to give it priority. Now its Wednesday, 24 hours later, no news, no contact.Worst service I have seen so far, completely useless, customer service 1.1. tells, stay in contact with your clients, communicate that you do at least something with their case. Never ever again MediaMarkt, stay away!

Title: Unprofessional and unreliable
Review: Unprofessional and unreliable. Have bought and paid an expensive graphics card which was on stock at the time of order, and now they have no delivery info so I am without the money and the card. Will not buy again.

Title: srsly this is all a joke
Review: srsly this is all a joke . . . worst online market today

Title: Ashamed.
Review: Ashamed. I would never suggest to buy anything from them.

Title: Be aware when buying online
Review: If you want to buy online, you will have the following issues:- You cannot cancel the order from the website, you need to call the hotline where no one will answer- The delivery will be late from 2 weeks to 1 or more months- You cannot change the delivery address once you placed your orderBasically, another company that wants to have your money at all cost once you ordered without chance of cancel or modify your order. Do not buy there online.

Review: I have recently bought a bagless vacuum cleaner from Mediamarkt-Turkey online web site. I received the product via courier service. However, the invoice was not included together with the shipment. I then contacted MediaMarkt ‚ÄìTurkey Customer Service to request the officially ‚ÄúSigned & Stamped‚Äù hardcopy invoice (not e-invoice). Even so I had not yet been forwarded my invoice.

Title: Don't buy online with them
Review: I would never use media markt online anymore. They were supposed to delivery a kindle and marshall phones for me, maximum at 12th december. Today is 21th december and I just received the marshal phones (delayed in 16th). I bought the 2 products on 27.11.2020, on the website was described they HAD stock and it would be delivered until 12th dec. It was my wife's b-day on 12th thats why I needed the products, so she spent her b-day with no gifts, and until now, we don't have the kindle. They said they also don't know when the kindle will arrive, but I checked several times on the website and they had stock in some stores in Berlin, so WHY don't send 1 for me that is already 1 month waiting for this product? Why promising fake dates delivery to your customers???

Title: great products and staff but unreliable‚Ä¶
Review: great products and staff but unreliable on delivery times, even to the store.

Title: The best store for electronics
Review: NaN

Title: NEVER AGAIN IN A MILLION YEARS
Review: NEVER AGAIN IN A MILLION YEARSI have put an order for a Fridge and although in their webpage was indicated that it was in stock and available in 3 working days they did not deliver for 15 days. They took the money immediately from our account but they could not even give an explanation why they did not deliver. Unacceptable company! STAY AWAY!

Title: Defective product- zero responsibility policy
Review: My parents received a fridge with a defective, loose handle. The door was also marked with scratches, probably from the same issue. Problem is since my father signed for the delivery before checking the product, No1 takes responsibility for it and we are accused of the damage done.

Title: zero customer service- Budapest Media M
Review: Hi. It is a disgrace they are portraiting themself having good customer service but the reality is much worse different. I tried to reach them several times, being on the line for half an hour each.

Title: This started with going in to store at‚Ä¶
Review: This started with going in to store at la zenia boulevard to buy a new lap top , when I finally got an assistant to stop asking for his help , first thing he did was complain I was British and not fluent in Spanish then remonstrated how he was treated like a pa!!y when living in London, complained about British would not talk about lap tops then disappeared off with two young women ignoring us totally my friend and I agreed no help no service so left store to find another computer shop in villa Martin were guy was more than helpful in fact enlightening on products and services available on lap tops he sold .To say they don‚Äôt care is an understatement won‚Äôt use store again unless forced desperation.

Title: Sorry to give this awful servis a star
Review: Sorry to give this awful servis a star. Don't buy anything online from this brand. I wanted to change my delivery date because I wasn't move there yet. But they didn't care my request and send them anyway. Then they wrote me an email and said 'I would like to ask you to order again.' It's very surprising that they trust I'll order anything from them again. So angry and frustrated...

Title: Black Friday deal 2020
Review: Black Friday deal 2020: Xiaomi Mi 10 lite 5g is only ‚Ç¨340 instead of ‚Ç¨399. It was ‚Ç¨299 2 weeks ago. I barely think this is even legal.

Title: Cancelled order, no refund after over 10 business days.
Review: Mediamarkt charged the money from my debit card but cancelled my order for a Google Pixel 4a phone on Nov 3. Their staff cancelled my order and stated that the money would be returned no later than 7 - 10 business days. It has now been over 10 business days and the money has still not yet been returned to my bank account. They have stopped responding to my emails, and I will be filing a chargeback with Visa soon. I have purchased the product elsewhere and will NEVER shop online with Mediamarkt again.

Title: Never again. NEVER AGAIN
Review: on MediaMarkt online, after almost 2 months my order was still pending, because they have delivery issues. I was waiting a lot, and I requested compensation for the 40 Days delay and they simply refused. After another week I said that is unbelievable to wait almost 50 Days and I said to either give me a compensation or cancel the order(I have ordered a 800+ Euro product), and they simply canceled the order and lost me as a customer instead of giving 10-20‚Ç¨ Discount. That is when a business threat the customers like fools with money, and when internal directive is: just take their money, never give them something back.All this considered that I am since 5 Years VIP Club Customer... so never again. I cannot recommend MediaMarkt.

Title: Something strange happened to me the‚Ä¶
Review: Something strange happened to me the first time in Germany.I ordered hair product (‚Ç¨47.16) online at medimarkt Bonn on 7th November (self-pickup).I received an email from the media market on 12th November at 12:01PM .saying that your product is ready to pick from the branch.I did not go last week due to work but I went today to pick up but the guy at pick counter said your product has been picked up by some girl? I refused to accept whatever he told me then he sent me to upstairs where they have customer services, so the same story the guy said we have delivered to your product already picked up the same day you received the email.When I asked the time to pick up he said just within an hour after receiving the email? So they did not even try to refund or give me product, when I asked them how you can give someone just with the order number, without the checking the ID? He told me that we do not do it due to covid?Where we go to the post office to pick up our delivery from amazon etc, they check first our ID then handover the products?Since I do not speak much German, he told me that I can go where I want to complain they just do not care.I lost that much money, its just advice that please take care when you order online something at the media market, you could be next victim of the scam.

Title: I ordered a Fridge from mediamarkt.de - they never delivered it.
Review: I ordered a Fridge from mediamarkt.de, they said they could deliver it by October 19.They still haven‚Äôt called me to arrange a delivery date (they wrote they would do it before October 19.). I have called them 4 times and  written them twice with an ultimatum to give me a delivery date or I would cancel the order on November 9.On November 10. I wrote them to say I was canceling my order because they hadn‚Äôt delivered and they were unresponsive. Now they have written me to say I can‚Äôt cancel my order but I can contact my local MediaMarkt to return the fridge. The whole point was that I have waited for a month and they still haven‚Äôt even contacted me to arrange delivery how and why would I return something I have never received?

Title: No english available. No lang translation.
Review: Their website forces me to select the country I am in. However, I can¬¥t understand nothing as there is not a single country where I can display their offering in ENGLISH. Only local languages are available (and not always). We are in the EU, a single market. So I don¬¥t understand why they make this messy website.

Title: Samsung galaxy A51 scam
Review: I bought galaxy A51 witch I bought bent,  they told me in Manheim, where I went in a few days after purchase, that it is no problem, I should bring the device and it will be solved trough siemens warranty, and now I still don't have my phone. They sent me e-mail that for device I bought for 300 eur I need to pay repair 280 eur because it is mechanicly damaged. I told them that I don't want to pay for repair of a new phone that I bought like that with no sign of use, the phone didn't had a piece of dust, and that they should do it, its been month and half, I don't know where my phone is, nobody contacted me, I am trying to contact them but its not working since I speak english.IT IS A HUGE MESS, NEVER BUY IN MEDIA MARKT.

Title: The goods are normal
Review: The goods are normal, like everywhere else, the service is also, only more expensive than others

Title: Order now and pick up tomorrow ‚Ä¶
Review: Order now and pick up tomorrow in the store. After 1 week I'm still waiting, and they won't let me go to another store they own and have the item. Customer service have no clue , they just tell you today or tomorrow every day.

Title: Gropius Passagen Handy Reparatur Techniker
Review: Gropius Passagen Handy Reparatur. I was there 2 days in a row to check a phone in for repairs. I went straight after work as soon as I could, both times. Once I was told by the technician it is too close to Feierabend and quite frankly he doesn‚Äôt feel like spending 15 minutes to check a phone in, the next day another technician said he cannot do it so close to Feierabend. How sad that an business can come to this?Fortunately there are others that are more interested in ones business.

Title: Sony Employee 5*
Review: Great service of the Sony employee at Media Markt Roermond! We bought a tv overthere and he was able to tell us all the details about the specs and usage. We were very happy and glad to see to see there are good employees overthere

Title: Horrific service and quite possibly con artists
Review: Horrific service! In addition to being sent the wrong product, it was also NOT new, slightly damaged and the guarantee from Apple will run out in a month LOL. I called to report it and had to wait on the line forever only to be told by customer service that there is nothing they can do about it and they'll have to send my complaint to the store (in this case, Aschaffenburg) that the product was sent from. I get a call a few days later from an employee, who asked for pictures of the damage, which I happily sent via email. He told me he'd get back to me the next day. However, he called me back a WEEK later. He offered to refund some of the product's cost in the form of a gift voucher, which he'd send via mail on the same day and that I'd have it within 2-3 business days. Here I am, more than a week later and no voucher as well as no response from customer care about it. I understand the pandemic may have a role to play here but it doesn't excuse poor response to customer complaints. I am not sure if a voucher even makes sense anymore since I will have to once again carry out business with them. Absolutely disgusted by Media Markt at this point.

Title: Online order never received.
Review: I bought a Nintendo Switch through their website, and saw straight away that they were delivering to our billing address instead of our delivery address. Despite the fact that I spoke to their customer service team twice and filled out the contact form twice and even wrote to them over twitter, they didn't change the details.I never received tracking information for the parcel, nor was I even informed when the order was dispatched. The package was delivered to the wrong address where someone forged my signature and kept it.But the most infuriating thing is that no one from MediaMarkt is accepting any sort of responsibility for this. The official line is that they delivered it correctly (which is astounding). I've had to involve the police, because otherwise they flat out refused to discuss my matter further.All of this could have been avoided had they done the bare minimum and changed the delivery address any of the four times I requested it, or even sent out tracking information. It's shocking that they have such expensive parcels floating around Germany, yet the people who paid for them are completely in the dark.I have never dealt with such an uninterested, unfriendly and, above all, incapable customer service team.

Title: Bought tv
Review: Bought tv. It was defected and I returned tv back. Now mediamarkt says I returned old and used tv instead of original. It is insane... it is last time I bought something from them. Unbelievable

Title: I've returned TV within 14 days
Review: I've returned TV within 14 days. But after one and half month I still have not received refund. So no TV and no refund. It is scam

Title: Terrible customer service
Review: Have been trying since 26/11/19 to resolve an issue with a faulty fridge that I bought and was only 3 months old when it failed. Have visited the shop on 5 occasions to try and resolve including on the last visit speaking to a supervisor / assistant manager still with no resolution. I truly believe that if you are not Spanish then the customer service that Media Mart provides is absolutely appalling. I will be visiting the store again today but don't hold out much hope with this problem.

Title: Fair pricing for goods
Review: NaN

Title: ATTENTION - RIP OFF
Review: ATTENTION - definitely, certainly, positively, categorically insist on opening boxes when your item is delivered for a pick up at the back of the store !!!!! Same at the delivery at home - insist on opening boxes, packaging, etc. It must be an obligatory process at this Media Markt store !!! If an item is damaged and you notice it later, let's say, at home, it will be your word against theirs and they will win !!! Everything is organized in a rip a customer off way !!! Contact me if you need some explanations. They managed to rip us off - 400 euros are lost !!!

Title: Avoid as much as you can.
Review: I will never buy again from them.1 - I bought online, one television and washmachine, I could not schedule the date of delivery.2- The wasmachine that arrived was damaged. It took 3 weeks to change for a new one. They promised a bonus of 40 euros for the all issue. I didn¬¥t get that.  The customer service is terrible ,  I could speak English only 2 times . 90 % of the them do not speak English.

Title: Bought a MacBook Pro with battery‚Ä¶
Review: Bought a MacBook Pro with battery issue. took it back immediately. it took 3 weeks for a battery replacement. instead of this, they broke the whole carcase. they didn't want to replace the product until Apple gave us a certified diagnostic where it was saying mediamarkt "fixed" it wrong. then mediamarkt accepted  to give us another macbook instead, just to find out at home that the product have the same battery issue. worst service ever. they don't return the money. besides, when I went to let them know I have the same problem, the manager of the store yelled "so you don't wait for us to replace your product third time?!"

Title: Customer Service acted few hours after‚Ä¶
Review: Customer Service acted few hours after my email regarding aircondition and a certain Herr Stewert was very helpful taking the aircon for repair wonderful people Media Markt I thank You

Title: Ordered BOMANN KG 184‚Ä¶
Review: Ordered BOMANN KG 184 K√ºhlgefrierkombination as online order in "MM M√ºnchen Solln" on 27. of July 2019 together with washing machine. I order it because I thought it will be delivered on time (within 2-4 working days), but now I am already 6 days in my new appartment without a fridge.The guy who sold it to me said to me on the phone that he did not promise that the fridge will be delivered within couple days and that he have a witness for that statement !!?.Well that is a partialy true because he said that for washing machine not for the Fridge!Well mister Salesman I have 2 witnesses also, my wife and my brother if we will talk about that and not about the customer satisfaction.So rating for professionality is ZERO.Next time I will buy something in this store only if I can bring that with me or if I can wait long enough to be delivered.I wish I can put a ZERO for rating here.And MediaMarkt does not publish bad reviews on their page.I put this review there but they did not publish it.Big ZERO for MediaMarkt from me !!!!!

Title: Its a great company
Review: NaN

Title: I can find what I need with a best‚Ä¶
Review: I can find what I need with a best prices.Thank you very much for media markt team :)

Title: Worst staff and customer service and‚Ä¶
Review: Worst staff and customer service and sales is so badThe staff here treat so bad also the put a tv on sale and they say it will end the next month then the sale disappear soonerSuch a trash company u can choose cool blue or krefel or fnac instead they are better

Title: Unpleasant staff (20.07.2019
Review: Unpleasant staff (20.07.2019, Rathaus Arkaden, 12:45 - 13:45 pm approx). I was buying a electric toothbrush, and taking my time to decide which one was the right one.At some point, a staff member appeared at my elbow supposedly to help. He stood very close to me the whole time even when he was approached by other customers for help.  He answered the questions I had a bit sarcastically. After I left I realized he was making sure I didn't walk away with one of the display models. If they do need to observe customers in order to prevent theft, fine. But at least respect people's personal space and don't intimidate people physically. You can see what someone is doing from a meter away. I found the aggression absolutely out of place. I won't be back any time, and I can not recommend going there, especially if you're not a white person.

Title: Worst customer service ever!!
Review: Worst customer service ever!!! I bought a printer from them. When I got home I saw that it had no USB cable (that fact wasn't stated in the technical details) so I tried to install it since it supposed to have wireless function. Surprise, it didn't work without a cable so I went to return it and ordered a new one.When I unpacked the product the plastic pieces that were inside the box to protect the printer from hits during transportation broke so I threw them away. So next day I go to the store in Metro-Stra√üe D√ºsseldorf and a man named Frank tell me that I have to pay 10 Euros for the 2 pieces of plastic that were protecting the printer. My level of German is not yet good enough for me to argue about things like this in German. I asked for a English speaker and I got the reply: Nobody speaks English here, you are in Germany! SO PLEASE DO NOT BUY FROM THEM !!!!

Title: Simple and easy
Review: Ordering online on Media Markt was easy and the delivery guys were very quick and efficient. It's helpful that you can choose your own delivery slot and rearranging was very easy. Overall, very happy and would purchase again online.

Title: Fast and perfect delivery to the store
Review: Fast and perfect delivery to the store. Nice staff at the pickup. Everything completely uncomplicated and so fast...

If the address is not a home address they should give it to me personally, not to someone a random person! The customer support can‚Äôt speak English, and I couldn‚Äôt find an email address to write the to ask why they didn‚Äôt give the package personally to me.

Title: Appalling online and average in-store service
Review: Appalling online and average in-store service / P√©simo servicio online y medio en tienda.If ever there was a case to say that many reviews could be fake, then this has to be one.I researched the reviews on this company online before placing my order for the new ‚Ç¨2500 Samsung QE55Q9FN UltraHD 4k TVEven Samsung, on their own website recommended either Media Mrkt or El Corte Ingles .I made my order online on a Friday at noon, with a collection from store within 24/48 hrs. I was hoping the next day.Their actual delivery to store promise, is within 1-2 business days.From that moment on it became apparent that this company have no idea how to fulfil orders via the web and/orstore collections. Their incompetence knows no bounds. The chronological list of events:-1.	Contacted samsung.es who confirmed they could deliver Monday/Tuesday the following week, as a result of the	weekend. I wanted ideally to find a store that held stock that would be open at the weekend. Samsung confirmed	that both El Corte Ingles & Media Mrkt held stock.2.    The Media Mrkt website does not provide the ability to search if a product is in stock in a particular store. Neither	do they ever answer their direct phone numbers, any day. In this case 966 815 600 at Av. Pa√Øs Valenci√†, 14 03509 Finestrat Alicante	and 962 826 900 CC Pz. Mayor Gandia - Av.Blasco Ib√°√±ez S / N  46701 Gandia, and a very long wait on their expensive	national phone line 902 100 606	They also boast ¬® Write us a direct message to our Facebook profile: facebook. com/ MediaMarkt.ES ¬®	No answer on any of the above at weekends, or their online CHAT service.3.	Basically if you order on a Friday it seems you can forget any possibility of collecting the order in store, despite the store being openSaturday and Sunday. In fact, I am still waiting for the status of my order to change online from ¬®Order in preparation ¬® and it¬¥s now Wednesday!4.	As I was unable to communicate with anyone, I decided to make the speculative journey on Saturday to the store, an 85 km round trip. Surprise , surprise, the very model was in stock !! and even more amazing at the same price. The staff would not permit me to take the TV they had in stock, that was for sale. They stated that they were unable to allow me to take this TV	from their stock, as the website orders are a completely separate system. And I would have to wait until it is/was delivered to store. Just as well I didn‚Äôt wait at the store, as it is now 5 days since I ordered and it has still not arrived. 5.	Luckily, I have the resources to pay another ‚Ç¨2500 and I purchased the TV from the store stock and returned home. The staff in the store admitted, ¬®the system was crazy and that only one person covers the phone calls from 		customers and often it is left to just ring ¬® . Whilst at the store I thought I would ask them to cancel the online order, as clearly it was no longer necessary. So now I have to wait in the information desk queue, manned by only 2 staff and it took over 30 mins, to reach the front of the queue, only to be told. That I would have to come back to the store when the TV I ordered online arrives and then pick up the TV and then ask to cancel it !! 6.	After 5 days I have ceased waiting for the cancellation of the order, despite emailing and leaving online messages multiple times for a full refund. I have simply informed my credit card company to dispute the charge!To top it all off, the TV had a sticker placed directly on to the screen and it was covering a small scratch!  This I am following up initially with Samsung!In summation. The store is happy for you to walk out the door, without the very TV that is there for sale‚Ä¶ and allow the client to cancel the online order and buy it elsewhere!Well done CEO Pieter Haas ! no wonder he has gone‚Ä¶ #mediamarkt #samsung #pieterhaas #QE55Q9FN #QLED #ElCorteIngles #Finestrat

Title: Without a cooker for one week.
Review: Had a ‚Ç¨1000 built in AEG cooker and hob installed by Mediamarkt Austria two weeks ago. Exactly one week later a little water boiled over on the new hob and the cooker stopped working.Reported this by phone and filled in the online forms but received no response . I waited a few hours then pulled out the cooker only to find it was damaged. Mediamarktsent requested  two photos so sent them.It was clear that the large dent on the top cooker was acting as a chanel for the water to run inside the casing.Mediamarkt say they have everything needed to proceed and that they will send someone.No contact so call Mediamarkt they have decided another form is needed but failed to inform us.so we comply.Two days later a guy finally arrived from the installation/delivery company.They had promised to call twice before but failed to show.I asked if he had a replacement he said no he is only here to take a photo of the cooker.He asked me why his colleague had fitted a damaged appliance which I thought was rather strange. He left telling me that I should contact Mediamarkt again.They promised to contact us the next day which was Friday but once again we heard nothing.Monday still nothing so called Mediamarkt  again. They claim the installation company Gebruder Weiss have still not sent them the photo taken last Thursday which is the same as the photos we sent almost one week ago. Gebruder Weiss say they have confirmation that Mediamarkt have received itToday Mediamarkt claim to be working on our issue.We reminded them that we have been without a cooker for one week now but that does not make any difference.It is unacceptable that Mediamarkt management choose to allow customers to be treated in this manner and instruct " customer service" to not hand out their contact numbers so they can remain faceless and unaccountable for this attitude toward customers who are contributing to their salaries.I will Never ever buy anything from Mediamarkt again.

Title: I had been waiting for 40 min and treated in a very disrespectful way by Media Markt Staff
Review: I had been waiting for 40 min. In order to be attended although the shop was almost empty, all what I wanted to do is to buy Bosh dish washer , and only one sales person was attending this section as well there was a problem in the system related to the item the other customer was asking for , I had my 1 and half year old baby with me , I asked for someone else to attend me but noone has shown interest , when I went to ask for the shop manager someone called Jose Carlos said he is the manager , and he said he cant do anything for me in a very disrespectful way, I said thank you and I left back to the area in order to keep waiting with my baby very disappointed from the way I have been treated, then finally the sales person called Ana came after finishing with her customer and I asked her about who is the manager in this section and she refused to tell me then I asked her about her name then at the beginning she didnt want to say it beside she doesnt wear her name tag like any other person in the shop and she said she is called Ana, at the end this is an extreme awful customer service and those managers dont know even how to manage their staff specially when the customer is right, How you want your business to grow when you provide such a poor customer service like this, I only had to buy the dish washer at the end coz same model is not available anymore in Carrefour, but I promise I will not buy anything else from your shop again ever , my bill no. Is 40501934 elche shop in Alicante  for investigation if you are willing to take an action.

Title: S√úPERDEAL - pay full price on a demo keyboard!
Review: Went to your store in Valbo, Sweden today and you had one keyboard left of the version I wanted to buy.I asked the guy in the store what the price it had since it was unpacked and showed to customers as a demo.I said I was in a rush too. They guy went to the office to check with his boss and came back after a while.The only thing Media Markt could offer was some discount on an insurance that I never requested and that nobody needs since there is always warranty and everybody have home insurance that covers most cases.I left the store and will from now on never return, been dissapointed before but this was enough. Do you expect a customer to pay full price on a keyboard that has been used by a lot of customers visiting a store?!?? I have never heard of this before but maybe this is what you call a S√úPERDEAL at Media Markt.

26.09.2017, 14:58,I ordered one Iphone. After giving the order, the information about my order on the web page will be sent by e-mail. There was also a case of ordering number.Though I  paid the money with my credit card, It is currently 21:00, but I still can not see any order information in the order information section. But the money is blocked by the media mark on the bank.So both my money blocked( be cannot used my money ) is there but there are no products on my membership accounts to will be sent to meNow I am asking;Is Media markt a usurper company? Why have you confiscated my money for 6 hours? If you are not a thief, why do not the Iphone order appear on your web page? I called the call center but they were not helpful enough, They said to me just wait!You are not a number one retailer of Europe like your slogan, but a thief, a liar and a usurper company. I will not choose you again.

Title: Misleading information - customer from Denmark
Review: Online shop telephone support informed me that I - as a customer from Denmark- would be able to pay by VISA or Mastercard when I retrieved the item in Flensburg. But in the store in Flensburg it was not possible. I had to pay in "danske kroner" at an unacceptable and high exchange rate.In the supermarked next door it was possible to pay in Euro. Great business for Mediamarkt - but not for me.Misleading information!  The expected cost reduction by driving to Germany - instead of buying i Denmark was lost.BRING CASH IF YOU COME FROM DENMARK.

Title: Bad delivery and worse customer support
Review: I had ordered the product via webshop and Opted for additional services which included removal or washer covers and setting up of the machine for operation. The person delivering the product was unprofessional and untrained for the additional services requested. While trying to set up the machine the person used brute force to remove the cover washer to the extent That screws were bent out of shape and the internal frame was broken at multiple places, and leaving a screw inside for us to remove. When questioned, the person responded without any accountability to ask for the replacement. If required, I have the pictures of the broken frame and screws are for the record. This was my first and highly negative experience with the media market making me very cautious to make any Purchases Further there. Would recommend everyone to take cautious steps while making any purchase.

Title: very unfriendly toward foreginers.
Review: I have been to Meida Markt in Alexanderplatz to return a product that did not seem to go well with my laptop. The customer service there were terrible. They told me that they have to check the security camera to check if I stole it despite I have a recipt proven that I purchased two days before. At the same time while I waited. The surcurity guy talked on the mircrophone to another colleague of his saying, the customer does not speak German, and her English was not that good either. And I am in front of this guy. I could understand what exactly he said. And of course I started the conversation with them in German at the beginning then switched to English after I senced their unfriendliness. Afterward, there was an African originate custmor came and seeked for help. But because of his strong accent in English, it was not easy to understand. The employees just showed a very unpleased face and said I do not know what you are talking about and kept the customer repeat many many times.Since then, I never bought anything from MeidaMarkt.I am very surprised as there are so many foreigners in the area of Alexanderplatz and this certain store does not seem to approve any international sense of business and courtesy.

Title: WASHING MACHINE PURGATORY!!
Review: My husband recently purchased a washing machine from Media Makrt. I have to say that I am furious and extremely disappointed with the service that we have received. First of all, he reserved the machine online and when he went to pick it up, not only was it not there, but they didn't even have a record of it. He then arranged to have the machine delivered, but then when the people came to deliver the machine, they didn't bring it :O They apparently thought they were doing some repair service. They had no washing machine for us, AGAIN. So then we finally get the machine after more waiting and it DOES NOT WORK!! Then we proceed to go through calling the repair service. The repair man comes and he can't fix it. He has to order some cable. He comes back a few days later and the cable does not work either. Our flatmate then goes the following weekend to talk to the people at Media Markt who can't seem to help him or even see that a machine was purchased with them. What kind of a business is this? That is my question! What kind of a business allows their customers to experience this disappointment and charges them for it?  I think you need to rephrase your slogan.

Title: schrecklich after sales
Review: Really really bad after sales service. I brought my samsung three months into the purchase (!) that failed to respond to my touch after every phone call and they looked at it and said it was fine and if I were to send it for a repare I wouldnt get a replacement device. Awful!

Title: I love this shop
Review: I love this shop, i bought my gear for design and photography from them and everything was on time and in perfect condition, not a single complain until now from my side. Thank you very much.

Title: I wanted to sign up
Review: I wanted to sign up - that did not work, because it asked me for a company name. I was signing up for a private account - company accounts are on a separate page.I spoke with three people via Chat - two of them just cancelled the chat, because I was in meetings and did not respond within five minutes. They did not ask, if I was still there, they just cancelled the chat. The feedback page was in Dutch - I used the german page, so no idea why I landed there.After three different support teamers, multiple browsers, cleaning cookies and everything it took me more than 30 minutes to sign up. I wanted to order a device of similar price at Amazon, but decided to go for Coolblue - even after 30minutes just for sign up, I was only given a "we are sorry", no compensation what so ever. Unless the order process and a potential return are much better, I would not use coolblue in the future.
Response: Hi Robert,it is of course annoying that your order is not working properly with your device. I also understand that you would prefer longer waiting times for the chat. We end the chat after 5 minutes of inactivity, but also provide feedback. There are of course other customers who need support, and we want to help them quickly too.You can also create your customer account over the phone with a member of staff. You can also place your order over the phone.Thank you for your feedback!With a smile,Simon from Coolblue

Title: This is really the best online store‚Ä¶

Next day delivery without fail, decent product selection, good prices, useful buying guids on their catalog that help explain the different product categories, and above all, fantastic costumer service - I had a representative talk to me for half an hour to help me choose the most suitable dishwasher model and a laptop exchanged no questions asked because I ordered the wrong type of keyboard. A small but great feature on the website is the "call me back", that allows you to leave your number and get a call from a representative when they are free (from my experience, within half an hour or less) so you don't have to wait on the phone listening to horrible waiting room music. They also provide installation services for the more complicated appliances for a small extra fee. In short - a model store.

Just for that, I asked a friend of mine to travel from another city, in order to be here to open the doorbell to the team. Title: Worst service ever
Review: Worst service ever! I ordered a suitcase with plenty of time (1 week) to be packed and deliver on time but cool blue waited until the very last minute to pack and ship my order.  I knew when I saw the shipping notice that my order was going to arrive late when I won‚Äôt be home and out of the country. Then I get a message apologizing and blaming the shipping company.  How the heck is DHL supposed to deliver something when it was handed to them so late. First and last time I order something with such unprofessional company.
Response: annoying that your package didn't arrive on time. I understand that you are disappointed. Unfortunately, it sometimes happens that a package is delayed. Sorry for that.Thank you for sending me your contact details. I was able to take a look at your order. We have one day delivery so you have indicated that you would like to receive your goods on the 07th, so the goods will be handed over to DHL on the 06th. The delay is really with DHL. But of course this does not help you. That is why I have left you a small compensation in your customer account. I hope that you can now smile a little again.Thank you for your patience and feedback!With a smile,Simon from Coolblue

Nobody will collect this, and it will be sent back... they don't seem to care about it either.Edit: I understand they are not delivering the package, DHL does. but now is too late, I am away, I lost this order and1 day of work coz I had to find an alternative solution. Title: I purchased online a PS5 with disk‚Ä¶
Review: I purchased online a PS5 with disk drive from Coolblue DE. I was assured the purchase would arrive within 2 days. Over and over again Coolblue said they would send a new order out... they never did.Over 2 weeks later ... purchase has not arrived.After being informed a 4th time a new order would be sent out... I receive an email advising me a Refund Credit is provided, because the order was held by DHL and returned after Coolblue entered the incorrect address.The Refund Credit... doesn't exist! Neither does the 50‚Ç¨ voucher they emailed to make up for the mismanagement of my order. Attempts to access them - returns does not exist reply.I have made a complaint of FRAUD with the EEC....AVOID AT ALL COSTS... because they will take your money and provide nothing! I am making a discrimination complaint as well.... being referred to as an "Ausl√§nder" during conversation with customer support is highly inappropriate!----------Update:I have never been subjected to such discrimination for being a foreigner by ANYONE, in my whole time residing in Germany - than I have been subjected by Coolblue DE customer service!I have four emails, advising me that I would be provided a ‚Ç¨50,- voucher  for the delay in the providing me the ordered and paid for item. The account doesn't exist and neither does the ‚Ç¨50,- voucher When enquires where made, I was denied the account details! When I asked by the credit isn't provided in a voucher Coolblue customer service operation "Jenny" refused to respond!I have never come across such mismanagement and fraudulent practices. At one stage, in an email, I was provided some other customers details including phone number, address and what they purchased! Such simple tasks are apparently beyond Coolblue customer service! To sum up - I am still without my purchase, and still without an alleged  ‚Ç¨50,- voucher
Response: Hi Paul, you are not happy about the whole process around your order. It really sounds that there was happening a lot of trouble.I would like to take a closer look at your order process, so that I can get a bit more clarity into the situation. I have sent you a message on Trustpilot to ask for your order number and contact details. Thanks for replying! I've sent you an email. With a smile, Eliza from Coolblue

Title: Beware of predatory price practises
Review: Beware of predatory price practises. On Saturday phone on their website costed 329 ‚Ç¨. On Monday in store same phone had price set to 449‚Ç¨. Staff when asked why price has changed so drastically could not answer the question. More so, when we checked price on their computer, their internal price was set to 399‚Ç¨, while in google you can still see it being displayed for 329‚Ç¨.I understand that prices can vary, but changing price for 120‚Ç¨ higher in 2 year old smartphone market is outright predatory. In 449 price range you get completelly different phones than in 329‚Ç¨.
Response: Hello Dariusz, that prices change so much is really rare, but not impossible. The employees in the store, could not give you any information about the price development, because they do not decide this. But of course I understand your disappointment that it has become so much more expensive and you probably did not buy it, although you were looking forward to it. Keep an eye on the prices, just as quickly items can become cheaper again. Love, Samir from Coolblue.

Title: Not getting a refund after getting delivered the wrong product
Review: I bought Apple AirPods Pro 2 in used condition for a good price. Unfortunately they sent me the wrong product (I received Apple AirPods 3 instead), so I sent them back. Should be easy as that, but after a few weeks they told be my return arrived empty at their facility. They then started an investigation with DHL and told me that they would refrain from compensating or returning me my money. You can even see in the DHL tracking that they damaged the package and had to repackage it, which is most likely when it was stolen/lost. But Coolblue just refuses to give me any compensation now, even though they sent me a wrong product in the first place. I would not recommend anyone to buy here after this experience.
Response: Dear customer,we want check  your case and requested you contact details by trustpilot.In case of a damage (return) parcel with lost goods we need to wait for a result from the DHL investigation before we can refund the money. We ask for your understanding.Kind regard.Johannes from Coolblue

Title: Delivery issues
Review: I ordered a washing machine off them. I picked out a delivery date and was told I'd get a 1-hour time slot send via e-mail the night before. I dind't get that e-mail so I called customer service to ask if they could tell me the shedule. The lady was really nice and promised to call me back half an hour later to tell me the delivery time. Four hours later I still hadn't heard back so I called again and the guy just said that his best guess is that the machine probably wouldn't arive today, wich is fine by the way! I know that things like this take time and there is always the possibility that things go wrong but I think a company that offers sheduled delivery and even bases their ad campaign off it should at least imform you that they can not stick to that agreement.. I took a day off work for this and am now really annoyedEdit: thank you for taking care of it. Unfortunately I don‚Äôt think you fully understood what my issue was. It isn‚Äôt that I couldn‚Äôt wait for the machine to come it‚Äôs that I hab to take time off work to receive the machine. That‚Äôs why I scheduled it on that particular day and was annoyed when it fell through. I have to be at work tomorrow. What happens the delivery comes and I‚Äôm not home. Will I be charged?
Response: Hey S., Thank you for choosing Coolblue to buy your new washing machine! I can imagine that you were anxiously awaiting your purchase. Pretty disappointing to find out, that the delivery of your order is delayed. Our next day delivery is normally sceduled as promised, so I suspect that something went wrong with your visit. To be able to pinpoint the problem, I would like to take a better look at your order. I've therefore sent you a contact request here on Trustpilot. Thanks for replying on the request! I was able to reschedule your delivery appointment for tomorrow. Now it won't be long until your washing machine will be delivered! With a smile,Eliza from Coolblue

Title: Pay and get nothing :)
Review: If you'd like to give your money and get nothing in return - it's a perfect company. I made an order, and for the entire week they told me that my shipment is on it's way. Here's the timeline of my order, maybe it warns other people:Friday evening - created order and made payment. Delivery estimate tool said that delivery will be on Monday.Monday - I got an email from Coolblue, saying DHL delays my package and it will come on Tuesday.Tuesday - another email form Coolblue, saying that my order will arrive on Wednesday.Wednesday - total silence, emailed Coolblue to ask about my order, they were surprised that my order has not arrived. They said that that they'll send me a new one on Friday.Thursday - as Coolblue advised me, I was "enjoying the waiting".Friday - got an email that they send me a refund, without even discussing with me. And the new explanation - the courier with my package went missing on his way to DHL. I don't know who kidnapped him, but Coolblue has to do smth about the safety of their employees.As for Friday, no refund and no drone. I enjoyed the whole week of extensive emails & calls. And also got a 10 euro off for my next order, which I definitely won't do :)
Response: Hello Kyrylo,I am very sorry that everything that can go wrong with your order went wrong. Under the motto "every day a little bit better" we try to do justice to every customer and to act in their interests. Unfortunately, we don't always succeed. I'm sorry for that.I hope you give us another chance and that we can present ourselves from a different angle.Kind regards, Sabrina from Coolblue.

Title: Fraud and liars
Review: I have ordered a 1000‚Ç¨ drone on Friday 17.06.2022. Payed online. The order should have been delivered on Monday 20.06.2022. Then they rescheduled to Tuesday 21.06.2022. On Tuesday they rescheduled to Wednesday. And so on to the point when they wrote me on Friday 24.06.2022 that my order is cancelled and they are sending my money back. It was a birthday present for my dad. Customer support guys have been lying to me the whole week that the order will be eventually delivered. They have been hunging up on me several times, when they didn‚Äôt know what to answer. Rudeness and unprofessionalism. If you want to loose your money and time, welcome to the CoolBlue.
Response: Hallo Oleksandra,I am very sorry that everything that can go wrong with your order went wrong.Under the motto "every day a little bit better" we try to do justice to every customer and to act in their interests. Unfortunately, we don't always succeed. I'm sorry for that.I hope you give us another chance and that we can present ourselves from a different angle.Kind regards, Sabrina from Coolblue.

Just put shipping takes 2 days, which is fine for most I can imagine, just not for me in this instance.
Response: Dear Shiney Shine, I am very sorry to hear that your shipping has experienced a delay. I can imagine that when seeing our promise of the fast delivery and seeing that everything turns green and seems to be fine, you also expect exactly that service.Actually, in over 80% of the orders the delivery does follow on the next day. But sometimes, unfortunately, a shipment can experience a delay that we can't influence directly. Sorry that we weren't able to meet our own expectations and have disappointed you.In order to make up for your disappointment we have asked you through Trustpilot for more contact details. Unfortunately, we haven't received any more information yet. It would be really nice if you could contact us again so that we can give it our best and leave a good impression!With a smile, Jorinde from Coolblue

Title: Every buyer should know CoolBlue may not allow you to pay for your purchase through PayPal.efore any‚Ä¶
Review: Every buyer should know before any purchase in this store: after a long product selection and long communication with customer service, the store may eventually simply not accept your money and reject the payment. It's incredible, it's hard to believe, but it's a fact! Have you ever heard of a store suspecting you of fraud and rejecting your PayPal payment without giving any reason? So, this is real! Not once, not a single store has complained about my PayPal payment, but CoolBlue decides for you how you should pay. And if you do not have, for example, 3000 euros for a new laptop and you were hoping to use the PayPal installment plan, then CoolBlue will deprive you of this opportunity. You may receive an email with the following content:"To prevent fraud, all credit card and PayPal payments are checked. Unfortunately, your payment didn‚Äôt pass this check, so your order wasn‚Äôt placed. We‚Äôre not allowed to share the reason for failing the check. In order to prevent further fraud, we keep the check methods secret.We can‚Äôt undo rejections."Turning to CoolBlue, I want to say: I have never had such a negative experience in buying goods.What is the point of giving a discount on a product, then depriving you of the opportunity to choose a payment method? I'm incredibly sorry for my wasted time. And one more thing: your site should be written about how you can deal with the buyer, at least in the FAQ section.Did you really want to see a smile on my face?...
Response: Hi Vladimir, We are incredibly sorry that we've disappointed you that much because of our payment security. But unfortunately, these checks exist to guarantee our customers as much as our own security. Sometimes it can happen that a few payments of customers that had good intentions may have been rejected. Therefore, they can always try again and in most of the cases, if nothing seems fraudulent with the PayPal address, the second try is successful. So regarding your concerns about good offers that one may want to buy you can be sure that we'd love to make our customers happy with orders from our shop. That is why we want to advise you to try again, and just see how the magic happens and your order will most probably go through the check without any further problems. In case you have any other questions you are very welcome to contact our customer service. We would be happy to solve them and also help you with rejected order. Best, your Coolblue Team!

Title: No one in the company communicates with me
Review: On Monday, I ordered goods (a gift for Christmas) from the German e-shop, which MeinEinkauf received the very next day on Tuesday morning.  On Tuesday afternoon, people from MeinEinkauf found out that the seller was missing an invoice and asked me for proof of payment, which I provided them within the hour.  It wasn't until the next day that they told me that the goods were going for customs clearance and they would let me know as soon as they sent them.  Today is Thursday, no one answers me, does not reply to my e-mail, when I try to call them, it always throws me in the voicemail.  I'm leaving for Christmas tomorrow night and probably without a gift, because I don't know where it is at the moment, I hope that no one will steal it from my inbox in the 14 days I'm gone.  So thank you very much dear MeinEinkauf, for your unreasonably overpriced service.
Response: Hello Adele,I can understand that you are worried that your Christmas present won't arrive on time. Of course, we want to help you the best way possible! In order to do so, could you contact us via telephone through this number 0211 819 735 55 or send us a Whatsapp message to this number 0172 7912251, so we can look for a solution together. Kind regards, Coolblue Customer Service

Title: Good exp
Review: Good exp. great service

Title: Terrible customer service
Review: Ordered a fridge freezer due for delivery on 13-12-21. 6:30am receive a text saying delivery is between 8:50-9:50am. I opted for collection of old fridge/freezer so emptied the entire old unit as coolblue clewrly state old items must be fully emptied. Made 2 calls and agent mentions it‚Äôs a little delayed. 1pm and still nothing and food all probably ruined. Another call and agent says it will come soon. They assure its coming. 4:30pm agent says will arrive before 10pm. I call again at 5pm to tell them please bring it earlier and agent confirms the delivery agents don‚Äôt have the units with them. I spend my third hour speaking to agents and they tell me 40euro is max compensation and tomorrow can be arranged for redelivery. I ask for confirmation in email and they cancel my order. I rearrange all my meetings and plans to be home the next day. Coolblue raises a new order and the agent sends an email saying delivery can only be four days later. This is officially the worst customer service I have ever had and I thought coolblue was supposed to be a customer service orientated company. Three hours of my time on calls, damaged food and misleading me numerous times to make all these plans around false information over and over. The stress caused is truly unbearable.I can understand delays, but to completely reassure a customer things are coming 6 times and then to reschedule another day only to then fail there too even is incredible. I would have paid 200euros to avoid this time waste and hassle and compensation offered is 40euro. I need the fridge and freezer tomorrow.
Response: Hi Rahul, How unfortunate that you¬¥ve spent your Monday waiting for the delivery of your fridge freezer combination. We can imagine that you envisioned the delivery to go well and smooth, and that is our mission, too. We are very sorry that so many things went wrong. Still, we do not want to leave this case unfinished. We would be super happy if you could contact us once more to make it up to you and deliver you your needed fridge freezer combination. Best, your Coolblue Team!

Title: Extremly Poor Customer Service
Review: On their website they advertise a 1 day delivery, it took 3 days for the item to arrive; not that bad I could live with that!I sent the item back 2 days after it arrived as is my right, Coolblue took 8 weeks to reply to me and decided that the solution would be to give a credit for the amount of the said item. I emailed them asking for money back instead of the coupon, no replies for some weeks and then I receive an automated email telling me that they are taking too long to reply but maybe the issue is already resolved ?????? outrageously unprofessional and poor Customer Service
Response: How good that you get in touch with us with your feedback. We can certainly understand that you had imagined everything differently. We do our best every day. Apparently it didn't work out that well this time. Smiling customers are our priority and we would like to offer our apologies for these inconveniences.Would it be an option for you to contact us via email (kundendienst@coolblue.de) or by phone on 0211 819 735 55? Then we explain what happened and we are happy to hear your opinion. A small patch is certainly appropriate and our motto is "every day a little better". We would be delighted if we could present ourselves from a different perspective next time.Kind regards, your Coolblue team!

We would love to give it a try and see how we could make this unfortunate event a little better for you.We will do our best do answer you as soon as possible. Title: A pleasant surprise
Review: I did not know this retailer before, but after getting two orders cancelled in a few days, from two well known German retailers, I decided to give it a go, since the price was good and, after some research, it seemed that CoolBlue was reliable in some other countries. I have to say that I am pleasantly surprised by how smoothly it went, for a retailer I did not know, especially given the current situation. I would strongly recommend CoolBlue, and will probably order again from them.

Title: Quick disclaimer
Review: Quick disclaimer: I had never heard of this site, and only ended up buying my article (LG 27UL600-W) from them when I could not find it elsewhere, except with a 3-4 week shipping window.Shipping experience- 5/5I ordered the article (monitor) at midnight, Tuesday. I instantly received a confirmation that matched the shipping estimate on the site (Delivery Thursday).I was then dissapointed when the delivery agent (DHL) ascertained Friday as the delivery date.However, Coolblue delivered the monitor to DHL so early in the morning that I still received the monitor Thursday- at one in the afternoon.Shipping was free.Website- 5/5Snappy, responsive, suggestions and searches work flawlessly.Article page- 6/5- Full list of specifications for the article (Technical and Cursory!)- On page user reviews - no review-pre-filtering!- Non-generic Pro-Con list, with extremely helpful cons for the less-technical buyer- Pro-Con list changed when buying multiple monitors to reflect the usefulness of the monitor when placed side-by-side (near bezelless)- Great summarySummary: 6/5Coolblue was able to convince with extremely thorough and well thought out product pages. Various payment options, especially Paypal, lend to the site's credibility. Optimistic and yet satisfying delivery prognosis.I never write reviews, but after buying my monitor from Coolblue, and comparing said experience to other major retailers, Coolblue has become my electronics retailer of first choice.I can't judge for anyone's else's experience, but this experience was absolutely amazing.Quick note to negative reviews:If the only reason to give a low star review is slight shipping delays...Coolblue seems to deliver their products at the earliest possible oppurtunity to the shipping agent. Any delays after this are the fault of the shipping agent's estimated delivery dates and any subsequent delays.
Response: Wow Alex! Are you sure this is your first review? This is one of the most thorough feedbacks we have ever gotten. The level of detail with which you though about our site...wow.  We're super impressed and incredibly happy that we could make you smile AND now know exactly how we did it. Thanks for helping us learn and help other people have the same experience. We are proud to call you our customer and are looking forward to impressing you again.

Title: Negative 1 star is deserved
Review: Absolutely terrible customer service. PC came with faulty components and went into more than a month long debate via emails telling them that it's wrong and them saying it's fine even though the PC was already sent to them and have been telling me that they have tested it multiple times (liars) then 1 day they send me a message confirming the error while the error happens exactly at the boot step, this happens after 40 days of me purchasing the PC. Keep in mind that I paid +200 Euros on top of the hardware cost for them to check the PC before sending it, they didn't check and sent faulty parts. So basically their "kontrolle" service is a scam. I'm never touching this service ever again and anyone reading this and you want to try them, please find yourself an alternative.

Title: Awesome Service
Review: The company was very friendly very forthcoming and just overall left a good experience behind. I did buy computer parts there twice. Spend about 3k in total. But still after the "Gew√§hrleistung" ended the company was able to help me and assist in Warranty claims with the Manufacturer of my Graphics Card.Added Bonus:They usually reply super fast I once wrote them a message and within 13 Hours they did respond. That time varies but still they seem to be quite capable.As I'm still in the Process of the Warranty issue with the graphics card this might be updated if

Title: If you want to waste your time debating‚Ä¶
Review: If you want to waste your time debating their employees about defective products and them refusing in any way they can to replace it and saying "no faults or defects were found" this is the right place for you. Absolute joke of a company, just buy something on amazon and have any problem you might have handled with 0 questions asked.

Title: Order somewhere else if you value your time!
Review: Never again. I ordered and paid over a week ago and it is still not shipped. The telephone hotline only has a prerecorded message that asks you to write them an email. The Whatsapp number is offline. everything looks to be just a show for people who don't know better to give the illusion that this is a serious website before they get their money.They may be 2% cheaper than other places but the experience is not worth it imo.

Title: Never again
Review: Never again. Same for me: bought a GPU that got too hot and not even the stock benchmark scores. After 2 RMAs within the 2 weeks and a 1,5 months ago I was waiting for about 2-3 months of a year for an actually good GPU. 2 times I got the same faulty GPU back and am now very sad I gave them more of my money to buy another GPU as I was expecting actual service until now. Never ever buy anything here again if the 10-20-30 bucks are not worth your time and nerves is my suggestion!

Title: Excrement-like
Review: Excrement-like, faulty GPU and horrendous RMA, first returned to me the same faulty GPU as problem-free and then when I sent it for the 2nd time they replaced it with a much cheaper GPU without even asking me if I agreed. German authorities should look into business practices of this company

Title: RMA is a joke
Review: My mainboard was broken and I had sent it back for exchange, but I got the answer that there was no more in stock and I would get a credit so far ok. when I was looking for a new one on the site I saw that my mainboard was still in stock but it was a lot more expensive I wrote an email asking if that was intentional but I didn't get a reply so I assume it is that was wanted

Title: Absolutely the worst online experience‚Ä¶
Review: Absolutely the worst online experience ever.Can't separate billing and shipping address, changes email without verification, constantly have to sign in, and so on.

Title: Customer service is terrible
Review: Before this everything was okay. But this time I purchased a GPU which crashes on specific workloads and is basically useless to me. Sent it for warranty, got a new one back, same issue. Sent it back again, got the same card back with the statement - Software driver issue, not our problem. So I am stuck with a useless thing which I paid good money for. All I wanted was a refund.

Title: Recommended and will use again
Review: Fast dispatch. Items as described and a competitive price.My only concern was the items were showing as being dispatched on their site and wasn't updating.However, I received the items without the status on their site updating and when I contacted customer service via email to query prior to this, they responded within 10 minutes. (normal business hours)You can't ask for better than that.Would recommend and will be using them again for sure.

Title: Great customer service
Review: Almost 1 year after my whole PC was bought, the Power Unit started to make some weird noise. I contacted Mindfactory for help and they gladly changed the entire Power Unit with a new one! Not only they suggested it, but they also were very quick with sending it (They received a new Unit on Friday, sent it right away and I got it on Saturday! I was really expecting to be without PC entire weekend but they surprised me).Great support

Title: Would give 6 stars if I could.
Review: Would give 6 stars if I could.I've ordered multiple times in the past with Mindfactory, as the prices are usually cheaper than at other online retailers. My order was always quickly dealt with and shipped the same day. They offer many payment options.Their website is well-ordered and has many filtering options. To me, it is literally one of the easiest places to find a specific PC component. My recent experience was the cherry on top: I ordered after their Christmas deadline, they told me to not expect the package by Christmas. They still managed to ship on the morning of the 24th.However, I wanted to return the order because I ordered a wrong part. Returning the order was dead easy. Clicking a *single* button on their website to print my package label and my money was returned to my PayPal two days later without having to contact any customer service at all.If I could suggest one improvement, I'd allow users to stay logged in for longer than until the end of the day.

Title: quick help where it is needed
Review: Just recently I bourght a brand new 7900XTX from Mindfactory and this is where my tale begins. The order itself was send very quickly and arrived in just a few days, sometime around christmas. I went on vacation that week and hadn't had time to put it into my system so afterwarts I was suprised to see that the backplate was severly bend (seems to have been a production issue). So I asked the support, sent it back and within literally a day they sent me a new card. So far so good. The new card arrived, I plugged it in ... and it blew up ... unlucky. Sent the card back and again, basically as soon as they got the card, they (in this case) gave me the money back so that I was able to order a diffrent brand. Thank you guys so much, after that shock the quick help really was a relief.

Title: Good Experience
Review: I bought several pc components. Prices was pretty good and came very fast. The box of my pc case was abit damaged which scared me a little bit but the case inside wasnt damaged

Title: Returns are too slow, Service Level Gold is a scam, Reviews are censored
Review: First of all, the whole premise of "Service Level Gold" is laughable. For ‚Ç¨4,90 you can buy "Service Level Gold", which is essentially the exact same service they are forced to provide by German Law anyways (Gew√§hrleistung). Next, when you want to return something, they first try to bribe you with a ‚Ç¨5 discount to do a return to manufacturer instead, even though they are legally required to offer a return to vendor.Then, when you do a return it is just an excruciatingly slow process. I got broken RAM from Mindfactory, so i returned them. 3 business days for them to arrive at Mindfactory, another 2 business days for Mindfactory to "check" the return (why does that take so long?) and then another 3 business days to actually receive the parts. And then, to top it all off, one of the two new RAM modules I got was broken again. I asked if this time they could send me the replacement parts in advance, so I can at least work with the one functioning RAM module and my PC won't be out of commission for another week. Mindfactory declined. The joke about it is that the manufacturer actually does offer sending replacement parts in advance, so I'm better off just talking to the manufacturer than to Mindfactory... (wasn't this exactly what "Service Level Gold" is designed to prevent?)Edit: I originally gave them 2 stars, but now they just deleted my product review where I warned that the RAM appear to be plagued by defective modules (since I had received 3 defective modules out of 4). The phony excuse for the review deletion was that I couldn't have tested the product if it was defective. Great, right? You can't report that a product is plagued with faults because it's too faulty to make an opinion about. Plus, it's not even true because I was able to work with the 1 functioning module while I'm waiting for a Corsair's RMA procedure. You just lost one more star for censoring negative reviews, Mindfactory.Edit2: They allowed me to rewrite my review.

Title: My experience with Mindfactory
Review: Alright, so I've been buying a lot of components from them, yet I haven't written a review of them.They always delivered the components I bought, and I haven't had an issue. My PC is mostly built with the items I bought from there, and I'm also planning on upgrading the CPU. My brother also bought most of his parts from there. He is actually the person who recommended me this website in the first place.DeliveryThey have a standard delivery fee of 8,99‚Ç¨, however if your item's price is higher than 150‚Ç¨ and you're shopping at 0-6AM (MET, Germany), the delivery fee gets reduced to 0‚Ç¨ (This only applies for DHL). There are a few restrictions though.It didn't really take that long for the items to arrive, I kinda forgot, but I know it usually took 1-3days. SalesThey have 3 different sections where items are on sale. First is "MindStar". In this section, multiple random items can be on sale. If I'm not mistaken, they can enter or leave the sale any day, there is no specific date the sale will end. Sometimes a lot of items are there, sometimes it's pretty empty.Next up "DAMN!-Deals"Here you will see a bunch of brands listed. Or not, it can be different at times. It can go from empty to a lot. The items for each brand can also be different, going from just one to a lot, like more than 20 items.And last, "Schn√§ppShop"In this section are items that were returned by a customer. These items then get repaired and controlled. Please note that these items have been used, so it could be possible that the packaging could be missing. Mindfactory also has a few promotions, where buying certain items gives you a game or cashback or something else. But besides that, they also offer a service where they build your PC so you don't have to(or parts, example: BIOS update and CPU onto motherboard).That's it. My review. Most information I wrote down should be true, however if I find out that something is false, I'll correct it.

Title: My account has been suspended because I‚Ä¶
Review: My account has been suspended because I sent criticism via email

Title: Article no longer available RME
Review: My motherboard was defective so I wanted it replaced. However, the price of the mainboard has risen over time and Mindfactory said they no longer had any in stock, although the product was still in stock and sold on their own website. I was then given credit for the original prize. It's a shame that products can only be exchanged if the price remains the same.

Title: Returns are too slow, Service Level Gold is a scam, Reviews are censored
Review: First of all, the whole premise of "Service Level Gold" is laughable. For ‚Ç¨4,90 you can buy "Service Level Gold", which is essentially the exact same service they are forced to provide by German Law anyways (Gew√§hrleistung). Next, when you want to return something, they first try to bribe you with a ‚Ç¨5 discount to do a return to manufacturer instead, even though they are legally required to offer a return to vendor.Then, when you do a return it is just an excruciatingly slow process. I got broken RAM from Mindfactory, so i returned them. 3 business days for them to arrive at Mindfactory, another 2 business days for Mindfactory to "check" the return (why does that take so long?) and then another 3 business days to actually receive the parts. And then, to top it all off, one of the two new RAM modules I got was broken again. I asked if this time they could send me the replacement parts in advance, so I can at least work with the one functioning RAM module and my PC won't be out of commission for another week. Mindfactory declined. The joke about it is that the manufacturer actually does offer sending replacement parts in advance, so I'm better off just talking to the manufacturer than to Mindfactory... (wasn't this exactly what "Service Level Gold" is designed to prevent?)Edit: I originally gave them 2 stars, but now they just deleted my product review where I warned that the RAM appear to be plagued by defective modules (since I had received 3 defective modules out of 4). The phony excuse for the review deletion was that I couldn't have tested the product if it was defective. Great, right? You can't report that a product is plagued with faults because it's too faulty to make an opinion about. Plus, it's not even true because I was able to work with the 1 functioning module while I'm waiting for a Corsair's RMA procedure. You just lost one more star for censoring negative reviews, Mindfactory.Edit2: They allowed me to rewrite my review.

Title: quick help where it is needed
Review: Just recently I bourght a brand new 7900XTX from Mindfactory and this is where my tale begins. The order itself was send very quickly and arrived in just a few days, sometime around christmas. I went on vacation that week and hadn't had time to put it into my system so afterwarts I was suprised to see that the backplate was severly bend (seems to have been a production issue). So I asked the support, sent it back and within literally a day they sent me a new card. So far so good. The new card arrived, I plugged it in ... and it blew up ... unlucky.
