Sent the card back and again, basically as soon as they got the card, they (in this case) gave me the money back so that I was able to order a diffrent brand. Thank you guys so much, after that shock the quick help really was a relief.

Title: Would give 6 stars if I could.
Review: Would give 6 stars if I could.I've ordered multiple times in the past with Mindfactory, as the prices are usually cheaper than at other online retailers. My order was always quickly dealt with and shipped the same day. They offer many payment options.Their website is well-ordered and has many filtering options. To me, it is literally one of the easiest places to find a specific PC component. My recent experience was the cherry on top: I ordered after their Christmas deadline, they told me to not expect the package by Christmas. They still managed to ship on the morning of the 24th.However, I wanted to return the order because I ordered a wrong part. Returning the order was dead easy. Clicking a *single* button on their website to print my package label and my money was returned to my PayPal two days later without having to contact any customer service at all.If I could suggest one improvement, I'd allow users to stay logged in for longer than until the end of the day.

Title: Order somewhere else if you value your time!
Review: Never again. I ordered and paid over a week ago and it is still not shipped. The telephone hotline only has a prerecorded message that asks you to write them an email. The Whatsapp number is offline. everything looks to be just a show for people who don't know better to give the illusion that this is a serious website before they get their money.They may be 2% cheaper than other places but the experience is not worth it imo.

Title: Article no longer available RME
Review: My motherboard was defective so I wanted it replaced. However, the price of the mainboard has risen over time and Mindfactory said they no longer had any in stock, although the product was still in stock and sold on their own website. I was then given credit for the original prize. It's a shame that products can only be exchanged if the price remains the same.

Title: rtx 4090
Review: orderd my rtx 4090 gigabyte oc version it caim literally the next day thank you mindfactory for your fast work

Title: I placed a wrong order and the WhatsApp guys were super quick to help
Review: I placed a wrong order (forgot to add a thermalpaste to my new CPU and RAM bundle) and the guys on WhatsApp were super quick to help. Good prices, helpful staff - I like this Store!

Title: Poor customer service, all info I provided ignored. Then ignored my emails.
Review: This was a retailer I used to recommend but after the experience and resulting dismissive attitude from their customer support, I have to say stay well away, as sad as I am to say that.I ordreded a graphics card last year and the experience was great. However, recently, the card has showed a vertical line of graphic corruption. It happens 3 times in 2 months and I kept dates and all methods of troubleshooting I tried (none worked, but it would disappear on it's own accord). Got in contact with a rep who was very responsive. I filled in the rma and also included a print out of the email conversation and photo evidence of the issue along with the graphics card (post at my own expense).The card was sent straight back to me without explanation and I had to contact customer support to even get a reason. The reason being, they couldn't replicate it, so the issue must not exist. The fact I effecitvely got called a liar is insulting. I provided extensive detail on the issue and photos, just so they could all be ignored.They should have contacted me by email or phone before sending it back for more detail from me. I'm now stuck with a graphics card that could be at the start of further issues with it, the issue I have should never happen on a GPU, it's doesn't matter if Mindfactory couldn't replicate it.Since I got the card back from them, all further emails to mindfactory have been ignored (I sent one a week ago and no reply).Very sad and disappointed by this ordeal.

Title: Customer service is a dream
Review: I have recently contacted Mindfactory with many questions with regards to having them build a new PC for me.  The young man who helped me was very knowledgeable and patient.  Before calling, I had a vague idea of what I wanted based off suggestions from friends.  The employee went through all of my shopping cart items with me and talked over the pros and cons of each item and discussed possible compatibility issues and suitability for my usecase.  In the end, I felt very confident with my purchases and am looking forward to receiving the built computer soon.  I wish all customer service could be this good!  I will be sure to update this review if needbe once I receive the computer, but at this point in time, it is well worth the 5-star review.
Response: Dear Sharla Field,thank you very much for your positive Feedback and kind words. We are pleased to hear, that you had a great shopping experience. We look forward to welcome you as our customer again.Best RegardsYour Mindfactory Team

Title: Sometimes usable
Review: Some competitive prices occasionally.full of products that arent covered by warranty and shouldnt be sold as new and in naother fashion.to give examples WD Blue HDD's that were replaced and lost their warranty already.GPU's that dont have warranty outside of NA you send in defective devices they state everything is fine and external support (Nvidia) finds the behaviour very much defective

Title: Hello Mindfactory üòäI just have one‚Ä¶
Review: Hello Mindfactory üòäI just have one question, I ordered some pc parts yesterday and I paid 690e but In the mean time some parts got little bit more expensive does that mean I now need to pay more (new price) thanks for answering have good day.
Response: Hello Carry Potter Potter,the price at the time of purchase applies, so of course you don't have to pay more.Have a good day and best regardsYour Mindfactory Team

Title: Missing components, zero support.
Review: Sold me an x399 MSI Creation motherboard with the SLI bridge missing along with an RGB cable, did not return my email when I reached out. Won't be doing business with them again.
Response: Dear customer,we are very sorry to hear that you are not satisfied with our service. We usually answer our Mails very fast, so we probably did not receive your mail. If you provide us with your invoice number or customer number we can check if there are any unanswered mails from you. The Reference number can only be seen by us and Trustpilot. We look forward to hearing from you. Best Regards Your Mindfactory Team

Title: Trash company
Review: Trash company! Don t buy from them!!!!
Response: Hello Pew Diepue,unfortunately we can't tell from this review what exactly the problem seems to be. We also can't find a customer account under this name. You are welcome to enclose your customer number or transaction number as a reference number with this review, then we will have a look at your case. The reference number is only visible to our employees and to Trustpilot itself.Best regards,Mindfactory Team

Title: I've had nothing but good experiences‚Ä¶
Review: I've had nothing but good experiences so far. I bought almost all of my pc components for my pc build from Mindfactory and the delivery was very fast on all of them. Unfortunately my cpu arrived with a bent pin but it got replaced immediately after sending it in and sending back my pc case was a very quick process as well.
Response: Dear Jin, thank you for your positive Feedback and kind words. We are pleased to hear, that the delivery and our service went well and look forward to welcome you as our customer again, soon. Best regards Your Mindfactory Team

Title: I have to keep the item I bought even‚Ä¶
Review: I have to keep the item I bought even tho I wanted to refund it to buy a different item. They sended me the parts in 2 deliveries (the second one came a week later) because 2 of the 8 items I bought weren't in stock. 1100 euros gone for a graphic card I'm not happy with and I have to live with this setup now because I was 1 day over the 14 days refund policy.  No goodwill towards customers by this company.

Title: My Account got blocked once I returned‚Ä¶
Review: My Account got blocked once I returned an item. I thought that mindfactory was a good and serious onlineshop but I noticed that many people have had this problem. So if you buy something at mindfactory, be sure you dont want to send it back, otherwise your account will be blocked aswell. I will definitely never recommend mindfactory to anyone again. Just buy somwhere else, the customer support will be 100% better than at mindfactory.

Title: Blocked account without any notice‚Ä¶
Review: Blocked account without any notice after i returned a defect GPU. Had the Account for over 7 Years without any problems.Contacted customer support because i sincerely thought it might have been a mistake and got the answer other reviewers have posted below. No further elaboration. This is not only unprofessional but also shows a blatant disregard of consumers rights.

Title: I am an happy customer!!
Review: As many others do before buying something i went to check the reviews online about mindfactory, well that made me a bit confused. So much positive and negative stuff that it was hard to decide something. Eventually i decided to let mindfactory build a pc for me. I got in contact with them because i wasnt sure if they would install the os for me and they said i just needed to put windows on my order together with the building service. I did my order on a monday and for my surprise my pc arrived on friday!! In the box was my pc and other boxes from my different parts (gpu, motherboard...) together with the unused materials. Connected the pc, went through the 1st time configuration of windows and in under 10 minutes my pc was ready to go!! I usually dont do reviews but i decided that this guys deserve it! Very competitive prices, the build is perfect, they even installed the extra fans that i ordered on the place that i wanted!( Yes, because you can ask for specific stuff when you are closing the order!) Cable management is also very well done! What more can i say, im really happy with my new pc and they just won a new costumer!! Thanks mindfactory, i will recomend you from now on and i really loved that you offer the building of the pc for people like me that prefer to choose the parts and not build the pc themselves. For me a clear 5 stars! Speed, eficiency, amazing amount of hardware to choose and most important care for the pcs they build! Thanks once again!
Response: Dear Customer, thank you very much for your positive Feedback and kind words. We are pleased to hear, that you had a great shopping experience and that the pc is to your liking. We look forward to welcome you as our customer again.Best regards Your Mindfactory Team

Title: They was fast.
Review: They was fast.2 days shipping.Recommanded.Im happy.
Response: Dear Hal√°sz Zolt√°n,thank you for your positive Feedback. We are pleased to hear, that the delivery went well and look forward to welcome you as our customer again, soon. Best regards Your Mindfactory Team

Title: They blocked my account...
Review: Blocked my account after I returend a wrong send article. Asked by email, what was the reason for that and that was the answer:"Unfortunately, after careful consideration, we decided to end business relationships with you.We will not comment on the reasons and ask youpolitely to refrain from further inquiries in our company."Terrible! I don't recommend it!

Title: Dont Buy anything from this Store!
Review: As you might have already seen by the bad reviews left out there on this Store i'd like to add another one although i don't think i would be the last one, i really hope that people would check the reviews before buying online! i ordered an item from these people and payed extra to make sure i get that item sooner their delivery is expensive asf! even thou i payed over 200 euroes and plus 40 euroes for the fast delivery i have not got the package anyway i called UPS they say they dont have any package, i tried to call their customer service for now two days straight and no answer! they dont pick up the phone or answer their emails! people if you like donating money you go ahead and buy stuff from them but i'd suggest looking the way around and go for Amazon or other companies if there was a worse than one star id put that absolutely horse s***! DONT BUY FROM THEM! this has been going on for 3 weeks now and still when  i finnally got to talk to  them they insisted that i've recieved the item and actually send me a UPS file stating that they have delivered the item when i read the file the adress was wrong, the name was wrong, even the street number was wrong these people don't want to work! and it took them two more weeks for those two whole weeks they would play ping pong with UPS and me they would say please call UPS they have your package then me being naive spending actuall money calling for the 20th time UPS they would still say it's not here or they would say it has been delievered. When they found out their mistake it took them another week to refund the money. What a complete full of clowns this Store has. DO NOT BUY FROM THEM! and when i placed the order it said it was on Stock otherways i would not have waited.
Response: Hello Mr. Burazz,that we did not ship your package immediately is probably due to the fact that the articles were not here yet. We differentiate in our shop between products on stock and products available. If products are available we need to get them delivered to our warehouse first which can take 3-5 working days. So if you chose an express delivery make sure that the articles are on stock. Of course we cannot say for sure what the problem was, since you did not give us any reference number. Best regards Your Mindfactory Team

Title: Same BS 10 years apart
Review: Gonna post this in English. Had my first order with this so called "professional" Shop 10 years ago. At the time of the order ALL of the items were available and ready to be shipped. As I payed right away and was waiting for the shipping confirmation days passed by. I thought that is odd. Checking on the order, there was NO information, neither did I get an email. I had to contact the damn shop to find out why my order isn't being shipped. Now after 10 years I thought... maybe they have gotten the hang of it. Who knows, RIGHT?! PAH! 4 Items in the order. ALL were available at the time of order. Payed right away. Days pass by without a shipping confirmation. ODD, seems like a deja vu. Checking on the order in the account, all it was saying, payed, no other information. ONCE AGAIN, I have to contact them. 2 days pass to get a reply. Telling me almost all of my order is not in stock at the moment and I have to wait. Corona is no excuse here! Not if the same exact thing happens 10 years apart. That being said, what frustrates me the most is, that I have to dig into why my freaking order isnt being shipped rather then them telling me. WHAT THE ACTUAL FUDGE KINDA Costumer service is this!!!STAY AWAY if you can.
Response: Dear Customer,we differentiate between goods in stock and goods available. Available goods must first be delivered to us from the external warehouse, this can take 3-5 working days. This is followed by a delivery time of 1-3 working days. We also clearly explain the difference between goods in stock and goods available on our website.Best regardsYour Mindfactory Team

Title: Changing articles in the middle of the order
Review: I ordered 4 PC components. When i checked my order i found out that they are sending me different components. I emailed them trying to return the items but they are stalling the process. . I don't want the parts because it is not what I have originally ordered, I just want to return them in the 14-day period and get my money back. But they are delaying and not responding to my last email.
Response: Dear Mr. Kondov,you can of course return the products within two weeks if ou got wrong ones. If you didn't get a reply from us, we may have not gotten your email. Please just write again, maybe use a different mail provider. Best regardsYour Mindfactory Team

Title: No way to treat customers
Review: After having my account for almost 5 years and spending >3000‚Ç¨ on a handful of orders my account got blocked after returning one (1!) unopened item, after receiving it, because I changed my mind about it. After sending an e-mail to the support they said they will not elaborate. Highly unprofessional behavior to block a customer just because he used the return policy

Title: Blocked my account after I returend a‚Ä¶
Review: Blocked my account after I returend a wrong send article. I called customer service "Can not talk on the phone about that". Than I ask in the email "Sorry we can not tell". Strangest store ever don't buy there...

Title: Terrible shop
Review: Terrible business, poor communication. It takes 10 days to get to Germany. They cancel the already running and sent order themselves. It then keeps you money for 14 days.Terrible business, I do not recommend shopping.
Response: Dear Jan, we are very sorry to hear that you are not satisfied with our service. We usually answer our Mails very fast. If you provide us with your invoice number or customer number we can check what exactly the problem was and why the order was cancelled. The Reference number can only be seen by us and Trustpilot. We look forward to hearing from you. Best Regards Your Mindfactory Team

Title: Miserable service!
Review: Miserable service. I ordered 4 PC components. After testing and multiple parts exchanges I get to test the PC. It makes weird electric noises in some of the components and I decided to send everything back. Of course the 15 days no-questions return was already over... Result: They sent me back all the components saying the did whatever kind of test and they are presumably perfectly working... Completely DISAPPOINTED with the service. LAST TIME AND NOT RECOMMENDED
Response: Dear Customer,we are sorry to hear that the ordered devices didn't work properly. If things are broken you can return them even if the 14 days return is over. It seems that our technicians testet the parts and there are working properly. Maybe it is a mistake in your system? You can also contact our technicians again to ask for help. You can reach them via technikteam@mindfactory.de.Best regardsYour Mindfactory Team

Title: Can't edit address, customer service didn't reply
Review: Wanted to buy something and was forced to put in a billing address. The billing address didn't allow for any "c/o" which is needed for my address. Then confirmed because I wasn't warned that it couldn't be changed later. Next window, I see that the shipping address was automatically set the same as the billing address and now both couldn't be changed.  After contacting customer support they also couldn't help and asked for confirmation that they should ship nonetheless. Gave them confirmation and didn't hear anything from them. Order on pause for two days. Then I called and they told me it's still on pause and they could confirm shipping now to send it out. Seems like someone didn't check my email confirming that it should be sent out that I had already sent two days ago. 0 empathy or explanation from their side. Super inconvenient.

Title: My review here was removed
Review: My review here was removed, when I claimed that they scalp people by raising the prices because of demand. This company raises GPU prices because of a shortage and they use that to their advantage. Lovely business model to remove truthful reviews. Keep up the great work
Response: Dear Mr. Oczkowski,our prices are related to the current situation and are not unreasonable. As you already claimed, there is an increase in demand and a massive shortage of graphic cards. Both of that leads to an increase in prices. This is how it works in a market economy. It is not us who raises the prices, it is simply owed to the current situation.Best regardsYour Mindfactory Team

Title: Wish no one made a mistake
Review: If they make a mistake you have a problem. Goods ordered via the web, paid for. Nevertheless, neither after inquiries the status of the order, nor in 4 weeks not delivered. Order canceled, the whole "purchase" cost me 1 day of correspondence and 50Eur.Any willingness on the part of the company to solve the problem = 0. Apologize = 0. At least they respond quickly to emails.

Title: Selling GPUs at scalper prices.
Review: NaN

Title: Solid hardware provider
Review: Solid hardware provider. Overall competitive and good service. Nice website.That being said, I noticed that I did not order much from them recently, mostly because I could always find deals just a little cheaper elsewhere. Competition is fierce in this field, I guess
Response: Dear Melki,thank you for your positive feedback. We are pleased to hear, that you like our service and website and look forward to welcome you as our customer again, soon. Best regards Your Mindfactory Team

Title: Their value is dog water.
Review: NaN
Response: Dear Abel Mosonyi,if you would be so kind to specify your problem? Maybe we can help then. I also can't find a customer account under your name. And please overthink your wording, this is not  appropriate and will get you nowhere in life. Lots of loveYour Mindfactory Team

Title: I know why I only order there
Review: The delivery times are good, the prices are good, but what really caused to me write a review is the customer service. I've dealt with them three times by now, and they are simply awesome. Fast responses, very obliging and accomodating. As a recent example, yesterday I ordered a CPU-cooler and to my dismay had to realize that some screws were missing that I would need to mount the cooler (my mistake, somehow lost them). Contacted them and they told me they'll just send me some free of charge. Over the years haven't had a single negative experience with them. All in all, best German computer shop I know.
Response: Dear Mr. Schiff,thank you for your positive Feedback and kind words. We are pleased to hear, that our service could meet your expectations and that we could help you. We look forward to welcome you as our customer again, soon. Best regardsYour Mindfactory Team

Title: Horrible customer service
Review: Ordered more than a week ago. Package arrived a few days ago at destination city, but for some reason went on to leave Germany and is on the way to Austria. I need the components really soon and can't wait anymore longer, so I contacted the customer service to find a solution, but the customer service guy couldn't care less. So now, in order to get what I ordered in time, I have to order somewhere else AND I have to pay for sending back the Mindfactory package, regardless of it's not being my fault... Thumbs up Mindfactory, you can be sure I won't ever recommend you.
Response: Dear A.S.,we are sorry to hear that you are not pleased with our service. I cannot explain why your package is on its way to Austria, since we only ship to Germany, that is probably a mistake from DHL. Please send an email to logistik@mindfactory.de or contact the customer support from DHL. Best regardsYour Mindfactory Team

Title: Mindfactory
Review: Best market prices, super-fast delivery!
Response: Dear customer,thank you for your kind words. We would be very happy to have you as a customer in the future as well.Kind regardsThe Mindfactory Team

Title: I ordered AMD Ryzen 7 5800x from them‚Ä¶
Review: I ordered AMD Ryzen 7 5800x from them and also added gold service for5 euros where they arsupposed to quickly ship your order and so on. Three days later my order has not shipped yet.Edit: after receiving a reply from Mindfactory here I checked my spam and found a tracking link for my CPU, it should arrive today. I will then update my review
Response: Dear Mr. Hamzaoui,your order was placed on February 1st and got shipped on the same day. Did you not get a shipping confirmation? You should have gotten it via email. If you did not receive the email and want to know your tracking number you can contact us at info@mindfactory.de, then we can send you the shipping confirmation again.Best regardsYour Mindfactory Team

Title: Amazing shop
Review: Amazing shop. They had everything I needed at great price. Their costumer service was really quick, the parts I ordered came in 4 working days. If I could find any bad thing is that shipping is a little too much expensive but everything else is 10/10.
Response: Dear Nejc,thank you for your positive Feedback. We are pleased to hear, that the delivery and our service went well and look forward to welcome you as our customer again, soon. Best regards Your Mindfactory Team

Title: Good delivery, fast refunding
Review: I ordered a set of PC components for building a gaming PC last two weeks from Mindfactory AG. The delivery was reasonable on-time and there was no goods damage. I am satisfied with what I ordered. However, I returned some components due to better models, which Mindfactory AG does not offer. They did refund me in a reasonable time frame.
Response: Dear Customer,thank you for your positive Feedback and kind words. We are pleased to hear, that the delivery and our service went well and look forward to welcome you as our customer again, soon.Best regardsYour Mindfactory Team

Title: I ordered something to a wrong address‚Ä¶
Review: I ordered something to a wrong address cuz i made a typo, my product got back to them and i didnt hear anything from them since. When i try to contact them by phone they are always unavailable and if i try to send them an email i just get a mail back that this address doesnt exist
Response: Dear customer,when an adress cannot be identified, it is the normal procedure that the package gets sent back to us. Thusly, we sent your money back and put the article back into our system.With kind regardsThe Mindfactory Team

Title: Dead customer service
Review: Quick processing of my order, i couldnt check the order details for various reasons and eventually noticed that my product got shipped today and is heading to my old address as it was apparently still connected to my account. I reported the issue, asking for help, yet customer service could not string two words together in response to my email, i asked twice if there was anything i could do, and got a short response with words not even spelled properly, in return. Yes it was an error on my part but in no way shape or form did they offer any solution or assistance, suck my dick.
Response: Dear customer,we kindly ask you to be more respectful when communicating with us. We are more than happy to help you with your issue regarding our service. For that, we need your customer-ID. You can simply add that as a reference to this rating, that way only our team and the Trustpilot team can see the reference. With kind regardsThe Mindfactory Team

Title: Awsome
Review: I wish this was the Standart
Response: Dear Mr. Schepers,thank you for your good feedback. We look forward to welcome you in our shop again.Best regardsYour Mindfactory Team

Title: Mindfactory is the Ryanair of PC Parts
Review: Mindfactory is the Ryanair of PC Parts. Good prices, zero customer service.Order was not shipped 3 weeks after payment. No response to phone or mail enquiries. Resolved via paypal claim. No reply, no excuse, nothing.Pay a little extra and take your business elsewhere.
Response: Dear Robert,we are very sorry to hear that you are not satisfied with our service. We usually answer our Mails very fast. It is also very unusual that you have to wait this long for your order to get shipped. Our delivery time is 1-3 working days unless we have to order the product from our external warehouse. But even then it should only take 3-5 working days, until we get the product. I can only imagine that there might have been delivery difficulties so we didn't get the product in time. If you provide us with your invoice number or customer number we can check that for you and can also check if there are any unanswered mails from you. The Reference number can only be seen by us and Trustpilot. We look forward to hearing from you. Best RegardsYour Mindfactory Team

Title: Selling RTX cards +200 euros above MSRP
Review: NaN
Response: Dear Smith,we work with daily updated prices. These are based on our purchase prices and can change daily. As is usual in a free market economy, supply and demand determine the price. With kind regardsYour Mindfactory Team

Title: Service Level Gold
Review: Explains a lotTy for the reply
Response: Dear Mr. Grgic,unfortunately the RAM was not in stock. The Service Level Gold  is an express collection for parts in stock. That means Service Level Gold orders are prioritized in our Warehouse. If the desired product is not in stock, it must be delivered in advance to our warehouse. This usually takes 3-5 business days. You ordered on 09.10, your RAM arrived on 13.10 and was shipped directly on 13.10. Thus the conditions of the Service Level Gold were kept. Please also note that in order for the Service Level Gold to take effect and your order to be shipped on the same day, the order must be placed before 2 pm. Your order was placed on Fridays at 4:30 pm. In this case, even if the goods are in stock, it would only be possible to ship the order the next Monday.Kind Regards,your Mindfactory-Team

Title: Service Level Gold = SCAM
Review: Service Level Gold is illigal.when you buy they advertise it "same day delivery" in the contract they say "same day is not always possible" - ofcourse they are not talking about weekends (weekends make sense).If you could not guarantee what you promise, it means you are stealing money.
Response: Dear customer,In the description of the service it says "Orders until 14.00 o'clock are handed over to our logistics partner on the same day" which means that if you are before 14.00 o'clock your order will be collected and sent out on that day. Another conditions is that all your order articles are in stock at our warehouse. The service doesn't claim that the order will be delivered to you at the same day. That's logistically not possible and is not what we claim.Best regardsYour Mindfactory-Team

Title: nice
Review: Very fast delivery,lots of infornation concerning the specifications of the parts,overall very good, would reccomend.
Response: Dear Costumer,thank you for your positive feedback. Kind regards,your Mindfactory-Team

Title: Quick, efficient and highly recommended
Review: Ordered parts for a full PC build on Sunday evening and opted for the "Service Level Gold" option. The order was processed and delivery tracking created by Monday morning. Impressed by the speed! Also opted for the UPS Express option, received all parts by Tuesday afternoon and writing this review on Tuesday evening from the finished PC! Prices were definitely among the cheapest and all the parts worked flawlessly. Would definitely reconsider for future shoppping for electronics.
Response: Dear Mr. Aditya,we are happy to hear that you liked our services.  Kind regards,Your Mindfactory-Team

Title: Paid 140 euros for installation and assurance service, got faulty component
Review: Ordered a full build PC 3 weeks ago. It too two weeks to just send out the pc. I sent 3 emails over the course of a week to check what is going on, no reply. After 3 extra days of UPS delay I got the PC. Immediately, the Cooler Master AIO is making loud ticking noise at the pump. Based on research it is a common problem of this product with many people having the same. But the problem is I paid 140 euros extra as a service to have it checked and installed. This is exactly what I paid the extra money for, to receive a working product. Then I contacted them for exchange, again no response. Now I am very frustrated. Price of the products are competitive in Germany. Return policy is good. But the general custom service, or the lack of is less so.
Response: Dear Jiajun,we regret to hear that you were not satisfied with our service.Please keep in mind that we only can begin with assembling the computer when all parts are in stock. Sadly you order parts that were not in stock. That is why your order got sent out delayed. Normally it takes around 2 business to process an order with a full build (variations are possible, depending on our workload).   Sadly we cant find 3 emails from you in our system.  We can only finde one email, which received an answer within the next 30 minutes.You paid the the service for assembling & testing the computer parts. This Service was provided and all parts were checked and were working correctly.If there is any damage at the waterpump , please reach out to our complaint department under reklamation@mindfactory.deKind regards,your Mindfactory-Team

Title: Order still in process for more than 3 weeks!
Review: I ordered a good amount of items, some of which were available in stock and ready for shipment by the time I placed my order. Of all items that are available, the smallest components are constantly awaiting shipment. It's been three weeks now and I cannot build a new Desktop because the same item is still awaiting shipment. No contact info as to why I do not receive the parts that are available or even a info when I can expect to get the whole set.Contact support just keeps me informed by stating that the parts are not available yet. Still on the edge of deciding between cancelling the order altogether or just awaiting the shipment (hopefully this year soon) and never buying from that store again.There is a reason why bigger shops and e-commerce giants are so successful.
Response: Dear Customer,we are sad to hear, that you are not satisfied with our services. Unfortunately, it can sometimes happen that delivery difficulties arise with certain articles. We apologize for this. You are welcome to ask our colleagues at info@mindfactory.de to cancel the corresponding article so that we can finally send your order to you.Best regards,Your Mindfactory-Team

Title: Faulty items
Review: I ordered an entire computer here piece by piece and the GPU and memory card stopped working within less than 10 hours of use. All in all it took a month to get them both replaced and they never covered my extra shipping costs. Because the GPU broke, I could only tell the memory card was broken as well only once I got the GPU replaced, which meant I had to get them replaced seperately and pay more for shipping because of that. Now, I can forgive part of  the shipping costs, as I did order through a middle man and they couldn't cover them becuase the items were returned from a different address, but the fact that 2 items broke and the month of inconvenience it all caused made this a horrible experience.
Response: Dear Mr.  Jesen≈°ek,if you order directly from us we always refund shipping costs when we have to replace products. We are sad to hear that two of your ordered products were broken but we ask you to understand that we  only sell the items and do not make them ourselves so we can't guarantee that products are always free of defects. We still try to replace defect items as soon as possible. Best regards,Your Mindfactory-Team

Title: Lack of communication
Review: Hello everyone. I'm a new customer of mind factory and my first purchase I submitted a payment for the product. Emails are quite delayed . I still have hope the product will be fulfilled. Also purchased service level gold so its kind of disappointing. My status of my order is still open even after payment submission. I'm so confused. Never seen a company operate this way. I hope to hear from them soon. Spent a lot of time and effort into ordering my product. Hope i don't get scammed. Pray for me. Processing number: 10656899
Response: Dear Customer,since you ordered via Bank transfer, we only can process your order when the money arrived on our bank account. It also got delayed because you dint sent the right amount in the beginning and needed to correct it. If you want want your order to arrive very quick you should check if the desired item is in stock (status in green "lagernd"). If an item is "verf√ºgbar" we need to order it. Your item arrived this morning in our warehouse and got sent out to you already.But i don't understand why you say we replied your emails delayed.You always received an answer the same day within our opening hours. Please keep in mind that the 21.05 was a bank holiday in Germany. Kind regards,Your Mindfactory Team

Title: Great service and staff
Review: Great service and staff! Prices are also very good!
Response: Dear Mark,we thank you for your kind review. We are happy to hear that you are satisfied with out services und you to welcome you back in the future.Kind regards,Your Mindfactory-Team

Title: MINDFACTORY.DE extremely bad experience
Review: On 6.4. I ordered PC parts + PC Case which was supposed to be in stock within 2-4 daysToday is 21.4. and after many exchanged e-mails, the company still ignores me.From 6.4. to 21.4. Ive sent the company numerous mails asking when will my PC case be available and they kept saying "next day". Today, after more than 2 weeks, I told them to give me a replacement PC case (which is about 15 EUR more expensive) if my ordered PC isnt ready to be shipped and because they have been fooling with me for far too long.Also they arent reachable by phone - I know they will make up the "coronavirus" excuse, as they do in all of their emails.Not to mention the fact that Ive been bugging them to stop lying and sent the ordered PC-case and they kept postponing it for 2+ weeks and finally they just removed the item from their website and said it is not available any more. What the hell??? If they have problems with their supplier they shouldnt have lie to their customer but resolve the issue with their supplier. They simply ignored the question and told me to make additional payment in order to ship items today.-------------Edit: How did you simply ignore the real problem of my ordered PC-case and shifted focus to something else? You still have not given me the information when I receive my Case-------------Edit 2: How can you reply in english but flat out ignore everything I wrote in english since my german is limited. And frankly, I tried to be friendly and wrote 90% of the text in german-----------Edit 3: If this can be resolved in this week through TrustedPilot and with your colleagues, I will rate experience a bit better than 1/5 as deserved. However, your colleagues always answer within 1-2 hours when I ask multiple questions in the same mail so they can pick which question to answer and ignore the rest which are usually even more imporant. But when I simply send 1 question in 1 mail, such as "will you actually get the PC case I ordered", I do not receive an answer. Whoever is replying to TrustedPilot, get in contact with whoever is handling my mails and tell them to call me +386 (0)69 929 037 and we can resolve the issue as I want some direct answers which I cannot get through the emails.-----------Edit 4: This is the last e-mail i sent to your colleagues "Can you tell me what is up with Lian Li case then, when will it arrive and be ready to ship? I have no other case to pick except CORSAIR 460X. This one without tax is 12 EUR more expensive than the Lian Li case I ordered. I think it is fair that you replace the Lian Li with this case and ship the order today. Considering the fact that Ive ordered Lian Li case because wait time was 2-4 days and not 2+ weeks. I will also change the TrustedPilot review if we can reach a fair agreement. I need this PC to work on during quarantine and its already 2 weeks in and I have to use my outdated laptop‚Ä¶ postponing the shipment is causing me damage since I cant work as fast as I could on a new PC. Applications like Microsoft Word take ages to open.Hopefully we can reach conclusion now."Please make sure your colleagues give exact answer to this question. Either ship Lian Li case this week or just ship Corsair 460X (only 1 corsair is in stock, if you wont react fast and it gets sold it wont be fair towards me as a customer)------Edit 5: Whole day has passed and I still got no reply from Mindfactory.de - all I got was "Dear Mr XXXXX,we never lie!Best regardsMit freundlichen Gr√º√üenIhr Mindfactory Service TeamXXXX XXXX"How do you have time to answer that you never lie but you again totally avoid the question asked?--------Edit 6:Today is 22.4. I sent the email again, since i havent gotten a reply for more than a day - they werent able to answer my simple question when will the case be available in 1 whole day, but they were able to answer another email within 1 hour on 21.4. when I asked them if they are lying and why What the hell is this website?--------Edit 7:Ok the case has been shipped today at 17:21. I thank Mindfactory.de for responsive theyve done after the review here, so I am sticking to my part of the deal and giving it another positive review. However, I am still waiting for them to ship other parts - currently theyve shipped only the case: CPU, ram, HDD, SSD, PSU, fans and some other minor stuff still have to be shipped. ---------EDIT 8: Today is 23.4. All other parts were listed as in stock on 7.4. and PC Case was listed as "will be in stock within 2-4 days", however yesterday on 22.4. the PC case has been shipped and other parts, which were all "allegedly" in stock, still havent been shipped, And in exchange of my e-mails with Mindfactory.de from 7.4. to 22.4. they have stated multiple times that items are available. Did they lie even about other items? ----They disabled option to Buy items on my account... I dont see prices/shipping on items unless I log out of my account...
Response: Dear Mr. Robida,we understand that your customer experience may be frustrating. The reason why we didn't swap your case is because it is simply not possible to replace ordered arcticles with more expensive articles. The reason for this are buyer protection provisions of the payment providers. Even if you are unhappy about our services, it is unacceptable to publish the names of the colleagues like that. We ask you to immediately remove said names as posting personal information violates Trustpilot rules.Edit: If you want to know the status of your order please contact the colleagues again. They will answer you in English if you write them in English, there is no need to contact them in German if you aren't comfortable in talking to them in German. Please leave them some time to respond though as they are quiete busy. They should be able to get back to you as soon as they can.  Regards,Your Mindfactory-Team

Title: Very bad vostumer support,very slow‚Ä¶
Review: Very bad vostumer support,very slow delivery eben though you pay it yourself
Response: Dear Cosumer,we are sorry to hear that you are not satisfied with our service. Due to an increased order volume due to the Corona crisis, there may be delays in shipping. We would like to apologize for this. Unfortunately our hotline is also working to full capacity. In such a case you are welcome to send us an e-mail. Kind regardsYour Mindfactory Team

Title: Possibly the worst customer service
Review: Edit: even after customer service claimed they were working on processing my refund, they've yet to issue it more than a week later. It's almost as though they just say they're working on it to get customers to be quiet. I'm issuing a charge-back through my bank as it's evidently the only way I'll ever get my money back.Possibly the worst customer service and customer experience around.During checkout I entered a new delivery address as I had moved since last I'd ordered from them. After confirming my order and finishing my transaction, I noticed that the address had reverted to my old one, so I tried to contact them before it was shipped. Evidently even if you enter in a new address, it doesn't confirm right away and instead they have to manually confirm the change on their end. This isn't made clear during the checkout process. They replied the following day to let me know that it had been shipped and that they could not change the address, but that I could cancel the order and repurchase it at a later date. Mindfactory put in a return order directly to DHL, who then delivered it back to them, meaning I never had the package nor was there an attempt to deliver it to me.Now, a week after they received the item back from DHL I have yet to get any sort of confirmation as to the status of my return, and any and all emails have been blatantly ignored.As it stands, Mindfactory has stolen 439‚Ç¨ from me.I'll never be ordering from them again.
Response: Dear Mr. Stensland,I have just check our system and your order should get fully refunded. Due to the amount of requests we are currently getting because of the the current global situation, our customer service is currently fully occupied. We apologize for that. You should be getting notified shortly about the state of your refund and your money should be transferred back to you. If you wish to speed up that process you can try calling our customer service hotline at 04421 / 91 31 010. Please note that getting through can also take a bit longer than usual.With kind regards,Your Mindfactory-Team

Title: Worst experience with any online shop so far!
Review: Totally weird experience. Few points to note, why the order had problems due my actions.1. We had wrong address in order, but it was fixed within one day by me.You would expect they contact you and ask to re-check this, however what happen is following:1. They freeze your order.2. They did not contact us about having problems with the order at all.3. Their customer service put you to wait on the line like 1-2 hours and basically after that they ask you send again email to the customer service.So meaning: I noticed one of my two orders with different accounts were showing different status: One was shipped one was still in "paid" mode. So I decided contact then and ask what is wrong. I opened Live chat, waited literally over a hour for answer.What I got there, there was problems with the order and I should contact their support. They did not contact me about this nor told what was wrong with the order until I contacted them with email to given email, not email showing on their site.The response on the email was, there was wrong address between the EU system and profile information. So I fixed the EU system address there, even tough the first address was totally legit according to local authorities. After this started the cat-mouse hunt. I ask them to re-check, they reject. This happen about 2-3 times. I literally provided them also access to local authorities system, where they could see all information and also tell what is exact problem with the order.We DID NOT get even exact problem to our knowledge as MF declined to disclose the full problem with the order with us. This is totally meaning, they just want run you trough their own machine and waste your time. It was totally cat-mouse experience where I have updated information as correct based on their live chat instructions where the email guy gives us following generic response"Dear customer,Please change the data in the customer account.Best regards"Last time I literally was 2 hours in the live chat queue and one guy said I need to answer to email, which I had already answered, and that email was again one of those generic ones. They said, one of the supervisors will contact and solve, this however, this never happen.Also as last resort as they were no more answering the emails nor the live chat, I tried to call them. They did not pick up, probably due they already knew the number. They are totally most unprofessional customer support experience ever!Due they did not answer me anymore I had to open PayPal case about this, which they surprisingly did answer and refund the order via the case, not by email, live-chat or phone. So, I will HIGHLY TO NOT ORDER from here. I have made over 100 orders within last 6 years and now with new company account, this happen. No thanks anymore.ABSWR FOR MF:Address was checked from EU system, Finnish YTJ and it was matching. It was updated into correct one. Also your generic and lazy responses did not help at all. And neither the facr you DID NOT contact us about frozen order.
Response: Dear Niko, you inserted a wrong address - no worries that can happen. Due to new data protection laws we are not allowed to change the address for you. As you said, you changed the address, that is true. But it was still not matching the address that was registered under your VAT ID in the EU system. We asked you multiple times to change the address, without any result. It is important, when you want to order in the name of your company without taxes, that the address is matching. Sadly there is nothing that we can do, to assist you with inserting the correct address. We are happy to hear that you could solve that issue and PayPal could refund you quickly. Since you didn't update your address we would have needed to cancel your order anyway.Kind regardsYour Mindfactory-Team

Title: Worst customer service ever
Review: Worst customer service everOrdered during last 5 years over 100k EUR of goods under various company names. First time ever they want delay, wait until customer contacts them and asks what is wrong.They have frozen the order without reasoning.
Response: Dear Costumer,we are sorry to hear that you were not satisfied with our service. To find out what went wrong with your order, we would like to have a look into it. Sadly you didn't provide any reference number, like this we cant identify your account. Please add your account ID or the order ID to your review and we will assist you in this matter.Kind regards,Your Mindfactory-Team

Title: A device I ordered from Mindfactory‚Ä¶
Review: A device I ordered from Mindfactory broke within the warranty period. I sent it to them. They were unable to supply me with a replacement device and instead granted me a credit in the amount of the purchase price. I ordered a comparable device, but had to pay the high shipping costs of 8.99 EUR myself (which would not have been incurred when the device could have been replaced). When I asked for a reduction of the shipping costs, I received the answer: "We would also have had the opportunity to send the item in for repair for several weeks and have you wait." This would be fair enough.If you expect more service than in the area of ‚Äã‚Äãthe legal minimum, I recommend ordering somewhere else.
Response: Dear Chris,we are sorry to hear sat you were not satisfied with our service.  The normal procedure in warranty cases is, that the device is send in for repair to the manufacturer. This process can take up to 8 weeks. In order to save you time, my colleagues already went the extra mile and granted the full purchase price. Yes, if afterwards you choose to order a new product you need to pay the shipping cost.If you let us know your costumer ID, we can look into your case, if there is anything else we can do for you.Kind regardsYour Mindfactory Team

Title: Got sent wrong product. I have to pay 4.90‚Ç¨ shipping to returning it.
Review: They send me the wrong product and I have to pay 4.90‚Ç¨ to return it. Paying for their mistakes is just really terrible service. Will never order from them again.
Response: Dear Mr. Zelo,if we sent you the wrong product, of course you don't have to pay shipping for an exchange. Please let us know your account- oder ordernumber so we can clarify the situation.Kind regardsYour Mindfactory-Team

Title: Refusal of processing order after payment without explanation
Review: I made 5 orders over 2 years without any problem. However in 2020 I found my account blocked and my payment was made but MF refused to process the order without any warning or explanation:Dear customer,Unfortunately, after careful consideration we have decided to end our business relationship with you. We will therefore not continue to process your order. We will of course refund the amount already paid back to your PayPal account. We will not comment on the reasons and ask you to refrain from further questions in our house.Kind regardsYour Mindfactory Service TeamEDITI don't understand why you don't state clearly in private the reason of "refusal to sell" (which can be illegal and sued). My account is still active. I stated that I'm in a residency with more than 500 appartments, sharing the same IP address, and I often receive captcha or request forgery warning on certain commercial websites due to abnormal activity from my IP address. I hope this is not related to your decision. The only reason I can see is that I did not cancel 3 invoices; and in that case I find MF behavior/policy a bit brutal. In order to lift any misunderstanding I think it would be right to share in private the exact reason, and in the future, I advise you to have an escalation policy to warn your customers of consequences, that would be professional.EDIT2I appreciate the change in your policy. I wrote yesterday asking for this, they remain silent so far.
Response: Dear Marthieu,we regret to hear that you are not happy with us. We close accounts because of several reasons. Please share your customer number with us so we can check why exactly your account was closed by us. We also kindly ask you to remove the name of our colleague from your review as this is not permitted per Trustpilot guidelines. RegardsYour Mindfactory-TeamEdit: Thank you for sending us the E-Mail. Sadly we can't tell you in public why your account was closed by us but I'm sure you are already aware of the reason. We reserve the right to close accounts of customers for any reason, a justification is not needed by law. We hope you can understand our reasoning and wish you well in the future.  Edit 2:If you want to know the reason why we decided to close your account please directly contact our colleagues at info@mindfactory.de. They will tell you. All that I can tell you is that it's not related to your IP adress.

Title: I've recently ordered a case from this‚Ä¶
Review: I've recently ordered a case from this company, at the same time i ordered all other parts of a new pc build from another company. i have received all the other parts from the other company and not even an acknowledgement from mindfactory. They first made me transfer froms from bank account and i had to chase them up to know if they received it or not then a few days go by and they send another email to say that they received the funds again but still no product and still no idea when/if it will be delivered even after several messages and emails.
Response: Dear customer,we are sad to hear that you aren't satisfied with our service. If you whish you can send us your customer ID via social media or e-mail and we will check the status of your order. Regards,Your Mindfactory-Team

Title: Wanted to build my first rig, all I got was useless parts around my room
Review: Terrible service. Items not even shipped within a week. Phone number doesn't work, no replies to any emails. Don't do this to yourself.

Title: ITEMS ARE STILL IN PROCESSING - PATHETIC SERVICE
Review: Operation number: 6771201Processing number: 10241145Bought Several items on 2nd December worth ~450 Euros, Got one package delivered in 4 Days and other items are STILL IN PROCESS (They charged ~8-9 Euros for delivery).They have provided their phone numbers(04421/91 31 010) on website but it doesn't work at all.They also don't provide response over email address - info[at]mindfactory.deMoreover they have provided their whatsapp number, again the same - NO RESPONSE AT ALL.AND ITEMS ARE STILL NOT PACKED BY THEM.PATHETIC SERVICE PROVIDED TO CUSTOMER.DON'T BUY FROM mindfactory.de AT ALL.

Title: Long standing customers mean zero.
Review: Long standing customers mean zero.Business client, over three years of regular purchases for my company. Was alternating between Mindfactory and Amazon, whoever had better prices. So it is not even a best-prices-ever shop that has no alternatives. Business is expanding, pressure is high, I order some latest tech for a new employee.1) A high grade monitor arrives Ultra Used. Not open box, USED, for long and badly. Stripped screws, scuffs, scratches. WOW. Customer support of course suspects me of cheating, and I have to make a photosession to prove it. Luckily even the delivery box was so badly re-stickered and re-closed that there could be no doubt. Since they messed up badly, I asked to send immediately a replacement and have the used monitor collected by the same courier. No, nothing. Big f#ck you to my face, I have to waste time, send back the trash they sold me, wait, receive something back.2) A crucial new workstation order gets stopped because an item from it is no longer available AFTER I purchased it. And I made the purchase Exactly with available articles, because I Needed It to close an emergency and Get Delivered. I suggest a replacement, nothing. Even though they show it as available the next day. Brick wall.So, yes, my new employee has no workplace. Thanks a lot.I now cancelled the outstanding orders, will send back the ghetto monitor myself and...that's it. I am done with Mindfactory. Will stick with Amazon. They have higher prices on average, but they stand by their customers and god forbid they mess up.Overall for three years things were ok, so it is a sad farewell.This whole situation could have been a spectacular PR action, with one click and, maybe, 10‚Ç¨ loss on near 3000‚Ç¨ order. Send monitor, collect monitor, replace case with similar model and send. Bam! I would be shouting about how great Mindfactory is, forever loyal. Instead no, they went the dumb way. We don't know, we can not, we don't care. Well, that was your choice. You lost a growing tech company, handed it straight to your competitors, destroyed in twelve hours three years of trust building, got another bad review here and forever bad word of mouth in my company and around. Could you have managed this situation any worse? Was it worth it? Is that your business model? How much do you spend on advertising? Because bad one costs you only 10‚Ç¨ per 100 people reach. This is how much you refused to lose, to make up for your own, and your only mistake, and replace the disappeared case with one from its dozen variants.Everybody makes mistakes, but it is how one solves them that matters. I had two business partners messing big time, but they turned it into amazing solutions, and won forever my love and money. These people, instead, did not even acknowledge two massive mistakes, blamed everyone but themselves, took no responsibility and no pride and let me bear the consequences of all their issues. Very double standard approach to exceptions: occasionally selling used items as new and falsely represent inventory - fine, but breaking the routine to solve problems caused to customers - no way.I am not even angry with Mindfactory, just really really sad. Farewell.p.s.) Surprisingly enough, they did refund the monitor. I now expected to remain at the receiving end of this scam. But of course I had to pay myself for the shipping. Obviously, who else should pay for their mistakes? Nice cherry on the cake. Removing one more star from the initial, already miserable, three.

Title: Unreliable service
Review: I wasted a whole week waiting for my package to arrive which should have normally taken two days (I paid for the express delivery).The tracking page says that the packages were sent back to the sender. When I reached out to their logistics team, they simply responded that they didn't know what went wrong, they didn't even bother contacting the delivery service to find out what's the actual problem, also they were so unfriendly.The address I provided was correct and my name was on both the doorbell and the mailbox.I wish I have known about this earlier, otherwise I would have stayed away from Mindfactory.Edit: I have not placed the order again nor made any changes to my address. You don't even want to admit that it was your fault...I ended up receiving the packages btw.Edit 2: You could have done something at least when you received my emails:i.imgur .com/P99EtA0.pngi.imgur .com/qmz4t1G.pngAt this point, the "Service Level Gold" and the "Express Delivery" I paid for are pretty useless...
Response: Dear Ismail,with regret we take note that you were not satisfied with the order processing. To ensure that an order can be processed as quickly as possible, it is important to ensure that all items have been sufficiently in stock. As soon as all articles have been in stock, the order has been prepared for shipping. The order has been shipped to you via UPS Standard Shipping. This could not be delivered because the recipient (you) has moved. The order has been returned to us and a corresponding credit note has been issued to you. As we can see from your customer account, you have placed the order again with the correct address data. Furthermore we cannot understand your criticism, because you are responsible for the correctness of your address data.Edit:We can't comprehend why UPS couldn't find your address in the first place. Fact is we have written proof of UPS stating that the recipient has moved. To clarify this you need to get in touch with UPS.We didn't get in touch with UPS because we sent the delivery out again and it was delivered.Edit2:No, we cant do anything while the package is in the hands of UPS. We need to wait for the package to return. Please keep in mind that the Service Level Gold is no express delivery. It just has the purpose to collect your order faster and with priority, if you meet the criteria: The item needs be in stock in sufficient quantity and your order needs to be placed before 14 o'clock. See here: https://www.mindfactory.de/info_center.php/icID/18 Also you didn't Pay UPS Express Delivery, you paid for UPS standard. We gave you the 2nd time the express delivery free of costs as a good will grant.Yours sincerely,Your Mindfactory team

Title: I would not recommend the company at all
Review: I would not recommend the company at all. They might be cheap but so is the service. I bought several identical systems. The one I assembled is still running the other which were assembled by the company did break one by one. I paid 20000‚Ç¨ for 4 machines:(1) two mainboards broke (onboard etwork card)(2) one graphics card (Titan RTX)(3) 3 water cooling systems, bequiet is not recommendedAll of it resulted in sending parts back and forth and I could use the machines for a long time. What is most annoying is that the company is questioning that I did not send back the correct part (based on the manufacturers number).On top of that they have send a used watercooling system. There was cooling paste on the waterpump. The pump was broken, of course. This is absolutely not acceptable.Customer Number: 12629457
Response: Dear Mr. Schulz,I'm really sorry to hear, that you are not happy with our services. Of course we try to provide the best costumer service possible. That is why we take reviews like your as very serious matter. Sadly we cant investigate your case, because you didn't add any reference number to your review. If you add your account- or ordernumber we will have a look into your case.UPDATE 21.10.2019If a device is broken, we gonna assist you with your warranty (Please keep in Mind that this not the guarantee! This is provided by the manufacturer). Please consider that we also have to investigate what is wrong with the device. Sometimes we can do that internally, but if our tools don't help us to find out what is wrong, we need to send the device back to the manufacturer, which has way better testing environment than us. This Process can take between 6-8 Weeks. Of course I can understand that its not nice to wait that time, specially if its a productive System. But first of all we are just an online retailer. We are not responsible to provide a service to you, that guarantees an direct replacement, to minimize your waiting time. If you wish to have a service that offers you a direct replacement you need to hire a company that offers this service (PC-Service, PC-Emergency Service, etc. ) These services cost always money and we don't see, why we should offer this to you for free. Also didn't match the serial number of one of the parts you sended back, with the Serial number in our System. And of course we have to question an anomaly like this. Otherwise everyone could send us literally anything and we have to look for an replacement. If the serial number doesn't match, please double check with our invoice. The Serial number is written on it. Maybe this helps to identify the mistake.That you received a used waterpump is unacceptable. Sadly the one we gave to you as a replacement was also sold to us as new. If you wish to clarify this situation please get in contact with our claims department. You can reach them under reklamationsabteilung@mindfactory.deKind regardsYour Mindfactory Team

Title: I've orderd some pc parts and‚Ä¶
Review: I've orderd some pc parts and everything was fine. Only the shipping was a bit expensive to my mind.
Response: Dear Mr. Hikari,im happy to hear that you like our services.I can understand that you think our shipping costs are too high, but we prefer to label the costs as what they really are, instead of adding these costs to the prices of our products.But you can take part in our midnight shopping. Optimized processes help us here to provide a free shipment. More information you can find here:https://www.mindfactory.de/info_center.php/icID/16Kind regards,your Mindfactory Team

Title: I have to give them a good review
Review: I have to give them a good review, hands down. The communication was excellent, I got all my items (2.5k EUR worth) within 7 days just like predicted by their ordering system. I ordered an exotic PC case so the wait was fully expected by me. It was not a day longer than predicted.Shipment was well-packaged, nothing was missing or damaged. All components working flawlessly.Will buy again, solid company.
Response: Dear David S,We are pleased to hear that you have been satisfied with your order and our service.We would be pleased to welcome you also in the future again in our Shop to be allowed.Yours sincerely,Your Mindfactory team

Title: Stay away from Mindfactory
Review: Ordered an item from them that they had in stock according to their webpage. Paid for it using PayPal. Got an e-mail saying the order was successful. Nothing happened for a day. Suddenly I notice that the item is no longer in stock on their webpage and that the delivery time is 2-3 days. Well, I e-mail them asking when I can expect my item. I receive a reply stating it should be shipped within 2 days, 3 max. So 3 days go by without an update. E-mail them again asking about my order. This time they reply they are expecting the item in 1-2 days and that I should just be patient. A week goes by and still no update, so I e-mail them again. This time they say they are expecting the item today! Okay, I think - finally! Only to then receive an e-mail a couple of hours later stating the item is no longer available.EDIT: I can share a screenshot of the page showing the item being in stock just last Tuesday. It clearly said "Largernd | > 5 St. (weitere sind uterwegs) (Max. Bestellmange: 5). I have also been in contact with you by e-mail and you offered no apologies or even another product for the same price, just a simple refund after waiting for over a week and constantly being told to just be patient. Now I can't even get the same product from another e-tailer for the same price.Just copy and paste the following without the *: https://*drive.google.com*/file/d/1CJBvdMtNAb8VhVoJnOlEZeiAKwi0l1G6/view?usp=sharingEDIT 2: Just to let other potential customers know - what they do is called a basic "Bait and switch" where the e-tailer lures you in by selling a product for a low price they have no intention of ever delivering to you. They just inform you after you've placed your order that you have the choice of either getting a refund or switching to another product (full price of course). Most people will just switch to another product in order to avoid the hassle, leading to the e-tailer getting more money from you despite engaging in illegal activities. You can read more about it here: https://*ec.europa.eu*/digital-single-market/en/rights-principles-applicable-when-you-buy-goods-or-services-online?fbclid=IwAR1d-sfH3nG_T5smS8pSAp32uQEzvV6rn9vcKXA6fvZ9deAT-nm50IePniUAgain just remove the * from the link.EDIT3: It wasn't from the time I placed my order, but on Tuesday the following week on August 6th. So you apparently wanted to get even more orders in despite already having many on back-order (the timestamp is in the filename as I uploaded it to Telegram). So what happened to the products you had in stock on Tuesday?EDIT4: "We tried to order from other suppliers and we offered you alternative Products and you didn't take them." Why are you making up facts? You offered no alternative products you just sent me a refund, and only when I sent you an e-mail asking about alternative products did you respond with a less than stellar offer on another item. In fact it was no offer at all, but just an alternative product for full price which again just proves you engage in illegal "bait and switch" tactics. You did offer your "Gold service" free of charge, which based on my experience amounts to pretty much nothing.EDIT5: You still did not explain why your website claimed you had them in stock on the 6th? You can take whatever action you see fit as I do have the files to prove you are lying. And what could I possible gain by photoshopping an image for trustpilot? Are you honestly claiming I took the screenshot before the you lowered the price and had them in stock, only to use it as leverage against you when I didn't receive an order I placed while the price was lowered (how could I have even known you would never deliver the item in question)? That is a pretty absurd accusation.EDIT6: I actually just noticed that in the first screenshot I took of your webpage it you had 3 in stock, and a couple of minutes later it was updated to > 5. So I actually have two different screenshots uploaded to Telegram (encrypted platform so you can't actually edit the timestamps or files which makes them basically the most reliable sort of evidence there is).  EDIT5: Here's the first screenshot with the timestamp from Telegram: https://*drive.google.com*/file/d/12xOmRjdFuxH7N_ZsHUWDsMkVoON7d6J_/view?usp=sharingSecond one: https://*drive.google.com*/file/d/1RIHQ1CIb_2C33UmXGtJNzD-J4ndFkDnV/view?usp=sharingSee how the products in stock went from 3 to > 5? Moments later the webpage was updated again:https://*drive.google.com*/file/d/1YmdsRbQ9Y4fSVHnbiNdpJwKSKgP9wiYm/view?usp=sharing
Response: Dear Mr. Vuorelma,we have a few different status information on our website. We have "verf√ºgbar" (available) and "lagernd" (in stock). Only if its in stock we can guarantee a fast handling of your order. In case its just available we need to order the items. This can take 3-5 business days. In your case we couldn't get your graphics card anymore. We tried to order it from different suppliers, that is why you got different information when you contacted us. Sadly we cant order your desired item anymore and we took it out of our shop. The money you paid, will be transferred back to you through your payment method. We apologize for the inconvenience.Edit:The screenshot you provided doesn't have any timestamp. Also you ordert for a way lower price than its shown on the screenshot. Therefore we cannot accept it as valid and have to assume the screenshot is not from the time of your order. Also it can happen that our Website shows >5 items in stock, but at the same time we receive more than 5 orders.  Everything we can do in this case, we did also for you. We tried to order from other suppliers and we offered you alternative Products and you didn't take them. The next step is a cancellation and a refund.I can understand that you are upset, but we cant do magic and create new products out of nowhere.But I can't understand why you say we didn't offer you any other alternative product. We told you we can't offer you anything in the same price range, because there is no availability. We offered you different cards, which you didn't accepted. There is nothing more we can do.Also I would like to reinforce that we distance us from your malicious assumption, that we are engaging in illegal activities.  What you are doing here is nothing else than defamation without any proof.While I'm texting here my colleagues from customer support are reaching again out to you to offer you again an alternative. Edit2:Im really sorry but a timestemp in the filename we  cant accept as valid, since its way to easy to fake. Just for the future: Open the clock of your OS and than take a Screenshot, so everything (Date, Time, Item) is visible on the Screenshot and not just a part of it.We received the 30.07, the 06.08. the 08.08 and the 12.08  different deliverys of this product. All of them are associated to orders, that were made before your order. All the items went to the people who ordert it. And now we would like to ask you to stop your malicious assumptions, otherwise we are gonna take actions against that.Edit3:I never accused you of anything. I simply told you that a screenshot without timestamp is not a valid proof.In our cancellation e-mail it is written that we keep the cancellation for two days on hold, in case you want any other replacement product you can simply get in touch with us and chose another article. You answered to that E-Mail , but instead of asking for a replacement you wanted an explanation. That is totally understandable and of course we provided you an answer to your questions.  This answer is by the way also valid to all your further questions regarding our Stocks:There is a huge stock shortage. Not only on your desired product, but also on a lot of different other products. Most likely this is connected to the current political situation and the trade sanctions on Asian counties.  That is why we received on different dates different amounts of this specific product.Some days before your order we received 30 articles, some days 50. All of these articles were delivered to customers prior your order. After that we started to receive less and less articles. On the 06. August we received one time 4 articles and one time 9 articles. On other days we just received 1 article.In that moment that we receive articles in our warehouse they get scanned. In the time from scanning the articles from the arriving pallets  until they get further processed there is a little time frame in which they can show up on our website. As soon as they are processed they are of course not visible on the website anymore. Probably you just checked in exactly that time frame.Your accusation of "bait and switch" is invalid insofar as we do not refuse the delivery. A delivery is unfortunately simply not possible because there are no more articles on the market available for us.Since we kept receiving some articles it was not predictable that this article is gonna run out of stock.In case like that we are not obliged to provide you with any compensation or upgrade free of charge. Instead we offered you our Service Level Gold free of charge. I cant see why you speak about experience when you never tried the Service Level Gold.Kind regards,Your Mindfactory Service-Team

Title: Useless warranty?
Review: I have contacted Mindfactory for a solution for the horrid coil whine of my ASUS Strix Vega 64 which I bought about half year ago, after the faulty card was sent back, I waited for a month for the replacement. And the replacement I received has seriously damage on its heatsink, which is absolutely unacceptable. So I contacted the service and they agreed to get me a another replacement. After some time, I received a replacement with heavily used condition, but again with the unbearable coil whine. So I am starting to asking myself why would I contact them for the warranty case in the first place if it didn't solve any problem at all? I have to think twice before I ask them to make an exchange again which may cost me another month to wait and might not bring anything but anger.EDIT: 05.11.2019After I see the comment from Mindfactory, I have get in touch with their service team, now coil whine is not a reasonable complaint anymore! Ha! Nevermind, but I won't ever buy anything there!
Response: Dear Mr. Huang,of course getting a heavily used card with the same error is unacceptable. I would ask you to get in touch with my colleagues under reklamation@mindfactory.de and explain your situation. I'm sure they gonna find a solution.Kind regards,Your Mindfactory team

Title: Alles verlief super
Review: NaN
Response: Sehr geehrter Kunde,wir bedanken uns bei Ihnen f√ºr das positive Feedback und w√ºnschen Ihnen einen guten Start in die Woche.Mit freundlichen Gr√º√üenIhr Mindfactory Team

Title: Returns & customer support are unsatisfactory
Review: The prices might be seducing, but the customer care is absolutely lacking. Although most people are okay to talk to, their company policy makes them look extremely bad in my eyes. Bear in mind that I remained to be polite for the entire time.They closed down their tech departments' phone support and basically told me to google my problems with the full system I ordered or shoot them an E-Mail. Apparently replies take ages, so I looked into it myself. After hours of troubleshooting it turns out that one of my RAM sticks is faulty.Upon calling there again, I was redirected to the returns department and was informed that in order to get them replaced, I had to send back both sticks using my own money, effectively making my brand new computer unusable for at least a week and paying 30% of the broken sticks' price in shipping.Bonus: If you then tell them that you want your money back on the broken product, they ask you not to use the returns form altogether and send the product to them without their help.The people were calm at all times, if some a bit condescending, but the company policies are a joke. Save yourself the stress. My order might have saved me 10 bucks in comparison to other online retailers, but if that means spending money to return broken stuff and waiting longer for my system to work, I'd rather pass.Luckily my local electronics store has a similar RAM stick in stock. I'll make sure to avoid doing business with Mindfactory in the future.
Response: Dear Kevin Staudt,we regret to note that there was a defect and you were not satisfied with our reclamation service..Defective RAM Sticks must always be sent to us completely. A revocation can be made through our Returns Assistant. Please note that if a credit is requested it is a revocation and the return costs have to be borne by the customer. This can also be found in our terms and conditions.With best regards,Your Mindfactory-Team

Title: Too complicated registration process.
Review: I wasn't even able to register on their website. After 3 attempts it was still asking me to put 'appropriate' password.
Response: Dear Mr. Babiak,im sorry to hear that you had tgo face issues with our registration process. Our password requirements help to keep the accounts safe.
