Following rules are required for the password:At least 8 characters password lengthAt least one number from 0-9At least one letterAt least one special character(eg:! - _ ¬ß $% &? * + ~ # @ ‚Ç¨)Kind regards,Your Mindfactory-Team

Title: Really guys? How long does it take to reply to an email?
Review: Been emailing mindfactory team for a week about an order I placed and still not a single reply! I did order afew items and 2-3 hours after my order was paid items worth 350eu were removed from my order without a single explanation  and been asking the reason all this time.Update: The emails were sent to mindfactory.info and mindfactory management. Order no. 9605787Update: Still not a single reply.
Response: Dear customer,we actually answer emails as fast as we can. That you wait so long for an answer is very unusual. To which e-mail address did you send your request? We would like to have a look at the process. Can you provide us with your order number?

Title: Overall I'm really satisfied with this‚Ä¶
Review: Overall I'm really satisfied with this service. Fast shipping and nice prices. Many products to choose from. Website is nicely organised as well and communication is great and fast.My only cons are that they don't send items to Croatia even we are in EU (now for 6 years) and also if you have some warranty claims or/and returning items they can't send you back to Croatia, so you need to arrange shipping back to you somehow. Hope this will change soon.

Title: Solid shop, decent products, mediocre time management
Review: I've gone through several orders with mindfactory over the past couple of years and first I have to say I like that this shop has not only fixed pricing. They fluctuate on a daily basis representing the market. This is good for the costumer, since you can benefit from price drops directly. The product's quality has been to my full satisfaction, although I have to reprimand the slow processing of orders. If you choose instant money transfer, the items (all marked as available) will not ship for the next two days. Also, I have to disclaim that I never had to send back items so I am not aware of their refund policy and goodwill. All in all I can recommend this shop, since it features the lowest prices on the market, has excellent choice and a good store front.[Edit] You actually have the choice to buy yourself a much quicker processing for 30 [Edit: mistake, see answer below!] bucks, which is just shady and should not be the standard.[Edit2] Had my first experience with service. They forced me to downrate this shop from 4 to 3 stars. People on their service do not really provide adequate solutions, but in the end, if you follow their "suggestions" you are going to get what you are entitled to. But it is a bumpy road.----[ANSWER TO MINDFACTORY]---First of all, I felt okay ordering with you. I was not completely dissatisfied and I will be ordering again. As for your reserving ordered items only on money being wired to you: That only makes sense and is completely fine. No worries.You pointed out the 30‚Ç¨ speed delivery. Sorry for the price mistake, that should not have happened. I actually referred to the option of your employees speeding up processing for around five Euros. As a customer, I have the feeling that this means your service only really kicks in when you get an additional five Euros for an order. I just don't like this elitist system. Bottom line: You have a decent warehouse with potential to sort out your internal planning and customer relations. Product and price-wise you are top-notch! That's why 3/5. Hope I could help. Always trying to be fair.
Response: Dear Customer,we are sorry that you have not been satisfied with your order and our service.We would like to point out that in the case of prepaid orders, the items are only reserved for the customer when there is a receipt of payment and all items are sufficiently stocked.What exactly do you mean with a faster settlement for 30 ‚Ç¨. Do you mean an express delivery?With best regards,Your Mindfactory-Team

Title: Amazing customer service
Review: Amazing customer service, great pricing and fast shipping - what else could you want

Title: DISAPPOINTING SHOPPING EXPERIENCE
Review: -= DISAPPOINTING SHOPPING EXPERIENCE =-I made an order of Motherboard+CPU and my order got stuck because the motherboard got out of stock (but it was still in stock when i made the order)Also i paid 19% VAT  but the store refused to ship my order within EU because they said i needed a company Sales Tax ID.I gave them the Sales Tax ID of the company i work for but still they were refusing to ship my order with a silly excuse ( the company is not in my name )I never expected such a bad customer support from such a big tech store.
Response: Dear customer,We are very sorry that you are not satisfied with our service.Please tell us your customer number, so that we can look at the facts and help.With best wishes,Your Mindfactory team

Title: Great service
Review: Great service! I ordered all my pc components from this website and can't complain. the support answers your questions fast and they are helpful. The only negative thing that bothered me was the shipping costs. You have to pay 8,99‚Ç¨ for a delivery if its not exceeding 150‚Ç¨ and you are shopping at night from 0-6 am. Other companies can do this better.

Title: mediocre customer service, cannot deliver to different addresses than billing
Review: First of all, I wasn't allowed to order shipping to an address other than my billing address, which meant I had to wait at home to receive one of the packages (with components). I would have loved to ship it to my work address, as it would have been easy to receive, but unfortunately not. When the case arrived I wasn't home. The case was shipped back to them and now (a week later) they refuse to send it back. When I asked their customer service about it (via e-mail, the phone is usually disconnected), one person said they would send it back and the other said the next day that they received it and it would be refunded. UPDATE: OK, finally it arrived! Seems like everything is functional, updating review to 3 stars. I am still unable to make orders to deliver to a different address, despite their claim that it is only for the first order (-1 star). Also, the whole confusion with the customer service makes me really glad that everything is working, wouldn't want to have to suffer through the return process (-1).
Response: Dear Mr. HillWe are sorry that you were not satisfied by our customer service.¬†When you place your first order with us, you can only enter your actual billing address. If you order again you are free to change the shipping address to a different one.¬†According to our system and the responsible department, the case was sent to you again today, September 5th, 2018.¬†Again, we apologize and hope that you will receive the case this time.¬†With kind regards,Your Mindfactory-Team

Title: Great Service and Prices!
Review: I have been purchasing PC hardware from Mindfactory for nearly 2 years now.  I have never problem with their service, as they are very quick to process and dispatch my products.  If something is not available they have always been prompt to contacted me.Because of their great service, support and friendly team I will continue to be a loyal customer.  Let us not forget of their great prices on parts too!Thank you!

Title: Quick shipment
Review: I got my order after 2 days. Only 2 bad points though:  1- shipping is a bit expensive (above 8 euros no matter how much you pay) 2- I got the price of one article raised suddenly by 3 euros when ordering and didn't have any explanation but still less expensive than other websites
Response: Thank you for your positive rating.Our shipping costs are composed of many factors. Price fluctuations can occur because we work with daily updated prices. However, we are pleased that you are mostly satisfied with us and our service.Best regardsMindfactory

Title: Criticism is a ban
Review: After my recent review, I stumbled on their new RX 480 Red Dragon offer. While being in the shopping basket, I get a notice: "The price has gone up from 299 to 319‚Ç¨". That does a lot when ordering 4 units. Proof imgur com/a/gf7KOYet I continued ordering process and logged in. What do I see? I am unable order anything from them. So instead of taking the feedback and criticism they've deserved from the last issue I encountered (read the previous review), they actually banned me. Proof: imgur com/a/0BPOJLast time I was banned to participate, I was 7 and I was on a sandbox. This is getting hilarious.
Response: Dear Betro Hakala,thank you for your feedback.We are sorry, that you are not satisfied with our Service.Please notice, the delivery outside Germany is only possible with an customer VAT-ID. This is an inernal decision. We hope for your understanding.Unfortunately, you do not have a VAT ID.With best regards,Your Mindfactory-Team

Title: Very good service
Review: Very good service, including an RMA due to an error by myself, and fast delivery.

Title: Good selection and good prices.
Review: Good selection and good prices.Service and site are in german, so some times I need some google translation for success.Website isn't the easiest to navigate with. Search is quite slow.I've used them three times for full custom pc builds without problems. Only shipping costs prevent me using them more. For instance, I've bought the motherboard, cpu, gpu, rams and other smaller parts - all that fits in one parcel.. But buying display and pc case is no go, because each would be sent in additional parcel (doubling or tripling the shipping costs).I have had luck (?) with my orders - no wrong items, nor need to use warranties with them.I will buy from them again for sure.

Title: Quality.
Review: Cheap prices, good quality and fast delivery. Though the website could quite use an update...
Response: Dear Mr. Steegmans,thanks for your review.We are pleased to hear that you have been satisfied with your order and our service.For some time, our shop is also available in responsive design and offers an even more modern shopping experience.With best regardsYour Mindfactory-Team

Title: Order to Denmark
Review: Order to Denmark, everything went fast and smooth.I had to transfer money by bank account, but as soon as they arrived, my order was shipped, and I had it within 1-2 days.Very pleased with overall service, prices and products.Best,Gustav

Title: Great service, but refund took longer to arrive than expected.
Review: I had a mostly great experience with Mindfactory with the fairly substantial order I placed with them. The products arrived well packaged and I have been very happy with every item I received. They were also extremely accommodating to requests I had to change items in the order, right up until the morning before the order left their warehouse. However, I cancelled an item before the order was dispatched and was informed I would receive a refund after a few days. It was over three weeks until the refund got to my bank account.
Response: Dear Mr Ruston,Thank you for your feedback.We are pleased that you have been satisfied with your order.We would like to apologize expressly for the long waiting period, regarding the reimbursement of the difference.There seems to be a problem with the existing bank data. This prevented the reassignment from being performed correctly. I would ask you to communicate the bank data once to Buchhaltung@mindfactory.de. The colleagues will then make the re-transfer as soon as possible.WIth best regards,Your Mindfactory-Team

Title: Good but
Review: Excellent prices, good selection and a pretty good filtering system that helps you find what you want. Financing through Santander may prove useful although in the end it was too bureaucractic for such small amounts.Returns policy is not acceptable, with an 'up to ‚Ç¨80' charge. Rather pay more somewhere else in the knowledge you can send it back for the price of the postage.
Response: Dear Anthony,thank you for your feedback. If you want to use the 14-day right of revocation as a private person, you can return your order to us. To do this, you can use our return assistant. In the case of a return due to a revocation, 4,90 ‚Ç¨ will be charged. How do you come to 80 ‚Ç¨?If a product is defect, you can claim the warranty for 24 months and return the item free of charge to us via our return assistant.With best regardsYour Mindfactory-Team

Title: One of the best companies I've ordered ‚Ä¶
Review: One of the best companies I've ordered equipment from. The prices are some of the lowest in Europe and definitely lower than anything sold in Bulgaria. The shipment is fast, the reviews and the count of the sold products is very useful to find the popular components. Overall A+++.The only thing mindfactory can improve is to allow shipment to Bulgaria.

Title: Perfect company very serious,
Review: Perfect company very serious,Price very competitiveMounting perfectCommunication perfectShipping perfectI can recommend it without a doubtRegards

Title: Fluent trade
Review: I just bought products from them and am extremely satisfied. Deliveries in its time. The messages sent by me extremely fast and in a businesslike manner were answered. There is no complaining.

Title: Constantly delays of delivery date
Review: I ordered at 28/06 a gtx 1080 Zotac amp! Extreme edition and hours after my purchase they changed the shipping date from 30/06 to 15/07.I e-mailed the company but they didnt respond back only after i rate them here at trustpilot and they told me that my order will be ready to ship at 15/07.And today guess what? The shipping date gone from 15/07 to 29/07 without any notification from the company about the delay and the reason for, with that attitude and unsatisfied customers no company can grow their customer list.The conclusion is all yours--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Sorry but this answer does not cover me us a customer , this should be wtitten at your site and before the purchase and not after someone evaluate your company at a public site like this .The delivery dates it is your problem and not the customer.At least e-mail the customer with the problem, it is so simple
Response: Hello Georgios,unfortunately this situation is with most of the manufacturers and they are not holding the date. We therefore have to change it, everytime. We only get a few cards and send them directly to the preorders.

Title: Great customer service and ordering fixes! Fast delivery
Review: I recently ordered a full performance gaming PC from Mindfactory, and it was my first time ordering with them. I ordered roughly 2400 euros worth of equipment from them, all parts for a PC, the case and the monitor. The ordering process was a bit non-standard due to direct transfer through iBan based on invoicing, however I actually liked this part of the process!  Multiple times through the order I had to correct errors I had made on the order (wrong cpu and forgot to include a power supply in the original order). Each time I had corrections, they quickly responded, updated invoices, helped resolve payment differences due to increased order amounts, and everything was done quickly and kindly and they even translated into English during the email conversations.  I have to say that the whole experience was really fantastic and I can't be happier with everything I received. UPS service was effectively next day from Germany to the Netherlands, and the packaging was very safe and secure. I really can't say enough good things about Mindfactory! I would recommend this company to anyone looking to buy parts for high end performance gaming PC's.  I used google translate to translate the same post to German Ich bestellte vor kurzem eine vollst√§ndige Performance-Gaming-PC von Mindfactory, und es war mein erstes Mal mit ihnen bestellen. Ich bestellte rund 2400 ‚Ç¨ im Wert von Ausr√ºstung von ihnen, alle Teile f√ºr einen PC, der Fall und dem Monitor. Der Bestellvorgang war etwas Nicht-Standard durch direkte √úbertragung durch Iban auf Rechnungsstellung basiert, aber ich mochte diesen Teil des Prozesses! Mehrere Male durch die Bestellung musste ich Fehler korrigieren, ich in der Gr√∂√üenordnung gemacht hatte (falsche CPU und vergessen, eine Stromversorgung in der urspr√ºnglichen Reihenfolge enthalten). Jedes Mal, wenn ich Korrekturen hatte, sie reagierte schnell, aktualisiert Rechnungen, half Zahlungsdifferenzen aufgrund der erh√∂hten Auftragsmengen zu l√∂sen, und alles war schnell und freundlich getan und sie auch in Englisch in den E-Mail-Gespr√§che √ºbersetzt. Ich muss sagen, dass die ganze Erfahrung war wirklich fantastisch und ich kann nicht mit allem, was gl√ºcklicher sein, die ich erhielt. UPS Service war effektiv am n√§chsten Tag aus Deutschland in die Niederlande und die Verpackung war sehr sicher und sicher. Ich kann wirklich nicht sagen, genug gute Dinge √ºber Mindfactory! Ich w√ºrde diese Firma jedem empfehlen, der Teile f√ºr High-End-Performance-Gaming-PC zu kaufen.

Title: Still 5 stars!!!
Review: Fast shipping good packaging!!!!!
Response: Hello Roland,we're checking your case and are sure to be able to help you. We'll get back to you soon.It's your fault, since you opened a PayPal Case. The money is blocked until this is resolved.

Title: Very unhappy to have chosen Mindfactory
Review: I had originally left a glowing review for Mindfactory, but after my latest experience with them, I feel I should make you aware of their other side. I was ready to go with a purchase of a monitor (‚Ç¨272) and a DP to HDMI adapter (‚Ç¨10) and to my surprise, the website was charging me two delivery charges, both at ‚Ç¨30 each for each item.  So ‚Ç¨30 for shipping the monitor, kind of understandable, but not for a small adapter that's worth only ‚Ç¨10.  So thinking it's just an automated issue, I was sure they would agree with me.  But I suppose you can't give anyone the benefit of the doubt.  I'll leave the email thread here and let you decide for yourself.... Enjoy and happy shopping! ( Me ) Hi, I would like to purchase these two items from the Mindfactory website... *  27" (68,58cm) iiyama ProLite XUB2790HS-B1 schwarz 1920x1080 1xDVI / 1xHDMI 1.3 / 1xVGA - ‚Ç¨ 272.93 * Adapter Anschlusskabel Displayport Stecker auf 19pol HDMI Buchse Schwarz Ferritkern - ‚Ç¨ 10.90 However, the website is insisting on charging me ‚Ç¨60 for delivery.  If I remove the Displayport/HDMI adapter, the shipping reduces to ‚Ç¨30, which is what I expected.  I feel it's unfair to pay x3 times in shipping for something that's priced at ‚Ç¨10.  Also, the Displayport/HDMI is rather small in comparison to the monitor.  Can the shipping be changed to ‚Ç¨30 for both items?  ( Mindfactory ) thank you for your mail. Those two parts are stocked in differrent locations, so there is no way to send both together. Kind regards, Ihr Mindfactory Sales Team  ( Me ) Dear Sales Team, Thank you for responding.  However your response is not helpful nor what I inquired about.  My query is about the shipping price, not where the items are stocked.  And why should it matter to me where these items are located?  And are you trying to tell me, indirectly, that you feel it is acceptable to charge ‚Ç¨30 shipping for a ‚Ç¨10 product? I have to say, I am shocked at your unhelpful response.  So I will ask once again, can you send both items for ‚Ç¨30?  If not, I am more than happy to take my business elsewhere, and I have no problem posting my disgust online.  ( Mindfactory ) We do not charge 30 Euro for a 10 Euro product.We charge 30 Euro for a shippment into a foreign country for each packet  we have to send.We can not put both articles in one Package. It is simply not possible.I regret, that I can't tell you anything else, but there is nothing shocking about that to me.Please feel free to post the truth online, there is nothing wrong about it. Kind regards  ( Me ) Actually, I said I was shocked at your unhelpful response, and you have just proved that again a hundred times over.  You even go so far as to contradict yourself.  "We don't charge ‚Ç¨30.... We change ‚Ç¨30".  I know for a fact that it would not cost ‚Ç¨30 to ship a small adapter to another EU country. Oh well, try and have a nice weekend.  You're clearly having a bad day, which is a shame since it's only 10:22 in the morning. I'll shop elsewhere. ** UPDATE (05/Oct/2015) **To further clarify Mindfactory's response, since I can't reply to it directly, I never said that I found the 2x ‚Ç¨30 shipping to be "great value" with my one and only order.  In proportion to the cost of my order, which was ‚Ç¨1230, the shipping charge amounted to 5% of my order.  In contrast, Mindfactory are now asking me to pay a delivery charge that is 300% the cost of a small adapter. And no, I did not know I would be charged two delivery's prior to ordering. When the website calculated two delivery charges, I was genuinly surprised.  So I decided I would contact Mindfactory to find a better resolution.  I foolishly thought Mindfactory would have the courtesy and good-manners to deal with their customers in a professional manner.  How wrong was I!!  They have labelled my reasoning as "incomprehensible", while admitting that the shipping charge is "not a good deal". Mindfactory pose this question, "Of course it's not a great deal if you order one part for 10‚Ç¨, but what does that have to do with the possibilities?".  Let me hand-hold Mindfactory as I guide them through a world they're obviously not familiar with.  Good/fair/respectful customer service. Here is just one solution...1. Customer inquires about shipping rate being too high.2. Mindfactory should reply back stating that they absolutely agree that ‚Ç¨30 shipping is an outrageous price to pay for a ‚Ç¨10 item.  Mindfactory should of course organise a better rate with their courier, or even propose to send the item by post, or best yet, find a way to package the small item with the computer monitor for free.  You know, cause that's what helpful retailers do.  They look for solutions.3. Customer is happy that Mindfactory offered to resolve the issue in a helpful and courteous way.  Everyone is happy and Mindfactory retains a happy customer. So there you have it.  That was the other possibility Mindfactory could have chosen.  That really isn't rocket science.  That is in fact the basics of all trade.  If Mindfactory can't see that, and is more than happy to see negative reviews and loss of customers, then what can I say but good riddance.  Now that's incomprehensible!
Response: Hello David,what's so difficult to understand? Monitors are in Warehouse 1 and small computer parts are in Warehouse 2. They each ship seperately. Of course it's not a great deal if you order one part for 10‚Ç¨, but what does that have to do with the possibilities? We still have to ship each package from each warehouse seperately. When you ordered in May it didn't bother you, because you ordered more pieces and found a great value even with 2x 30‚Ç¨ shipping. You already knew about the shipping in 2 packages and still you react like this because of a 10‚Ç¨ part. Sorry, but that's incomprehensible.UPDATE: If there was a possibility, don't you think, we would have offered it to you? It is, as my colleagues already told you. Two different warehouses, two times shipping, just like declared in our shop. If it's not acceptable for you, we're sorry, but we can't help you then.

USP driver got to my place 4 times, knocking our downstairs doors, not knowing we have a buzzer at street level, and couldn't give us the package, because we didnt know he was there. What I had to do was contact USP customerservices after a while, not getting the package, and  find out about the problems not getting contact. Then I had to drive 50km to the USP storage facilities.  MARK YOUR GOD DAMN PACKAGES BETTER FFS!
Response: Hello Henri,thank you for the review. Usually a phone number is not necessary, that's why we don't put it on there. Sorry for the inconvenience.

Title: Horrible - delivered "checked" screen with dead pixels, wont refund!
Review: Bought a Dell U2715H and paid for their "Pixelpr√ºfung" option as i need a pixel perfect screen for my work. Received screen with at least two dead pixels (stopped looking after that). Asked for a full refund including shipping costs as is a consumers right in this case in accordance with the EU conumer legislation. They refuse not only to refund any shipping (neither original nor return) but also refuse to refund their pixel check service saying they dont take refunds as it was performed. So basically they wont refund a paid service on which they didnt deliver. I am now forced to file a report with the ECC. Stay far away from this store!
Response: Hello Alex,we're sorry about the inconvenience. A replacement or repair would be free of charge, but if you choose to cancel the order you have accepted those terms and have to send in at your own cost. The service was also performed and cannot be refunded in a case of cancellation.

Title: Swift an easy delivery
Review: Swift an easy delivery!

Title: Could be close to perfect, but...
Review: Ordering parts for a new computer build was rather easy, even as a foreign buyer, and almost everything was in stock at the time of ordering, except the GPU which was fine since it should be in a couple of days (a choice to have the site displayed in english would be great but it's not a major problem). However the GPU was delayed with another couple of days three times until mindfactory finally send me a mail stating that they honestly didnt know when the GPU would get in stock (estimated 2-3 weeks). It reminds me of flightcompanies that tend to make flight delays ongoingly display as being only 20-30 min. just to make another 'new' delay - in order for people not to wander off from the gate. In this case, to make sure customers doesn't take their business elsewhere.   I contacted mindfactory and asked if they could do a sepperate dispatch free of charge, with all the other parts so i could begin loading software onto the system. They replied that it would cost me yet another 30EU, and having allready payed 2x30EU in shipment cost (because they send chassis' from the another warhouse) I would have found it to be good customer care just to dispatch free of charge. They do however make quick replies to mails.  When i decided to cancel the GPU from the order, 9 days after ordering when i finally got the honest answer, then suddenly the memory wasn't in stock (which they were at the time of ordering). It didn't take mindfactory longer than another day to get the memory back in stock, it just befuddles me that the items isn't reserved for the ones who've waited the longest.     When they had everything in stock (excepts the cancelled GPU), after ten days, the packing and dispatch went rather quickly. I did take DHL another 5 days to get the package from Germany to Denmark, which I'd say to be on the slower side. The package arrived in good shape, and everything (again except the GPU) was there and in working order. Being a foreigner i had to pay in advance, so I was a bit anxious to cancel the GPU but the difference was repaid to my account quickly. On a side note: be aware that the contact number isn't a freecall number (at least not as a foreigner).   All this being said, I wouldn't hesitate to make another purchase at mindfactory, simply because of the very low pricepoint and the fact that the items did eventually make it to my doorstep in good shape. But the next time, I be sure not to make and order within 14 days to a major game release, since this isn't sure to be enough time for mindfactory to handle.
Response: Hello Bo,thanks for the great feedback, but please bear in mind that almost no one was able to ship those cards. All manufacturers were surprised by the demand.Greetings to Denmark!

Items were packed well, box filling done with the recyclable HDPE-airpads.  This was first order for me, but I had no fears because of Mindfactory answered fairly quickly to my questions. They also kept me updated with order status ( when receiving the payment, when shipping the order and delivery tracking by DHL ). This was not the last purchase from this store, thanks!! ;)

Title: Worst experience ever
Review: Before I start, I'll simply say I purchased twice from mindfactory before this happened, and although both orders weren't very quickly delivered, it was due to my personal choices of items not always available in store. However, this third order is the second worst e-shopping experience I've ever had, the first being an internet scam (from which I recovered my money using legalese against the payment processing company). a) I wasn't contacted or kept up to date when the shipment was delayed (it was due 14/11 and I got the information after phone calls on the 16/11) b) I had to chase after people to finally get the info that mindfactory couldn't put a date on that delivery, and that there would be further delays c) I had to chase after people to finally get my order cancelled (no kidding, I sent an e-mail and I still had to phone twice.) d) Further delays from mindfactory asking me for my bank details which they obviously already had e) And now I'm chasing around because somehow that money still isn't back in my bank account (5 days and a pissed off customer of mine later). Really disappointing. I'll update as resolution comes - for now its a -(over 9000) stars at least.

Title: Great & Cheap
Review: Ordering was pretty clear eventhou im not a german, translations worked fine for this site.  Delivery took its time but i cant blame them for that.  Overall i got what i wanted, might have taken some time but everything was okay in my packet and got the stuff i ordered. Recommended for sure, the prices are soo cheap compared to Finland's hardware selling sites. Thank you mindfactory!

Title: Good service, slow delivery
Review: I ordered on 30.7. I changed the order a bit on 31.7 by email and got response quickly and was also asked for my bank details for a refund. All the items were ready in stock on 4.8 and the packet was sent the same day. I got the package on 9.8, I think the delivery is bit slow. The items were right and packed with protection. Using Mindfactory is bit of a problem because the website does not have a translation for English and I don't know German. I use Chrome to automatically translate the site. All the automatic emails you get are also in German but the customer service speaks English (email at least). NOTICE: At first Mindfactory email got caught in the spam folder until I marked them as non-spam and the filter learned to not filter them. Overall I'm satisfied with Mindfactory, its cheap and service is good. They could do better with delivery abroad and website translation.

Title: Great service
Review: Good price, great service and very helpfull. One of the items I wanted was out of stock (I was aware of it while ordering) and I had to wait for it. Meanwhile I placed a second order and asked for it to be "merged" with the first one.This was not a problem and,because no aditional packaging was requiered, I even the second order's transport fee back. The only reason I do not give 5 stars is: international transport.Altough the site says DHL it is in fact Deutsche Post (DP), apparenty DHL and DP are the same company in germany.Due to this fact, delivery took a long time to Portugal (almost 7 weekdays) and was totaly untraceable between Germany and Portugal. If the change to full DHL service or use another company for international delivery (GLS works great). If I could, I would rate them 4.75

Title: I ordered a Gregory Kalmia 50L backpack‚Ä¶
Review: Edited* I ordered a Gregory Kalmia 50L backpack from Alternate. The package was delivered in a speedy manner, BUT the item was wrong. Called the customer service hotline, the person was very helpful and the correct item was sent and receives around 2 weeks later. Wasn't able to get the backpack on time but, overall the issue was resolved smoothly. Thank you very much!
Response: Dear Customer,Thank you for your feedback.Unfortunately, it is unavoidable to always send out the right item, as errors in logistics or other processes can happen at any time. Of course, we understand your dissatisfaction with the process and the associated waiting time. The mail you sent has reached us and is currently still being processed by our colleagues. You can also expect a response here, but we ask for your patience. Our colleagues will inform you in the e-mail about the next steps.We apologise for the inconvenience and ask for your understanding.With kind regardsYour ALTERNATE-Team

Title: Fast, reliable and good customer support
Review: Used alternate for several deliveries over the past years, always 1 or 2 day delivery. I'm living in a city at the moment and it's always been 1 day delivery time here. Back when I used to live in a small town in a rural area it sometimes took 2 days delivery time.Customer support is really fast and never had any issues with it. Though I only needed to contact them once so far (because of my mistake) and my brother only needed to contact them once so far as well. A cheap USB stick he ordered as a part of a bigger delivery wasn't working. He received another one the day after messing customer support about it. So there's not many experiences this opinion is based on.
Response: Hello O.S.,thank you very much for your very good review.We are pleased to read that you have already ordered from us several times and the deliveries were always fast with you. We are glad that our customer support was able to help you immediately and solve your problem and that you were very satisfied with it.With kind regardsYour Alternate Team

Title: They immediately issued my order
Review: They immediately issued my order, everything was perfect. I just hope that can update the tracking info instantly (it would be perfect then)

Title: Miserable service, waste of time and money
Review: Giving one star since zero is not possible. Took them 4 weeks to process my complaint about RAM module that was malfunctioning (screenshots of memtest results were submitted) and caused my PC to crash. No response from customer service, nothing to indicate if they will refund the module or send a new one, leaving me with my non functional PC. Finally the complaint is closed, they sent me the modules back, stating ‚Äòmemtests pass‚Äô. Never buying anything from them again. I will make sure my company removes them from the supplier list.

Title: Stay away if you're not from Germany
Review: If you're not from Germany and expect them to provide you with warranty, forget about it.They don't even bother answering their support emails.Would not recommend for people ordering from outside of Germany.Update 02/02/2024 - The initial email towards Alternate was sent on 03/01/2024, this review was posted on 15/01/2024 and they replied to the initial email on 17/01/2024. As mentioned in Alternate's Trustpilot reply from 26/01/2024, I have sent an email to Alternate's Trustpilot email address (on 27/01/2024) attaching both the previous email sent towards the ASUS Service Center, where they told me to contact the seller (Alternate) directly and another email sent towards Alternate (where they asked me for my address to forward towards ASUS). I have not gotten any conclusive reply yet. The warranty expires on 25/02/2024.
Response: Dear TommyMadFlavor,We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience you have experienced with our service, especially regarding warranty support for customers outside of Germany. It's disheartening to hear that your support emails have gone unanswered.Ensuring a positive experience for all our customers, regardless of their location, is of utmost importance to us. We take your feedback seriously and will investigate the communication issues with our support team to address and rectify any lapses in our service.We understand the frustration you must feel, and we want to assure you that your concerns are not taken lightly. We value your business and are committed to providing a better experience for our international customers.If you have specific details or order information you'd like us to review, please reach out to us directly at trustpilot@alternate.de so that we can further investigate and address your concerns. Your satisfaction is our priority, and we appreciate your feedback as it helps us improve our services.Once again, we apologize for any inconvenience you've encountered, and we hope you will consider giving us another chance to demonstrate the high standards we aim to achieve.Best regards,Your Alternate Customer Service

Title: More than 8 weeks after payment no package or money back

I cannot recommend that store. The customer service is non-existing.

Title: Right of withdrawal not applied
Review: DHL was not able to deliver a 250eur package because I was working and put It instead in a pick up station. I didn't have time to pick It up. As a consequence, DHL sent It back to Alternate. But It's been half a month that DHL sent the package back to Alternate but I have not been refunded, while Alternate must have received the package.As most of the people reviewing Alternate with a 1-star comment, the support does not answer your questions as soon as they received their money and that you cannot do anything.

Title: Waste of time
Review: I ordered a BtO Computer on the 23.05.23. The aproximate Delivery Date was set on the 21-22 of June.I called the Hotline multiple Times getting told to wait another week only to wait and have nothing.The Hotline is annoying and takes long to wait in. you can expect at the least to wait for at least 15 min before getting to an actual Human, which then promptly redirects your call to the right department, because the system is so badly designed, that you cant even navigate to the understaffed department.The Webpage is another shitshow on its own, They changed their ordernumber system, so i got two orders one day for the same computer, without a disclaimer. It showed up a few days later. The Order-status tells you nothing for the month of waiting, and the box in which they tell you they will email you or alert you if there will be delays is a flat out lie.To conclude, i do not recommend using this shop to order a computer. Don't waste your Time and money on these People.

Title: I've been using Alternate for 10 years
Review: RMA: 386641174I've been using Alternate for 10 years. I bought 2 PCs and parts from them.A power source, hard drive, and case broke recently. I sent back the parts for warranty inspection, they got there 2 weeks ago. I've been trying to call and find out the status for a week now. The customer service is TERRIBLE. Can't get through to them by phone, have to wait for more than 90mins to talk to someone, just to hear that it will be 3 weeks or more before they do the inspection or send back new parts.I will NEVER again use Alternate. I have never seen service this bad, and it's clear from the other reviews, that this is normal for Alternate.

Title: Kundenservice anwortet gar nicht, trotz 3 fachem Nachhaken
Review: 12.6.2023The support responded 7.6.2023, that I should have some more patience and they might enter the UPS Package receipt into the system soon. To be sure everyone knows that is 3 weeks after sending th part back for exchange. Of course it was only a promise - nothing happened and the status is still that alternate pretends that they didn't receive anything back. 3 WEEKS AFTER SENDING IT BACK WITH UPS ! It's really unbelievable how bad customer support is at alternate. 7.6.2023I bought a Gaming Computer for my Son's Birthday and one pf the part had to be sent back. Nothing happened for several weeks. No response at all. I opened 3 tickets as a follow-up. Still no response. Unbelievable how Alternate treats customer ! I bought the damaged part now at Amazon and will sent everything back.

Review: If you want to buy a product and like a company that doesn't care about the customer or provide assistance when there is a problem I recommend Alternate. Title: They don‚Äôt return money!scammers and thieves! Technical support 0. A lot of bugs when paying!
Review: On 24.05 I bought a samsung monitor. at the last stage of payment there was a payment error paypal. i thought that the payment will not go through because of the error. i ordered from another site. all went well. i went to paipal and saw two payments for the monitor on different sites. i immediately wrote to alternate.de and asked to cancel my order and shipping. they said that they cannot cancel the order and i need to get the TV and send it back. 04/27 I sent the TV back and filled out all the forms! I sent all the return information to alternate.de. 11.05 the monitor came to my house! alternate.de does not respond to my emails! i don't want the monitor and i want to send it back! i want my money back! i am tired of waiting!Am 24.05 habe ich einen Samsung Monitor gekauft. Bei der letzten Zahlungsstufe ist bei Paypal ein Zahlungsfehler aufgetreten. Ich dachte, dass die Zahlung aufgrund des Fehlers nicht durchgef√ºhrt werden kann. Ich habe auf einer anderen Website bestellt. alles ist gut gegangen. Ich ging zu Paipal und sah zwei Zahlungen f√ºr den Monitor auf verschiedenen Websites. Ich habe sofort Alternate.de angeschrieben und darum gebeten, meine Bestellung und den Versand zu stornieren. Sie sagten, dass sie die Bestellung nicht stornieren k√∂nnen und ich den Fernseher holen und zur√ºckschicken muss. 27.04. Ich habe den Fernseher zur√ºckgeschickt und alle Formulare ausgef√ºllt! Alle R√ºcksendeinformationen habe ich an alternative.de gesendet. 11.05 Uhr kam der Monitor zu mir nach Hause! alternative.de antwortet nicht auf meine E-Mails! Ich m√∂chte den Monitor nicht und m√∂chte ihn zur√ºckschicken! Ich will mein Geld zur√ºck! Ich habe das Warten satt!
Response: Hallo Irina Sperber,vielen Dank f√ºr Ihr Feedback, und es tut uns leid, von den Schwierigkeiten zu h√∂ren, die Sie mit Ihrer Bestellung und dem Kundenservice hatten. Wir entschuldigen uns aufrichtig f√ºr die entstandenen Unannehmlichkeiten.Wir bedauern auch, dass Sie keine Antwort auf Ihre E-Mails erhalten haben. Unser Kundenservice sollte Ihnen in dieser Angelegenheit behilflich sein und Ihnen die entsprechenden R√ºcksendeinformationen zur Verf√ºgung stellen. Wir werden sicherstellen, dass Ihre Anfrage schnellstm√∂glich bearbeitet wird, und wir werden unsere internen Prozesse √ºberpr√ºfen, um sicherzustellen, dass solche Situationen in Zukunft vermieden werden.Sie haben uns leider einen Monitor eingeschickt, den Sie nicht von uns bezogen haben, wahrscheinlich haben Sie den Monitor den Sie auf der anderen Webseite bestellt haben zu uns geschickt. Dies konnten wir feststellen weil die Seriennummer auf dem Ger√§t und auf der Rechnung nicht √ºbereinstimmen. Aus diesem Grund haben wir Ihnen den Monitor wieder zur√ºck geschickt.Wir haben Ihnen nochmal eine Reklamation f√ºr einen Widerruf angelegt und Ihnen die Unterlagen per Mail zukommen lassen. Bitte vergleichen Sie die Seriennummer auf dem Ger√§t und auf Ihrer Rechnung damit Sie diesmal den richtigen einsenden.Wir entschuldigen uns erneut f√ºr die entstandenen Unannehmlichkeiten und bedanken uns f√ºr Ihr Verst√§ndnis. Wir werden alles tun, um das Problem zu l√∂sen und Ihr Vertrauen zur√ºckzugewinnen.Mit freundlichen Gr√º√üen,Ihr Alternate-Team

Title: Terrible Experience.
Review: It's being an horrible experience. I bought a full PC gamer by parts, spent almost 1,5 thousand euros, and still don't have all my parts after 2 weeks. Tried to cancel the order, was IMPOSSIBLE. They say that you can be supported in English, the costumer support HANG UP on me more than once, refusing to speak in English (even that they were understanding me perfectly). Lied to me many times that would send me an e-mail about my missing parts, never did, lied to me that I would get my parts in the other day, never received to this day! My wife that is German steps in to help, they keep saying to her that will arrive till Friday, till Wednesday, un till the end of the week, but it never NEVER gets delivered.

Title: My first expierence with Alternate.
Review: On the 6th of May, 2023 (a week after this review has been written) I ordered a gaming notebook from there. The price of this notebook has been reduced from 999‚Ç¨ to 699‚Ç¨. After 3 Business days (on a Wednesday) (Sundays do not count as Business days) it arrived. The product seemed to be new, as they stated on their Website. They also included the Day it would arrive at, which were Tuesday-Wednesday.The specs also matched with the ones that were listed on their Website. In case you wanna know them:Name of product:HP Victus 15-fa-0055ngComponents:RTX 3050i5-12450h8GB RAM512SSD Edit: I changed the RAM and SSD, for the RAM I went for the Crucial 3200Mhz CL22 Dual Kit (SO-DIMM, as those are specifically made for motherboards that are installed on notebooks)For the SSD I went for the Lexar NM790 2TB (M.2, Nvme)Display:9ms response time (Not sure if that's true, as I don't see a huge difference with my 0.5ms monitor for my desktop. I got this information from other sources, so that may be wrong.)IPS Panel144Hzforgot the rest of it So far everything is good. Now I do not know how their customer service is, however once I have the need to call them, I will update this review and include my experience with them. But for now that's it. I received my product and it arrived at the days that were stated on their Website. The product also arrived at perfect conditions and the specs matched.That's what matters the most.Update (for the notebook itself): In case you're curious about the amount of RAM/SSD slots, you can replace the 8GB default RAM with SODIMM sticks, 2 in total. The RAM sticks that come pre-installed are 2 4GB sticks.And for the SSD, there's one slot for it, I replaced the default 512GB SSD with a 2TB SSD and it works without a flaw.The wifi card that's installed also seems to be fast, reaching between 43-51MB/s download and around 11MB/s upload. (Connected to wifi, there's no Ethernet cable plugged in)Meanwhile my PC, which has an Ethernet cable plugged in reaches 48-53MB/s download and around 12MB/s upload.
Response: Hello Selcuk Kisla,Thank you for your review and feedback! We're glad to hear that you had a positive experience with your recent purchase of the HP Victus 15-fa-0055ng gaming notebook from our store.We strive to provide accurate product information and deliver items in a timely manner, so we're pleased that the notebook arrived within the specified timeframe and met your expectations in terms of condition and specifications. It's great to know that the components and features matched what was listed on our website.We understand that customer service is an important aspect of the overall experience, and we aim to provide excellent support should you ever need to contact us. If you do have any questions or require assistance in the future, please don't hesitate to reach out to our customer service team. We value your feedback and will continue working to ensure that our customers receive the best service possible.Thank you for choosing our store, and we look forward to serving you again in the future. If you have any further updates or additional feedback, please feel free to share it with us.Best regardsYour Alternate-Team

Back when I used to live in a small town in a rural area it sometimes took 2 days delivery time.Customer support is really fast and never had any issues with it. Though I only needed to contact them once so far (because of my mistake) and my brother only needed to contact them once so far as well. A cheap USB stick he ordered as a part of a bigger delivery wasn't working. He received another one the day after messing customer support about it. So there's not many experiences this opinion is based on.

Title: Ordered a computer monitor which I‚Ä¶
Review: Ordered a computer monitor which I needed before the long weekend ahead, and alternate.de showed it was available for delivery. I'd never ordered from them before and am happy to support websites other than amazon.de But then suddenly an email came that the delivery date was now unknown and it provided NO further info (very unhelpful email). I called their hotline and the person on the phone confirmed they didn't have the product to ship and no idea when it would be available. So the problem is their website doesn't seem to be properly updating the stock on hand which leads to very poor experiences for shoppers like me. And now I've missed the chance to receive this product from any other retailer by the time window I had. Doubtful I'll ever purchase from them again.Edit: I prefer not to share my personal information here naturally, but as I wrote, I did speak directly to your customer service on a call and shared with them my experience and what in my view should be fixed. For record the product was AOC AGON AG493UCX2. Platforms like this one sometimes are the only way to ensure others are aware of the bad experiences to avoid and hopefully drive incentive for the retailers to make the necessary improvements.
Response: Hello Joe,Thank you very much for your feedback.Unfortunately, you did not provide any customer specific information so we cannot review your order to see what exactly you were shown and possibly find the error and improve our homepage.You are welcome to send us an email with your customer or order number to trustpilot@alternate.de so we can check everything.We apologize for the inconvenience caused.With kind regardsYour Alternate Team

Title: How long does it take to get a PC?
Review: I unfortunately cannot recommend ALTERNATE.deI have ordered my PC on the 30.01.23, received a faulty computer, late. The build was also questionable, with the CPU radiator not sitting a 90 degree angle and the extra fan installed in the wrong place. Last week, on the 8th of March, I was told the faulty equipment had been identified and replaced. That the PC was being tested over night to make sure all was well. But I am still waiting... It is now the 13th of March, and still no communication from ALTERNATE. There was no apologies, offer of compensation, or show of concern for the delay or the build quality.Edit: The repaired computer was received on Thursday 16.03.23. The CPU, Motherboard, RAM, and Power supplies were replaced. Seems strange that they sent out the PC in that state in the first place. Unfortunately, the GPU is also faulty, giving an Error 43 (it wasn¬¥t the drivers). Alternate asked me to send back the GPU, and are sending a new one as we speak 21.03.23.Edit 2: GPU arrived on the 23.03.23. The PC finally works. That was quite an ordeal, not sure what to say.
Response: Hello Joe,thank you very much for your feedback.After consultation with our colleagues, everything was properly checked and executed.According to the service department, your PC should be shipped tomorrow and arrive in the next few working days. We therefore ask for your patience.We also apologize for the inconvenience caused and hope to welcome you back soon.Yours SincerelyAlternate-Team

Title: I highly suggest skipping this site
Review: I highly suggest skipping this site. The product comes yes, but in my case i had a 7900x cpu which i had to wait for all my parts to arrive and the motherboard i first got had bent pins and i still tried using the motherboard to see if it could post and i could not get it to post, no biggie i sent it back and ordered another motherboard and when it arrived i then also tried with the cpu i bought from Alternate and i only kept getting messages of new cpu installed with every boot, i swapped out all parts, tried bios flash as well and nothing fixed the issue so i contacted alternate and had to wait and wait for ressponses. I finally got them to answer by reporting the case to paypal and the company finally answered with sending me a return labell and now has been over a week in which they had the cpu and still no answer from them. Avoid this site as they sell broken items and their customer service iss really really horrible. The cpu has now been returned to me with papers saying it passed their tests, the cpu was filthy and had thermal paste everywhere which i had to clean up as well and am stuck with a non working cpu. Ripoff scammers

Title: borderline illegal practice
Review: Order placed when there was 2 TV‚Äôs left in stock according to website.Alternate Took payment of ‚Ç¨1,300.They sent me an email a day later (after black friday deals were over) that the order would be delayed 5 days.5 days later - after cyberweek ended - Alrernate informs me the order will now be 3 weeks delayed. So Alternate has taken my money, and prevented me from buying elsewhere while the prices were at their lowest, and clearly don‚Äôt have my product - thus forcing me to either pay ‚Ç¨400 more, or accept their shady/illegal business practices.after a 20 minute call with customer service, they can‚Äôt even provide a 10 or 20% discount. Instead I will have to live without a TV in December in my new apartment.By drip-feeding the order delays, they have essentially kept me captive. The customer service rep said it wasn‚Äôt illegal because i could have my money refunded - but that‚Äôs in this case the equivalent of losing ‚Ç¨400.Of course, if theres a repeated pattern of taking customers money, and selling them products they don‚Äôt have in stock, until the manufacturer sells the stock cheaper again, this would be illegal and likely investigated by a public litigator/regulator.Although it‚Äôs not illegal in this case on its own, the behavior is still borderline fraudulent and they‚Äôre operating in shady territory.I would avoid this company and go with a more reputable competitor - these guys will likely not change their behavior until they get fined/audited.
Response: Dear Customer,thank you very much for the feedback. We are very sorry that you have problems with your order and would like to apologize for the inconvenience caused. Unfortunately, we can never 100% guarantee the delivery dates that we receive from our suppliers and manufacturers. Please note that the purchases you made were offers and we cannot give any further discounts on them.  We ask for your understanding and offer you to look for an available alternative, which is available immediately. You are welcome to contact us at any time for this purpose.With kind regardsYour ALTERNATE-Team

Title: Horrible and not recommended
Review: This is most horrible website ive used in my life. First if you are outside of Germany you are treated like a trash. Exactly like a trash. First ordering from this website you need to exchange 4-5 emails to get order approved. They convert German prices to your country prices. They dont have automatic system for this which is hilarious (Its 2022 we are not in 2000 era where online shopping started to grow). Their live chat facebook and twitter support is useless. They have only one guy working on outside of EU orders. I feel bad for him because he is working alone on so many orders (approving). I did 3 orders on this website. In one order there is a cashback voucher for asus motherboards. You get 125 euros gamesplanet.de voucher to buy games. They dont want to give me because im not in Germany (probably their employee will use it for his kids or for himself). First of all if i cannot use it i would give it to my friend in Germany as a gift. In second order they sent me wrong items. Website description for this product is wrong. Now im in return process they say they didnt get anything from me. I have proof of delivery from trans o flex company. They received item 10.10.2022 in their shop. Then in facebook messages they lied to me that they never received item. I will probably open paypal dispute and ask for money back at the end of this week. I have proof of delivery. They hold 930 euros for this order. Also they dont know how to speak english on phone calls. So i asked my friend to speak german to get information and order approved.TLDR: IF YOU ARE OUTSIDE OF GERMANY DONT USE THIS SHOP!-No refund for 930 euros-No cashback/gamesplanet voucher for 125 euros
Response: Dear Customer,thank you very much for your honest criticism and evaluation.First and foremost, we would like to apologize for the fact that the ordering process is somewhat more cumbersome.Since we unfortunately do not have our own webshop for your country, manual processing is necessary here.The price differences you mentioned are usually borne by individual manufacturers, in which we receive subsidies for their articles.However, we receive these subsidies under special conditions which we cannot circumvent. In this case only for sales within Germany.In the case of a sale outside of these specifications, we must bear the normal costs for an article in the purchase and can then unfortunately not offer or distribute them below the actual purchase price.If you subtract the subsidies of the manufacturers, the prices are identical except for different VAT calculation.If you are interested in the prices, promotions or coupons listed in our German webshop, you need a delivery address within Germany. However, you have to take care of the further transport to your desired destination country yourself.The return you mentioned was also processed by us with a withdrawal, that is, the amount you paid will be refunded to you.We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

Title: Really bad support
Review: Not following and respecting your European consumer laws and rights, there is a chance they will refuse to pay for shipping costs for defective goods back to Germany if you are not located there. Despite having great deals I really don't see myself ordering from there again after this.
Response: Dear customer,we are apologizing that we can't offer you the experience that you were looking for and excusing the trouble. Your request is currently being clarified and our colleagues will give you feedback as soon as possible in order to find a solution. We apologise again for the inconvenience and hope to find a positive solution.With kind regardsYour ALTERNATE Team

After I received that packet the status was "order complete". However, you should all receive the shipment numbers by e-mail.We are sorry that there was confusion here, but hope that the packages have all arrived.With kind regardsYour Alternate Team

Title: Think twice
Review: I have shopped at alternate a few times. last time the product arrived with damage, it happens. But after experiencing alternate's customer service, I will probably think twice before doing it again. I think the will is there to help. but the skills are not.I have bought an assortment organizer where the pins that hold the drawers in place are missing for one drawer. I send a picture of that with the complaint. The first message is that they want a picture of the damage which I have already sent. I sent the picture one more time, after which they notify the manufacturer. so far so good. I then receive a package from alternate, in which there are two new drawers, it surprises me, so I contact alternate again and am informed that I have received the drawers I have complained about! I just haven't done that, I've advertised over the frame. so now I'm still left with a broken organizer and two extra drawers.It must be the height of incompetence. I would recommend others to think twice before shopping there, the price may be reasonable, but it could end up being expensive.
Response: K√¶re kunde,Vi er meget kede af, at du har haft en negativ oplevelse med klagebehandlingen.P√• billederne s√• det ud til, at der manglede to skuffer til hylden, s√• vi havde startet en foresp√∏rgsel om tilbeh√∏r hos producenten.Kollegaen havde allerede svaret p√• din sidste e-mail i dag, at vi ville udarbejde en komplet klageprocedure. Vi beder dig venligst om at besvare denne billet.Med venlig hilsenDit suppleanthold

Title: The WORST company we ever dealt with in‚Ä¶
Review: The WORST company we ever dealt with in the last 15 years in this industry. We paid 4242,84 euro for an order on the 26th of May. They sent the wrong item worth 150 euro and requested to send it back. No exchange was possible because they no longer had the products requested in stock. Luckly we paid via Paypal so we will escalate the claim to a dispute as this seems to be the only way to get the money back from Alternate. We will also open a claim with the European Commission and report the incident on all platforms. ABSOLUTELY THE WORST !!!

Well deserver 1 star, don't recommend shopping here if you wish to have your item/money

However, it can sometimes happen that two orders do overlap.The amount was posted back to your credit card account on the same day the credit was issued.Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience.With kind regardsYour Alternate Team

Title: Horrendous Customer Service
Review: After complaining about a defective item, for which I paid the return costs to the carrier, 5 months later I was charged the same amount again by guess who: Alternate. The Reasoning: Since I couldn't provide any "proof" for having paid the return fees (although the item arrived and a refund was issued) Alternate couldn't trace the payment and requested me to pay the return fees again to them while threatening legal actions against me.Definitely my last purchase there, please don't make the same mistake and purchase from these scammers!
Response: Dear Customer,we are very sorry that you had such a negative experience.This all sounds quite atypical, so we would like to take a closer look at this case. Please contact us with a customer or order number at: trustpilot@alternate.de.With kind regardsYour Alternate Team

Title: Defective RAM, Couldn't Get A Refund

I considered the possibility and bought another pair of rams, again from Alternate.Yes, it was true, new rams worked fine and the old ones were defective. I sent them back to alternate. They said "it's over 15 days, we can't give you a refund" and sent them back to me.I am sorry I wasn't a tech genie and couldn't know that your BRAND NEW RAMS were defective and noticed that 3 months later!This is your customer satisfaction. Live with it.
Response: Dear Mr. Seref,we regret the negative evaluation of our service.Here, however, it is so that the customer has a legal 14-day right of withdrawal and within this time this money back. After this revocation period, the warranty comes into effect. After sending in the defective memory, you would also have received a replacement from us.With kind regardsYour Alternate Team

Im sure its fixable, but as I said, I am a noob and hoped the GUI got my ignorance all covered.

The delivery was quick and when I needed to return one of the items, because I didn't need it, it was quick and efficient through their website. No calls, no waiting, no hassle. Title: Do not order here!!
Review: Do not order here!!I ordered a laptop, the order was cancelled because we had a disagreement in 2018 that was solved through paypal. After asking why the order was cancelled I was asked to stop ordering, because they dont like paypal escalations. The reasson for the escalation was that we paid them to take the waste with them which they did not do (washing machine).By the way the final resolution was a voucher, so they invited me to order again. Simply put an unserious company that puts customer service lowest and profit highest.As an answer to alternate its reply: the voucher was accepted and even used!!! I did not make any more demands and accepted what the neutral party (paypal) decided. The full problem: the washing machine was hit against the balcony, the man delivering it did not listen and drove off, the waste was not taken (we paid for it, though not seperately listed on the invoice) and it was delivered late. Paypal decided in Alternate its favor because the extra service (waste) was not seprately listed and the balcony was insurance for which the delivery person would have had to paperwork instead of run off. The vouched was accepted for the late delivery.My advice to all people stands do not order here, if you get into an argument and ask an external party to have a neutral look they wont do buisness anymore (without informing you until your next order).
Response: Dear Mr Postema,Thank you for your feedback.Your order from 2018 did not go perfectly. We have tried to find a satisfactory solution for both sides, but this was not very easy. You opened a PayPal dispute, which was resolved in our favour. You rejected a voucher, which we wanted to send as a gesture of goodwill. Unfortunately, you kept making higher and higher demands, which were not justified. For this reason, we have decided to end a further business relationship and have closed your customer account.With kind regardsYour Alternate-Team

Title: Bought a Xiaomi Redmi Pro 8 128 GB in‚Ä¶
Review: Bought a Xiaomi Redmi Pro 8 128 GB in December 2019 for 250 EUR - in cca May 2021 the phone stopped working it gave a peeping signal and it wasn't possible to hear anything in the mic anymore or make calls. Phone was sent in under warranty on 20th of May 2021, I waited almost 2 month to receive an answer from the customer service that the phone can't be repaired and can't be replaced so they offered me 150 EUR as a compensation. I wrote back that I'm not accepting a partial refund as the phone was still under warranty and stopped working so I requested either the full amount refunded or a replacement phone with similar capacity. No answer via e-mail, via phone they told me this is not possible. I've sent an e-mail again that until 16.07.21 I'm expecting either a replacement or the full refund, if not I'm contacting my lawyer. During this to solve the case I tried to contact them via phone and almost always had to wait btw 30 and 45 min minimum in the waiting line, that's just too long - slow customer support here. For your reference:32416478 / 454585954------------------------------------------------------------Update: after receiving a full refund I've amended the star rating from 2* to 4*, but I must say this took some effort from my end and a lot of energy to receive this outcome. Unfortunately I won't order my new mobile phone from Alternate.
Response: Dear Mr. F√°bik, thank you very much for your email.Your return was forwarded to the manufacturer's complaint department upon receipt.As a rule, the product is repaired or replaced as part of the rectification process. However, neither of these was possible in the case of your item. For this reason, it is impossible to carry out a rectification of your complaint and a credit note will be issued.Between purchase of the product and complaint you had a use advantage of 525 days. According to ¬ß 346 BGB we are entitled to deduct this drawn use in case of credit note. Of course, the expected useful life is not determined by us.determined. The calculation is based on the AfA list (depreciation due to wear and tear). Less the benefit of use for 525 days, the residual value of your product is thus 159.46 euros. You have the option to offset the credit against a new order or to have the credit paid out. For this purpose, please provide us with your bank details. With kind regardsYour Alternate Team

You can reach our credit card team at the E-Mail address Kreditkarte@alternate.de.With kind regardsIhr Alternate-Team

Title: 4 months searching for RTX3070 ended by Alternate
Review: I was trying to buy RTX3070 for 4 months. Absolutelly unavalaible in Czech. Local shops either sell only overpriced PC builds some was selling RTX3070 for 3-4xMSRP. After missing few drops at Alternate I finally managed to buy one. Yes, price was not MSRP, but only like 1,5xMSRP. Considering how big GPU shortage is, still a good price. There was few struggles as I could not buy directly through their webshop. But they answered a lot of my calls and e-mails. The only problem was UPS delivery service. UPS is absolutelly incompetent at least here in Czech. I suggest to change to DHL or whatever else. I have now GPU installed in my PC and it is running perfect. I've got bit scared after ordering and comming here to read all negative reviews. However, nothing mentioned here become to bu truth and alternate surprised me in the most possitive way and as thank you I'm writing my review here. I bet there is not many of satisfied customers who go write possitive review while those with bad experience always do. So lets ballance it a bit. Thank you Alternate.de for patience with me and your communication.

Title: Initially good, went to downhill Quickly!
Review: Ordered a Window Vac which stopped working approx 3 weeks later. I needed the window vac for my conservatory (condensation in the winter months)Initial customer service was excellent and they sent me a label to send it back to them.Then Brexit happened........Remember: I needed a window vac for my conservatory (condensation in the winter months) so contacted them asking for updates?????They said they were having admin issues due to the new paperwork needed post Brexit.I said this wasn't my problem and needed the vac, or a refund so I could buy another one elsewhere.They wanted to replace the item and kept stalling...........................2 weeks of this and a ton of soggy towels, I bought one from a UK supplier.Another 7 weeks later I eventually got a refund after they stated the admin was too much trouble for them to organise.Sure Brexit had a part to play here, but 9 weeks to resolution is simply NOT accetable customer service!
Response: Dear Mr. Peterborough,We are sorry to hear that you have a complaint about our service.We would be happy to review the case in more detail together with our complaints department.We would therefore ask you to contact us at trustpilot@alternate.de, quoting your customer number.With kind regardsYour Alternate Team
