Review: my experience with this company was not a wow!i bought a Laptop in 02.21 and it came fast as planned, thank u for that one. Before end of the month it started crashing I didn't know why? so i asked for " Retour" successfully done!  then i gave them the Address where to be sent to cause i wasn't at home. they did not do that. then after unpacking the box I've realized that the Adapter and the cable were not the same and can not plug them to my laptop. It took forever to reach them per phone so i tried Email, social Media...and finally i got answers from Facebook account and they couldn't do anything on Friday though it was still" the morning" some of those who contacted me do not belong to costumer services " if u cannot handle costumers on stress ur in the wrong department" . this is my msg to  the pp who work in this field.so after explaining that i need my Adapter and its cable for my meeting they send it indeed again not all of it the cable was still missing. now that i got everything that is not original and does not belong to my laptop i would say Never again. I do regret wasting my money and energy for such service
Response: Dear customer, thank you very much for your review. As a retailer, we rely on your feedback to better deal with such problems in the future.Due to the high mass of orders in recent weeks, there is naturally also a high proportion of returns and service cases. We were not prepared for this high volume of returns. Of course, the colleagues check every occurring complaint with the best conscience and care, but mistakes can still happen to the colleagues here.We would like to support you and ask you to contact us at: trustpilot@alternate.de with your customer number, if the case has not yet been resolved.We apologize for any inconvenience caused. With kind regardsYour Alternate Team

Title: The costumer support is horrible.
Review: The costumer support is horrible.They take ages to reply, sometimes more than a month.They also send packages to the wrong adress, and make you sort it out yourself.DO NOT RECOMMEND
Response: Dear Mr. Kjerulff,our highest priority in the company is the satisfaction of our customers.At the moment there may be delays in the hotline and also with e-mails due to an extremely high volume.We would be happy to take a look at the case if it is still open, especially due to the wrong delivery address.Please contact us again directly at trustpilot@alternate.de.With kind regardsYour Alternate-Team

Title: The worst webshop I've ever met
Review: The worst webshop I've ever met! I ordered 2 video cards from them, paid the price, and after several weeks my order was arbitrarily canceled! I didn't ask you to cancel my order, I would have waited !! They were referring to a false VAT regulation which turned out not to be true! Then this company claims the manufacturers do not produce the vidocard. They are lying!!!I ordered from another country due to the cost of the transfer fee and the money exchange I suffered 40 euros due to the transfer back and forth !! The cost was not paid to me! I don't recommend them to anyone, junk company, you don't get the product !!!!!This rating is not 1 star but ZERO !!!!!!
Response: Dear Mr. Kovacs,we are sorry that we could not deliver your order.We see that your order was initially received by us as an offer, which is then converted to an order.And this is exactly where the error occurred. We currently only sell graphics cards to our German customers due to low availability. Therefore, your order was unfortunately cancelled by us.If you have any further suggestions, please contact us at trustpilot@alternate.de.With kind regardsYour Alternate-Team

Title: The worst experience of online ordering I have ever had
Review: Just to warn you right away, this is going to be a lengthy review because I really want to write in detail about the horrors of online ordering through Alternate. I placed an order for PC components for my company  in Croatia through alternate-b2b.de, Alternate's website for business customers. I received the quote from Alternate and payed for the order. After that the status of my order was unchanged for 4 days. When I called their customer support I was informed that some items I ordered weren't in stock (even though they were in stock on their website when I ordered) and they split the order in two separate shipments.The second part of the order, power supply and PC case, arrived yesterday. I received the shipment, and as soon as I took the PC case out of the box I realized it was damaged. I immediately called customer support and was told to take photos of the damaged case and send them through e-mail, which I did. I contacted their support again today, and after they inspected my photos they offered me 10% discount which I refused. I explained that I payed a lot of money for that PC case and I expect it to be in perfect condition. Their customer service representative said he understands, he made sure they have another PC case in stock which they would send after they receive the damaged one, and told me that he will send return shipping information through e-mail.However, instead of that, I received an e-mail in which they claim they conducted an internal investigation and found out that the shipment left the warehouse in perfect condition, and how I'm ineligible for shipping insurance. Basically, they told me there's nothing they are going to do about it. What probably happened is they realized the return shipping cost and cost of sending a new PC case would be too high for them, and the easiest solution would be to blame everything on the customer. So now I'm stuck with damaged PC case which I'm sure left their warehouse in damaged condition, since the power supply that was shipped along with the case arrived in perfect condition. My advice to everybody ordering through Alternate is to make sure you open your shipment right in front of the delivery guy and inspect everything thoroughly so you make sure you don't get scammed like I did.I hope this makes you realize how shady and unethical Alternate is as a company.
Response: Dear Customer,we regret that there was a complaint about your PC case. Generally, however, power supplies are not shipped together with PC cases, this is always done in a savings rate package.In order to clarify the process in more detail, we would ask you to contact us again here: reklamation@alternate-b2b.de. We will gladly try to find a suitable solution.If the matter has not yet been clarified.With kind regardsYour Alternate-Team

Title: What bad customer service
Review: What bad customer service. Try to get info about an article in their store and shipping costs to the Netherlands. First get a gentleman who pretends you speak Japanese and connects you to another colleague, but turns out to just dismiss you. Phone call is terminated just no one on the phone. Then after hour, called again, waiting 15 minutes before contacting a lady, who could not provide technical support and would also put me through to a technical person. Which only could say tututu. No one on the line again. Wast of time such a store.Then bought the same product in a specialist store in the Netherlands, which had knowledge of product knowledge and service.Mind you, my German word treasure is at a high level.I don't want to think about the service if the product breaks down and we talk about warranty. Stay away
Response: Dear Customer,we are sorry that you had such a bad experience in our hotline.Normally, our colleagues from our department are normally available for our foreign customers. They can also help you with complaints or technical questions.If you still have questions or need help, please contact us at trustpilot@alternate.de with reference to this review and your customer number.With kind regards Your Alternate-Team

Title: In stock is not in stock
Review: In stock is not in stock. Don't send a receipt if you don't have the item, that is just basic stuff.Not cool.
Response: Dear Customer,we are sorry that you have problems with your order.We would like to take a closer look at the process of this.If you would like to do so, you can contact us at: trustpilot@alternat.de with your customer number and reference to this review.With kind regardsYour Alternate-Team

Title: Lacking information and constant delays
Review: I ordered a couple of toys on the 21st December, on the 28th the money were withdrawn from my account. Since then I have received mail after mail, with new dates they expect to receive the items from the manufacturer, just to receive a mail a couple days later that they now don't know when they will receive the items.I've contacted their support, who wasn't able to shed lights on things, other than claiming it was difficult to say when I could expect to receive the items, due to the manufacturer.The final straw came today, after I received a mail Monday, that they would receive one of the two items on the 18th, but I then received a mail this morning saying they don't know when they will receive the items again. I don't know how their logistic chain works, but I do know that there are plenty of other webshops out there that has the items in stock and at a similar price, and they will now be getting my business.Going from other reviews on the site, it does unfortunately seem like this is not just me being unlucky, but a somewhat regular occurrence for them.I hope you improve, as you have some very attractive prices, but I prefer not having to wait months over saving a few euros.
Response: Dear Mr. Dupont,We regret the negative order process.If your order is still pending, we would like to ask you to contact us briefly at trustpilot@alternate.de, stating your customer number and referring to this review.With kind regardsYour Alternate Team

Title: Hello, Alternate, you are the WORST
Review: Hello,I could not log into my account  at Alternate today, so I have set up another. After registering  I ordered  GC ASUS  RTX 3090 Strix  OC   at "action price", that was  still horrible, but alas  supposedly  300‚Ç¨ less than the "regular" price.Instead of being  able to got through the checkout, I was  FORCED to agree that I  "will be issued a separate  offer by email" and that " certain price  actions  and promotions  are  valid  for German  customers only". Well, to me that is  illegal.Either we DO have a common market or we DO NOT.Needless to say up to this  time   I did not received   any offer, NOTHING.Well, this is a plain scam , I wrote to the customer¬¥s department, but it is clear, that I am going to come out shorthanded.I  have never, ever experienced  such an ourightly nasty behaviour from any German etailer.
Response: Dear Customer,we are sorry to hear that the ordering process was not a positive experience for you.We usually have a separate homepage for our customers from abroad.All items that you can find there, we are allowed to deliver abroad, many items on our German site are unfortunately not intended for delivery abroad. This is so specified by the manufacturers. If you need any further information or help, please contact us with your customer number at: trustpilot@alternate.de.With kind regardsYour Alternate Team

Title: Problem completely solved
Review: After this I can believe that this company support can solve any conflict situation.
Response: Dear Customer,we are sorry that you are not satisfied with your order process.We always try to respond promptly to all customer inquiries, we are very keen to look into your case and ask you to contact us directly at trustpilot@alternate.de, quoting your customer number and referring to this review.With kind regardsYour Alternate Team

Title: Good and 1st service.
Review: NaN

Title: Sells items without having inventory, avoid
Review: Placed an order in December for an expensive monitor. Then they emailed me to say the article was out of stock and would be available in late January. Now they are telling me it will be available in February.I have revised my rating to 3 stars since they issued the refund immediately on request.
Response: Dear Mr. Mueller,we are sorry to hear that there was this big delay in delivery of your order.We have taken a closer look at your order process. At the time of your order, the delivery date of the item was unknown. Unfortunately, various manufacturers have been experiencing delays in deliveries since the Corona pandemic.Since that time, we have been given several delivery dates by the manufacturer, but they could not be met either.If you have any further questions or suggestions, please contact us at: trustpilot@alternate.de.With kind regardsYour Alternate-Team

Title: Bad experience
Review: Last week we made a (business) order for a 3080 GPU for around 1000 Euro. At time of ordering the item showed In Stock.When receiving the invoice the address was wrongly displayed, a payment link was missing as well. We emailed Alternate asking to correct this mistake and send a payment link. We received no response what soever.2 days later we called with Alternate, after a long waiting time, being transferred between multiple departments, an employee arranged for us to receive the invoice and payment link, which we promptly paid. 2 days after paying and receiving no confirmation nor sending status, we called Alternate again. After waiting for no less than 17 minutes in line, being internally transferred again, an employee told us that the item is out of stock, and not even eligible to be sent to the Netherlands. He put us on hold to check with the supplier. After being on hold for approximately 5 minutes, the call is suddenly disconnected. We waited for 10-15 minutes to see whether the employee would call us back. We were not.Currently we are already 20 minutes waiting in line again, waiting for someone to finally answer our call.-------Why is Alternate selling items which they do not have in stock? I am aware of the worldwide shortages, but why misinform customers of availability?Why is Altternate selling products which assumingly are "Germany only"?--------Update 29 janThe order was canceled.On request of alternate I sent them an emailUpdate 30 janNo answer from their teamMy funds are not yet returned
Response: Dear Ms. Vos,we regret the inconvenience caused.We see that you placed the order from the Netherlands, so you were probably put through to our foreign department.Due to the still very high volume, the waiting times are currently unfortunately somewhat longer.We apologize for the undesired callback after the call was disconnected.We will be happy to take another closer look at the case. Please contact us at trustpilot@alternate with your customer number and reference to this rating.With kind regardsYour Alternate-Team

Title: I am Irish buyer
Review: I am Irish buyer, but still delivery of my rtx card was fast. Only took 5 days from Germany to Ireland!I will definitely use alternate again!

Title: Incomplete shipping and no refund so far
Review: Goods should arrive withing 3 days but just part of it arrived 3 weeks later. After additional 2 weeks and some email I was informed that it is not available anymore so I will receive a refund. Since that (neary 3 weeks) nothing happened. I wrote several emails with no reply. Hope PayPal can help....
Response: Dear Customer,We are sorry to hear that you were not satisfied with our service.We would be happy to look into the case in more detail with the help of our service department. The best way to do this is to contact us at trustpilot@alternate.de with your customer number and a reference to this review.With kind regards Your Alternate Team

Title: Poor christmas return policy
Review: Bought a router in december for a Christmas present. It was faulty, and they did not offer refund as it was just over the two weeks return window. Even buying from the high street has better return policies over the holiday season.Will not be using Alternate again. Now waiting for repaired router, have since bought another one as was not going to wait weeks for repair on a christmas present. Poor.
Response: Dear Mr. Price,we are sorry to read that you have a complaint regarding your claim.As we would like to take a closer look at the case with the help of our service department, we kindly ask you to contact us at: trustpilot@alternate.de with your customer number and the reference to this evaluation.With kind regardsYour Alternate Team

Title: A very disappointing company!
Review: Actually they dont deserve a single star for this! For almost 2 hours I waited for someone to answer my call and finally at the moment that it would be my turn, my call was turned down! My ordered item was broken and I need to pay for the cost to return it!
Response: Dear customer, We will be happy to review the situation with our service department.Unfortunately, there are often longer waiting times on the hotline. However, it should not happen that a call is simply rejected. Generally, we have a limited number of customers who can wait in our hotline, so that it does not come to even longer waiting times.If your product is defective, you will receive a return label for it.Please contact us once with your customer number and reference to this review: trustpilot@alternate, so that we can find a common solution.With kind regardsYour Alternate-Team

Title: Spend 5‚Ç¨ more and buy elsewhere.
Review: Terrible experience.Goods were sent in manufacturer packaging made for POS and not parcel shipment. Goods received obviously damaged. Claim opened 2 weeks ago, nothing...You cannot reach the customer support on the phone. You're just stuck with them wondering whether you'll ever be reimbursed. My advise, spent the 5‚Ç¨ more and buy elsewhere.
Response: Dear customer, we regret that there was a damaged delivery.Currently, there may unfortunately be increased waiting times in our transport and service hotline.Our colleagues have just contacted you. Please feel free to contact us again at the following e-mail address if you have any further questions: Trustpilot@alternate.de With kind regardsYour Alternate Team

Title: Good products & prices
Review: Offering good products at very competitive prices, especially on PC components.Customer support may take long time to respond, but concerning my case the situation has improved, following a UPS delivery problem, the refund was processed fairly quickly.
Response: Dear Mr. Omari,we regret that your order process did not go smoothly.I have just consulted with my colleagues from our transport department. They will contact you shortly regarding the lost package in order to process the refund.Should any further information or assistance be required, please contact me at: trustpilot@alternate.de, quoting your customer number.With kind regardsYour Alternate Team

Title: Great cable management
Review: Delivery was on time and the cable management was very nicely done (PC builder service was used).

Title: Madness
Review: I ordered from this website because they had the shortest delivery times. But every day the page would get updated with a new date, been waiting for 3 months so I had to cancel. I think somebody has to tell them that lying about dates like that is illegal? Extremely chaotic and they have long waiting times for replies. Put a live chat in your website, it will help for this horrible experience you have currently. I canceled the order. Still no mention of refund. Absolutely do not recommend, or at least do not trust shipping dates ‚Äî they lie about them and will tell you that they have no idea  when they'll deliver later.
Response: Dear Customer,we regret the delayed delivery.However, it is not that we lie to customers or make up delivery times. The delivery dates shown on the homepage are given to us by the suppliers.Unfortunately, also due to the current stock, there may be delays from time to time.To explain the ordering process to you again in more detail, you can contact us with the customer number and reference to this review: trustpilot@alternate.de.With kind regardsYour Alternate Team

Title: On-time refund
Review: I pre-ordered an Asus RTX 3080 TUF card on alternate.de, but after that, I found a drop from the other retailer. So I cancel the order on alternate.de. Although I sent some reminders, they did refund me in a reasonable time. You earn my trust so I will order something in the future.

Title: Just plain bad at this point
Review: I was looking for a site on which I can buy PC components as I wanted to build myself one,so I found AlternateI bought the components on 26th of November, it's already 12th of December and I have got nothingPayed 1200‚Ç¨ for my stuff, it's been 2 damn weeksEither way,I will cancel my order since I'm sick of waiting,want my money back and sick of a ,,delay" email every 3-4 daysOverall,I wouldn't recommend using Alternate
Response: Dear Customer,we are sorry that you had such a negative experience.We have taken another look at your order process. Most of the items have already left our house and should be with you by now.Your subsequent delivery is still Open and not available, should this be cancelled or would you like an alternative for the three items? Please contact us with reference to this review and your customer number: Trustpilot@alternate.de so that we can discuss how to proceed.With kind regards Your Alternate Team

Title: Slow and unreachable
Review: Dealing with them, or rather not dealing with them was frustrating as a customer. I needed a product which they say they have "in stock". Great, I ordered it. Then for 4 entire days it just says "in bearbeitung". I don't know in which era we live, but in my experience when something is "in stock" I expect it to be shipped at least the next business day. Anyhow, 4 days was too long for me, so I cancelled the order. Apparently they need to manually approve this once you have filled out the form. The next morning I get an email with an invoice saying they sent my order. They simply ignored my cancellation request and sent out the products the next day anyway.We are a b2b customer. Their b2b hotline is completely unreachable. 2 hours in the queue was enough for us. Didn't get through.We had already ordered the product somewhere else now, so we had to cancel that (and that company actually allowed us to cancel, great). I guess I will have to wait and just deal with it, as b2b can't just send products back.We have another order with them still open, that is also "in stock" and has been sitting there doing nothing for the past 2 days.I'm really sorry, but I just don't believe it takes someone 4 days to pick a product off a shelf and put it in a box.I really do not want to go to Amazon, but you are making it extremely difficult for me to uphold reasons not to.I'm okay with waiting a bit longer and paying a bit more if I get reliable service for it in return, but here I am getting neither.
Response: Dear Customer,Unfortunately, we cannot avoid the fact that deliveries or the picking of goods take longer during the Christmas season. We and our colleagues in logistics are working at full speed to ship all products in a timely manner.We will be happy to take a closer look at your order process with the help of our B2B department. You can contact us at trustpilot@alternate.de with your customer number and reference to this review.With kind regardsYour Alternate Team

Title: abusive company
Review: I was highly interested in get a PlayStation 5 console and I have checked in several websites in Germany and I came across with a ‚Äúdeal‚Äù in alternate.de, they were offering, a PS5 disc version with 2 dual sense controllers + PS5 remote control + Spider-Man miles morales+ Demons souls+ sack+ sackboy for 999‚Ç¨. If you go in their own market and Want to buy all the items separately they will cost you 814‚Ç¨, they are just stealing 185‚Ç¨ because this is the only way to get a console at this point.I am really disappointed with this company and I hope you have consequences with Sony because this kind of abuse it‚Äôs not different with the resellers of EBay.
Response: Dear Customer,we are sorry that you have a reason to complain. We are happy to try to explain the price increase here. Due to the high demand and the slow production of the manufacturer, our purchase prices have also increased and we can not keep the offer so. Here we also have no influence as an online retailer. With kind regards Your Alternate Team

Title: Slow support
Review: Go a lot of trouble currently with french website. Got 3 packages: first one marked has shipped but got nothing, second one got "address error" (but how does they shipped the first one in this case oO) and the third one is marked as delayed.Support doesn't reply so please make them do their work. My support ticket is #2020120335083111I know issues are related to UPS but I can't make pressure on them and shoudn't have to.And of course I don't know if I must rebuy everything somewhere else for christmas.
Response: Dear customer,we regret that you have had a negative experience with the forwarding agency.We would be happy to take a closer look at the order process with the help of our transport department.For this purpose, please log on: trustpilot@alternate.de with your customer number and reference to this evaluation.With kind regardsYour Alternate Team

Title: Alternate and scalping prices of RTX 30xx
Review: Review concerning scalping practices of Alternate. I'll take an EVGA X3 3070 as an example. An EVGA X3 3070 retails for ‚Ç¨460 msrp excluding VAT, ‚Ç¨533 something including VAT. The very same card on the Alternate website, they have it costing ‚Ç¨654. They're charging ‚Ç¨121 more, just because they can as they know people really want to upgrade even though there is a shortage of stock currently. Disgusting practices by Alternate.
Response: Dear customer,we are sorry that you have a reason to complain. We are happy to explain the price increase to you here. Due to the high demand and the sluggish production of the manufacturer, our purchase prices have also risen and we cannot maintain the supply. Here we have also no influence as online traders. With kind regards Your Alternate Team

Title: Order in alternate
Review: I've made the order on the 25th of Nov and it was in stock. I've got the email that delivery will be from 26 to 28. But the next day accidentally I found on the site that there is no my position and the similar at all. All models. I tried to call to Alternate. I had to wait for maybe 20 minutes, but the customer service explained everything: I could wait for some days or cancel the order and get my money back. I've made the decision to wait for a for some days. On the 3rd of Dec, I checked my order and found that it was delivered, but I didn't get any notification in my email. I again called the service center, waited for 30 minutes, but again I got very good service and all answers.On the 8th of Dec, I've got my order.On conclusion:1. If you'd like to talk to the service center - you have to wait or call in the morning.2. I really wasn't happy about the delay, but sometimes it really can happen.3. You really have to be very careful when you order something that is very specific or popular.4 stars exactly because of the delay and this situation with stock.
Response: Dear Mr. Aksenovwe regret that the goods were not delivered on time.Due to our Black Week and the resulting high order volume, the process in our outgoing goods department has unfortunately been greatly delayed. Of course we would like to apologize for this.Also for the reason mentioned above, the waiting times in our hotline are currently longer than usual. We hope that the goods have now arrived properly and wish you much fun with the productWith kind regardsYour Alternate Team

Title: Shipping Issue Resolved
Review: ** I've written an update to my original review and added it to the bottom**I ordered headphones and the expected delivery date is coming up rapidly. The shipping status has remained with the following message "Your order is currently being processed in our logistics department." This is not the shipping that was promised when I purchased these headphones. Their website now says "delivery date unknown" and I've read horror stories of people waiting months for their products or being unable to process returns. Additionally, now the only email I've received says that they won't be able to answer questions. Very convenient to lie about the shipping and then be unable to be reached for any kind of correspondence. This was my first time purchasing from alternative.de and will be my last.Update: They were able to reach out and resolve the shipping issue.
Response: Dear customer,first we would like to apologize for the longer delivery time.We have taken another look at your order process.Due to the Black Week and the associated order volume, there are unfortunately delays in logistics. Also the Christmas business is currently very noticeable.According to the current status the package will leave our house today. If you have any further questions, please contact us with your customer number and the reference to the evaluation: Trustpilot@alternate.de.With kind regardsYour Alternate Team

Title: Delay in the delivery
Review: Ordered a gift for my dad on their website with delivery guaranteed between Dec. 2 and Dec. 4, 2020 I check this morning Dec. 4 deadline for the delivery the status of my order on their platform and it says my order is under process in their logistics department... so very likely it won‚Äôt be delivered today as promised... and date of delivery was Paramount so if I knew they would have not respected it I would have bought the item with someone else!!! Very disappointed so far
Response: Dear Mrs. Garbin,we are sorry that there is a longer delivery time at the moment.We have taken a closer look at your order process.In fact, it says here that your order is still being processed in our logistics department. Currently there may be a delay due to the Christmas business (in all areas). You are welcome to contact: trustpilot@alternate.de stating your customer number and reference to this review to get more detailed information about your order. With kind regardsYour Alternate Team

Title: Sleazy price gouging crooks
Review: Sleazy price gouging crooks. They take advantage of the market and scalp video cards. I was once a valued customer and now I will never again buy from them. Terrible!
Response: Dear customer,we are sorry that you are not satisfied with your order process.Due to market fluctuations and price increases of the individual manufacturers, we have to move along with them and raise the price as well.You are welcome to contact us with your customer number and the reference to this review at: trustpilot@alternate.deWith kind regardsYour Alternate Team

Title: Missing AMD voucher code
Review: Ordered a new AMD 5800X processor. All went well and as expected, however I did not receive a code for the AMD ‚ÄúEquipped To Win‚Äù bundle that should come with the processor, nor has Alternate.de replied to any of the 3 emails I have sent them the past weeks in regards to this.Edit: I have just received the bundle code thanks to the prompt follow up and action from the team that monitors these reviews.
Response: Sehr geehrter Kunde,es tut uns leid, dass Sie mit Ihrem Bestellablauf nicht zufrieden sind.Wir versuchen stets zeitnah auf alle Kundenanfragen zu reagieren, es ist uns sehr daran gelegen Ihren Fall zu pr√ºfen und bitten Sie, sich mit Angabe Ihrer Kundennummer und mit Verweis auf diese Bewertung sich direkt an trustpilot@alternate.de zu wenden.Mit freundlichen Gr√º√üenIhr Alternate-Team

Title: the worst costumer service ALTERNATE.DE
Review: Alternate.de has  one of the worst costumer services known to me is is really baffelingThey dont answer to questions and when they do it is a machine generated BS answer on the line of not our fault please be patient I waited more than 2 month for my paket without information on when a shippment is inbound whether i get it this year or next which positon on the queue i am  And they said at the beginning it is getting shipped late october early novembernext time I order on other sites it is maddening how fustrating it is  poor effort to customer satisfaction0/5
Response: Dear Mr. Slayer,we are sorry that you are not satisfied with your order process.Please note that delivery dates for new releases are somewhat uncertain due to possible delays in development and production start.  Together with our partners, however, we are working at full speed to be able to provide additional cards. However, we cannot give you a concrete date for the next delivery at this time. We would be happy to assist you with your problem and ask you to contact us at: trustpilot@alternate.de stating your customer number.With kind regardsYour Alternate Team

Title: Major shout out to Kevin Kegler
Review: Major shout out to Kevin Kegler, he is an absolute gentleman and helped me out big time with a build and the supply of the parts which came well packaged and quickly with the delivery service. Would definitely recommend and order from again.

Title: Never again!
Review: Worst phone support I have ever experienced! Waited for more than 2 hours! Dear alternate.de - other companies are able to offer sufficient phone support, so please do not talk yourself out of it with "Conversations may take longer than expected...". I will not buy again and recommend my friends not to buy from alternate either - this kind of support is an absolute cheek in these days and not marketable in the long run.
Response: Dear customer,It is a pity that you were not satisfied with our customer service.We would like to take a closer look at the case with the help of our service department. The best way to do this is to contact us with your customer number and a reference to this evaluation: trustpilot@alternate.de.With kind regards Your Alternate Team

Title: Not a good way to do business
Review: ordered the new Ryzen 5900X because it was available on their site ( WITH STOCK)  .Got email confirmation that my order had been placed and money left my account ( being sold more expensive than the recommended price by AMD) .2 days letter i receive an email that they are out of stock and that i should wait .
Response: Dear customer,we are sorry that you have a reason to complain.We have taken a closer look at your order process.When you bought the item, it was already indicated that it was no longer in stock and the delivery date is unknown. This is also shown in your order overview. If you have any further questions, please feel free to contact us with your customer number at Trustpilot@alternate.de with your customer number. With kind regardsYour Alternate Team

Title: FAILED
Review: They are just playing dirty games. The products are marked as "stored". Which means these are in real, not digital, in store. Otherwise it would be "ordered". Not knowing about it you order expecting the delivery within days. But what you get after days waiting, is an email, telling you there were technical issue the product needs to be ordered within weeks. This explanation from a IT/tech seller is just poor. You exist by the simple capability of running a server and deliver items.You failed.Never ordering there again, there are way better and trustworthy competitors delivering what was promised.
Response: Dear Customer,We would like to apologize for the fact that the article has not yet been delivered.We would like to take a closer look at your order.In addition we would ask you to turn with your customer number and the reference to this evaluation to: trustpilot@alternate.de.With Kind regardsYour Alternate-Team

Title: I have no word to describe the‚Ä¶
Review: I have no word to describe the disappointment ! I bought and receive the invoice for a RTX 3070 for my son birthday present for a built in Computer ! He was so happy and already asked me few times when he will receive his birthday gift ! It brakes my heart to go home today and tell him Alternate has played with our feeling and send us today an email writing the Video card its not anymore available !I am an online shop myself but I will never do something like this to my clients !Very, very disappointed !!!Actually just wandering if this is legal what they did ? Maybe they let the RTX 3070  online, whyle the other were honest and announced the out of stock, to obtain my email and contact. Wonder if the other stores shouldt take action for unfair practice !!!!
Response: Dear customer,it is a pity that you have a complaint to our customer service.we would like to inform you briefly about the current delivery situation regarding the graphics card(s) you ordered. We had been provided with a limited contingent right from the start. With this contingent we also planned the launch of the graphic card(s). There is always a small time delay when comparing our store system and our merchandise management system. Due to the extremely high demand, this short period of time was sufficient to accept more orders than we had available in the first delivery step. We apologize for this.  Gladly you can contact us for this also with your customer number and the reference to this evaluation: trustpilot@alternate.deWith Kind regardsYour Alternate-Team

Title: Payment Issue
Review: Tried to purchase an item. Sent a payment to the Bank listed and they tell me they did not receive it? So I just got scammed 121,69 euro? Tried contacting them with no help.
Response: Dear customer,we are sorry that you have reason to complain.We always try to react promptly to all customer inquiries, it is very important to us to examine your case and ask you to contact trustpilot@alternate.de directly with your customer number and with reference to this evaluation.With kind regards Your Alternate Team

Title: 65 inch TV screen wrecked!
Review: We have ordered a 65 inch TV screen for our meeting room. Unfortunately it came with a huge image error (about 40cm in diameter) which was not visible in the preinstalled intro and test images of the manufacturer. We requested to send the screen back and be refunded and were told to pack it and that they would assign a trucking company to pick it up. They did come and pick it up, but after a few days we received note that the TV had arrived fractured and that they could not refund anything and that our only options were to have it disposed of for free or have the completely wrecked screen returned to us unprocessed. The packaging was almost und harmed but the TV looked as if someone had dropped a washing mashine onto it. Upon requesting that the insurance of the trucking company handle the claim as it was obviously not our fault but the fault of the trucking company we were only told that the company does not insure pick ups. I will NEVER order anything with them again. The delivery was fast and uncomplicated but when issues arise they have no customer service to speak of and we had no way of getting a refund for a TV screen that was delivered to us in a faulty condition and then ruined by THEIR trucking company.
Response: Dear customer,we are sorry that there was a transport damage during the delivery.In order to follow up this matter we would like to take a closer look at the case with our service recording. We are sure to find a suitable solution here.To do so, we would ask you to contact: trustpilot@alternate.de with your customer number and a reference to this evaluation. With kind regardsYour Alternate Team

Title: Never again from my perspective!
Review: They are selling stuff which they have not available and cannot deliver!  As I paid with the online purchase the risk of the orderly financial return of the purchase price remains with myself! This is now day number 8  after the original online purchase contract and all I still get are  emails that they WILL reimburse me!
Response: Dear Mrs. Welp,we regret the unpleasant order process.In general, however, if you wish to cancel the order, we will refund the full amount to the payment method used.You are welcome to contact trustpilot@alternate.de again with your customer number and a reference to this evaluation so that we can check your order status.With kind regardsyour Alternate-Team

Title: Stock available but nope
Review: Ordered a power supply, it said 20+ are available. Next day I check my order, it says it can't be delivered because it's out of stock - ok what?I wait a few days and it says they'll have new stock tomorrow. I wait for a day, it still says they'll have new stock tomorrow. I wait for another day and it says it's gonna take 20+ days for new stock to arrive. Right. No thank you.Look guys, I know there's a pandemic going on and it's hard to resupply. But if an item is out of stock, how about saying it's out of stock?Scummy shop on my opinion, would not recommend, 1/5.
Response: Dear Mr.  Gouderswe are sorry that you have reason to complain.As we see, you placed the order through our partner "Idealo". Unfortunately we have no influence on their delivery time.We ourselves always indicate on our homepage whether the article is really in stock or is in the inflow and should arrive first.At the moment there are strong delays in delivery due to the current worldwide situation.According to the information available to us, the goods should arrive on 12.11.2020.If you wish, we can look for an alternative delivery date.Please contact us with your customer number and the reference to this evaluation: trupstilot@alternate.de.With kind regardsYour Alternate Team

Title: Do not deliver...
Review: Ordered the pixel 4a already 21-sept, indicated shipment date 1-oct at the time. Then at 8-oct I get an email that it will get shipped at 20-oct.Now it's already 22-oct, order has still not been shipped. Already paid for it over a month ago. Disappointing customer communication. Many other companies have been able to ship this phone to their customers, so what is going on at alternate?
Response: Dear customer,we are sorry to hear that the ordering process was not a positive experience for you.The delivery of the smartphone was announced to us before October. Due to the current widespread problems, many manufacturers are unfortunately experiencing immense delivery delays.We ourselves are still waiting for the goods and hope to receive them in October.With kind regardsYour Alternate Team

Title: Your telephone support is a joke..
Review: Your telephone support is a joke... 2 hours waiting and when I get to the front of the queue it says I'm number 1 or 2 and have 3 minute wait time suddenly it increases to 5-10-15minutes... I'd avoid dealing with alternate
Response: Dear Customer,it is a pity that you have a complaint to our customer service.Unfortunately, depending on the volume, there may be increased waiting times, both on the hotline and for e-mails.Unfortunately, service calls can always take longer than expected, which can also change the waiting position.However, you can also reach us by e-mail.For this purpose you can contact us with your customer number and the reference to this evaluation at: trustpilot@alternate.de.With kind regardsyour Alternate-Team

Title: Preordered RTX 3080 on Launch day
Review: Preordered RTX 3080 on Launch day. Seen multiple orders after me (for exactly the same model!!!) beeing delivered before mine.They take your money and dont honor your spot in line because others paid more or because they order by pick-up and still have to pay (so they immediately get a pick-up date for alternate to get their money asap)There have been numerous reports online, I personally know people with such cases, support keeps telling lies about us not understanding their process, etc....There is NO EXCUSE for what they are doing and if their "process" not only allows, but actually promotes such things, it HAS TO BE COMPLETLY REVAMPED.*Edit* and STOP! Copy-pasting your pre-written replies. Your lies do not help your case. Admit what you did and do it right from now!Update 04.05.21 - so nearly 3/4 year later still no sign of them shipping my order.
Response: Dear customer,we would like to inform you briefly about the current delivery situation regarding the graphics card(s) you have ordered. We had been provided with a limited contingent right from the start. With this contingent we also planned the launch of the graphics card(s). There is always a small time delay when comparing our store system and our merchandise management system. Due to the extremely high demand, this short period of time was sufficient to accept more orders than we had available in the first delivery step. We apologize for this.  Together with our partners we are working hard to provide more cards. At this point in time, we are not able to give you a concrete date for the next delivery. However, we hope to be able to serve all orders until the end of October or beginning of November. Unfortunately we can't do anything else at this point but to ask for your patience and hope you will understand.As soon as we are able to ship your graphics card(s), you will of course be notified again.Of course you are free to cancel your order free of charge until the goods are shipped. In this case we will refund any payments already made immediately.With kind regardsYour Alternate Team

Title: The product is totally fine but the‚Ä¶
Review: The product is totally fine but the experience with Alternate delivery and customer support is very poor.
Response: Dear customer,It is a pity that you are not satisfied with our service.We would like to take a closer look at your order history and the delivery process.Please feel free to contact us at: trustpilot@alternate.de with your customer number and reference to this review.With kind regardsYour Alternate-Team

Title: Excellent customer service.
Review: Quick processing, very good packing.Fast international shipping.Excellent customer service.

Title: My lovely new PC from Alternate
Review: I've just configured a new PC with Alternate. They have cheapest price/value on the market, if you know exactly what you want and expect to have. The delivery was 1 week earlier. All the parts are well assembled.Tips: To save delivery time, choose parts carefully, do more research and check for the compatible of the hardwares with each other. Also pay attention to the availability of the hardware you chose. If it is less than 10 parts available, then chose another one, because the website could be outdated. I was lucky to have the very last 650W platinum PSU of be quiet!.

Title: Totally positive experience on my first‚Ä¶
Review: Totally positive experience on my first purchase - I will definitely buy from them again. The item was shipped the other day after payment confirmation, well packaged, and quality product.Excellent customer service and communication!Keep up the good work.

Title: Super for all
Review: NaN

Title: Great service
Review: Fast and good service including fast shipping to the Czech Republic. Would recommend to anyone who wants to buy a VR headset and can't buy it in their country.

Title: Really bad support
Review: Really bad support, didnt respond to my email in 1 week and hung up on my call, which I was waiting in for 2 hours!!!

Title: No customer support.
Review: This was my last order from this site. Have been happy with their services for years now because of really competitive prices and fast deliveries...that was until I had to engage with their customer support (or the lack thereof). Sent in a broken GPU for RMA *over a month ago* with no update as to what is happening to my RMA request. Even took them 5 full bussiness days to acknowledge the package came in even though tracking showed it arrived 5 days before that. Couldn't even be arsed to answer a simple email I sent to ask for a quick update 4 days ago. Avoid this vendor.

Title: Returning items
Review: Sending packages back is complicated, you have to write a couple of emails until they respond. If you have any questions you have to wait much longer for a respons (if they respond at all)

Title: Fast delivery and good packaging
Review: Fast delivery and good packaging. Highly recommended!

Title: Bad customer support / generic emails and script based communication
Review: Delivered the wrong product and make it very difficult to find solutions. I'd not recommend to buy here...

Title: Worst E-shop ever! SCAM?!
Review: Alternate thinks they know everything about the products they sell but they don't know anything at all.They also think they are above the law and don't have to follow normal regulations!! The law states that for ALL items you have to give back the money if i ask it in 14 days. Alternate thinks they can "bypass" a law by making their own T.O.S. sadly this isen't possible. I had bought an Oculus Rift S . and every 10-20 min it would suddenly stop working. hand controllers get stuck and there was nothing you could do to fix it. we tested this on 3 different pc's and it kept happening. Alternate said it was the room ( false ) , Alternate said it was our pc's ( defenitly false! )we sent back the item to them and let them test it they said nothing at all was wrong with it. IT TOOK THEM 3 WEEKS TO TEST THE ITEM!!! AND CONCULDE THERE WAS NOTHING WRONG WITH IT. we had already asked for a refund by than which they refused!!!! Customer service is horribly rude!!! and i can't imagine how they still have customers at all ?!? with that tone and them not even doing a proper check when you tell them to! We had the worst experience ever with alternate. LUCKY ENOUGH!!! oculus rift is a very friendly comany and helped us out. they took back the oculus rift and sent a new one. and that one worked perfectly. so to all the stupid "tech support" that works at alternate you guys are so dumb ? how did you get hired in the first place ? did you just buy your way in ?to all the billing support of alternate and probably legal team as well. DID YOU EVEN GOTO SCHOOL !>?!?!?? cuz you should know clear as hell that you CANNOT reject a f******* refund request!!!!My experience with alternate was the absolute worst!!!!! it took me more than 2 months to finally get a working Oculus rift!!!Next time i'll just goto coolblue or Bol.com or any other trustable store. SHAME ON YOU ALTERNATE!!! SHAME ON YOU!!!DO NOT SHOP HERE!!!

Title: Very good communication
Review: Very good communication, steps involved couple of email exchanges including placing initial order, confirming it and finally choosing payment details. Competitive prices is another plus. Will not hesitate using it again.

Title: I know Alternate for almost 6 years and‚Ä¶
Review: I know Alternate for almost 6 years and they are my first choice when shopping online

Title: Worst service ever!
Review: Worst service ever!20 Feb 2020 Purchased hiking poles for ‚Ç¨ 127.90 and shipment was ‚Ç¨ 7.9024 Feb 2020 They informed me that they can't deliver my order, delivered promised to 05 March 202006 March 2020 I asked them what's with my purchase, they promised delivery at 15 April 202018 April 2020 they promised delivery at 15 May 20208 May 2020 I've got notification that I should go to delivery point to get my package. For paid shipment!What I've seen? They send me wrong model! Cheaper one! 18 May 2020 They asked me to send wrong item back to replace it with correct one28 May 2020 they got returned item and know what? They just refunded the price of it! Without ‚Ç¨ 7.90 of shipment expenses and any excuses. But I asked them not for refund but for replacement. I just want my desired model.First time faced with that s**t. Even Chinese sellers form Aliexpress are more client oriented. Alternate guys just don't care about anything.I tried to contact them via their phone. Well, 20 minutes of waiting, without any result.

Title: Excellent Service
Review: I was very satisfied with the advices informing me with the progress of my order, with the speed of delivery and with the phone itself. I was disappointed that it would appear that discount codes only apply to German residents. The price I paid was a bit higher than anticipated because I did not realise that the price quoted on the website included German vat but that vat would be adjusted to reflect Irish vat (19% increased to 23%).Otherwise excellent service from Alternate.

Title: Asking extra money after the order and finding excuses to cancel order
Review: Such an unprofessional company with no respect to the customer.Ordered a few items on 1/5/2020 and paid for them at the same day. After waiting for 12 days for the items to be shipped I got a message from your company that you need extra money. And when I declined this request, you found another excuse: That the product is at the End Of Life. When at the same time the product is still available normally for ordering at your website.Is this how you treat all your customers?

Title: Never again
Review: I ordered there because of the short delivery time (should be here tomorrow at the latest). Now I got an email saying because they didn‚Äôt dispatch the parcel in time my parcel will be here next week. I understand if shippings can take longer due to the current situation but do not advertise with fast shipping then. I definitely will never order at this alternate again.

Title: I ordered a HP Spectre x360 13 laptop‚Ä¶
Review: I ordered a HP Spectre x360 13 laptop and the process was quick and uncomplicated with a very quick delivery.However I experienced some minor software issues in the beginning (probably because of the extra software bundles that came with the laptop) but the issues were all resolved after I formatted the system and installed a fresh Windows 10. It's been two weeks and everything works perfect now.

Title: Thanks for my order
Review: Thanks a lot for my order! It was processed quite fast. My questions were answered in time and all necessary explanations were provided. I got my order and fully satisfied with it. Recommend Alternate.de for sure!

Title: Hey, this shop delivers quick and well
Review: Hey, I mean this company got mixed reviews here on trustpilot but for me it is impeccable. Very detailed informative parts descriptions, expert prompt and helpful answers to technical questions over E-Mail, very good information in many E-Mails as far as order progress. Parts came two times, both times they were very well packaged and in perfect new condition. For me one of the best shops.

Title: Quick and accurate delivery
Review: Quick and accurate delivery! Thanks a lot!

Title: Good selection and fast delivery
Review: Good selection and fast delivery. just for some reason i was unable to pay by credit card but that was ok as i could give the delivery company cash. I would recommend and use again.

Title: They take part in the black friday /‚Ä¶
Review: They take part in the black friday / cyber monday shenanigans with really competitive prices but are lying about availability. So essentially they sell you goods they don't have.I was making sure that all items were showing as "in stock" hoping I would get them at the next weekend at the latest. The estimated delivery date passed and nothing was send out to me. The weekend passed, too. Next Tuesday (more then 1 week after ordering) I call them. I'm waiting 30-40 for someone to talk to. Then I get to talk to a friendly but powerless person who informs me that they don't have the ordered goods, can't offer me any alternative products (i was ordering RAM and an SSD - there is a lot of stuff with basically the same specs) for the same price (the sale is over so now everything is 10%-20% more expensive again and I would have to pay the difference) and even if I would order something else now via phone they couldn't guarantee me that the package would be send out today (i was phoning them during lunch time) without me paying an extra premium for express delivery. So I saw no other solution than to cancel my order. Got the refund logged into paypal within minutes, so at least that worked.

Title: Very nice support
Review: I had to return a product because of a mistake on my end, I had to call the support multiple times to ask for precisions for things I wasn't sure of because of the languageThe support was top notch, quick,responsive and professional, and everyone was speaking perfect English. I'm very satisfied and would order again there if I they have the product I need

Title: They sell products they don't have
Review: I ordered a product from here as in the product page it stated that it is in stock and will be shipped in two days. 3rd day after ordering I got an email saying they have problems with their distributor and they don't know if they'll ever get the product in the first place.Yeah, let's sell things that we don't have and waste people's time. It was a time-sensitive thing for me!

Title: Very bad support.
Review: Very bad support.I sent a defective NUC back for repair, it was returned but not repaired. It still doesn't work. I told them that the NUC works well with the generic Windows driver in low resolution but not with the expected Iris Intel driver for 4K which is automatically dowloaded from Internet and installed during Windows10 installation (YOU HAVE TO WAIT UNTIL ALL DRIVERS ARE DOWNLOADED AND INSTALLED, STUPID GUYS !) ..My problem is probably an embedded Iris graphical chipset issue.They only tested the windows booting several time and that's it. Nobody called me to discuss about the problem to make sure the problem is well understood. Totally unacceptable !Website to avoid.

Title: Shopping experience was okay as well as‚Ä¶
Review: Shopping experience was okay as well as the delivery. Unfortunately the bought power supply did not last that long but Alternate sent me a new one.

Title: Everything was fine
Review: After some issues I was treated seriously and I am very grateful for that.

Title: Tragic
Review: Tragic. The package was expected to be delivered on 16th of April. I also mentioned during ordering that I would like to receive package as soon as possible because I won't be present at the adress from 19th of April. Of course there was a delay so 17th of April I contacted them and mentioned again that they have only two days left to deliver package. No response. 19th of April I wrote them an e-mail that we have to change the shipping adress because I am not there anymore and won't be able to pick up the package. Package finally arrived to old adress (my old company) on 25th of April, only 9 days later and of course today I got a reply to all my emails that change of adress is not possible anymore because package has been delivered. GREAT SERVICE!

Title: Worst rma i never seen.
Review: Worst rma i never seen.A year ago I bought a 1080ti graphics card, it cost me ‚Ç¨ 870. In October I had problems with her because of some blocks in games, I sent it up to 3 times and the card remains the same, they just want to give me longer so that the guarantee is exhausted.Never more Alternate

Title: very poor customer service.
Review: very poor customer service.tried to call tgem 6 time , never got any response from other side.no reply by email as well, i have no f**king idea when they are going to send my order , its been more then 3 days

Title: The worst customer service
Review: The worst customer service I have ever seen: intentionally unhelpful, arrogant and rude. Got my order (from Black Friday) cancelled because they wanted to avoid granting me the Black Friday promotions.

Title: perfect
Review: just perfect

Title: Got it before I expected
Review: Got it before I expected, great prices

Title: Alles top
Review: Alles lief gut

Title: Professional service and fast shipping.
Review: NaN

Title: many hidden cost
Review: They may have seemingly good prices, but this can double by 200% when they start doing individual deliveries and charging more delivery cost than the product is worth. Also the deliveries are delayed again and again and again, and even again.

Title: PRODUCT should have arrived after 3-4‚Ä¶
Review: PRODUCT should have arrived after 3-4 days, but after 7 it wast even been sent! I deleted my order, since there was no change for 1 in-time delivery, but here the same: no  answer for 2 days, no money back for 1 week...still waiting for my refund.Alternate.de: never again!FInger weg von Alternate.de, absolut nicht empfehlenswert, vor allem im Zusammenhang mit IDEALO.

Title: product arrived after 15 days!!!- although it was available when purchased
Review: The product arrived 8 days after the 7 days that they promised it would arrived, I waited 15 days for my product. when I bought the same product from Amazon it reached after 3 days. The delivary was also terrible. They told me to expect the product between 11:30-15:00 - no one came. and no one left a note in which neighboor they left the packet, I had to call Alterate and find out its in a store 350m away from me. Alternate didnt agree to conpensate me in anyway on the late arrival although it was a very neseccary product for me. . They also took their time to announce to me that there is a delay, so I wont have choice but wait for them. first they told it will be at their store on the 3rd but really it was on the 10th,  I don't recommand this shop at all. when I purchased the product was avvailable on their site

Title: I've ordered a phone 2 weeks ago and‚Ä¶
Review: I've ordered a phone 2 weeks ago and received nothing. Payment was captured for sure. I've sent numerous email requests and got no response in weeks. Call service is impossible to reach.

Title: I placed an order on 30.04
Review: I placed an order on 30.04, expecting the items would be delivered in 3 days, as mentioned on the website. It is now 13th of May and still has not arrived.I have sent two requests, one by email and one online and no reply.Unfortunately my German is basic so could not understand when I called.I would not order fro this company.

Title: The product (xiaomi mi a1 red 32gb) was‚Ä¶
Review: The product (xiaomi mi a1 red 32gb) was received on time. Price was also fair. Phone performing well. Overall a good experience till now.

Title: The package delivery was delayed
Review: The package delivery was delayed, not the same as mentioned when ordering the product. The outside package was a bit broken, but not inside. I was wonder, if they are taking care when packing the product. The price is good and excellent compare to other competitors.

Title: Perfect online trading
Review: Fast delivery, fair prices and best customer service! BUY HERE!

Title: Perfect
Review: The purchase process was simple and I received my item on time in perfect conditions and really well packed.

Title: Products avalaibilities not reliable ‚Ä¶
Review: Products avalaibilities not reliable (due to suppliers ?)Good support reactivity.Order cancelled after waiting too long for "restock", i'm now waiting for a "refund".

Title: Alles Gut
Review: Suppppppppppper Service

Title: Great!
Review: Good service, fast and reliable

Title: fast delivery
Review: i have searching for a BBQ and found this first on the dutch branch. but after some googling i found the same unit on the german  branch which is cheaper  ( inc  transport to the netherlands) so i ordered it through the german branch  and they do deliver to the netherlands .At first  i have some issue with paypal  but after a email  they give me a link where i can pay .And before i knew it  order is placed paid and received a a tracking number .Service is great and since my german is not great they do speak / write  in english . perfect service

Title: Very bad customer service
Review: Ordered a Backofen and a Auszugsystem. Had it deliveret to family in Germany. Delivery of the Bachofen was very late, so when I realised that the Ausszugsystem they had delivered first did not fit, I was told that it was too late to return. This is just not acceptable. First they should not sell me a piece of equipment that does not fit and secondly the should accept to swap it the the right one. DONT USE ALTERNATE if you are not absolutely sure that you do not have to return goods.

Title: USB enclosure defect
Review: MS Tech LU-379PS, Laufwerksgeh√§use war KAPUT!

Title: Sehr gut!
Review: Good contact before buying product about payment.Fast delivery.Product works excellent.

Title: Great Service !
Review: Bought a 55 inch TV of them, posted to Ireland no problem (still cheaper than here). Customer service was excellent, quickly replied to e-mails. My order was posted next day and arrived here 3 days later, I was delighted to see courier deliver it on a Saturday. Highly recommended online shop !

Title: A very nice experience!
Review: This is the first time I build up my own PC. And it is very pleasant using Alternate PC configuration tool. It is easy to use and you have a huge variety of components to choose from. And most of the component have the cheapest on-line price. Perfect! I would highly recommend Alternate for configuring your own PC.

Title: Samsung Aegis 600B W7Pro64
Review: 14" Notebook super in Hardware und checked so weit beurteilbar. Es funktioniert alles wie es soll! Sch√∂nheitsfehler w√§ren schlecht zu beheben aber akzeptabel. W√ºnschenswert w√§re eine detailierte Beschreibung, evtl. mit Bildern verdeutlicht. Danke

Title: Not the most logical website
Review: Having ordered and paid in full. Alternate suddenly found there was an issue with delivering from Germany to Denmark. I have ordered many things on the web in several different EU countries and have never before had any problems. Now why would that option be available on the web if it is not possible in the real world.  After not sending the goods but still "taking" the payment I was suggested by email to make my purchase on the Danish Alternate site. If they cannot ship from Germany - why wasn't automatically directed there in the first place when I selected Denmark as a delivery country? The Danish site is a very poorly, from German to Danish, translated site. After several days of delay payment was returned to my account. The biggest problem is however, that it eventually took more than a week to get the wanted goods that I expected in a next day delivery. Had the website been working correctly I might have considered becoming a returning customer.

Title: I had a terrible experience with Alternate stay away from it !!
Review: I bought a motherboard from alternate and it came faulty. so the next day i packed it to it's original package and sent it back requesting refund. But instead of refund they sent me the same faulty motherboard back ! After tens of emails phone calls they are refusing to refund me for the faulty motherboard. The company is a scum. Stay away from it for your  own good.

Title: rffffffffffffffffffffffffffffff
Review: fffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffff

Title: Great service and friendly team

Title: Saturn is stealing money from customers
Review: Saturn is stealing money from customers. Up to this date, I haven't received a refund from Saturn (amount of more than 1000 EUR), and I have been calling them many times. And it's always "it's not me, it's my colleagues", ‚Äûthe item didn‚Äôt reach the storage (after more than 2 months!!! and as if it‚Äôs my problem since i never received it)‚Äú, and still nothing... Every time I called, I was promised it would be solved within the day ( just to get rid of me) and then literally nothing happened (called at least 5 times, and have no idea what else to do).cannot believe! this is a robbery. Title: Dubious availability status of items
Review: TLDR: ordered articles that continue to be advertised as "available online" but saturn wont ship them to me and cancelled my order instead.I have ordered 4 articles from the online-store as presents before christmas which were all marked as "shipping in the next 2-3 days".Christmas has passed and the articles didnt arrive yet - fine for me, I can wait a bit longer.After 2 weeks I was contacted that 3 of the articles are no longer available to ship and I can get a refund, however when I looked at the online store 2 of them showed up as "available online".I asked about this and was simply told that they are not available. I asked if they would arrive if I ordered them from the website again but didnt receive a reply to that question.I was asked if I want a refund for 3 of the articles butbefore I could reply, my order was already cancelled.I also checked that day and all 4 of the articles were marked "available online" but for a higher price than I had ordered them for initially.I still havent got another reply from customer service, I dont know why Saturn advertises articles as being available, when they are supposedly not. This can maybe happen for a few days during christmas, but not for several weeks.My personal theory is, that Saturn is simply advertising lots of articles as being available for SEO and better Google results. First really disappointing experience with Saturn and will avoid them for the future

Title: Terrible online platform, terrible customer service

However, after visiting the store and also contacting customer service multiple times, the answer I got is my order is still under process. The staffs at the local store were at least helpful. They told me that they did not receive my order number from online platform and therefore, they cannot process it. They told me to wait for a few days. After that, I called the customer service, however, instead of being friendly, they told me that it is just a vacuum cleaner and I should not be annoyed about it. They even humiliated me via phone when I asked them what does it mean by being under process or what does it even mean for Express Abholung. They told me that they have already sent emails to the local store and I should have received some written responses from them. All are lies. Apparently, nobody processed my order and they don't even try to care. I couldn't give them even a star.

Title: Deceptive toward their customers
Review: On October 3, 2023, I placed an order for a Fridge Freezer Combination, washer dryer, and dishwasher. However, I later decided to change the Fridge Freezer Combination to a different model, but I was informed that this was not possible. Consequently, I had to cancel the entire order. I reached out to customer support and successfully canceled the order, receiving a confirmation email for the cancellation. I then proceeded to place a new order, making the change only to the Fridge Freezer Combination, while keeping the washer dryer and dishwasher the same.The estimated delivery date for this new order was set for the middle of November. To my surprise, when I contacted customer support to inquire about the status of my first order, they informed me that it had not been canceled and had already been shipped. However, I had not received the first order. This left me with two separate orders, both of which I had purchased through a monthly installment plan.In my attempts to resolve this situation, I encountered unprofessional and rude behavior from one of the customer support representatives, who abruptly ended the call. This whole ordeal has cost me a significant amount of time and has left me confused about my monthly installment payments. I now find myself in possession of two Fridge Freezer Combinations, two washer dryers, and two dishwashers. Unfortunately, my attempts to seek clarification from customer service have gone unanswered, with calls being abruptly terminated.Such actions are completely unacceptable, and I firmly believe that they violate consumer rights protected by German law. I hope that in the future, legal action will be taken against this company to hold them accountable for their misleading information and disregard for customer rights. While their prices may seem tempting, the time and frustration this experience has caused are simply not worth it. Dealing with this company has been emotionally and financially burdensome, and it is imperative that they are held accountable for their actions.

Title: A huge 80kg package was left on the ground floor
Review: I have ordered a quite bulky and heavy KOENIC KAC 12022 Air Conditioner and a window sealing kit for it on the official SATURN.de website. In the very beginning everything went very smooth: the day after I made an online order, I even got an email from the SATURN Customer Service asking for my phone number for the delivery (which makes sense, because when you deliver bulky items you have to be sure that the recipient is available and at home). Later I got a few notifications: first from the iLoxx Service-Team with a tracking number and approximate date/time when my order is going to be delivered, later - an SMS from the Wunschliefertag that suggested me to pick up a delivery date, and on the day of delivery (13.06.2023) one more SMS from IDS saying that my package is about to arrive. On 13.06.2023 my order has arrived. I went down to open the door (I live on the 3d floor without an elevator), but the person who delivered the order said that he is just a driver and doesn't have to lift the 80 kg box upstairs. I contacted SATURN Customer Support immediately, described the situation, but got an answer that usually the item is delivered to the apartment only in case the order was made directly from the Saturn offline store. Then I asked to somehow help to solve that problem, for example, to send some SATURN delivery workers to my address just to help to lift this huge 80 kg box upstairs (I even asked how much this service would cost). The only reply I got is that SATURN "does not offer such service". And here is the question to the Saturn Customer Service: how can you be so careless while sending such bulky items to your customers? I have already understood that in some cases you do not ship items by yourself and hire some external delivery services for that, but isn't it your responsibility to at least check who you hire and how your orders are being delivered? I think it is not a big deal to at least make sure that a bulky item that you send arrives with at least one professional loader who can lift it upstairs, and not only with a driver who drops the box on the ground floor and then leaves. P.S. It was a working day and I had to waste two hours of my work, because I couldn't leave the box with an expensive air conditioner inside unattended on the ground floor. This is very irresponsible of you.
Response: Hallo,wir bedanken uns bei Ihnen f√ºr die Bewertung. Gerne schauen wir uns das nochmals genauer an. Schicken Sie uns hierf√ºr bitte eine Mail, mit dem Betreff "Saturn Trustpilot", an¬†¬†bewertung@media-saturn.com. Wir freuen uns auf Ihre Nachricht.Viele Gr√º√üe - Ihr Saturn Team

Title: Paid money, no product delivery, no refund. Will seek legal action
Review: I had ordered a Phone which had to be cancelled within almost an hour. Saturn customer service via email said they can't do it and I simply only have to refuse the delivery. The money was 1,263 eurosAs per the instructions I refused the delivery. The package was sent to receiver on 1.11.2022 as given in the saturn website.It took only two days to deliver the product and it's been more than a week after sending back.Still the customer service center says they haven't got it back.I have been sending a lot of emails to which saturn no more replies.Also please don't tell me to email you on this bewertung*media-saturn.com (this is the email address with which you have been asking all these poor customers to contact with).I have already done it, and there is no response to it. I have also emailed you on kontakt*saturn.de. again no response to my recent emails.I have already opened a claim through paypal, through which I paid.I am going to escalate the claim in 3-4 days as there is no response from Saturn as usual.I never even saw the product and Saturn has been holding my 1263euros product for more than two weeks straight. If paypal fails, I am seeking legal action against this.
Response: Good morning,Thank you for your honest feedback. Please accept our apologies for the inconvenience caused. Title: Disrespect and Mis-Leading Information by Saturn/O2 Employee
Review: Dear Sir/Madamme at Saturn,I am writing this email to address a case of misleading information-sharing and disrespectful treatment by one of your employees standing at O2 desk at Saturn (within PEP Zentrum) in Neuperlach, Munich, Germany.Together with another co-tourist, we visited the aforemnetioned desk and bought two O2 sim-cards on 3rd October with 15 ‚Ç¨ registered under name of Lazgeen. The O2 staff promised us a 3.5 GB package to become active right after we insert the sim cards to our phones. We left Saturn and waited for hours, the internet package did not get activated. We visited Saturn again (which is away from our accomodation place several kilometers) on 4th October and waited in the queue for one hour. The staff told us we need to top up some 15 more euros again to get the internet package of 6 GB, saying that it will automatically get activated right after the top up. And we did top up 15 more euros at Saturn right away. Making the total amount 22 euros (which actually equaled more than what is needed to get a 6 GB internet package as per the announcements made available at Saturn. We waited and waited over and over. The package did not get activated. On the 6th October, I visited O2 desk at Saturn again. When I first asked the guy who was standing at the desk. He said I am super busy and you must speak German. I am a tourist, I speak 3 languages and unfortunately German is not one of them. He turned his back to me and left the desk. I waited because I have already spent four days going back and forth. which lasted for one hour, while he saw me in the queue all the time, he purposefully ignored me and waited to become my turn. When finally it was my turn, he said he can't help me. This time he only spoke German, where I had to translate what he said (which was disrespectfully meaning No, I won't help you). Given that we are in Germany for only several days (leaving to Italy soon), the three days we spent at O2 at Saturn and the disrespectful treatment and the misleading information which was provided to us really affected our psychology and our touristic tours, where we were having no internet. Hence, I am addressing this concern to your respective company as I strongly believe this attitude of such employees really affects the way people perceive Saturn. I did not know the employee's name but I describe him below: a skinny man, black color with a little beard and moustache. Best regards and I remain at your disposal should you require any further info.Zuhair Kh. Lazgeen00964 750 413 1629
Response: Hi,please note that your experience was passed by a issue with o2. Saturn is not the correct contact for experiences with o2 Stuff or o2 contracts. So please delete this review and use the possibly Trustpilot account of o2.Thanks in advance and Best regards
