Title: Shocking service
Review: Please read the full story, if you want to buy from Saturn!I bought a brand new fridge-freezer from Saturn on the 21st of July. After 5 days they told me it will be delivered from 1pm to 6pm with a notification 1 hour in advance. Carrier (Hermes) called me at 11:45AM and told me that it would arrive at 12PM!!!Ridiculous but it is just the start of our issue!When they brought the appliance I realised that it is a used device with a couple of scratches (as far as I saw). I refused it in front of the building (not inside) and the carriers told me that you will get a new one.I reached out to Saturn support (with a lot of effort) and understood that they don't have any replacement, contact person said you will get a refund asap.Next day they said "once your return reaches our warehouse, we will cancel the contract and initiate your refund."After 2 days I received an email that "order is currently in the internal returns process."It has been 5 days since that time and nothing!I contacted them today (3 August), and the fridge has not been delivered to their warehouse yet!!! Additionally they clarified that bank transfer may take a few banking days.If anyone from Saturn sees this review, please elaborate why I am pending for your internal process?

Title: Very bad customer service
Review: Edit. Increased score to 2 because product arrived within 2 additional days.Very bad customer service. Two different employees said the order was in stock even though I didn‚Äôt get the email for the second half of my order. We travel to the store because I was told it‚Äôs all in stock in the store! But when my Ukrainian relatives arrive, we get only part of my order. Now kids are disappointed that they travelled for nothing. If we hadn‚Äôt gone to the store, then that half order would expire after 4 more days. Why do they send me emails to come get half of the order? I didn‚Äôt order half an order. I ordered a full order. And why does central customer service not have proper stock information? I called in and spoke English with 2 different employees. They both said it‚Äôs all in stock. But when I called again when at the store, then they wouldn‚Äôt transfer me to someone who speaks English and hung up on me. I had to call in again and use google translate to get through it and I was told that it was NOT in stock and the order was being prepared and couldn‚Äôt be expedited faster. I‚Äôm furious. Wasting my time completely with this. Terrible shopping experience. And I was originally happy with the customer service when I called in the first 2 times. But this is just messy and unprofessional conduct. Saturn needs to get their policies and systems in order. And transfer customers to someone who can speak English if they can‚Äôt do it themselves. This was a confusing and unpleasant shopping experience.

Title: Terrible Buying Experience
Review: I went to Saturn today in Alexanderplatz in order to purchase a TV.While I was there I was approached by one of the store representatives.I Immediately asked him if they have the new TCL QLED 75C735 TV in stock, because I would like to examine it before I buy (to reduce the hassle of ordering it online and have to return it if i'm not satisfied).I was instantly asked by him why did I choose this TV? I replied because this TV is the only one that answers my needs and has the best specifications for mehe replied: NO IT DOESN'T. and asked me to come and sit with him by the service station.while we were sitting he claimed that TCL is a terrible company, with terrible TVs, that the picture quality is awful, and that there are better TVs in the store with OLED technology.I replied that i wasn't looking for an OLED TV and that one can't compare an OLED TV to a QLED TV or LED.He got a bit annoyed and claimed that QLED is the same technology as LED and there is no difference.I told him that he was completely wrong, and that not only that QLED has a way better picture quality, it has an extra layer of tiny particles in front of a regular LED backlight and that QLED IS NOT LED.Now he got really angry, put his head on the desk (like slamming it from frustration of talking to me) claimed that i don't know what i was talking about and that he is the professional and the knows the best because it was his work.After the initial shock, i told him that if that is so why on earth does SATURN sell this TV if it is such a terrible TV? he said that SATURN doesn't like to sell TCL TVs because they always have negative reviews and that I shouldn't buy it.At this point i was a bit confused and told him that at the moment the only stores selling this TV in Germany (by geizhals) are SATURN and MediaMark.Now he got really angry, said that i was wrong, i have no idea what i was talking about and that if i want i can order it online (and not from him).I looked at my wife who witnessed the entire situation and decided to put an end to this miserable experience, told him I was wasting my time with him and that he should really work on his communication and professional skills and left the store without buying the TV.Now the things i don't understand are:1. If a client comes to purchase a SPECIFIC brand/model, why do you try to force him to buy a different one? don't you think he did his homework and know exactly what he wants to buy?2. why do you trash talk about brands you sell and represent?3. Even if a customer is wrong, what is the point on arguing with him for 7 mins? what's the point on telling him "you don't understand what you are talking about, i know better, i work with TVs.." when you're clearly wrong and doesn't even know the initials of what QLED stand for or what the technology is or how it is being manufactured?4. How come a representative tell to a client to go and order the TV online and not close the deal in the store?5. How do you expect a client to have a positive buying experience after being treated like that, and want to order ANYTHING online or buy from you ever again?Please feel free to contact me for further information.

Title: Defective device (from Day0) and lack of support
Review: I have purchased a ‚ÄúRoborock S7 MaxV Plus‚Äù robot from Saturn on 11 Apr 2022. Right out of box, the device was not performing as advertised. I spent several hours for debugging (checking the manual/device setup). Unable to fix the problem myself, I took it back to Saturn on 16 Apr 2022. Salesman saw the problem and took-in the device for repair. I was informed that repair could take 2-3 weeks and I shall be informed by text once my device is ready.At this point, I felt bad, as I have bought the device with plus guarantee (PGARANTIE), money had been paid and I didn‚Äôt have a working device at home. In a very best case, the manufacturer could repair the device, but even then, Saturn has sold me a refurbished device at the price of a new one. As this situation is not acceptable by me and there is no reasonable solution from Saturn, my case is ending up in Amtsgericht (German court).In my opinion, one should only buy from Saturn, if he/she has1.	a lot of patience.2.	very good legal support.

Title: Device does not work, no response, no replacement
Review: I ordered two loudspeaker. When delivered, I realized that one worked, one did not. I informed Saturn immediately on Dec 31 via email and telephone that I need a replacement. Nothing happened. On Jan 6 I received an email asking me to cancel my order. I replied that I do not want my order canceled, but want a replacement.On the same day, I received a phonecall promising that I would receive instruction soon.I waited until Jan 17 and then called again. I was promised a call back within 24h. Nothing happened.On Jan 18, I called again. The person hang up on me.

Title: The worst customer service
Review: TL;DR: Saturn support ghosted me when I asked them to activate my purchased voucher. I purchased Xbox with Game Pass voucher from them, but I could not redeem the voucher. I've contacted to Xbox support and they informed me that the retailer was supposed to activate it firstly.I've contacted to Saturn support and they told me that the voucher was expired. I mentioned this to Xbox support and they sent me email saying that the voucher is not expired and it needs to be replaced or activated by Saturn.I've sent this information to Saturn and they asked me for the proof of the error message I get when I try to redeem the voucher. I sent the screenshot to them, but then they never replied to me for the last 8 days. I'm still waiting for hearing from them. The issue ticket number in case Saturn wants to take care of it finally: 220110-045292

Really disappointing. David@musicnow . Co. .za for your response on how you will resolve this issue?

Title: **Delivery Estimates are not Accurate**
Review: As a whole, Saturn will get you your product, but you can't trust them when they provide a delivery estimate. I had a shipment that had a delivery window from Friday to Monday. They didn't hand over the package to UPS until Monday, the last day of that delivery window. And then of course UPS pushed the delivery of the package to Thursday. Looking at their website now, if I were to order the same product today, they still claim it would arrive tomorrow, which is ridiculous. Sadly I travel on Wednesday (tomorrow) for an extended trip. So I'm working with UPS to refuse delivery, and trying to get Saturn to do something about it as well. We'll see how they handle it.As the product is expensive, I can't pick it up locally until I'm certain Saturn will return the money, so sadly I'll be traveling without this. Very disappointing, especially as it was a gift to improve the flying experience for my spouse.

Title: Do not buy large appliances from‚Ä¶
Review: Do not buy large appliances from Saturn. I purchased a washing machine and a fridge freezer from saturn and paid 30 euros for delivery and 30 euros to have the washing machine installed. The delivery came at 10am instead of between 12 and 5 as stated, which forced me to take a half days vacation from work.The delivery drivers told me that a part was missing to install the washing machine, and that I would need to pay an extra 10 euros cash (with no receipt) to use his one (very scammy, I felt like I was being taken advantage of since I'm a non-native German, but had no alternative).After paying the additional 10 euros cash, the washing machine was not correctly installed and leaked from the water inlet and outlet.I approached Saturn for some help and was offered none. They forwarded my complaint to the Spedition company (Hermes) who refused to offer any kind of refund because they were not given the chance to fix the issue (although it's impossible to fix coming at the wrong time and I couldn't wait 3 weeks for them to come and repair the bad job they'd done - and probably be told I'd need to pay extra cash for the privilege). I also had to buy a new part (the one that I had to pay the delivery driver for), because his one was broken.Saturn took zero responsibility for this situation despite me having just spent about a thousand euros with them and the service being advertised on their website as if it is provided by them. I did not order anything through Hermes, everything was via Saturn, and yet they take no ownership.I've never had such a bad experience ordering something online and Saturns customer service has been an absolute joke. At the absolute minimum I would expect to have the 30 euros installation fee refunded since it was not correctly installed, and honestly the delivery fee should be refunded too since it wasn't as advertised. I realise there's no way I'll get that 10 euros cash back.Saturn, if you're reading this, please do something to help this situation - I've never felt so taken advantage of buying something online in my life.

Title: Incompetent and irresponsible
Review: I ordered a mobile-phone with screen protection and assembly. The protection fell off after a very short time. I was referred by phone to a local Saturn shop, which I cannot and may not contact by phone, to clarify the issue before visiting in person. An email went unanswered. I had to drive there for over half an hour. There was no guarantee on the screen protector, which is why they didn't want to help me. After further investigation, it was found that the cell phone case and screen protector do not work with each other at all. So they sold me incompetent crap and didn't want to be held responsible for the damage. The management only offered new protection at half price. One employee was so embarrassed that he professionally installed the new protection for me. I'll never order from this company again. That was the last time.

Title: It was SO wrong
Review: I pay a LOT of money for a new fridge, taking care to buy the proper one to fit on my apartment and te be able to go through the stairs. When the INCLUDED delivery came here, they only take a quick look of the stairs and IN A VERY VERY VERY VERY RUDE way they say that they were not gonna take the fridge upstairs. I insist, saying thay I measured the stairs and I was pretty sure that it would work. But no, they say there was no way they were even gonna try it, and they could offer me to leave the fridge con the sidewalk, or to take it back and on their words "You can try to buy it again in about 3 or 4 months if Corona is over and you can get 4 people for the delivery" WHAT KIND OF ANSWER IS THAT? I had my old fridge outside waiting to be taken and all the food out. I told them to levae the fridge outside, because what other choice did I had? We took it upstairs without any problem with my roomate and one friend who came to help, because as a girl I don't hace the strengh enough to do it with only one more person. But it proves that they could and MUST do it, because that's THEIR JOB. I don¬¥t care how heavy the fridge is, I am a waitress and I don't refuse to take an oder when it's more than 2 plates because I only have 2 hands. I am SO SO SO SO angry whith this situation because I bought not only a fridge but a service with it, and the workers refuse to do their work, gave me a big problem, and then no one take responsabilty if something happened with the fridge and I had to risk to loose a lot of money if the fridge got damage during the lifting. I can't believe this happens, and I don't want to buy from you any more, and I reccomend all the people I know NOT to order here

Title: Nearly 2 months and counting for a repair?!
Review: Recently an AOC monitor I bought broke and I thought "OK, sucks, but it's on the verge of warranty, so I'll just send it in to repair".Well, close to seven weeks later and I still don't have my monitor back. Early last week I wrote customer support, which told me that they "immediately sent it to the manufacturer" and gave me a link and info where I can view the status of the repair. Through package-tracking I know that it arrived two days after I shipped it, so it apparently just sat there for more than five weeks gathering dust!To top it off the repair info only says "in progress" which is absolutely useless and I can't beleve that, even though COVID-19 is still going on, it takes that extremely long for a repair to go through and without ANY notice to the customer, that I had to go out of my way approach support to get any info on it whatsoever.The thing is I bought a lot there. So much in fact that I'm at max level in their bonus points program. To treat someone like that is really just unbelievable.Had I bought the same monitor not by saturn but on amazon and it broke, I would've gotten a new one in a matter of days.Almost SEVEN weeks and I'm still waiting for my monitor, Saturn!!! Where is it??

Title: Good enough for the price
Review: Very fast delivery. Simple installation. I skipped the instruction during the installation and didn't remove the transportation bolts. Machine was loud and jumping allover the place during  the spinning but after noticing mistake and removing bolts it is running properly. The washing process is quite. Spinning gets louder with the higher speeds but it is just a spinning sound not the other kind of rumble. Machine stays in place sturdy. I'm used to commercial dryers so drying process is leaving a lot to wish for me. No availability to set the temperature level only the time set up. The shortest drying cycle 30 minutes but the last minute lest for ever (for heavy cotton socks etc. more time needed). The door gets locked during the drying process, which is very annoying if I want to take something out before the end. I had to stop machine and pull the lever beneath service flap .There was also a very strong rubber tire like scent from a part underneath the machine. I have run a hygienic cycle at 90 degrees and the smell was very strong and awful. After that it went away. You can smell it a little but on the outside(I have machine for one day) . It doesn't leave that smell on the clothes after washing or drying. In my opinion it is a decent washing machine with drying option if you just want to dry something from time to time. But to dry everything or most of the washed stuff it will not substitute a separate washer and dryer. The quality of the machine is better than what I have expected. I think that for my needs it is worthy of the price .

I had them sent my AirPods to repair centre (under a warranty) due to an issue I was having with the mic, and then they decided to give me a new pair in an unopened box. However the product I was given was an earlier model of the AirPods which I couldn't tell from the box until a bit later, though I never opened the box. Afterwards, I got in touch with them multiple times by calling them, emailing them, and visiting them in the store in person, stating that I was given the wrong product by showing all the relevant paperwork; however I still didn't get an answer or a replacement of a new product after 8 silent weeks.

Title: Canceled my Order after 2 months waiting
Review: Canceled my order 2 months after I ordered it. The delivery should be in 2 weeks. Saturn said that they must do that because the product is sold out. Thanks for nothing. Its a shame that I became the information 2 weeks bevor delivery and after 2 months waiting. I couldn't use the offer from other websites on Black Friday and cyber Monday, because I trusted Saturn. One day bevor they canceled my order I had a call with an employee from Saturn and I asked about the date of delivery. He request me to have patience and say I will get it in 2 weeks. One day later they canceled. German version below. Stornierung meines Produktes 2 Monate nachdem ich es bestellt habe. Die Auslieferung sollte in 2 Wochen geschehen. Saturn sagte dazu dass es keine andere Wahl gab, da das Produkt ausverkauft ist. Danke f√ºr nichts. Es ist sehr schade dass ich die Information 2 Wochen vor Auslieferung und nach 2 Monaten warten erst erhalten habe. Ich konnte die Angebote auf anderen Websites an Black Friday und Cyber Monday nicht nutzen, da ich Saturn nat√ºrlich vertraut habe. Ein Tag bevor meine Bestellung storniert wurde habe ich mit einem Mitarbeiter von Saturn telefoniert und nach dem Liefertermin gefragt. Er hat mich um Geduld gebeten und gesagt dass das Produkt in 2 Wochen ankommen wird. Ein Tag sp√§ter haben sie die Bestellung storniert.

Title: Selling things they don't have, screwing their customers over on Christmas
Review: I bought an ebook reader online on Black Week 2020 (27th of November 2020, paid in advance). First, it was supposed to be available to pick up on 23rd of December. Then the lockdown began and I received an update from the shop, informing me there is a delay and my purchase will be sent to my home address on the 52nd week of the year 2020 (FYI, plenty of other shops of that kind still allowed their customers to come and pick up their ordered purchases). I kept waiting, it wasn't delivered. On 29th of December 2020 I received a message of exactly same kind, informing me it will be shipped on the 1st week of 2021. I'm SO CLOSE to writing the Customer Service and asking them how many of those damn messages am I going to receive yet in the course of the coming weeks and telling them to shove them AND my purchased item and give me my effing money back. Countless companies are ripping their A's off to stay in business and millions of people are losing their sleep, fearing unemployment and homelesness, and THIS is how Saturn Germany goes about its business. Thank you for ruining the remaining part of my child's Christmas, not only not allowed to see his grandparents but also not getting his Christmas present I promised him! It has been my first time I bought ANYTHING from Saturn and will surely have been THE LAST ONE.

Title: online ordering and billing is a mess‚Ä¶
Review: Bad online ordering system and customer service isn't concerned with making the process easy.I work for a large tech company and I tried to change billing details for my company address at the checkout but although there was an option to change the billing address, it wouldn't allow me to do it (kept changing it to the delivery address) so I thought, no problem, I would just email and ask for the change after purchase - I have done this in the past with other retailers without an issue.They didn't allow this, wouldn't change billing name to name on the credit card nor would they change to my company without proof. I may have understood their lack of interest in helping me if it was my fault but the problem is with their system.15 emails later I finally was able to get them to change billing address to my company after I sent a copy of my signature statement of my contract.It's fair to say that I won't be advising my company to purchase from them in the future.

Title: I ordered an Google Pixel 5 phone from‚Ä¶
Review: I ordered an Google Pixel 5 phone from their store the 2. of October which was paired with an offer in which I would get a set of Bose headphones when the order was done before the 14. of October. A good deal with the offer but a bad deal without the "free" headphones. Somehow Saturn got to blacklist me and they wrote me that my order was not accepted. I tried a bunch of times to order but without luck. Now almost a month later Saturn write to me by post that I can order the phone I just have to transfer the money to them. Well that's all great except the "order date" is now changed to the 24. of October and the offer hence no longer apply. I expect that Saturn gets a bigger profit margin on phones sold after the 14. of October. What a hoax! Order nr. 40721445 Thanks a bunch!

Title: I ordered a new dishwasher, delivery and installation a disaster !
Review: I ordered a new dishwasher, with delivery and installation. It was delivered, however the 3rd party company ( Hermes ) refused to fit it as ordered and paid for due to Covid 19 ? although the same company could deliver ? employees had no masks with them ? Hermes claimed it was clear to Saturn they could not install the dishwasher, and should not have taken the order ! Saturn is not directly contactable, only a call centre that advised me to visit the nearest store, and could not help further. It appears they are happy to accept orders online but block any further direct contact by telephone, basically no accountability, disaster service ! or rather NO SERVICE I will never shop by Saturn again, and would strongly advise anyone considering to buy from them to reflect very carefully ! They do not deliver the services they promise ! out source services to third parties, who do not deliver the service Saturn sold to its customers, and leave you trying to sort the mess out. In my case with a dismantled kitchen, and no direct way of contacting Saturn on the spot. COWBOYS and CROOKS, fast profit for no customer satisfaction. Well Saturn if you haven't already noticed the world is changing ! NO SERVICE does not represent the future.

Title: NEVER pay for connection (Anschluss) services - they won‚Äôt do it anyways
Review: I‚Äôve ordered 2 machines in the last 6 months from Saturn, both sent via Hermes. The first thing the delivery guys say is always: we don‚Äôt connect the machine EVEN in both cases I‚Äôve paid extra for the connection. 1. My wash machine was rejected connection because it had an extension cable. During purchase, there‚Äôs no visible ‚Äòconditions‚Äô written WHEN AND UNDER WHICH CIRCUMSTANCES the machines can be connected. 2. My dishwasher was delivered and again, it was not connected because it was a free standing machine and standing under the kitchen plate which does not have wall in either side is considered ‚Äòeinbau‚Äô. Again, I have already paid the connection fee, and the service was not delivered. On top, it was told to me that I had to disconnect my old machine for them to take it with them, although I‚Äôve also paid for its transfer. No matter what I pay, I never get a service in return. No information about the absolutely ‚Äòrandom‚Äô rules that only show up when two men standing in front of my door, with a 60kg machine and being threatening when asked to do what was already paid for. If I could disconnect my machine, I can connect the new one. What‚Äôs the point of paying Sb for it then? I did afterwards connected the machine myself, which took 15 mins in total, with no tools other than a screwdriver and a face time call to my brother. When I opened the door of the machine, I realized it was wet inside and there were water spots! THE MACHINE WAS USED ALREADY. Because I‚Äôve already connected it myself, they wouldn‚Äôt take return. Don‚Äôt bother paying for any extra service which you won‚Äôt get for some made-up rule at the last minute. If your kitchen is already in the condition that the guys would like it to be - you can do it as well in 5 mins if you are at all familiar with any too usage unlike me.

Title: If you shop online, shop elsewhere...
Review: This shop is good when you need some advise before purchasing something in their store. However if you want to shop online, do yourself a favor and turn elsewhere. I wanted to buy a new cell phone, looked it up online, and ordered it from the neerest store with on-site pick up. My expectation was that since they have the product in the store and I already ordered and payed for it I can pick it up the next day. BOY WAS I WRONG.... 3 days later, still no pick up notification, I call customer service (the phone is the whole time available in the store) and they apologize and tell me a pick up email is comming right away. NOPE, it didn't. Next day I call again, the first customer representative dodges my question by simply hanging up on me (smooth move...) the next one tells me the phone is no longer available and there will be a delay (the phone is of course still available in the store according to their web page). I thank him for his feedback and hang up. Few hours later I get a confirmation email I can pick up the phone. Took only 5! days.Went to the store, bud due to the Covid situation the queue of people was so long, I decided not to waist my afternoon. Will try again on a Monday....

But after all of my orders came, they came in great new conditions, sealed box etc. So minus 1 star for the lousy communication, otherwise everything's great as expected.

Title: SCARY EXPERIENCE in lack of‚Ä¶
Review: SCARY EXPERIENCE in lack of accountability, service, and competence for ONLINE shopping. (In-store shopping is fine)I ordered an iPhone that was advertised on sale. For smaller deliveries, SATURN only works with DHL. DHL is a delivery service that is grossly incompetent. Horror stories abound-just read the reviews and avoid them at all costs.  I tracked my order online but DHL claimed they could not deliver my phone because they could not find my address and name on the door buzzer. My name is clearly printed along with all the other neighbors who live in my building and I live on a major street clearly marked on any map. (I also provided my phone number on the purchase form)I spoke to two customer reps at DHL who could not tell me WHERE the package currently was or if they would redeliver and if so, WHEN. Other delivery providers usually at least leave a notice for redelivery. So, I called Saturn customer service. They told me the package will automatically be returned to them. Saturn said that DHL does NOT redeliver. It would be nice if DHL and Saturn got their stories aligned.The first Saturn representative told me she had to transfer me to a second department. The second department rep said the phone will be returned to them but that I have the option to file a notice to a THIRD department that will review the case in 2-3 days. I asked what is the point of that if the phone is already being returned. Would they then send it out again?  She said that she could not tell me what this third department does; in fact, she could not even give me a name of this department. It was some mysterious division apparently shrouded in secrecy.So I asked her what was the point then of waiting for the third department. What could I hope for? I was wondering if it was worth it. The customer service rep just said, "I am hanging up now, we are going in circles". She hung up on me. So I have no idea if this matter is now in a third department or if I am being reimbursed for a phone that was and will never be delivered because a delivery man from DHL could not read.Since I know the phone was not delivered; I can see from my balcony when deliveries arrive and I was waiting for it,  I toy with the thought that Saturn may have falsely and recklessly advertised a product they actually did not have in stock (bait and switch) and the rest is just a cover-up to save face at customers expense..?All customer service representatives at DHL and Saturn are defensive and resort to talking over you and barraging you with fast German when you challenge their staid parroted comments by asking a logical question that would seem normal to a customer in any other country in the world. I was considering opening a BUSINESS Account with them, but If they can't manage to deliver something as small as an iPhone, how can they manage a whole set of office supplies worth a few thousand euros???? Does the DHL guy say he couldn't find you and ship back?  I did due diligence and confirmed this policy with a business rep; she confirmed that business customers get the same treatment. SO BUYER BEWARE: SATURN IS NOT IN CHARGE, DHL ISWhen you order from SATURN you are at the mercy of that ONE delivery moment from DHL, and if they decide to skip your address on their route or do not know how to read, your purchase/s will defacto be returned to Saturn. Your money will, of course, be refunded, but you will have lost valuable shopping and waiting time. You are better off buying from a company that communicates with a reliable delivery provider, honors the consumer and requests repeat attempts. (Amazon.de is very good at that, never lost a purchase through them!)No business or private customer should deal with a company that fails to deliver, and insults you in the process. Here the customer is not king, DHL is ;-)

Thanks Saturn for using the worse delivery people in the world.

Title: WORST ONLINE SERVICE EVER! NOT RECOMMENDED
Review: I am very disappointed with Saturn‚Äôs online shopping service. I made an order on the 17.09, and I'm still waiting for my order to arrive (=12 working days so far), even though they communicate in their website it takes between 4 and 6 working days. I just received an email saying that it will take longer due to an error in the shipping but Saturn didn‚Äôt communicate how many days more. After waiting 30 min on the phone for their customer service to answer, I am told that the delivery is expected on Saturday 28.09. However, it didn‚Äôt arrive and I had to call and wait for 25 min again to be told that now the delivery date is estimated for Tuesday 01.10. Today, 01.10, I had to call several times (and wait an average of 25 min for their customer service to reply) to check what happens with my order. They told me that it arrived to Saturn Frankfurt Zeil, however I cannot pick it up as the store told me there is a problem. They asked me to wait for another 1 to 2 days. How many more days do I have to wait?On the other hand, I got a small compensation for this inconvenience after 1 day the order was delayed. However, this compensation is the same regardless the days you wait and the time you loose to get in contact with them...

Title: Das ist katastrophie

When I tried to reach the customer service I had to wait everytime more than 10 min before talking to someone...Today was the worst day, I had fridge delivery today and to the worst Saturn has given my house number as 3 instead of 38.  I had to run to Hermes people on the road to tell them that I was waiting at 38.  And I had to literally call them loud, when the person saw me didnt respond at all...I thought they are taking the fridge back, and tried to call the number and they picked at 3rd call.  Then I had to be rude to get my parcel, they agreed to come back finally when I said are you delivering or not.But overall I really felt bad, as I paid and for my product I had to run behind them to get it delivered.I would suggest if you are booking by saturn ask them not to send parcels via Hermes.  And infact I would say better avoid Saturn until you are taking from store.

Title: Unzuverl√§ssigster Verk√§ufer! / Totally unreliable shop!
Review: Unzuverl√§ssigster Verk√§ufer!(text in English below)Am 18.03.2019 habe ich bei der SATURN ONLINE GMBH (saturn.de) einen Elektroherd (Exquisit ECM6-4 Inox) bestellt, sowie dessen Anschluss und Lieferung. Das Geld (404,90 EUR) wurde sofort √ºber Pay Pal von meinem Konto abgebucht. Die Lieferfrist laut dem Verk√§ufer - innerhalb von 4 Wochen (d.h. sp√§testens 14.04.2019 bzw. Kalenderwoche 15).Binnen der angek√ºndigten 4 Wochen habe ich vom Verk√§ufer weder den Herd noch irgendwelche Nachricht bekommen. Ich habe noch weiter gewartet, aber erfolglos - der Verk√§ufer hatte wahrscheinlich √ºberhaupt nicht vor, mir den Herd zu liefern bzw. mich von der Verz√∂gerung in Kenntnis zu setzen, was ich √§u√üerst frech finde.Am 24.04.2019 habe ich beim Verk√§ufer √ºber meine Bestellung nachgefragt und habe erst dann von ihm irgendwelche Info bekommen. Meine Lieferung habe "sich versp√§tet" und w√ºrde "voraussichtlich(!) in der Kalenderwoche 20(!)" im Lager des Verk√§ufers eintreffen. "Direkt im Anschluss" erhalte ich die Auftragsbest√§tigung und meine Rechnung. Erst dann w√ºrde mein Produkt "umgehend(!)" an meine Anschrift geschickt.Also der Verk√§ufer hat mir weder eine Begr√ºndung der Verz√∂gerung noch √ºberhaupt eine definitive Lieferfrist angegeben.Am 6.05.2019 (19 Kalenderwoche) hat mir der Verk√§ufer best√§tigt, dass mein Herd bei im in der darauffolgenden Woche (KW 20) eintrifft. Ich habe aber weitere mehrere Wochen umsonst gewartet. Und zwar wieder habe ich weder meinen Herd noch irgendwelche Nachricht vom Verk√§ufer bekommen.Ich musste Ende KW20 wieder √ºber meine Bestellung nachfragen und habe Anfang KW21 wieder die gleiche Antwort gekriegt: die Lieferung habe "sich versp√§tet", nun war die Rede von KW22 mit denselben Worten ("in unserem Lager", "direkt im Anschluss", "umgehend" usw), wieder keine Angabe einer definitiven Lieferfrist.So frech agiert die SATURN ONLINE GMBH ihren Kunden gegen√ºber, wenn sie ihr Geld bekommen hat! Der Verk√§ufer hatte wahrscheinlich wieder √ºberhaupt nicht vor, mir fristgerecht den Herd zu liefern bzw. mich von einer erneuten Verz√∂gerung zu benachrichtigen. Es kommt mir schon vor, dass mein Geld wurde durch den Verk√§ufer einfach als kostenloser Kredit ausgenutzt, da er gar keine Lieferbereitschaft gezeigt und mich √ºber die Verz√∂gerungen nicht informieren gewollt hat.Als ich am 22.05.2019 das Pay Pal √ºber die Situation informiert habe, habe ich vom Verk√§ufer eine E-Mail bekommen, die Bestellung sei storniert worden. Ich musste aber den Verk√§ufer noch 3(!) mal anschreiben, um endlich eine Best√§tigung hinsichtlich der H√∂he des zu √ºberweisenden Betrags zu bekommen.Im Endeffekt habe ich umsonst √ºber zwei Monate auf die Lieferung gewartet und SATURN ONLINE GMBH hat √ºber zwei Monate mein Geld kostenlos benutzen k√∂nnen. Ich frage mich, ob das auch 3, 5 oder 10 Monate gedauert haben k√∂nnte!Ich habe also √ºberhaupt keine Lust mehr, irgendwas beim SATURN zu kaufen, da es ihm nicht zu vertrauen ist, und empfehle allen, sich lieber an einen zuverl√§ssigen Verk√§ufer zu wenden.PS: Alles oben geschriebene kann ich durch den E-Mail-Verkehr mit dem Verk√§ufer nachweisen.Aleksei B.--------------------The shop is totally unreliable!On 18 March 2019 I made an order on saturn.de which included an electric cooker (Exquisit ECM6-4 Inox), installation and delivery. The money (404,90 EUR) was debited from my account via PayPal on the same day. The time of delivery declared by the shop was "within 4 weeks" which meant no later than 14 April 2019 or calendar week #19).During these 4 weeks I have received neither the cooker nor any message from Saturn. So I waited another week and a half - in vain. The shop probably wasn't going to send me the prepaid cooker at all, neither were they going even to let me know about the delay which I find absolutely disrespectful.On 24 April 2019 I texted Saturn customer service - only then they admitted there was a delay in the delivery without any explanation and without providing a definite delivery time. So the answer read: "Your delivery is delayed", "Your product is expected(!) to arrive at our warehouse in 20th(!) calendar week", "immediately after that(!) You will receive the order confirmation and the invoice. After that Your product will be promptly(!) sent to Your address".On 6 May 2019 (19th calendar week) the shop confirmed that the cooker would arrive at their warehouse in 20th calender week. But it turned out to be another lie as I ended up waiting in vain another several weeks! And as you probably imagine they didn't notify me again of another delay in the delivery!So I had to contact them again at the end of 20th calendar week just to get several hours later (already 21st calendar week) absolutely the same answer: "Your delivery is delayed", "Your product is expected(!) to arrive at our warehouse in 22nd(!) calendar week", "immediately after that(!) You will receive the order confirmation and the invoice. After that Your product will be promptly(!) sent to Your address".Yet again no explanation, yet again no definite delivery term! That cheeky treats SATURN ONLINE GMBH their customers when they have gotten their money. I have a strong impression that the shop wasn't actually going to deliver the cooker in a timely manner as well as it wasn't ever going to let me know about another delay.It looks like they just wanted to use my (and probably I was not the only one to order that cooker) money for free as they have shown no willingness either to send me the product I had prepaid or to notify me of the delays.As I informed PayPal about the situation on 22 May 2019 and told them I could no longer negotiate with the shop, I got an email from the shop reading the contract had been canceled. But it took me then another three (!) attempts via email to receive their confirmation regarding the reimbursement amount and term.Thus in the end I have spent over two months in vain and SATURN ONLINE GMBH have had my money for free during this time. I wonder if it could last 3, 5 or maybe 10 months!So I'm never again going to buy anything from Saturn as they just are not to be trusted and I suggest everybody to choose a reliable shop over them.PS: I can prove all the above-stated with the email correspondence.Aleksei B.

Title: Can't use my 'unlocked phone' without‚Ä¶
Review: Can't use my 'unlocked phone' without an EU sim: I bought a Samsung Galaxy from Saturn, with the promise that it is internationally unlocked, granted I talked for 5 minutes with a German sim card. I did that, after getting a verbal promise from both the in-store staff and the call center that it would be enough. I left Germany, and lo and behold, it didn't work. I tried calling, messaging and emailing numerous times, asking for a code/something that would unlock the European lock that I was PROMISED would not be a thing, or to send the device back, and received no help from Saturn. This has been going on for OVER A MONTH, and I am willing to pay for that code, just let me use my phone number.

Title: Customer service is unacceptable.
Review: Background:I purchased a new phone online. The first time I made the purchase the transaction timed out because I had limited connection and I was unable to update my banking app on time. I tried again, and it seemed to work.Reason for contacting help service: I realised that I had made a misake with my DHL post number, I contacted the online chat service to ask if I can change this. Problem 1: No English. I am asked to use a translator, but the helper is impatient.Problem 2: I am informed that my order is denied. Despite getting an order confirmation and having the money deducted from my bank account. I am told that my order was denied because of a verification problem, and that they could not help me any further. Problem 3: The helper was also unable/unwilling to help understand the reason for the failure in any way further.Problem 4:  I received no message of a failed order. I received no proper support. The service was shocking. Back to Amazon, the experience is not worth the saving.I have saved the chat details for reference. I have cancelled my order using the online "Wiederuf" just in case the helper was mistaken.

Title: 300+ euro lost and 8 days for nothing
Review: *√úbersetzung in Deutsch ist unter Englisch.*8 days after my order, they informed me that the goods are not available.An order for 2 items in total 2000 Euros (extra 14.99 Euro for the shipping... ) with the Black Friday discount. That day I could find the same items on a few other places. Because of the bad service at Saturn, I lost the opportunity to save 300+ Euro. I received some kind of feedback on 7.12. The order was made on 23.11.The cancellation from their side was on 30.11.Not only I won't buy anything from their chain store, but they also harmed the brand that I was looking for, for not providing the correct item supply information which causes me to search for alternatives. And yes, I'm much more happy with my new brand choice!*DE*8 Tage nach meiner Bestellung wurde mir mitgeteilt, dass die Ware nicht verf√ºgbar ist.Eine Bestellung f√ºr 2 Artikel im Gesamtwert von 2000 Euro (extra 14,99 Euro f√ºr den Versand ...) mit dem Black Friday-Rabatt. An diesem Tag konnte ich dieselben Gegenst√§nde an einigen anderen Orten finden. Wegen des schlechten Service bei Saturn habe ich die M√∂glichkeit verloren, 300 Euro zu sparen.Ich habe am 7.12 eine Art Feedback erhalten. Die Bestellung wurde am 23.11. Gemacht.Die K√ºndigung von ihrer Seite erfolgte am 30.11.Ich kaufe nicht nur nichts in ihrem Laden, sondern sie haben auch der Marke, die ich gesucht habe, geschadet, weil ich nicht die richtigen Informationen zur Lieferung von Gegenst√§nden geliefert habe, die mich veranlassen, nach Alternativen zu suchen. Und ja, ich bin viel zufriedener mit meiner neuen Markenwahl!

Title: Incompetent customer service
Review: After bringing a suddenly malfunctioning external hard drive back for repairs to Saturn we received an e-mail a few days later telling us that the device is available for pickup. At the pickup the store clerk told me that due to mechanical damage the warranty is void and he needs to charge me 15 Euros. The hard was never dropped or anything of that sort so that seemed unreasonable but okay 15 Euros was not the highest bill. I asked if the device is working now. They did not let me try it out in the store and only said it should work because they charged for working time. After coming home and testing it turned out that the hard drive is still broken and we were charged 15 Euros for nothing. Thanks but no thanks Saturn. That is not how you treat customers.

Title: Avoid Saturn ordering online!
Review: I have recently moved to Germany and I had to buy a washing machine. I had to order it online because the type I was looking for was not in stock. I have processed the order and I was waiting for the delivery 11 Days MAX they said. After 12 days I called customer service and the lady there was rude. Not speaking English, ok I get that, so I tried to speak German. She checked the system and she saw it was not even ordered and she just said, it is in transit, next week. Next week came, no washing machine. I call again, this time I am in luck, I get a girl that speaks English. We started making progress. We are cut off. I call again, a guy answeres the phone and I ask if he speaks English. He says, no and that nobody speaks English and yet he understands everything I say. . . In English. I tell him, that I spoke with a girl in his office not 5 min ago, that spoke English. He just cuts the call. I call back and get the same girl. We come to the bottom of things, the washing machine was in the system, but was not ordered at all, not even by the girl who took the call the first time. The girl I spoke to the first time I called saw it was not processed yet did nothing at all. I cancel the order and request the refund. I am not waiting another month for the washing machine.Avoid Saturn, with the exception of the English speaking girl, their customer service is unhelpful, unkind and they are lying.

Title: Dont trust cashback offers from Saturn Hannover for camera lenses
Review: I bought a professional grade 50mm canon f1.2 at Saturn Hannover.  They offered me a discount and a further cashback after filling some info at Canon DE website.  After I did this,  I was informed by canon that the lens were NOT new and therefore did not qualify for the cashback.  Given that Saturn sold the lens as NEW used the cashback as an enticement during the sale process, they had the responsibility to know that the lens were not eligible for cashback. I felt scammed by the store.  They subsequently refused any responsibility.  I can only recommend prospective buyers to avoid doing business with Saturn Hannover.

Title: Very Bad Customer Service
Review: I recently purchase an inkjet printer cartridge and bought the wrong one. I was supposed to buy epson multipack 29 but got epson multipack 18. My fault understand my mistake. I come back home realize i have purchase the wrong one. I do not open anything keep everything intact and go back the next day to get it replaced. To my surprise the people at Saturn told me i cant get it replaced. This is the worst type of customer service anyone can do. In Germany, you have the possibility to get refunded anything within the time frame of 14 days and all i wanted was to buy a different cartridge that also costs the same price. I had to argue for one hour to get those replaced. I would never in my life ever go back to Saturn to purchase anything. They should close their stores and maybe learn what Amazon do. I have had the worst experience i could ever imagine

Title: I do not recommend to make purchase  anything from Saturn.de ONLINE STORE!
Review: Before I made order I contacted the Saturn.de online support and asked if I can make order from internet Saturn.de store, pay with PayPal and collect the goods when I came to the Germany. (I accentuated, that I am not a resident of the European Union!)   During the receive an order, in SATURN Markt Chemnitz,  employee refused to provide my a ‚Äútax free‚Äù form. Justifying this by the fact that I was made online order and pay for it with PayPal.I understood that offline stores are only a franchise.(I contacted with store workers  in another Saturn offline store and they told my that they cant help with solving the problem. And recomended to contact the online support) . I contacted  online support and got the answer!   If I'm not a diplomat and not customer of Helgoland (customs and VAT freedom) and B√ºsingen am Hochrhein (applicable Swiss customs and economic rights). I cant get the  VAT refund.I do not recommend to make purchase  anything from Saturn.de ONLINE STORE! If you want to buy something ‚Äì go to the nearest offline Saturn store and buy there! My experience cost me 127 EUR! Don't duplicate my mistakes!                                                                                Best regards Vladimir.

Title: The online shop is simple and it works‚Ä¶ Bad customer support
Review: The online shop is simple and it works how expected. But if need a service for your mobile phone which you bought with a contract you will be lost! It took them 6 weeks to get the smartphone (Pixel 2) fixed and the communication was really really bad. They always wrote "be patience". But if they can√Ñt give ayou feedback what is happening and they have no idea what the status is, this is not a satisfying answer. On top they send my phone back without the original packaging, which I included in the shipping for transport and also i wrote it on the paper they required. I can√Ñt highly NOT RECOMMENED buying stuff at Saturn if you have ever problems.... Oh by the way... My phone was only 2 weeks old... so I owned it for already 8 weeks and was able to use it only 2 weeks. I am still waiting fopr response of this crappy service!Edit: Eine Entschuldigung ist sch√∂n und gut, ich habe immernoch Probleme mit eurem Service, da noch immer meine OVP fehlt und ich noch immer auf eine Gutschrift warte. Unglaublich ..... Ich komme mit diesem Support nicht mehr aus dem Kopfsch√ºtteln raus... Vielleicht solltet ihr mal hier anfangen.

Title: racism
Review: It‚Äôs my first time to write a feedback or a review online, but I wanted to let everyone knows what happened today.I am originally from Israel, and I live and study in Berlin. My german is not good yet but I‚Äôm working on it.I went to Saturn in Mall of Berlin on January 26th 2018 around 1 PM, I was looking for a screen protector for my iPhone and I approached the first gentleman there and I said:‚ÄúHallo, I‚Äôm looking for a iPhone X screen protector‚Äù.The gentleman didn‚Äôt even bother to look at me and he kept looking at his computer screen and said in German.‚ÄúI don‚Äôt speak English, only Deutsch‚Äù.and waved with his hand to me to go away and not bother him because simply he doesn‚Äôt speak english.I told him politely, ‚ÄúIs this the way to deal with your customers?‚ÄùHe said in English ‚ÄúThat guy speak english‚Äù, pointing at his colleague.I was really shocked and went to the other gentleman, and said:‚ÄúHello, first I just want to tell you, your colleague refused to help me and said he doesn‚Äôt speak English ‚Ä¶.‚Äùhe interrupted me and said:‚ÄúHe doesn‚Äôt have to speak English‚ÄùI said ‚ÄúBut your store is in the mall, and most people here are tourists and don‚Äôt speak German‚Äùhe replied ‚ÄúYeah, but we are in Deutschland we speak Deutsch‚Äù.I left the store feeling really bad after experiencing for the first time what racism is like.I understand that some people don‚Äôt speak English.But there‚Äôs a better way to tell customers to approach other colleagues if they need help.If the first gentleman said (Even in Deutsch) ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt speak English, but my colleague over there does, please ask him for help‚Äù.If he just said that I would be apologizing to him for not being able to understand or speak Deutsch.In the other hand, how come Saturn hire people in their branch in the mall (where a big part of their customers are tourists) who don‚Äôt speak English.
Response: Vielen Dank f√ºr die konstruktive Kritik. Wir w√ºrden uns freuen, wenn Sie uns die Chance geben, mit Ihnen noch einmal Kontakt aufzunehmen. Gerne k√∂nnen Sie uns hierzu Ihre Schilderung an shop@saturn.de senden.

Title: Paid for installation, received leaking washing machine
Review: I purchased a washing machine with installation service. There are water-in and water-out connections for my machine. Guys came in, connected water-in and said that I have to purchase extra connector for water-out and left. I could not check their work since machine was not installed. And of course they were too hurry so they just left. After I purchased what they said and connected water-out, water-in connection started to leak! So it was not properly installed by that team. I asked saturn about fixing this and another team came and said that I need another water connection for water-in. They rejected to fix this with gummy-rings and their tools and just left. First team did not say nothing about water-in is inproper! Again, I purchased what they asked for, but the machine is still leaking. After my next request saturn rejected to send me a team for finishing installation which I paid for and which was not completed.So, I purchased installation service for 30 euros and I have to install machine by myself since installation team did not mention what is wrong from the beginning. Now I need to purchase extra tools and spend my time for finishing installation which I paid for.

Title: Good price/Quick delivery/bad user experience - website crashing + payment options
Review: I bought a Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge through the online shop of Saturn recently and this is how my experience was:- amazing discount on the phone- because of the big discounts, the website was crashing continuously- as I had a voucher of 100 EUR to spend on Saturn online, which was issued by a third party, I could not figure out how to enter it in my final payment. 13 digits + 4 digit PIN code. Saturn helpdesk over the phone was NOT helpful at all and quite unfriendly to be honest. Saturn helpdesk over chat was friendly enough to explain to me how it works. Overall, I would say you should work on making this much more straightforward, as there are 2 different approaches for using vouchers or discount codes on your payment system and that is not clear at all.- Payment methods - it is not clear that an international credit card is not accepted, the lady over the live chat made that clear to me while purchasing. Good thing I have a German debit card, so I could still get this phone.- Delivery was quick and painless - happy about that!

Title: Absolutely horrible service
Review: 1 my review will be in english, my apologies.2 after ordering my oven, i get a notification that my item is in saturn kleve, then 1 day later i get another email that its not , not a problem for me as i can wait for it.3 i try to call the saturn kleve store maybe for 5 days of the week with 15 minutes wait time for someone to pick up the phone....NOBODY EVER PICKS UP THE PHONE IN THIS STORE, AS IF THE STORE DOESNT EXIST. I wanted to know the status of the item and maybe check if there are other ones available, but more importantly i wanted to know when does this store close on december 31,2016.4 my item arrives and i have an email, finally5 i drive all the way from Belgium to pick it up and i am literally standing at the door at 14:02pm on 31st of december. The store closes at 14:00pm! I beg and plead with many people of the store but nobody wants to help. Yet nobody can also explain why didnt anyone ever pick up the phone or decide to inform all customers by putting the special working hours on their website. All they wanted was to have me leave the door area so they can lock it, this means they were ready with cash stations already closed at 14:00. This means that they closed everything before the closing times as it takes at least 10 minutes per cashier desk to close. So they could have helped but chose not to.Absolutely ridiclous customer service and no shame in employees to understand the customer who travelled from far distance.6 i founnd the same oven online on sale the same day with free delivery. Problem solved.
Response: Ihren Standpunkt k√∂nnen wir sehr gut nachvollziehen. Wir w√ºrden uns freuen, wenn Sie uns eine E-Mail auf Deutsch an shop@saturn.de zur Kl√§rung zukommen lassen.

Title: Worst service I have ever had
Review: Goods were ordered and paid online.  In confirmation, received on email, was written to have Passport with you and confirmation of order. When I came yesterday to shop, personal on info desk asked also for Anmeldebestatigung.... Normally if it is necessary to show this document when you pick up you wares it should be written! To avoid to come 2 times to shop! Client is paying for goods and should not come 2 times to pick it up, because merchandiser is not providing full info! And what if I was staying in Hotel??? What kind of Anmeldebestatigung can be provided in this case??? Personal with ‚Äúhappy‚Äù face even did not wanted to look on credit card... Very unprofessional!Good that I remembered that I have a photo of Anmeldebestatigung. (It was already after I left info counter)   Had to come second time and to stay in long queue, because shop was full with customers... and only one person was serving clients with speed of turtle and ‚Äúhappy‚Äù face...Never again will buy something in this shop! And will not recommend anybody to do it here. Better to pay more money but to receive good service!

Title: Mostly great when everything works out, and good service, but questionable decisions.
Review: Bought 2 expensive PCs, external HDs, cables, etc. in their physical store and WILL KEEP DOING SO - basically no complaints. But there were a few things that should be mentioned of my several years of Saturn experience:1) Got a set of PC speakers for ‚Ç¨60 ("Trust 2.1Ultimate Bass GTX 38") I returned - because I heard some weird overtones, so I played a pure sinus sound with a sound editor. Turns out that the right speaker created an overtone - *when playing a pure sinus*, the sound every other sound consists of. (Some analysis revealed that the sub woofer frequency separating filter must be the problem.) Insufficient. Well, then I got replacement speakers - same model. Same flaw. Told Saturn - but they keep selling them *knowing of the problem*. Bad, Saturn. Btw., I found out that of this specific speaker type, about 50 had been sold by the store, and about 15 had been returned. Since the problem is not *very* obvious (but clearly audible), I'd say this confirms that these speakers should not be sold, and the manufacturer should be informed.2) Got a 27" flat screen monitor for PC for ‚Ç¨260. Turns out that it has linear gamma, which is completely unthinkable for the vast majority of desktop PC users - the whole WWW was designed for a monitor gamma of 0.55 instead of 1.0 so it looked a lot too bright. Got it fixed on Windows via some calibration tricksery, but switching to TV forced me to use one of the monitor's built-in flavor modes, which does not correct the gamma, but relatively improved the image a lot (while also over-saturating it :P). I should have returned that thing right away. Anyway, one day I feel like speaking to one of their store people about this and the response I got is that *that* level of special interest perfectionism can't be served there. Realize that just because the word "gamma" whose meaning here you might not know is the problem, we're not talking about some problem only a scientist might observe - everything is too damn bright, and *every* *last* (trained) DTP artist knows exactly what I'm talking about. The average user would know the flaw, too, they would just not know its name.You can't sell such a screen in a standard media store, especially not without explicitly informing about this! Bad, Saturn.3) Got an ASUS PC (Never again.), returned it. Got an identical model as replacement, returned it too because same problem - a clear defective contact. Pushing the case at a certain place caused a sound inside (probably HD). Plus there were problems setting the PC up (with >30 years of IT experience which includes setting up *at least* 10 PCs, the fault was surely not mine). That was before 2014, therefore I don't have more details. But what I do know is that the fault was so clear, the PC should never have left the factory floor, neither should the two or three Saturn people who stood around me in the return office have loudly pondered that the fault was possibly just intended behavior. I felt like surrounded by crazy people. At least they did accept the return.4) Online contact form at saturn.de: You have to enter the email address twice as a security measure, but those who are clipboard-enabled and copied it from their email program are out of luck: They disabled pasting into the second field. Wrong decision. Doubly wrong because they did not disable pasting into their first field: You could type into the second field, then copy to the first. So, those who would type and therefore might make a mistake can circumvent it. But those who would copy correctly from their email program in the first place are out of luck. Bad, Saturn.BUT THERE'S AN UPSIDE HERE: Jan 2015, when you'd type a too long text into the contact form, you would not get an ok-message as usual, and also not a hint that you need to shorten your text, instead you'd get "The connection was reset". I just tested that again with the same text - no problems. There's progress!***SUMMARY:*** If you have a problem, they help you (e.g. you get your money back). When you get in touch with the ugly infrastructure in the background that you find almost everywhere in the industry, you see that it's - of course - all about the money, so defective PCs or speakers are *knowingly* sold as long as the customers don't complain. So, take a close look at the item you're buying and return it in case you find a problem. They'll sure not stop selling it, but they will take good care of you otherwise.Btw., I mailed Saturn about all of this in one mail and that I think this shouldn't fly. I got a canned response three days later, and that was all:"Sehr geehrte Damen und Herren,vielen Dank f√ºr Ihre Nachricht.Wir sind dankbar f√ºr jeden Denkansto√ü und jede konstruktive Kritik, die es uns erlaubt, unsere Prozesse zu optimieren. Daher vielen Dank, dass Sie sich die Zeit genommen haben, uns Ihren Standpunkt mitzuteilen. Ihre Kritikpunkte leiten wir gerne an die entsprechenden Stellen weiter, die diese in die Diskussion um zuk√ºnftige Verbesserungen einflie√üen lassen werden.F√ºr die Ihnen entstandenen Unannehmlichkeiten, m√∂chten wir uns ausdr√ºcklich entschuldigen."------------------------------------------------Now this is unbelievably epic. See what kind of company Saturn is? Again, I like to buy there, but they are just as talk-to-the-hand as your next commerce machine. They actually replied to my review. And the reply is (as you can possibly still see underneath the review):""""""""""""""""""""""""" Reply from SaturnPublished 9 hours agoVielen Dank, dass Sie uns Ihr Anliegen geschildert haben.Bitte senden Sie uns dies per E-Mail zusammen mit Ihren Kontaktdaten an kontakt_saturn.de.Wir freuen uns, wenn Sie uns die M√∂glichkeit geben Ihr Anliegen zu kl√§ren."""""""""""""""""""""""""So, what just happened? They didn't read that I had mailed this to them already and that I even included their response. And replied with a standard-text, just like the one I quoted.
Response: Vielen Dank, dass Sie uns Ihr Anliegen geschildert haben. Bitte senden Sie uns dies per E-Mail zusammen mit Ihren Kontaktdaten an kontakt@saturn.de.Wir freuen uns, wenn Sie uns die M√∂glichkeit geben Ihr Anliegen zu kl√§ren.
